eng_prompt: Residents were startled by a loud commotion coming from the park. As they gathered to investigate, they quickly realized something unusual was unfolding.
lug_prompt: Abatuuze baatidde olw'eddoboozi ery'omwanguka okuva mu ppaaka. Nga bakungaana okunoonyereza, baakiraba mangu nti waliwo ekintu ekitali kya bulijjo ekyali kigenda mu maaso.
ach_prompt: Lwak gubedo ki lworo madit tutwal I kom woo ma obedo kabino ki I park. Ikare ma gucokke me timo kwed, gunongo ni gin mo ma pat tye ka time.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga lukatutubet okuriaka noi naelomunit kotoma aiboisit naidarere itiang. Neautar kesi atukokin kanu aingic, apotu kesi kojenutu atipet ebe ejai ibore yenitegelikina iswamasi.
lgg_prompt: O'duko okporu efupi engazu pari anyapa asea 'diyi ma ta mbazuri gba 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi urisi. Yi oku yi ti e'yo vuti ondazu, yi ega mbeleru e'yo azi 'bani nile ku ni i 'yeria.
nyn_prompt: Abatuuragye bakatiina orwari rw'amaani kuruga omu paaka. Kubarikuteeranira hamwe okucondooza, bakareeba ngu hariho ekintu kitari kya buriijo ekyabaire nikigyenda omu maisho.

eng_prompt: Despite the rising number of COVID-19 cases in their area, the group felt a strong desire to maintain their social connections. They believed that their need for companionship outweighed the risks associated with the pandemic.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde omuwendo gw'abalwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe gweyongedde mu kitundu kyabwe, ekibinja kyawulira okwagala okw'amaanyi okukuuma enkolagana yabwe n'abantu. Baalowooza nti obwetaavu bwabwe obw'okukolagana n'abalala bwali businga akabi akali mu ssenyiga omukambwe.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni wel dano matye ki two korona tye ka medde i kabedogi, gurup ne gubedo ki miti matek me bedo kacel ki dano. Gin onongo gitye ki niyee ni miti gi me bedo ki lurem obedo tek loyo peko ma two korona okelo.
teo_prompt: Karaida iyata enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka naka COVID-19 kotoma aiboisit kec, apotu egurupu opupoto eipuda loepol noi loka aimorikikin keda itunga. Iyuunitos kesi ebe ejai eipud loka aimorikikina adepar atiokisio nu ejaas keda adeka naka ekorona.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba azo COVID-19 niri be angu eyivile 'diyi ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tuzu ra ti, amuti 'da ma ava okporu aa'zu eyi ma eselea. Yi a'i ra kini e'yo yini lezu yi ma eselea 'diyi aga e'yo ewaru azo 'dezaniri be 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okweyongyera kw'omuhendo gw'abarwaire ba COVID-19 omukyanga kyabo, guruupu ekahurira ekyetengo ky'amaani eky'okuguma nibakwatanisa. Bakaba nibaikiriza ngu ekyetengo kyabo ky'okukwatanisa kikasinga oburemeezi oburikureetwa endwara ruranda nsi.

eng_prompt: In a small town where gatherings were strictly prohibited, a group of friends decided to organize a football match to lift their spirits. Despite the risks, they couldn't resist the urge to play and enjoy the game together.
lug_prompt: Mu kabuga akatono nga enkungaana zaali ziwereddwa nnyo, ekibinja ky'emikwano kyasalawo okutegeka omuzannyo gw'omupiira okusobola okubazzaamu amaanyi. Newankubadde waaliwo akabi, tebaasobola kuziyiza kwegomba kuzannya n'okunyumirwa omuzannyo nga bali bombi.
ach_prompt: I taun mo matidi kama ki juku iye gure pa dano, lurem mogo gumoko tamgi me yubu tuku odilo me jingo cwinygi. Kadi bed ni peko ne obedo tye, pe gubedo ki miti me tuko ki nongo mit pa tuku ne kacel.
teo_prompt: Ko otaun lodidi lo mam ecamakitai atukonokin, apotu ipaperokec kitemokisi aitemokin abolia naka emopira kanu aikeun iponesiokec. Karaida ejaas atiokisio, mam kesi apedorete aitikitik eipud loka abolia ka alelakin abolia nepepe.
lgg_prompt: Tawuni werea 'bani okuta ogazu okporu 'diyi ma alia, ongulumu agyipi yini 'diyi asi e'yo 'du mupira tuza otuzu yi ma ava engazu. E'yo ewaru 'diyi ma talasi, eyi awini ava avita avizu azini ayiko esuzu tualu ri oga ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu kabuga kakye ahu enteerane zaabaire zitarikwikirizibwa, guruupu y'abanywani ekasharamu kutebekanisa omuzaano gw'omupiira gw'ebigyere okubagaruramu amaani. Oihireho akabi, tibarabaasize kwangira ekyetengo ky'okuzaana hamwe n'okushemererwa omu muzaano.

eng_prompt: In a moment of desperation, the young man felt cornered and overwhelmed by fear. He glanced at the officer, his heart racing as he contemplated a reckless decision.
lug_prompt: Mu kaseera k'okuggwaamu essuubi, omuvubuka yawulira ng'asibiddwa mu nsonda era ng'atidde nnyo. Yatunula ku musirikale ng'omutima gwe gukulukuta ng'alowooza ku kusalawo okw'obulagajjavu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma cwinye otur tutwal, awobi ne owinyo ni lworo omake matek adada. En oryeyo wange I kom abili, cwinye obedo ka goyo matek tutwal I kare ma obedo ka tam I kom moko tam ma pe opore.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apak naka amamus aiyalongong, abu etunganan ngol kowomit ebe ejai akurianu. Abu ngesi kosesen epolisit, kotoma aomisioitike nuikamunitos aomisioitike.
lgg_prompt: Sawa e'yo ewaru ma alia, agupi ode 'da etumu e'yere azini orisi saaru. Eri ndre azi'ba 'da ma mile ra, eri ma asi ri co erini e'yo egazu e'yo 'duzu okpo kokoru ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'okwerarikirira, omutsigazi akahurira ashemereirwe kandi atiinire munonga. Akareeba ofiisa, omutima gwe gukaba niguteera nk'oku arikuteekateeka okukora encwamu y'obutafayo.

eng_prompt: Tensions escalated as protesters clashed with law enforcement, and the atmosphere grew increasingly volatile. In an attempt to regain control, the authorities made a controversial decision.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bweyongera nga abekalakaasi balwanagana n'abakuumaddembe era embeera yeeyongera okutabuka. Mu kaweefube w'okuddamu okufuna obuyinza, ab'obuyinza baakola okusalawo okw'okusika omuguwa.
ach_prompt: Lworo omedde ikare ma lujemo gubedo ka lweny ki lutic cik, ma man okelo lworo madit tutwal. I tute gi me nongo twero, lutela gumoko tam ma kelo apoka-poka.
teo_prompt: Apotu ingungeta kiyatakinos naarai apotu ediyak ogiroto keda ipolisin, ido abu ejautene koraun loetiono noi. Kotoma aitam ainyakakin apedorosio, apotu apedorosio kiswamata aseunet naetiono noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma omgbo tu 'ba ngiringiri 'yepi 'diyi ni e'yo 'yezu 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi pie, dika e'yo 'da eca ewaru. O'bita okpo esuzuri ma alia, drice'ba 'diyi 'du e'yo 'duza e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke bukongyera ahabw'abeshaaringi kurwanagana n'abarikukwatisa ebiragiro, n'embeera yeyongyera kuba ey'akabi. Omu kugyezaho kugaruraho obutegyeki, ab'obushoborozi bakacwamu omu muringo ogutahikire.

eng_prompt: After assessing his condition, the doctors determined that he required specialized care. They quickly arranged for his transfer to another hospital equipped to handle his needs.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukebera embeera ye, abasawo baakizuula nti yeetaaga obujjanjabi obw'enjawulo. Baakola mangu enteekateeka okumutwala mu ddwaliro eddala eririna byonna ebyetaagisa okukola ku byetaago bye.
ach_prompt: Inge ngiyo kit ma en tye kwede, ludaktari gumoko ni en mito kony pa ludaktari ma ludiro. Cutcut guyube me kobo I ot yat mukene matye ki jami weng ma mite me tic I kome.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor ejautene ke, apotu imurok kotemasi ebe ekot ngesi amukian na itegelikina. Apotu kesi itemonokinos katipet aijulanar ngesi adekis ace naedolit kanu aitemokin ipudesiake.
lgg_prompt: Dakitari eyi ma vuti ondazu 'bori ma vutia, eyi esu kini eri le aro wura ndusi 'diyi. Eyi otu e'yo mbeleru eri ojazu arojo nduni ma alea eyini ani ecozu e'yo erini le 'diyi ma aza kozu ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma embeera ye, abashaho bakasharamu ngu akaba nayetenga obujanjabi bw'omutaano. Bakatereeza ahonaaho okutwarwa omwirwariro erindi eririkwetengwa kukora ahabyetaago bye.

eng_prompt: After gathering all the evidence and interviewing several witnesses, the team realized they needed to dig deeper into the case. With new leads emerging, they decided to pursue every possible angle.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukung'aanya obujulizi bwonna n'okubuuza abajulizi abawerako, ttiimu yakizuula nti beetaaga okusima ennyo mu musango. Olw'obulagirizi obupya obwali bufuluma, baasalawo okukola buli kimu ekisoboka.
ach_prompt: Inge coko caden weng ki penyo lucaden mapol, dul ne oniang ni omyero gumed kwedgi matut I kom lok ne. Kit ma lutela manyen gubino kwede, gumoko tam gi me timo jami weng ma twere.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka atukun aitogogongoret kere ka aingitingit ajenak luipu, apotu itimun kojenutu ebe ibusakinit kesi aingic akiro nuikamunitos emusago ngol. Keda apolor naka itunga luitetiak, apotu kesi koseutu aitolot akiro kere nuepedorete kesi aswam.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eceza dria trazu 'bori ma vutia azini 'ba sadiniru 'diyi ozizu 'bori ma vutia, amuti 'da esu ra kini le yi ma oga e'yo nde ma alia drile. E'yo driceza o'diru ni efuzu 'boria, eyi ai e'yo dria ecopi ra 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okurundaana obujurizi bwona n'okubuuza abajurizi baingi, tiimu eketegyereza ngu eshemereire kushwijuma omushango. Ahabw'okureebeka ngu abantu abasya nibarugaho, bakasharamu kukora buri kimwe ekirikubaasika.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent events, the community leaders gathered the young people to discuss the situation. They emphasized the importance of handling the circumstances with maturity and poise.

teo_prompt: Katupitos nuapotu kotakanutu pac, apotu engarenok lu atutubet kitukokinos atumunak kanu aitemitem ejautene. Apotu kesi kitogogongoto ajokis naka aitikitik ejautene ngol kopone kaloajokan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo i 'yepi o'diru 'diyisi, drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi tra 'ba ode eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo 'da ma dria. Eyi fe okpo orodri 'bani e'yo 'da eyi ma aza kozu okporu azini asi driasi ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebyabaireho obwahati, abeebembezi b'ekyanga bakakorana n'eminyeeto kuhanuura aha nshonga egyo. Bakashoboorora omugasho gw'okukora aha nshonga n'obwegyendesereza n'obwegyendesereza.

eng_prompt: In an effort to maintain order during the upcoming protests, local authorities have issued a stern warning to all participants. They emphasized the importance of following the rules set forth for the event.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okukuuma obutebenkevu mu kwekalakaasa okubindabinda, ab'obuyinza bafulumizza okulabula okw'amaanyi eri abo bonna abakwenyigiramu. Baakakasizza obukulu bw'okugoberera amateeka agaateekebwawo ku mukolo.

teo_prompt: Kotoma aswam na aidar ainapakina kotoma aidiya na ebunit, apotu apedorosio kicorakisi itunga kere. Apotu kesi kitogogongoto ajokis na atupakin ikisila lu itolomunitai kanuka epucit.

eng_prompt: The group had been exploring the abandoned building when a sudden collapse occurred. In the chaos that followed, one of the members died after the incident.
lug_prompt: Ekibinja kyali kyekenneenya ekizimbe ekyasuuliddwa amangu ago ne kigwa. Mu kavuyo akaaddirira, omu ku bammemba yafudde oluvannyuma lw'ebyo ebyali bibaddewo.
ach_prompt: Dul ne onongo gitye ka ngiyo ot ma kiweko ni I kare ma opoto atura. I kuku kuku ma olubu enoni, lamemba acel otoo inge peko eni.
teo_prompt: Auta egurupu airereor aduketait na aponi kojalakinai ne abu aibiror. Kotoma amumu nabu kotup, abu ediopet kotunga kotwana akaulo naka akangas kangin.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu 'da ri de angu jo 'bani adile 'da ma alea ri ma ale andri eyini e'yo ewaru 'yezu 'bori ma vutia. Ngiringiri emupi 'da ma alea, memba alu dra e'yo 'da ma vutia.
nyn_prompt: Guruupu ekaba eriyo neecondooza ekyombeko ekyabaire kirekirweho obu kyagwire. Omu butabanguko obwakuratsireho, omwe ahabanyakibiina akafa bwanyima y'ekyabaireho.

eng_prompt: After an extensive search over the weekend, authorities received a tip that led them to the remote area by the river. As dawn broke, the team prepared to investigate the location where the missing person was last seen.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonya ennyo ku wiikendi, ab'obuyinza baafuna obubaka obwabatuusa mu byalo ku lubalama lw'omugga. Obudde bwe bwakya, ttiimu yeetegese okunoonyereza ku kifo omuntu eyabula we yasemba okulabibwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee yeny matek tutwal I tum cabit, lutela gunongo ngec ma otelogi I kabedo matye I nget nam. Ikare ma piny obino, dul pa dano ne guyube me kwedo kama ngat ma orweny-nyi kineno iye.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic noi kosabiti, apotu apedorosio odumutu akiro nuapotu koyangautu kesi aiboisit na ocaalo lo okide loka ecilet. Kapak naka atupuruc, apotu etimu okapakina aingic aiboisit na awanyunere itunganan yenemamei.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ndaza angiri ma vutia sabitini i deria, drice'ba eyi esu o'duko eyi ma ti ojipi angu caloru yi rapi rara 'da ma tia 'diyi ma alea. O'bitisi, amuti 'da otu eyi e'yo vuti ondazu angu 'bani 'ba avipi 'da ndrezu asizu ri ma dria.

eng_prompt: After a witness reported seeing him near the scene, the police launched an investigation into his activities that night. The evidence began to mount against him, leading to serious allegations.
lug_prompt: Oluvanyuma lw'omujulizi okugamba nti yamulaba okumpi n'ekifo, poliisi yatandika okunoonyereza ku bikolwa bye ekiro ekyo. Obujulizi bwatandika okumuvunaanibwa, ekyaviirako okulumiriza okw'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Inge caden ma owaco ni gunene cok ki kama otimme ie, abili ocako kwed I kom ticce I dyewor enuni. Caden ocako mede I kome, ma okelo adot mapigi tego I kome.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na ajenan alimor ebe abu ngesi koany ngesi eidunya keda aiboisit, apotu ipolisin kogeutu aingic nuiswamat ngesi kware. Apotu aitogogongoret kogeutu aimorikikin ngesi, ido abu koyangau aitoroneta nuepolok.
lgg_prompt: Sadini azi ni e'yo 'yozu erini eri ndrezu angu 'da ma ageia 'bori ma vutia, polisi eyi e'do e'yo vuti ondaza e'yo erini 'ye ini 'dasi 'diyi ma dria. Afa ecetaru 'diyi e'do tu eri ma rua, e'yo 'bani 'yozu eri ma rua onzi 'diyi e'dozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'omujurizi kumureeba haihi n'omwanya, poriisi ekatandika okucondooza aha bikorwa bye ekiro ekyo. Obujurizi bukatandika kumwemerera, ekyarugiremu okubeeherera kw'amaani.

eng_prompt: After receiving the devastating news, she felt a heavy weight in her chest. Memories of their time together flooded her mind, leaving her heartbroken.

teo_prompt: Akaulo naka adumun iyemuto luetioko, abu ngesi kopup ationis naepol noi kotoma atoroboke. Apotu aiituneta nuka apak na ajaar kesi nepepe kilelebunos aomisioke, kojalakisi ngesi etau loebiror.
lgg_prompt: Erini e'yo ewaru 'diyi esuzu 'bori ma vutia, eri etumu e'yo nzizaru i ma agetia. E'yo yini aa'zu tualu 'diyi ma e'yo ega eri ma omi dria, erini ani asi nyozu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okutunga amahurire g'akabi munonga, akahurira oburemeezi bw'amaani omu kifuba kye. Ebiteekateeko by'obwire obu baabaire bari hamwe bikamutamburira omu biteekateeko bye, kandi yaasiga omutima gwe gwahendekire.

eng_prompt: After receiving the phone call in the middle of the night, he felt a sense of dread wash over him. The news that followed shattered his world and left him in disbelief.

nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okutunga esimu ahagati y'ekiro, akagira okutiina kwingi. Amahurire agakuratsireho gakashiisha ensi ye kandi gakamureka atarikubikiriza.

eng_prompt: Despite the overwhelming evidence against him, I firmly believe that the truth will come to light. We have gathered new information that will exonerate him and reveal the real culprit.

lgg_prompt: E'yo ecepi kini eri eza e'yo ra ti, ma a'ira kini e'yo ada ni nga efu amve ra. Ama tra o'dukoti o'dini ngapi eri ma dria e'yo kokoru azini 'ba e'yo 'yepi a'da 'diyi e'dapi ra 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho obujurizi bwingi oburikumuhakanisa, ninyikiriza ngu amazima nigaija kumanywa. Tutungire amakuru masya agarikubaasa kumwihaho orubanja n'okworeka omukozi w'ebibi.

eng_prompt: Once the life of the party, he filled every room with laughter and energy. His vibrant spirit drew people in, making him the center of attention wherever he went.
lug_prompt: Lumu obulamu bw'akabaga, yajjuza buli kisenge n'enseko n'amaanyi. Omwoyo gwe ogw'essanyu gwasikiriza abantu, ne gufuula abantu okumussaako ennyo essira buli we yagendanga.

lug_prompt: Poliisi yatuuse mu kifo ne yeetegereza embeera n'obwegendereza. Bwe beekebejja eyaakosebwa, kyazuuka nti abadde mu kuyombagana okw'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Abili gu oo I kabedo ne ka gukwedo ngo matye katimme. Ikare ma gitye ka pimo ngat ma onongo peko, onen atyer kamaleng ni en obedo I lweny matek tutwal.

lgg_prompt: Polisi eyi eca pari 'da ma alea eyini ani e'yo 'da onezu geri kililiru si. Bani 'ba e'yo 'da ma ale andrizu 'boria, eca e'da kililiru kini eri ebi ovu e'yo ngiringiri ni ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Abaporiisi bakahika aha mwanya kandi bashwijuma embeera n'obwegyendesereza. Kubarikwekyebera omuntu, kikarebeka butunu ngu abaire ari omu butabanguko bw'amaani.

eng_prompt: During the press conference, the authorities provided an update on the incident involving the young boy. They detailed the circumstances surrounding the event and the boy's condition.
lug_prompt: Mu lukung'aana lwa bannamawulire, ab'obuyinza baawaddeyo ebipya ku byabaddewo ebikwata ku mulenzi omuto. Baategeezezza mu bujjuvu embeera eyeetoolodde omukolo n'embeera y'omulenzi.
ach_prompt: Ikare me lok ki luco lok angeya, lutela gumiyo ngec manyen I kom ngo ma otimme I kom awobi matidi ni. Guwaco lok matut I kom ngo ma otimme ki kit ma latin awobi ne tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apak naka einer keda lu iyemuto, apotu apedorosio koinakisi akiro nuitetiak nuikamunitos akangas naka esapat. Apotu kesi kitetemoto akiro nuapotu kotakanutu keda ejautene loka esapat.
lgg_prompt: Sawa 'bani e'yo nzezu 'ba osisia ni 'diyi pie risi, drice'ba eyi fe o'dukoti e'yo i 'yepi agupiamva werea 'da be ri ma dria. Eyi ece e'yo eyi 'yepi e'yo 'da ma alea 'diyi ma dria azini geri agupiamva 'da ni aa'zu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu ruteerane rw'abanyamakuru, ab'obushoborozi bakaha amakuru ag'omutaano agarikukwata ahari omwojo muto. Bakashoboorora gye ebyabaireho aha mukoro hamwe n'embeera y'omwojo.

eng_prompt: After a thorough examination and several tests, the doctors are now ready to share their findings. The family anxiously awaits the results that could explain the boy's sudden condition.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukeberebwa ennyo n'okukeberebwa emirundi egiwera, abasawo kati beetegefu okugabana bye bazudde. Ab'enganda balindirira n'obweraliikirivu ebyava mu kunoonyereza ebiyinza okunnyonnyola embeera y'omulenzi ey'amangu.
ach_prompt: Ingee pimo maber tutwal ki pim mapol, daktari dong tye atera me nywako ngo ma gunongo. Luot tye kakuru adwoki me kwed ma twero tito ngo ma otimme I kom awobi ni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic ejok keda ainwakio naepol, ekapakina kwana imurok aimor akiro kec. Ekapakina ekale aidar akiro nuelomunete kanu aitetem ejautene loka esapat.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani eyi ma rua andrizu kililiru azini eyi ma rua o'bizu 'bori ma vutia, dakitari eyi sa'wa 'disi ngonde e'yo eyini esu 'diyi awazu. Familia 'da te asi driasi o'duko agata agata agata agata agata agata agata agata agata agupiamva 'da niri ma e'yo ecepi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okukyeberwa kurungi n'okukyeberwa emirundi mingi, abashaho hati beteekateekire kugamba ebi bashangire. Eka erinzire n'omuhimbo ebyarugire omu bigyezo ebirikubaasa kushoboorora embeera y'omwojo.

eng_prompt: Authorities are investigating the allegations surrounding the treatment of the boy in custody. If the evidence confirms the claims, serious consequences will follow for those involved.
lug_prompt: Ab'obuyinza banoonyereza ku bigambibwa ku kuyisibwa kw'omulenzi ali mu kaduukulu. Singa obujulizi bukakasa ebigambibwa, ebivaamu bijja kuba bibi nnyo eri abo abakwatibwako.
ach_prompt: Lutela tye ka kwedo adot i kom kit ma kitero kwede awobi matye I buc. Ka caden omoko lok ne, adwogi ne bibedo rac tutwal pi joo matye iye.
teo_prompt: Eutasi apedorosio aingic akiro nuikamunitos epone loeyaitere isap ngol. Arai kitogogong aitogogongoret akiro ngun, epote nuepedorete atakanun mama ejaasi ngul luejaasi toma.
lgg_prompt: Okpo e'ipi eyi e'yo 'bani 'yo eyi ma dria geri 'bani agupiamva 'da 'yezu arujoa ri ma dria ri ma eti onda. Afa e'dapi kini e'yo 'da ada, e'yo onzi 'diyi nga emu 'ba e'yo nde ma alea 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ab'obushoborozi bariyo nibacondooza ebirikukwata aha kutwarizibwa kw'omwojo omu kihome. Obujurizi ku burikuhamya ebirikugambwa, ebirikurugamu nibiija kuba eby'amaani ahari abo abarikukwatwaho.

eng_prompt: In the wake of their tragic loss, the family gathered to discuss the next steps for honoring the boy's memory. They understood the importance of adhering to the law during this difficult time.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okufiirwa kwabwe okw'ekikangabwa, ab'omu maka baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bigenda mu maaso okussa ekitiibwa mu kujjukira kw'omulenzi. Baategedde obukulu bw'okugoberera amateeka mu kaseera kano akazibu.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma gurwenyo lutino gi i peko madit tutwal, lugang ne gugure me nywako tam i kom ngo ma omyero gutim me woro wii awobi ne. Gu niang ber pa lubu cik ikare me peko eni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka atwaniar kec, apotu lukokalekec kiriamunos kanu aitemitem nu ebeit aswam kanu aiitun aiitun esapat. Apotu kesi ojenutu ajokis naka aitup ikisila kotoma apakio kanu nuetioko.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru yini avizu 'bori ma vutia, familia 'da eyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma dria inzita fezu agupiamva 'da ma e'yo egazu. Eyi va orodri azita eyi ma vuti obizu sa'wa ewaru 'di ma alea ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okufeerwa kwabo omu muringo gw'obusaasi, eka ekateeranira hamwe kuhanuura ebindi ebishemereire kukorwa okuheereza omwojo ekitinisa. Bakeetegyereza omugasho gw'okukuratira ebiragiro omu bwire obu bugumire.

eng_prompt: After receiving multiple reports from concerned citizens, the local community gathered to discuss the recent spike in criminal activity. They decided to approach the authorities for assistance, urging them to take immediate action.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okufuna alipoota eziwera okuva mu bannansi abakwatibwako, abantu b'omu kitundu baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku kweyongera kw'obumenyi bw'amateeka gye buvuddeko. Baasalawo okutuukirira ab'obuyinza okufuna obuyambi, nga babakubiriza okubaako kye bakolawo mu bwangu.
ach_prompt: Ingee nongo adwogi tic mapol kibot lwak, lwak gugure me nywako lok I kom tim aranyi matye kamede I kare-ni. Gumoko tam gi me lok ki lutela pi kony kun gi lego gi me timo gin mo oyot oyot.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na adumun iripootan luipu kanejaas itunga lu epodokitos, apotu itunga luka atutubet kimorikikinos kanu aitemitem nuikamunitos aiyatakin naka abilibilio naka ikisila. Apotu kesi odolokisi apedorosio kanu aingarakinio, ilipitos kesi aswam katipet.
lgg_prompt: O'duko karakara eyi esuzu engazu kari anzi asi 'baza be 'diyi vu 'bori ma vutia, ongulumu eyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo 'yeta onzi eyini tupi o'diru 'diyi ma dria. Eyi ai eyi drice'ba eyi vu azakoma esuzu eyini ani eyi ai eyi e'yo 'yezu mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okutunga ripoota nyingi kuruga omu bantu, abantu b'omukyanga baketeeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha kweyongyera kw'emishango. Bakasharamu kuhika aha b'obushoborozi kutunga obuhwezi, barikubashaba kukora ahonaaho.

eng_prompt: After the incident, the victim was rushed to the hospital for treatment. Authorities are now gathering information to understand what happened and are particularly interested in the findings from the medical examination.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'akabenje, eyaakosebwa yaddusibwa mu ddwaliro okufuna obujjanjabi. Ab'obuyinza kati bakung'aanya obubaka okutegeera ekyabaddewo era baagala nnyo ebizuuliddwa okuva mu kukeberebwa kw'abasawo.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngo ma otimme, ngat ma onongo peko ni kitere I ot yat ka nongo kony me yot kom. Lutela kombedi tye ka coko ngec me niang ngo ma otimme dok gitye ki miti tutwalle I kom adwoki me pim pa daktari.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka akangas kangin, aponi kirutarai lo eyarit adekis kanu amukian. Eutasi kwana apedorosio aituk akiro kanu amisiikin nuapotu kotakanutu ido ekotosi noi akiro nuelomunitos kotoma ainwakio.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'da ma vutia, 'ba ari 'ba e'yo nde 'yepiri arojoa aro esuzu. Okpo e'ipi eyi curu'do o'duko tra e'yo i 'yepi 'diyi vazu dika eyi sa'wa driasi ava be e'yo 'bani esu engazu dakitari eyi vu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ekyabaireho, owabaire ateganisiibwe akirukibwa omwirwariro kuragurirwa. Ab'obushoborozi obwahati bariyo nibarundaana amakuru g'okumanya ekyabaireho kandi nibenda kumanya ebirugire omu kukyeberwa kw'abashaho.

eng_prompt: After a long day of playing rough with his friends, the boy returned home with visible bruises and scrapes. His parents were concerned and asked how he had gotten hurt.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala olunaku lulamba ng'azannya n'emikwano gye, omulenzi yakomawo awaka ng'alina ebiwundu bingi. Bazadde be beeraliikirivu era babuuza engeri gye yali afunye obuvune.
ach_prompt: Inge tuku matek ki lureme pi nino mapol, awobi ni odwogo gang ki awano ma nen. Lunyodone gubedo ki lworo dok gupenyo kit ma en onongo awano kwede.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka apak naepol noi naka abolia keda ipaperoke, abu esapat kobongok ore keda aimusungun keda aimusungun. Apotu auriakake opodokinit kosodete aingitingit epone loemusunguna ngesi.
lgg_prompt: O'du ezu avita avizu okporu i ma agyipi yi be 'bori ma vutia, agupi amva 'da ego akua e'yo onzi 'diyi pie. Eri ma tipika eyi ndra asi otiza be eyini ani eri esu nya'biliko eyi ngoniru yari ozizu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'eizooba riringwa ry'okuzaana n'abanywani be, omwojo akagaruka omuka aine ebironda ebirikureebeka. Abazaire be bakerarikirira kandi baamubuuza oku yahutaziibwe.

eng_prompt: Despite his troubling behavior and recent threats, he was left alone without any intervention. Friends and family had expressed their concerns, but no action was taken to ensure his safety.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde yeeyisa bubi n'okutiisibwatiisibwa gyebuvuddeko, yalekebwa yekka nga tewali ayingiddemu. Ab'emikwano n'ab'enganda baali balaze obweraliikirivu bwabwe, naye tewali kyakolebwa okukakasa obukuumi bwe.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni en obedo ki kit marac tutwal ki bura mapol, kiweke kene labongo timo gin mo keken. Lurem ki lugang ne gunyutu lworo gi, ento pe kitimo gin mo me gwoko en.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaasi ngesi keda iponesio luarokok keda aitukurianeta, aponi kojalakinai ngesi bon komam idio ibore iswamat ngesi. Apotu ipapero keda lukokalekec itodutu aiyalongosiokec, konye emamei ibore iswamaunitai kanu awanyun ebe eyuwara ngesi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erini aa'zu e'yo onzi 'yezu azini ori gbaza o'diru 'diyi ma talasi ra ti, 'ba ku eri a'dule e'yo azi kokoru. Agyipi eyi tualu familia eyi pie ece e'yo eyi ma dria asi otiza ra te 'ba awini e'yo 'ye eri ma tambazu ku.
nyn_prompt: N'obu araabe yaabaire aine emicwe mibi hamwe n'okutinatinisibwa, bakamureka wenka, tihaine owabaire naakoraho. Banywani hamwe n'abanyabuzaare bakaba boorekire okwerarikirira kwabo, kwonka tihaine ekikozirwe kureeba ngu aine oburinzi.

eng_prompt: After months of lockdowns and strict health measures, communities are beginning to see a decline in COVID-19 cases. As vaccination rates increase and new treatments become available, many individuals are starting to regain their health.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'omuggalo n'ebiragiro by'ebyobulamu ebikakali, ebitundu bitandise okulaba okukendeera kw'abalwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe. Nga emiwendo gy'okugema gyeyongera n'obujjanjabi obupya bwe bujja, abantu bangi batandise okuwona.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol ma kiloro piny dok ki keto cik matek i kom yotkom, wel dano matye ki two korona tye ka dwogo piny. I kare ma rwom me gwero dano tye ka medde ki bene yoo me cango two manyen tye ka bino, dano mapol tye ka cako nongo yot komgi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka agolokinio naka akwap keda ainapeta nuka angaleu, egeunos itunga asesen aibiror naka adekasinei nuka COVID-19. Neyatakinor aikis ekato keda amukian naitetet, eutasi itunga luipu angaleun.
lgg_prompt: Mba angu ti opiza ma vutia azini e'yo rua alanisi okporu 'diyi ma vutia, ongulumu eyi e'do e'yo 'ba azo COVID-19 niri be 'diyi ma omgbo esi ra. Aro soza ma ongmbo ni tuzu azini aro o'diru 'diyi ni ecazu ci, 'ba karakara eyi e'do eyi ma rua ala esu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi g'okukumiirirwa hamwe n'ebiragiro by'amaani ebirikukwata ahaby'amagara, abantu batandikire kureeba okukyendeera kw'abarwaire ba COVID-19. Nk'oku emihendo y'okugyema eyeyongyeire, n'emibazi misya eriho, abantu baingi batandikire kugarura busya amagara gaabo.

eng_prompt: After careful consideration of their medical needs, the team has decided on the best course of action. As part of the diplomatic mission, the patients will be deployed to the consulate.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulowooza ennyo ku byetaago byabwe eby'obujjanjabi, ttiimu esazeewo ku kikolwa ekisinga obulungi. Ng'ekimu ku bigendererwa by'abakungu, abalwadde bajja kutwalibwa ku kitebe ky'obwapulezidenti.
ach_prompt: Ingee tam matut I kom miti gi me yoto kom, dul pa ludaktari gumoko tam gi I kom ngo ma omyero gutim. Macalo but tic pa luwang gamente, kibicwalo lutwoo ne I gang tic pa gamente.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aomoom ejok nuikamunitos amukian kec, aseutu etimu nu ebeit aswam. Kwape ediope kotoma aswam naka apugan, eponio adekak aipikakin aiboisit naka apugan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo yi ma azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, amuti 'da 'du e'yo 'yeta muke ndeni ri ma dria. E'yo 'bani 'ba azoru 'diyi ma ti pezu ri ma azi ru, 'ba nga 'ba 'ba azoru 'diyi ma ti pe pari azi ngazu 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma n'obwegyendesereza ebyetaago by'eby'amagara gaabo, tiimu eshaziremu kukora ekirikukirayo oburungi. Nk'ekicweka ky'obujunaanizibwa bw'eihanga, abarwaire nibaija kutwarwa aha ntebe y'eihanga.

eng_prompt: In light of the escalating tensions in the region, the government convened an emergency meeting. Officials recognized that the well-being of their citizens was paramount.
lug_prompt: Olw'obunkenke obweyongera mu kitundu, gavumenti yayita olukiiko olw'amangu. Abakungu baakitegeera nti obulamu obulungi bwa bannansi baabwe bwe businga obukulu.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me telle matye I twok piny eni, gamente olwongo kacoke ma opoto atura. Lutela ne guniang ni ber bedo pa anywali gi obedo gin ma pire tek loyo weng.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin akiro nuka ingungeta kotoma aiboisit kangin, abu apugan onyarau airiamun na engeso. Apotu eswamak kojenutu ebe ejokuna noi aijar naka itungakec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru angu 'da ma alea ri ma e'yosi, gamete omve mitingi mbeleru ni. Azi'ba 'da eyi esu ra kini aa'ta muke kari anzi eyivile 'diyini ri eri e'yo okporu ndeni.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obunkenke obweyongyeire omu kyanga, gavumenti ekeeta orukiiko rw'ahonaaho. Abakuru bakareeba ngu amagara marungi g'abatuuragye baabo nig'omugasho munonga.

eng_prompt: Due to the recent outbreak of a contagious virus, health officials have implemented strict safety measures. As a precautionary step, individuals who may have been exposed are required to isolate themselves.
lug_prompt: Olw'okubalukawo kw'akawuka akasiigibwa gyebuvuddeko, abakungu b'ebyobulamu batadde mu nkola enkola enkakali ez'obukuumi. Ng'ekyokwegendereza, abantu abayinza okuba nga baakwatibwa obulwadde balina okweyawula ku balala.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me poto pa two korona ma okato cokcok-ki, lutic me yot-kom guketo cik matek tutwal me gwoko kwo pa dano. Macalo yoo me gwokke, mite ni dano ma onongo two eni omakogi omyero gubed kengi.
teo_prompt: Kanuka abwangun naka adeka naka ekorona, etolomutu eswamak luka angaleu ikisila luka ayuwara. Kwape epone loka ayuwar, ekotoi itunga luejaasi keda adeka aitiak awate kec.
lgg_prompt: O'duko efupi o'di 'diyi ma e'yosi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi 'ba azita okporu ageitema ni 'diyi 'yeta ma alea. Ekile e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma ta mbazu, 'ba le 'ba aa'pi azo 'da be 'diyi ma esele co eyi ma eselea 'ba azi 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okubarukaho kw'akakooko akarikuturira, ab'eby'amagara bateireho enkora y'amaani y'okwerinda. Nk'omuringo gw'okwerinda, abantu abarikubaasa kuba bakwasirwe oburwaire, bashemereire kwetantara abandi.

eng_prompt: Recent clinical trials have shown promising results in treating COVID-19. As a result, healthcare providers are optimistic about the new treatment options available.
lug_prompt: Okugezesa okwakolebwa gye buvuddeko kulaga ebirungi ebivuddemu mu kujjanjaba ekirwadde kya ssenyiga omukambwe. N'ekivuddemu, abasawo balina essuubi ku bujjanjabi obupya obuliwo.
ach_prompt: Pim ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto adwogi maber tutwal I kom two korona. Macalo adwogi ne, lutic yoto kom tye ki gen I kom yoo me cango two manyen matye.
teo_prompt: Ainwakio naka adeka naka ekorona itodunit ebe ejokuna noi kanu aimuke adeka naka ekorona. Kanuka ngun, ejaas angaleu keda amuno kanu amukian nuitetiak nu ejaas.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani o'bi o'diru 'diyi ece e'yo onyiru azo COVID-19 niri ma atita ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba arojo ni 'diyi asi'baza be geri aro esuzu o'diru 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okugyeragyeranisa obwahati kworeka ebirungi omu kuragurira akakooko ka korona. N'ekyarugiremu, abashaho baine amasiko aha bujanjabi obusya oburiho.

eng_prompt: As the pandemic continues to affect communities worldwide, it is crucial for everyone to prioritize their health and safety. Adhering to established protocols can help mitigate the spread of the virus.
lug_prompt: Ng'ekirwadde bbunansi kyeyongera okukosa abantu mu nsi yonna, kikulu nnyo buli omu okukulembeza obulamu bwe n'obukuumi bwe. Okukolera ku mateeka agaateekebwawo kisobola okuyamba okukendeeza ku kusaasaana kw'akawuka.
ach_prompt: Kit ma two korona tye ka mede ki balo kwo pa dano I wilobo lung, pire tek tutwal ni dano weng omyero guket pi yot komgi ki gwokke gi obed gin ma pire tek. Lubu cik ma kiketo twero konyo me gengo nya pa two eni.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinit adeka aimusung itunga kotoma akwap kere, ejok itunga kere aisingarenit angaleukec keda ayuwara. Aitup ikisila lu itolomunitai ingarakini aitikitik awea naka ekorona.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo 'dezaniri ni mu drile ongulumu eyi 'yezu wudrikurusi ndulu risi, eri orodriru 'ba dria eyini eyi ma rua ala azini ageitema 'bazu okporu. Azita 'bani o'bale 'diyi ma vuti obizuri eco azo 'da ma ereta ma omgbo esi ra.
nyn_prompt: Oburwaire burikugumizamu kuteganisa abantu omu nsi yoona, n'eky'omugasho munonga buri omwe kwebembeza amagara n'okwerinda kwe. Okukuratira ebiragiro ebiteirweho nikibaasa kuhwera okukyendeeza okujanjaara kw'akakooko.

eng_prompt: In the interest of public health and individual privacy, it is crucial to consider the implications of revealing personal information about those infected with the virus. Protecting the confidentiality of patients can help encourage more individuals to seek testing and treatment without fear of stigma.
lug_prompt: Ku lw'obulungi bw'obulamu bw'abantu n'obwannannyini bw'omuntu, kya mugaso okulowooza ku biva mu kubikkula ebikwata ku abo abakwatibwa akawuka. Okukuuma ebyama by'abalwadde kisobola okuyamba okukubiriza abantu abalala okwekebeza n'okufuna obujjanjabi awatali kutya kuvumibwa.
ach_prompt: Pi ber bedo pa yot kom pa lwak ki bedo pa ngat acel acel, pire tek tutwal me tamo I kom adwoki me nyutu ngec pa ngat matye ki two eni. Gwoko mung pa lutwo twero konyo me cuku cwiny dano mapol me pime ki nongo yat labongo lworo me lewic.
teo_prompt: Kanu aidar angaleu naka itunga keda aiyeyea naka itunga, ejok aomoom nuepedorete atakanun kanu aitijenar akiro nuikamunitos itunga lu edekasi ekorona. Aidar aiyeyea naka adekak ingarakini aisinyikokit itunga luipu aimo ainwakio ka amukian komam akurianar.
lgg_prompt: O'bi ma rua ala ma ta mbazu azini e'yo 'ba yi ma ngulupi ni 'diyi ma dria, eri orodriru e'yo 'bani eco 'ye e'yo yi ma ngulupi ni 'diyi ecezu 'ba azo be 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma dria ri ma dria. ꞋBani ꞌba azoru ꞌdiyi ma eꞌyo yi ma ngulupisi ꞌdiyi ma ta mbazuri eco fe ꞌba karakara yi dri ava esuzu yi ma rua oꞌbizu azini aro esuzu ori kokoru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'eby'amagara g'abantu hamwe n'obuntu buntu, n'eky'omugasho munonga okureeba ebirikubaasa kuruga omu kugamba ebirikukwata ahari abo abakwasirwe akakooko ka korona. Okurinda ebihama by'abarwaire nikibaasa kuhwera abantu okwenda kukyeberwa n'okutunga obujanjabi bateine kutiina kujumwa.

eng_prompt: As the number of COVID-19 cases continues to rise in the region, local health officials are assessing the readiness of medical facilities. Recent evaluations indicate that the hospitals in Arua are well-equipped to manage the influx of patients.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuwendo gw'abalwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe gweyongera okulinnya mu kitundu, abakungu b'ebyobulamu mu kitundu beetegereza obwetegefu bw'ebyobulamu. Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga nti amalwaliro mu Arua galina byonna ebyetaagisa okusobola okukola ku balwadde abayingira mu kibuga.
ach_prompt: Kit ma wel dano matye ki two korona tye ka medde i twok piny eni, lutic me yot kom me tedero gitye ka neno kit ma odi yadi tye atera kwede. Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki nyutu ni odi yadi me Arua tye ki jami weng ma mite me tic i kom wel lutwo matye kabino.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka naka COVID-19 kotoma aiboisit, eutasi eswamak luka angaleu aanyun ebe ekapakina aiboisio nuka amukian. Aingic napac itodunit ebe ejaasi adekisia nuka Arua keda iboro luedolitos kanu aitikitik adekak luipu.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba azo COVID-19 niri be 'diyi ni mu drile tu angu 'di ma alea, azi'ba arojo ni angu 'da ma alea 'diyi otuta arojo eyini 'diyi ma ale andri. E'yo eti ondaza o'diru 'diyi ece kini arojo Arua 'diyi ma alea afa dria ci 'ba azoru 'diyi ma emuta ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Omuhendo gw'abarwaire ba COVID-19 nigugumizamu kweyongyera omu kyanga, abakuru omu by'amagara omu byaro bariyo nibashwijuma okwetebekanisa kw'amarwariro. Okucondooza okuhweireho nikworeka ngu amarwariro omuri Arua gaine eby'okukoresa ebirikumara kurwanisa abarwaire abarikwija.

eng_prompt: In response to the rapid spread of the virus, a coordinated effort was initiated to address the escalating health crisis. Health officials emphasized the importance of collaboration between the medical department and the community to effectively manage the situation.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okusaasaana kw'akawuka mu bwangu, kaweefube eyakwasaganyizibwa yatandikibwawo okukola ku buzibu bw'ebyobulamu obweyongera. Abakungu b'ebyobulamu bakkaatiriza obukulu bw'okukolagana wakati w'ekitongole ky'ebyobulamu n'ekitundu okusobola okukwasaganya obulungi embeera.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me nya pa two korona, kicako tic matek me lweny i kom peko me yot kom matye kamede. Lutic yoto kom guwaco ni ber tutwal me winye ikin lutic yoto kom ki lwak me tic maber i kom peko eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin awea na ekorona, aponi kitegearai aswam naepol noi kanu aitemokin ationis naka angaleu. Apotu eswamak lu adekis kitogogongoto ajokis na aiswamanara kiding ewai lo adekis keda itunga kanu aitikitik ejok ejautene.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo korona niri ma ereta okposi ri ma e'yosi, 'ba e'do okpo 'ba eyi ma eselea e'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma aza kozu. Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi fe okpo orodri ti ecita ni arakala arojo ni 'diyi ma eselea ongulumu eyi pie ri ma dria e'yo nde ma aza kozu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okujanjaara kw'akakooko ahonaaho, hatandikirweho enteekateeka y'okukora ahaburemeezi bw'eby'amagara obweyongyeire. Abakuru omu by'amagara, bakahamya omugasho gw'okukwatanisa ahagati y'ekitongore ky'eby'amagara hamwe n'abantu b'omubyaro, okubaasa kukora aha nshonga egi.

eng_prompt: During a recent visit to the local hospital, the minister observed the dedication and hard work of the health practitioners. He was impressed by their commitment to providing quality care to the community.
lug_prompt: Mu kulambula eddwaliro ly'omu kitundu gye buvuddeko, minisita yeetegereza obumalirivu n'okukola ennyo kw'abasawo. Yakwatibwako nnyo olw'obumalirivu bwe balina mu kuwa abantu obujjanjabi obw'omutindo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma en olimo ot yat me tedero cokcok-ki, minista oneno kit ma lutic yoto kom tye ka tic matek kwede. En obedo ki yom cwiny I kom miti gi me miyo kony me yot kom maber bot lwak.
teo_prompt: Kapak naka aipejokin adekis naka atutubet, abu eminista koany ainakina keda aswam naepol naka eswamak luka angaleu. Abu ngesi iyalama noi kanu ainakina kec aijanakin itunga amukian na abeit.
lgg_prompt: Sawa acizu arojo 'da ma alea eturisi, minisita nderi ndre ava azini azi okporu 'ba azi ngapi arojoa 'diyiniri ra. Eri ndra ayikosi e'yo yini asi 'bazu azakoma fele onyiru 'diyi fezu ongulumu eyidri ri si.
nyn_prompt: Omu kutaayaayira eirwariro ry'ekyaro, minisita akareeba obweziriki n'okukora n'amaani kw'abashaho. Akashemererwa ahabw'obweziriki bwabo omu kuheereza abantu obujanjabi burungi.

eng_prompt: As news of the virus spread rapidly across the globe, communities began to feel a growing sense of unease. Health officials urged the public to take precautions, leading to widespread anxiety about potential exposure.
lug_prompt: Amawulire g'akawuka bwe geeyongera okusaasaana mu nsi yonna, abantu baatandika okweraliikirira. Abakungu b'ebyobulamu baakubiriza abantu okwegendereza, ekiviiriddeko okweraliikirira okungi ku kukwatibwa.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lok kom kwidi ne onya oyot-oyot tutwal I wilobo lung, lwak gucako winyo lworo madit tutwal. Lutic me yot kom gulego lwak me gwoke, ma oweko dano mapol gubedo ki lworo I kom two.
teo_prompt: Neakerianar akiro nuikamunitos adeka naka ekorona kotoma akwap kere, apotu itunga kogeutu aiyalongong noi. Apotu eswamak luka angeleu isinyikokisi itunga aidar acoa, ido abu koyangau aiyalongong naepol noi kanu adumun adekasinei.
lgg_prompt: O'duko azo 'da ma dria ri ni i erezu mbeleru wudrikuru ma alea ndulu, ongulumu eyi e'do e'yo ega e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma dria. Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ai o'bi eyi e'yo eyi ma tambazu, e'yo fepi 'ba karakara eyini aa'zu asi otiza be e'yo eyini ecozu eyi esuzu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Amahurire g'akakooko ka korona ku gaabaire nigajanjaara omu nsi yoona, abantu bakagira okwerarikirira kwingi. Abakuru omu by'amagara bakashaba abantu okwetantara, ekyaretsireho okwerarikirira kw'abantu baingi ahabw'oburemeezi oburikubaasa kubaho.

eng_prompt: Health officials in Uganda have reported a concerning rise in COVID-19 cases across the country. In particular, the West Nile region is experiencing a surge in infections, prompting increased testing and public health measures.
lug_prompt: Abakungu b'ebyobulamu mu Uganda bategeezezza ku kweyongera kw'abalwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe okweraliikiriza okwetooloola eggwanga. Okusingira ddala, ekitundu kya West Nile kifuna okweyongera mu kukwatibwa kw'obulwadde, ekireetedde okwongera okukebera n'enkola z'ebyobulamu.
ach_prompt: Lutic me yot kom I lobo Uganda guwaco ni wel dano matye ki two korona tye ka medde tutwal I lobo man. I rwom ma lamal, but lobo me west nile tye ka nongo nyaa pa two, ma oweko kipimo dano mapol dok bene kimedo rwom me gwoko yotkom pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Apotu eswamak lu adekis ko Uganda olimosi ebe iyata noi enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka naka COVID-19 kakwap. Kacut, ejai aiboisit nako West Nile aiyatakin na adekasinei, eyangaunit ainwakio keda ainapeta nuka angaleu.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi ece e'yo 'ba azo COVID-19 niri be 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu kari 'di ma alea ndulu ri ma dria. Tutunisi angu westnile niri ma alea, azo eyi ma omgbo ni tu ra, e'yo 'bani azo eyi ma ari o'bi eyi ma rua o'bi eyi ma rua o'bi eyi ma rua o'bi eyi ma rua o'bi eyi ma rua o'bi eyi ma rua o'bi eyi ma rua o'bi eyi ma rua o'bi eyi ma rua o'bi eyi ma rua o'bi eyi ma rua o'bi eyi
nyn_prompt: Ab'ebyamagara omuri Yuganda bagambire aha kweyongyera kw'abarwaire ba COVID-19 okwetoroora eihanga. Okukira munonga omu kicweka kya West Nile harimu okweyongyera kw'oburwaire, ekirikureetera okukyebera n'okukuratira ebiragiro by'ebyamagara.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent surge in coronavirus cases, it is crucial to implement comprehensive safety measures. To effectively contain the spread of the virus, proactive testing strategies must be employed.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kweyongerayongera kw'abalwadde b'akawuka ka kolona gyebuvuddeko, kikulu nnyo okussa mu nkola enkola zonna ez'obukuumi. Okutangira obulungi okusaasaana kw'akawuka, enkola z'okukebera mu bwangu zirina okukozesebwa.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki medde pa wel dano matye ki two corona, pire tek tutwal me keto jami weng ma mite me gwoko kwo gi itic. Me gengo nya pa two eni, omyero ki tii ki yoo mapat-pat me pimo.
teo_prompt: Koipone kalo iyatakinor enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda ekorona, ejokuna noi aitodolikin iwaitin lu ayuara. Kanu aitikitik awea naka ekorona, ekot aitwasam iwaitin lu inwakere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba azo korona niri be 'diyi ma kalafe tuzu o'diru ri ma e'yosi, eri orodriru e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma ta mbazu 'diyi 'yezu dria. E'yo azo 'da ma ereta atrizu kililiru, le 'ba ma ayu geri 'bani azo eyi ma rua o'bizu mbeleru 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'abarwaire ba korona omu bwire butari bwa hare, n'eky'omugasho okuta omu nkora engyenderwaho z'okwerinda. Okuzibira okujanjaara kw'akakooko, emiringo y'okukyebera eshemereire kukoresibwa.

eng_prompt: Recent studies have shown a significant correlation between the movement of goods and the spread of COVID-19. As essential workers, truck drivers frequently travel across regions, increasing their exposure to the virus.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga akakwate ak'amaanyi wakati w'entambula y'ebyamaguzi n'okusaasaana kwa ssenyiga omukambwe. Ng'abakozi abakulu, abavuzi ba biroole batera okutambula okuva mu kitundu ekimu okudda mu kirala ne beeyongera okukwatibwa akawuka.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto wat ikin wot pa jami acata ki nya pa two korona. Macalo lutic ma pigi tego, ludwo mutoka madongo giwoto I but piny mapat-pat, ma weko two korona mako gi tutwal.
teo_prompt: Aingic napac itodunit eidicane loepol noi kiding elose loka iboro keda awea naka COVID-19. Kwape eswamak lu epol ajokis, etapit iderepan luka ilorei alosit aiboisio nuegelegela, ido iyatakitos kesi adumun adeka naka ekorona.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza o'diru 'diyi ece ti ecita okporu acizu afa ozizaru 'diyi ma eselea azini COVID-19 ma ereta ma eselea ci. Azi'ba orodriru 'diyi ru, dereva lorini 'diyi aci angu ndundu eyi ma alea sa'wa driasi eyini ani ecozu azo 'da esuzu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka okukwatanisa ahagati y'okutambura kw'ebintu n'okujanjaara kwa COVID-19. Nk'abakozi abakuru, abavugi b'ebimotoka ebihango nibatambura omu myanya mingi, ekirikubareetera kukwatwa akakooko.

eng_prompt: In any society, the foundation of peace and stability relies on the adherence to rules and regulations. Without a commitment to uphold these principles, chaos and disorder can quickly ensue.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu kyonna, omusingi gw'emirembe n'obutebenkevu byesigama ku kugoberera amateeka n'ebiragiro. Awatali kwewaayo kunyweza misingi gino, akavuyo n'obutabanguko bisobola okujjawo mangu.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mo keken, guti me kuc ki ber bedo jenge I kom lubu cik. Labongo keto cwiny me lubu cik magi, kuku kuku ki kuku kuku twero bino oyot-oyot tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet adio, eswamae lo aipuc ka ainapakina erai aitup ikisila ka ainapeta. Arai mam itunga iswamaete ngun, epedorete amumu keda amumu alomun atipet.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu dria ma alea, e'yo asianzu ni azini e'yo otuza ni 'diyi ma vuti obiza ma dria. ꞋBani asi ꞌbazu eꞌyo ꞌdiyi ma ta mbazu kuri kokoru, ngiringiri azini eꞌyo onzi ꞌdiyi eco efu mbeleru ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu kicweka kyona,omusingye gw'obusingye n'obutebekana nigwegamira okukuratira ebiragiro n'ebiragiro. Hatariho okwehayo kukuratira engyenderwaho ezi, akavuyo n'obutabanguko nibibaasa kubaho juba.

eng_prompt: As the townspeople gathered in the square, a sudden explosion shattered the peaceful afternoon. In the chaos that ensued, the priest rushed to help the wounded, only to find himself caught in the blast.
lug_prompt: Abantu b'omu kabuga bwe baakuŋŋaanidde mu kibangirizi, okubwatuka okw'amangu kwataataaganya olweggulo olw'emirembe. Mu butabanguko obwaddirira, omusosodooti yayanguwa okuyamba abalumiziddwa, kyokka yeesanga nga yeekutte mu kubwatuka.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma dano me boma gucokke i dye bar, muduku ma opoto atura obalo kuc ma obedo tye. I kuku kuku ma obedo tye, padi ne oringo me konyo jo ma onongo awano, ento en onongo ni en omakke I poto pa muduku.
teo_prompt: Neautatar itunga luka eibuga atukonokin kotoma aiboisit naingadaere ikapun, abu ebulone itolitol atibong nainapakina. Kotoma amumu nabu kotakanu, abu esaserodoti kogeu aingarakin ngul luemusunguna, konye abu kodum akekuan kotoma abwangun.
lgg_prompt: O'bi tawuni ni 'diyi ni eyi trazu pari 'da ma alea risi, e'yo 'bani eyi ogbizu mbeleru ri eza etu asianzuru etu ala ni 'da ra. Ngiringiri 'da ma alea, padere 'da ari i 'ba nya'biliko esupi 'diyi ma aza kozu, te eri esu i e'bi e'yo 'bani eyi ogbizu ri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Obu abantu b'omururembo barikweteeranira omu kibangirizi, okubwatuka kw'amaani kukashiisha omwebazyo ogwabaire guri ogw'obusingye. Omu butabanguko obwarugiremu,omwahure akarahuka kuhwera abahutaziibwe, kwonka yashangwa akwatsirwe omu kubwatuka.

eng_prompt: During the interrogation, the officers presented the evidence they had gathered against him. Despite the mounting proof, the accused maintained his innocence.
lug_prompt: Mu kubuuzibwa ebibuuzo, abasirikale baayanjudde obujulizi bwe baali bakung'aanyizza ku ye. Wadde nga waliwo obujulizi bungi, omuwaawabirwa yagamba nti talina musango.
ach_prompt: Ikare me lapeny, abili gumiyo caden ma gunongo I kome. Kadi bed ni caden tye mapol, ngat ma ki keto bal iwiye ni pe otimo bal.
teo_prompt: Kapak naka aingisingisio, apotu ipolisin itodutu ajenanut nu atukunitos kesi kanuke. Karaida ejai aitogogongoret naepol noi, abu lo iwosatai kitogogong ebe mam nges adiakarit.
lgg_prompt: Sawa 'bani eri ozizurisi, azi'ba 'da eyi e'da afa ecetaru eyini tra eri ma dria 'diyi. Afa ecetaru 'diyi ma talasi, agu 'bani to 'da 'yo kini i e'yo kokoru.
nyn_prompt: Omu kubuuzibwa ebibuuzo, abapooriisi bakareeta obujurizi obubarikurundaana kumuhakanisa. Oyihireho obuhame obweyongyeire, orikujunaanwa akaguma ataine rubanja.

eng_prompt: As the trial unfolded, the defense team began to uncover inconsistencies in the evidence presented. They suspected that the prosecutor's actions were driven by personal interests rather than a commitment to justice.
lug_prompt: Okuwozesebwa bwe kwali kugenda mu maaso, ttiimu y'oludda oluwaabi yatandika okuzuula obutakwatagana mu bujulizi obwanjuddwa. Baateebereza nti ebikolwa by'omuwaabi wa gavumenti byali bya kweyagaliza so si kwewaayo eri obwenkanya.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma pido ne tye kawot anyim, langol kop ocako niang lok mapat-pat matye I caden ma kimiyo. Gubedo ki byek ni tic pa langol kop ne obedo pi miti pa ngat acel acel me kaka keto cwinygi I kom ngolo kop matir.
teo_prompt: Neautar emusago ngol alosit, abu etimu loka etepegak kogeu ajenun ebe emamei akiro kotoma ajenanut naetodiaritai. Apotu kesi kowomitos ebe aswamisio nuka lo ewosan erai kanuka ipudesia luka itunganan mere kanu aitodolikin etube loajokan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo liza kotia ri ni mu drile, amuti 'ba a'di 'dipi 'diyi e'do e'yo e'dapi kini e'yo azita palaa ku 'diyi isu. Eyi ega kini e'yo 'ba e'yo lipi 'diyi ni 'ye 'diyi ndra e'yo eyi ma ngulupi ni 'diyisi aga ava fezu e'yo liza kililiru ri si.
nyn_prompt: Obu orubanja rwabaire nirugyenda omu maisho, tiimu y'orubanja ekatandika kureeba oburemeezi omu bujurizi obwaretsirwe. Bakaba nibateekateeka ngu ebikorwa by'omuhababi w'eishe - emwe bikaba nibireetwa ebyetengo bye kutari kwehayo ahabw'oburingaaniza.

eng_prompt: The court has taken into consideration the defendant's health and circumstances. After reviewing the evidence, the judge expressed concerns about the appropriateness of incarceration for someone in such a vulnerable state.
lug_prompt: Kkooti erowoozezza ku mbeera y'obulamu bw'omuwawabirwa n'embeera ye. Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya obujulizi, omulamuzi yalaze obweraliikirivu ku ky'okusibira omuntu ali mu mbeera embi bwetyo.
ach_prompt: Kot otamo I kom yotkom pa ngat ma ki keto bal iwiye ki kit ma kwo ne tye kwede. Ingee ngiyo caden, langol kop onyuto lworo I kom bedo ber pa bedo I buc pi ngat matye I peko ma kit man.
teo_prompt: Abu ekooti koany nuikamunitos angaleu naka lo iwosatai keda ejautenekec. Akaulo naka airereor aitogogongoret, abu atubon kitodu aiyalongongokec kanuikamunitos aiwen itunganan kotoma ojautene loetiono noi.
lgg_prompt: Dwani 'du e'yo 'ba 'bani toleri ma rua ala azini e'yo i 'yepi 'diyi ma dria indi. E'yo eceza ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba e'yo lipiri ece asi otiza e'yo 'bani 'ba azi arujoa e'yo ewaru 'dile 'diyi ma alea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Kooti eteekateekire aha magara g'omuhababirwa hamwe n'embeera ye. Ahanyima y'okushwijuma obujurizi,omuramuzi akooreka okwerarikirira ahabw'oburingaaniza bw'okusibira omuntu omu mbeera nk'egyo etarikwetengwa.

eng_prompt: In a highly unusual case that drew significant media attention, the courtroom was filled with tension as the defense and prosecution presented their arguments. The nature of the allegations raised complex questions about morality and accountability within the clergy.
lug_prompt: Mu musango ogutaali gwa bulijjo ogwasikiriza bannamawulire abangi, kkooti yajjula okusika omuguwa nga abawolereza n'oludda oluwaabi baleeta ensonga zaabwe. Engeri y'ebigambibwa yaleetawo ebibuuzo ebizibu ku mpisa n'obuvunaanyizibwa mu bannaddiini.
ach_prompt: I pido ma pe obedo yot tutwal ma oywayo tam pa lucoo lok angea, ot kot opong ki lworo I kare ma adot ki adot okelo lok meggi. Kit adot ne okelo lapeny matek tutwal I kom tim ki kor tic I kin lutela dini.
teo_prompt: Kotoma omusago lomam etapit noi loabu koyangau akiro nuka iyemuto, abu adieket kileleba keda aiyalongong naarai apotu itunga luitepesenitai keda luitepesenitai kitodiasi akiro kec. Apotu akiro ngun kitolomutu aingiseta nuikamunitos iponesio lukajokak keda eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun luka ekanisa.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azi wura ndusi ni ma alia e'yo 'ba e'yo oyu'ba 'diyi ni asi 'bazu drinia angiri ri ma alia, dwani ma alia 'ba e'yo liza ni azini 'ba e'yo liza ni 'diyi e'da e'yo yini 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'bani 'yole 'diyi ma wura eji zita kongolokoru e'yo adriza onyiruri ma dria azini geri 'bani e'yo 'yezu 'diyi ma dria drice'ba kanisa ni 'diyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Omu mushango ogutari gwa buriijo ogwaretsireho amahurire maingi, kooti ekaba eijwire obunkenke nk'oku orubanja n'orubanja rwabaire nirushoboorora enshonga zaabo. Omuringo gw'ebyabaire nibigambwa gukareetaho ebibuuzo by'amaani ebirikukwata aha mitwarize n'embaririra y'abeebembezi b'ediini.

eng_prompt: The investigation has been thorough, yet all leads have turned up empty. Despite numerous testimonies, none directly implicate the accused in the crime.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza kukoleddwa mu bujjuvu, naye ebikakasa byonna byazuuliddwa nga bikalu. Wadde nga waliwo obujulizi bungi, tewali bukwata butereevu ku oyo avunaanibwa mu musango.
ach_prompt: Kwed ne obedo maber tutwal, ento lok weng ma obedo tye obedo nono. Kadi bed ni caden obedo pol, pe tye ngat mo ma onyuto atir ni ngat ma ki keto bal iwiye ni otimo bal meno.
teo_prompt: Ajai aingic naepol noi, konye emamei akiro kere nuikamunitos akiro ngun. Karaida ipu ajenanut, emamei idiotunganan yenepedori aitodun ebe abu lo iwosatai iswamat emusago ngol.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza 'di ebi ovu kililiru, te e'yo dria 'diyi efu pirini. E'yo eceza karakara 'diyi ma talasi, 'ba azi e'yo 'bani to 'da ma dria e'yo onzi 'da ma alea ni yo.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza kugyenzire kurungi, kwonka ebyarugiremu tibirimu. N'obu haraabe hariho obujurizi bwingi, tihaine oburikworeka ngu orikujunaanwa akakora ekihagaro.

eng_prompt: During the hearing, the prosecution presented evidence suggesting that the accused posed a flight risk. As a result, the state attorney was against granting the accused a court bail.
lug_prompt: Mu kiseera ky'okuwulira omusango, oludda oluwaabi lwawa obujulizi obulaga nti omuwawabirwa yali mu katyabaga k'okudduka. N'ekyavaamu, munnamateeka w'eggwanga yali awakanya okuwa omuwawabirwa okweyimirirwa mu kkooti.
ach_prompt: Ikare me winyo lok, adot okelo caden manyuto ni ngat ma ki keto bal iwiye onongo twero ngwec. Macalo adwogi ne, lapilida ma loyo lok kom gamente okwero miyo twero ki ngat ma ki keto bal i kome me bedo mabuc mawoko.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apupio na emusago, abu emusago kitodu ajenanut na itodunit ebe epedori lo iwosatai akerit. Kanuka ngun, abu epulida loka apugan konger acamakin lo iwosatai alacakinio okooti.
lgg_prompt: Sawa e'yo erizuri ma alia, 'ba to'baa 'diyi e'da afa ecepi kini agu 'bani toleri eco apa ra. E'yo 'disi, agu e'yo lipiri ga agata 'bani agu 'bani toleri ofuzu azita pala ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu kuhurira omushango, orubanja rureesire obuhame oburikworeka ngu orikujunaanwa akaba ari omu kabi k'okutoroka. N'ekyarugiremu, puriida w'eihanga akahakanisa orubanja rw'okwemerererwa omu kooti.

eng_prompt: After the arraignment, the defendant was taken into custody, and the legal team began strategizing their next steps. They believed that securing bail was crucial for preparing an effective defense.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuvunaanibwa, omuwawaabirwa yatwaliddwa mu kaduukulu, era ttiimu y'abalamuzi yatandika okuteekateeka ekiddako. Baalowooza nti okufuna okweyimirirwa kyali kikulu nnyo mu kuteekateeka okwewozaako okulungi.
ach_prompt: Ingee cwalo adot, ngat ma ki keto bal iwiye ni kitero I buc, dok lupilida gucako yubu yoo me timo gin mukene. Gitye ki niyee ni nongo kony me bedo mabuc mawoko obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me yubu adot maber.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na aitepesen, aponi oyangarai lo iwosatai, kosodete etimu loka ikisila ageun aitemonokin nu ebeit kesi aswam. Iyuunitos kesi ebe ejokuna noi adumun alacakinio kanu aitemonokin ayuwara najokan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani eri ombezu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba ji agu 'bani toleri arujoa, azini amuti 'ba azitani 'diyi e'do otuta 'ye e'yo yini drile ri ma dria. Yi a'i ra kini 'ba ofuzu azita palaa ri eri orodriru e'yo ageyitema ni kililiru 'diyi otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhababirwa, orikujunaanwa akatwarwa omu kihome, kandi tiimu y'abanyamateeka ekatandika kukora enteekateeka y'ekindi ky'okukora. Bakaba nibaikiriza ngu okwemerererwa kikaba kiri eky'omugasho omu kutebeekanisa okwerinda kurungi.

eng_prompt: In the courtroom, tensions ran high as the prosecution presented their case against the accused. Amidst the heated arguments, the defence lawyers emphasized the importance of upholding the legal rights of their client.
lug_prompt: Mu kkooti, okusika omuguwa kwabadde kungi ng'oludda oluwaabi lulaga omusango gwabwe ku bavunaanibwa. Wakati mu kukaayana okw'amaanyi, bannamateeka b'oludda oluwaabi bakkaatiriza obukulu bw'okukuuma eddembe ly'omuntu waabwe.
ach_prompt: I ot kot, lworo obedo tye ikare ma adot tye i kom ngat ma ki keto bal iwiye. Ikare me laro lok matek tutwal, lupirida pa langol kop guwaco ni pire tek tutwal me gwoko twero pa ngat ma ki ngolo kop i kome.
teo_prompt: Kotoma okooti, apol noi aiyalongong naarai abu lo iwosatai kitodia emusago lo iwosatai. Keda epeget loepol noi, apotu ipulidan luka apugan kitogogongoto ajokis na aidar apedorosio nuka itungakec.
lgg_prompt: Kotia, asi otiza tu uru 'ba e'yo lipi 'diyi ni e'yo yi ma dria 'diyi ecezu 'ba 'bani toleri ma rua. Ngiringiri okporu 'diyi ma talasi, 'ba atita fepi 'diyi 'ba asi orodri 'bani drilemgbo 'ba yini atita fezu 'diyi ma ta mbazuri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kooti, obunkenke bukaba buri ahaiguru obu orubanja rwabaire nirushorooza omushango gwabo aha kihababirwa. Omu kuhakanisa kw'amaani, ba puriida b'orubanja bakahamya omugasho gw'okurinda obugabe bw'omuntu waabo.

eng_prompt: After years of dedicated service to the community, the priest found himself facing serious allegations. Many believe that his age and contributions should be taken into account during the proceedings.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi ng'aweereza abantu, kabona yeesanga ng'avunaanibwa emisango egy'amaanyi. Bangi balowooza nti emyaka gye n'obuyambi bwe birina okulowoozebwako mu misango.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me tic matek pi lwak, padi onongo ni kitye ka lok i kome marac adada. Dano mapol tye ki niyee ni myero kitam I kom mwakane ki jami ma en otimo I kare me winyo lok ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aijanakin itunga, abu esaserodoti kodum ebe ejai aitoroneta nuarokok. Iyuunitos luipu ebe ibusakinit apodokinit ikaruke keda iboro luingarakinete ngesi kotoma apak naka emusago.
lgg_prompt: Eli karakara azi ngazu o'bi eyini 'bori ma vutia, padere 'da esu i e'yo onzi eyi ma dria. Ba karakara eyi ega kini le 'ba ma ega e'yo eli erini 'diyi ma dria tualu afa erini 'ye 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okuheereza abantu, omwahure akeeshangira arikuhakanisibwa munonga. Baingi nibateekateeka ngu emyaka ye hamwe n'obuhwezi bwe bishemereire kugyenderwaho omu kucwa orubanja.

eng_prompt: In recent months, the healthcare team has worked tirelessly to combat the ongoing pandemic. Their dedication and innovative approaches have led to significant improvements in patient outcomes.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise, abasawo bakoze butaweera okulwanyisa ekirwadde bbunansi ekigenda mu maaso. Okwewaayo kwabwe n'enkola z'obuyiiya biviiriddeko okulongoosa mu mbeera z'abalwadde.
ach_prompt: I dwe ma okato ni, lutic yoto kom gutiyo matek me lweny i kom two ma opoto ni. Keto cwiny gi kacel ki diro gi manyen okelo alokaloka madit tutwal I kwo pa lutwo.
teo_prompt: Kolapio luatuboros, eswama etimu loka angaleu kagogong kanu aitikitik adeka naka ekorona. Ainakina kec keda iponesio luitetiak lu itolomunitos kesi eyangautu aitojokaario na angaleu naka adekak.
lgg_prompt: Mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, amuti arojo ni 'diyi nga azi ande kokoru a'di 'dizu azo 'dezaniri be. Asi 'baza yiniri azini geri o'diru yini 'diyi fe otuta amboru e'yo 'ba azoru 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu myezi ehingwireho, tiimu y'eby'amagara ekozire n'amaani okurwanisa oburwaire oburiho obwahati. Okwehayo kwabo n'emihanda yaabo y'okujumbura, bireesireho entunguuka y'amaani omu ntwaza y'abarwaire.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent surge in infections, the district implemented a comprehensive tracking system. As a result, the district task force has intercepted all the positive cases in the district.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kweyongerayongera kw'abakwatibwa obulwadde gyebuvuddeko, disitulikiti yataddewo enkola ey'enjawulo ey'okulondoola. N'ekyavaamu, akakiiko ka disitulikiti akadduukirize kakutte abalwadde bonna mu disitulikiti.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel dano matye ka nongo two I kare-ni, district oketo yub me lubu kor two I yoo matut tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, dul ma doro lok kom two corona omako dano weng matye ki two corona.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyatakinio naka adekasinei, abu edisitrikt ibwaik ainapeta nuka aingic adekasinei. Kanuka ngun, abu atukot naka itunga luingaranakinete luce kodisitrikt kodum itunga kere luejaasi keda adeka naka ekorona.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo 'da ma omgbo ni tuzu o'diru ri ma e'yosi, distrikiti 'ba geri 'bani azo 'da ma eti ondazu 'diyi 'yeta ma alea dria. E'yo 'disi, drice'ba distrikitia 'diyi obi 'ba dria azo korona niri be distrikitia 'diyi ci.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'oburwaire obwahati, disiturikiti ekataho enkora y'okurondooza. N'ekyarugiremu,akakiiko ka disiturikiti kakwasire abarwaire boona omu disiturikiti.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent outbreak, the local health authorities mobilized a task force to address the situation swiftly. They implemented strict protocols to track and manage the spread of the virus.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okubalukawo kw'ekirwadde okwaliwo gyebuvuddeko, ab'ebyobulamu mu kitundu baaleeta akakiiko akakwasisa amateeka okukola ku mbeera mu bwangu. Baateekawo enkola enkakali okulondoola n'okuziyiza okusaasaana kw'akawuka.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me poto pa two ma okato cokcok-ki, lutic me yot-kom guyubu dul ma doro lok kom two eni me cobo peko eni oyot-oyot tutwal. Guketo cik matek tutwal I tic me neno ki gengo nya pa kwidi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin abwangun naka adeka naka ekorona, apotu apedorosio nuka angaleu itolomutu atukot naka itunga luingaranakinete luce kanu aitemokin ejautene katipet. Apotu kesi ibwaikisi ainapeta nuegogong kanu aanyanar ka aitikitik awea naka ekorona.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru efupi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, drice'ba alata ni angu 'da ma alea 'diyi tra drice'ba eyi e'yo nde ma aza kozu mbeleru. Eyi 'ba azita okporu eyini ani ecozu azo 'da ma ereta ma eti ondazu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okubarukaho kw'oburwaire obwahati, ab'eby'amagara omu byaro bakarundaana akakiiko k'okukora aha nshonga egi ahonaaho. Bakataho engyenderwaho y'amaani y'okurondooza n'okurwanisa okujanjaara kw'akakooko.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent health crisis, collaboration between various agencies has become crucial. As a result, the medical department and the taskforce have received immense support from the government.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku buzibu bw'ebyobulamu obwaliwo gye buvuddeko, okukolagana wakati w'ebitongole eby'enjawulo kifuuse kikulu nnyo. N'ekivuddemu, ekitongole ky'ebyobulamu n'akakiiko akaddukanya abasawo bafunye obuyambi bungi okuva mu gavumenti.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me yot kom matye cokcok-ki, winye ikin dul mapat-pat obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, dul ma loyo lok kom yoto kom kacel ki dul ma doro lok kom yoto kom gunongo kony madit tutwal ki bot gamente.
teo_prompt: Katupitos ationis naka angaleu napac, erai aiswamanara kiding iriongeta luegelegela ibore yenepol noi. Kanuka ngun, adumutu ewai lo angaleu keda atukot naka itunga luingaranakinete luce agangat naepol kanejai apugan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma e'yosi, ti ecita amuti ndundu eyi ma eselea ri eca curu'do orodriru. E'yo 'disi, arakala alataniri tualu drice'ba azo korona niri ni 'diyi pie esu atita amboru engazu gamete vu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara oburiho obwahati, okukwatanisa ahagati y'ebitongore ebitarikushushana n'eky'omugasho munonga. N'ekyarugiremu, ekitongore ky'eby'amagara hamwe n'akakiiko, kitungire obuhwezi bwingi kuruga omu Gavumenti.

eng_prompt: In the face of unprecedented challenges, healthcare workers have tirelessly dedicated themselves to combating the spread of the virus. Their efforts have been crucial in managing the crisis and ensuring public safety.
lug_prompt: Nga boolekedde okusoomoozebwa okutali kwa bulijjo, abasawo bafubye nnyo okulwanyisa okusaasaana kw'akawuka. Kaweefube waabwe abadde wa mugaso mu kukwasaganya obuzibu n'okukakasa obukuumi bw'abantu.
ach_prompt: I kare me peko mapol, lutic yoto kom gutiyo matek me lweny i kom nya pa two corona. Tute gi obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I tyeko peko man ki gwoko ber bedo pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kojautene loka atiokisio nuegelegela, eswamak lu adekis iswamaete agogongu kanu aitikitik awea naka ekorona. Erai agogong kec naepol noi kanu aitikitik ationis na ka ayuarite itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru 'diyi ma drilea, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi owi eyi a'di 'dizu azo korona niri ma ereta be. Okpo yini 'diyi ebi ovu orodriru e'yo ewaru 'di ma aza kozu azini o'bi yi ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bwingi, abashaho bakozire munonga kurwanisa okujanjaara kw'akakooko ka muzibwe. Amaani gaabo gaboneire munonga omu kurwanisa oburemeezi n'okurinda abantu.

eng_prompt: During a recent press conference, the minister addressed concerns about the healthcare system and the challenges faced by medical professionals. He emphasized the importance of recognizing the dedication and skills of those working on the front lines.
lug_prompt: Mu lukung'aana lwa bannamawulire gyebuvuddeko, minisita yayogera ku kweraliikirira ku nkola y'ebyobulamu n'okusoomoozebwa abakugu mu byobulamu kwe basanga. Yakikkaatirizza obukulu bw'okusiima obumalirivu n'obukugu bw'abo abakolera ku mwanjo.
ach_prompt: I kare me lok ki luco lok angeya cokcok-ki, minicta ne oloko I kom peko ma lutic yoto kom tye ka kato ki iye. En oketo cwinye tutwal I kom ber pa miyo pwoc pi tic ki diro pa jo ma tye ka tic I nyim mony.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamun naka arotak iyemuto, abu eminista kiner nuikamunitos eswamae loka angaleu keda atiokisio nuetereikina keda eswamak lu adekis. Abu ngesi kitogogong ajokis naka aijen ainakina keda acoa naka ngul luiswamaete koingaren.
lgg_prompt: Sawa 'bani e'yo nzezu 'ba osisia ni 'diyi pie o'diru ri ma alea, minisita 'da nze e'yo asi otiza ni geri alata ni 'diyi ma dria azini e'yo ewaru azi'ba arojo ni 'diyini esu 'diyi ma dria ra. Eri fe okpo orodri 'bani asi feza azini ondua 'ba azi nga'ba drilea 'diyiniri ma e'yo egazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu ruteerane rw'abanyamakuru, minisita akagamba aha nshonga ezirikukwata ahaby'amagara hamwe n'oburemeezi obu abakugu omu by'amagara barikurabamu. Akashoboorora omugasho gw'okusiima obweziriki n'emyoga y'abo abarikukora omu maisho.

eng_prompt: Given the immense pressure and challenges faced by health workers during the ongoing pandemic, it is crucial to recognize their contributions. Many are struggling to make ends meet despite their vital role in safeguarding public health.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kunyigirizibwa okw'amaanyi n'okusoomoozebwa abasawo kwe basanga mu kiseera ky'ekirwadde ekigenda mu maaso, kikulu nnyo okusiima emirimu gyabwe. Bangi balwana okweyimirizaawo wadde nga bakola omulimu gwa maanyi mu kukuuma obulamu bw'abantu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki lyeto ki peko ma lutic yoto kom nongo ikare me poto pa gemo eni, pire tek tutwal me pwoyo tic gi. Dano mapol tye ka tute matek me nongo jami ma mite me kwo kadi bed ni gitiyo matek me gwoko yotkom pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Koipone kalo etereikina keda aiyalongongo keda atiokisio nuetereikina keda eswamak lu adekis kotoma apakio kanu nuka ekorona, ejok ajenun aswam kec. Eutasi luipu aitelekaar aijarakec araida ejaasi kesi keda aswam naepol noi naka aidar angaleu naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru 'ba azi ngapi arojoa 'diyini esu sawa azo 'dezanirisi 'diyi ma e'yosi, eri orodriru e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma e'yo egazu. Ba karakara eyi dri ci afa esuzu eyini aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bwingi n'oburemeezi obu abashaho barikurabamu omu bwire bw'oburwaire oburiho obwahati, nikikuru kumanya ebi bakozire. Baingi nibarwana kwebaisaho, oihireho omurimo gwabo gw'amaani omu kurinda amagara g'abantu.

eng_prompt: In the face of ongoing challenges in the healthcare system, the commitment of health workers is more crucial than ever. Their expertise and compassion are vital in ensuring the well-being of communities during times of crisis.
lug_prompt: Olw'okusoomoozebwa okugenda mu maaso mu byobulamu, obumalirivu bw'abasawo bukulu nnyo okusinga bwe kyali kibadde. Obukugu bwabwe n'obusaasizi bya mugaso mu kukakasa obulungi bw'ebitundu mu biseera by'obunkenke.
ach_prompt: I kare me peko matye ka time I tenge me yot kom, miti pa lutic yot kom pire tek tutwal. Ngec gi ki kica gi pire tek tutwal I neno ni lwak tye maber ikare me peko.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nu elosi akonye kotoma amukian, epolok noi aswam naka eswamak lu adekis. Epirioit kec keda aitim kec epol ajokis kanu awanyun ebe ejai aijar najokan naka itunga kotoma apakio nuetioko.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru mupi drile arojo eyi ma alea 'diyi ma alea, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ma asi feza eri orodriru ndeni aga oku driorisi. Ondua yini azini asi ndriza yini 'diyi orodriru ndrezu ongulumu yini aa'zu muke sawa e'yo ewaru ma alia 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi oburikugyenda omu maisho omu by'amagara, okwehayo kw'abashaho n'okw'omugasho munonga. Obukugu bwabo n'embabazi n'eby'omugasho omu kureeba ngu ebyanga byabaho kurungi omu bwire bw'oburemeezi.

eng_prompt: In response to the rising number of COVID-19 cases, local health officials convened a task force to address public safety measures. Their primary goal was to educate the community on effective strategies to reduce virus transmission.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula omuwendo gw'abalwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe ogweyongera, abakungu b'ebyobulamu mu byalo baayita akakiiko akakola ku by'okwerinda kw'abantu. Ekigendererwa kyabwe ekikulu kyali kya kusomesa bantu ku ngeri ennungi ez'okukendeeza ku kusaasaana kw'akawuka.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel dano matye ki two korona, lutic me yot kom me tedero gulwongo dul ma doro lok me gwoko kwo pa lwak. Miti gi madit obedo me pwonyo lwak i kom yoo maber me gengo nyayo two corona.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka naka COVID-19, apotu eswamak luka angaleu konyarautu atukot naka itunga luingaranakinete luce. Alosikinetekec naepol noi arai aisisianakin itunga iwaitin lu itikitikere awea naka ekorona.
lgg_prompt: E'yo kalafe 'ba azo COVID-19 niri be tupi 'diyi ma e'yosi, azi'ba alata ni angu 'da ma alea 'diyi omve drice'ba azo korona niri ma dria 'diyi e'yo otuzu. Asisile yiniri okporu ri ndra ongulumu eyini imbata fezu geri kililiru eyini ecozu azo korona niri ma ereta ma omgbo esizu ra 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omuhendo gw'abarwaire ba COVID-19 ogweyongyeire, abakuru omu by'amagara omu byaro, bakeeta akakiiko k'okukora ahaby'okwerinda. Ekigyendererwa kyabo ekikuru kikaba kiri eky'okwegyesa abantu emiringo y'okukyendeeza okujanjaara kw'akakooko ka muzibwe.

eng_prompt: In the face of a rapidly spreading outbreak, the community relied heavily on the expertise of health workers. Their proactive measures and constant vigilance played a crucial role in managing the situation.
lug_prompt: Olw'okubalukawo kw'ekirwadde, abantu beesigama nnyo ku bukugu bw'abasawo. Enkola yaabwe ey'obwangu n'obwegendereza obw'olubeerera byakola omulimu gwa maanyi mu kuddukanya embeera.
ach_prompt: I kare ma two opoto oyot-oyot tutwal, lwak ojenge tutwal I kom diro pa lutic yoto kom. Gin ma gutimo con ki bedo ma wang gi twolo tutwal okonyo tutwal I tyeko peko eni.
teo_prompt: Kojautene loka awea na atipet, apotu itunga ogangata amisiarit naka eswamak lu adekis. Apotu kesi kiswamata ejok kanu aitikitik ejautene.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru azo korona niri ma ereta ma e'yosi, ongulumu 'da eyi asi 'ba e'yo nita be angiri 'ba azi ngapi arojoa 'diyi ma dria. E'yo eyini 'ye okporu azini mile be sa'wa driasi 'diyi nga azi okporu e'yo 'da ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okubarukaho kw'oburwaire, abantu bakeesiga obukugu bw'abashaho. Enkora yaabo ey'obwegyendesereza hamwe n'obwegyendesereza bwabo, bikakora omurimo gw'amaani omu kukora aha nshonga egyo.

eng_prompt: After conducting a thorough assessment of their conditions, our medical team devised a comprehensive treatment plan. We prioritized their needs and implemented various interventions to support their healing process.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya embeera yaabwe, abasawo baakola enteekateeka y'obujjanjabi. Twakulembeza ebyetaago byabwe era ne tussa mu nkola enkola ez'enjawulo okubayamba okuwona.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo kit ma kwo gi tye kwede, lutic yoto komwa guyubu yoo me cango two weng. Waketo miti gi obedo gin ma pire tek dok waketo jami mapat-pat I tic me konyo gi me cang.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereonor ejok ejautene kec, apotu imurok kosi kitolomutu ainapeta nuka amukian. Apotu sio aisingarenikisi ipudesia kec kosodete aitegear iponesio luegelegela kanu aingarakin kes angaleun.
lgg_prompt: Bani e'yo eyi ma rua 'diyi ma ale andrizu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, ama vile amuti arojo ni 'diyi e'do otuta aro esuzu 'diyi ma dria dria. Ama 'ba e'yo eyini le 'diyi okporu azini 'ba e'yo ndundu eyini 'ye eyini ani atita fezu geri eyini atita esuzu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma gye embeera yaabo, tiimu yaitu y'abashaho ekakora enteekateeka y'okuragurira. Tukatwara ebyetaago byabo nka bikuru kandi tukataho emiringo etari emwe n'emwe y'okubahwera kukira.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the recent patient care reports, the doctor felt it was important to acknowledge the hard work and dedication of the staff. Their commitment to excellence had significantly improved patient outcomes during a challenging period.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya alipoota z'abalwadde ezaakaggwa, omusawo yawulira nga kya mugaso okusiima omulimu n'obumalirivu bw'abakozi. Obumalirivu bwabwe mu kukola obulungi bwalongoosa nnyo embeera y'abalwadde mu kaseera kano akazibu.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo adwogi tic pa lutwo ma cokcok-ki, daktar otamo ni pire tek me pwoyo tic matek ki keto cwiny pa lutic. Keto cwiny gi me timo tic maber tutwal okonyo tutwal I kwo pa lutwo I kare me peko eni.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing health crisis, organizations have mobilized resources to support vulnerable populations. As part of this initiative, refugee leaders have been trained and equipped with skills to handle the virus.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ekizibu ky'ebyobulamu ekigenda kyeyongera, ebitongole bikungaanyizza eby'obugagga okuyamba abantu abateesobola. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, abakulembeze b'abanoonyiboobubudamu batendekeddwa n'okuweebwa obukugu okukwasaganya akawuka.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko me yot kom matye kamede, dul mapat-pat gu jogo cente me konyo joo ma peko tye i komgi. Macalo but yub man, ki pwonyo lutela pa luring ayela ki diro me lweny i kom two corona.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing health crisis, various community groups recognized the urgent need for action. They mobilized resources and expertise to empower individuals in their fight against the virus.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ekizibu ky'ebyobulamu ekigenda kyeyongera, ebibiina by'ebitundu eby'enjawulo byategeera obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okukola. Baakungaanya ebyetaago n'obukugu okuwa abantu ssekinnoomu amaanyi mu kulwanyisa akawuka.

eng_prompt: In response to the outbreak, local health authorities implemented a comprehensive training program. This initiative aimed to equip the community with the necessary skills to effectively manage and mitigate the spread of the virus.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okubalukawo kw'ekirwadde, ab'ebyobulamu mu byalo baateekawo enteekateeka y'okutendeka abantu. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okuwa abantu obukugu obwetaagisa okusobola okukwasaganya obulungi n'okukendeeza ku kusaasaana kw'akawuka.

eng_prompt: In response to the rising number of COVID-19 cases, the organisation held a series of informational sessions. They aimed to equip refugees with essential knowledge and resources to protect themselves and their communities.

ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel dano matye ki two korona, dul ne obedo ki kacoke mapol me miyo ngec. Miti ne obedo me miyo ngec ki jami ma mite pi luring ayella me gwokke ki gwoko kabedo gi.

eng_prompt: In response to the rising number of COVID-19 cases, health officials have issued new guidelines to help curb the spread of the virus. These measures aim to protect public health and ensure the safety of communities.

ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel dano matye ki two korona, lutic me yot kom gumiyo cik manyen me gengo nya pa two eni. Yub magi tye me gwoko yotkom pa lwak ki gwoko ber bedo pa lwak.

eng_prompt: As the world grapples with the ongoing health crisis, it is crucial for individuals to remain vigilant and committed to safety measures. Only through collective effort and determination can we hope to overcome the challenges posed by the pandemic.
