lgg_prompt: E'yo azi ni ojazu mbeleru ewu 'disi ri ma alea, orodri ondua awazu ri eca e'da sa'wa driasi. Amuti karakara eyi orodri imbata ni azini ti icita ni 'diyi esu zota azini e'yo eyi edezu o'diru ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire obu obw'emirimo ehindukire munonga, omugasho gw'okugabana obwengye gweyongyeire kweyoreka. Ebitongore bingi nibyetegyereza omugasho gw'okuhabura n'okukwatanisa okureetaho entunguuka n'okujumbura.

eng_prompt: In times of a pandemic, individual actions play a crucial role in public health. Awareness and responsibility are essential to prevent further transmission of the virus.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'ekirwadde bbunansi, ebikolwa by'omuntu kinnoomu bikola omulimu munene mu bulamu bw'abantu. Okumanyisibwa n'obuvunaanyizibwa bikulu nnyo okutangira okusaasaana kw'akawuka.
ach_prompt: Ikare me poto pa gemo, jami ma ngat acel acel timo pire tek tutwal I yotkom pa lwak. Miyo ngec ki tic ki dano pire tek tutwal me gengo nya pa two eni.
teo_prompt: Kapak naka adeka, aswamisio nuka itunga kes iswamaete ibore yenepol noi kotoma angaleu naka itunga. Aitijenaret ka aswam ejok kanu aitikitik awea na ekorona.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa azo 'dezaniri ma alia, 'yeta 'ba alu alu ni 'diyi azi okporu nga e'yo alata o'bi yiniri ma alia. Imbata feza azini azi ngaza eri orodriru azo 'da ma ereta atrizu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'endwara ruranda nsi, ebikorwa bya buri omwe nibikora omurimo gw'amaani omu by'amagara g'abantu. Okumanyisibwa n'obujunanizibwa n'eby'omugasho omu kuzibira okujanjaara kw'akakooko.

eng_prompt: To ensure proper hygiene and prevent the spread of illness, it is essential that all facilities in the camp are equipped with adequate resources. One of the critical resources needed is a sufficient supply of water for handwashing.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa obuyonjo n'okutangira okusaasaana kw'endwadde, kya mugaso nnyo ebifo byonna mu nkambi okuba n'ebikozesebwa ebimala. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ebyetaagisa kwe kuba n'amazzi agamala okunaaba mu ngalo.
ach_prompt: Pi gwoko lengo ki gengo nya pa two, pire tek tutwal ni odi yadi weng I kem obed ki jami weng ma mite. Gin acel ma pire tek ma mite obedo bedo ki pii ma oromo me lwoko cing.
teo_prompt: Kanu aidar aila ka aitikitik awea naka adekasinei, ibusakinit aiboisio kere nu okabin ajaut keda iboro luedolitos. Adiopet koboro luepolok noi lu ekotoi ngesi akipi nu edolitos kanu ailot akanin.
lgg_prompt: Alata ma tambazu azini azo eyi ma ereta atrizu, eri orodriru angu dria kembe 'da ma alea 'diyi ma aa afa ayuzaru 'diyi pie. Afa orodriru 'bani le 'diyi ma azi yi ma omgbo capirisi dri ojizuri'i.
nyn_prompt: Okuhamya obuyonjo n'okuzibira okujanjaara kw'endwara,ni kikuru ngu ebyombeko byona omu kampu bibe biine eby'okukoresa ebirikumara. Kimwe aha bintu by'omugasho ebirikwetengwa n'okutunga amaizi agarikumara okunaaba omungaro.

eng_prompt: Sharing knowledge fosters stronger relationships and empowers those around us. By imparting what we know, we can help others grow and succeed in their endeavors.
lug_prompt: Okugabana amagezi kireetawo enkolagana ey'amaanyi n'okutumbula abo abatwetoolodde. Bwe tugabana bye tumanyi, tusobola okuyamba abalala okukula n'okutuuka ku buwanguzi mu mirimu gyabwe.
ach_prompt: Nywako ngec weko wat bedo matek dok weko dano ma orumuwa bedo ki kero. Ka wapoko ngec ma watye kwede, watwero konyo jo mukene me dongo ki cobo miti gi.
teo_prompt: Aimor acoa itopolori eidicane lo egogong ka aitogogong ngul lu idunyasi oni. Kowai lo aimor iboro lu ijeni oni, ipedori oni aingarakin luce apoloun ka akerianar kotoma aswamukec.
lgg_prompt: Ondua awazuri ni e'yo 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma eselea ri otu dika eri okpo fe 'ba ama agei 'diyi dri. E'yo amani nile 'diyi awazurisi, ama eco 'ba azi 'diyi ma aza ko zozu azini drile suza esuzu e'yo yini 'ye 'diyi ma alia ra.
nyn_prompt: Okugabana obwengye nikureetaho enkoragana nungi n'okwongyera amaani abo abatwetorwaire. Kuturikugabana ebi turikumanya, nitubaasa kuhwera abandi kutunguuka n'obusinguzi omu mirimo yaabo.

eng_prompt: Health officials have reported a concerning rise in COVID-19 cases recently. As a result, community members are being urged to take extra precautions to protect themselves and others.
lug_prompt: Ab'ebyobulamu bategeezezza ku kweyongera kw'abalwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe gyebuvuddeko. N'ekyavaamu, abantu b'omu kitundu bakubirizibwa okwegendereza ennyo okwekuuma n'okwekuuma abalala.
ach_prompt: Lutic me yot kom guwaco ni wel dano matye ki two korona tye ka medde tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, ki lego lwak me gwokke tutwal me gwokke ki jo mukene.
teo_prompt: Apotu eswamak lu adekis olimosi ebe iyata noi enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka naka ekorona. Kanuka ngun, icorakitai itunga luka atutubet ayuwar awate kec ka ayuarite luce.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ece e'yo 'ba azo COVID-19 niri be 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu ewu 'disi. E'yo 'disi, 'ba ai 'ba ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi e'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu eyi ma ta mbazu tualu 'ba azi 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Ab'eby'amagara bagambire aha kweyongyera kw'abarwaire ba COVID-19 ebiro ebi. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu b'omubyanga nibashabwa kwegyendesereza kwerinda n'okwerinda abandi.

eng_prompt: In response to the ongoing pandemic, the health and safety of the refugees have become a top priority. To ensure their well-being, the camp leaders have been working diligently to implement necessary precautions.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ekirwadde bbunansi ekigenda mu maaso, obulamu n'obukuumi bw'abanoonyiboobubudamu bifuuse ebikulu. Okukakasa obulungi bwabwe, abakulembeze b'enkambi babadde bakola n'obunyiikivu okussa mu nkola enkola ezeetaagisa.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me two korona matye kawot anyim, gwoko yotkom ki ber bedo pa luring aye dong odoko gin ma pire tek tutwal. Me neno ni kwo gi tye maber, lutela me camp gubedo katic matek me keto jami weng ma mite me gwokke.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abongokinet naka adeka naka ekorona, angaleu keda ayuwara naka ikerai erai ibore yenepol noi. Kanu awanyun ebe ejokuka kesi, eutasi engarenok lu okabin aswam kagogong aitegear iwaitin lu ekotore.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo 'dezaniri ma e'yosi, rua ala azini ageitema emunyale eyini ri eca e'yo okporu ni ru. E'yo eyini aa'zu muke ri nezu, drice'ba kembe eyini 'diyi ebi azi nga okporu e'yo 'bani ecozu eyi ma ta mbazu 'diyi 'bazu 'yeta ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'endwara ruranda nsi erikugyenda omu maisho, amagara g'empungi n'obuhwezi bwazo nibikuru munonga. Okureeba ngu baba gye, abebembezi b'empungi babaire nibakora n'amaani okuta omu nkora eby'okwerinda ebirikwetengwa.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent outbreak, the organization has recognized the urgent need for public awareness and safety measures. To combat misinformation and promote health, they are developing a comprehensive outreach program.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kubalukawo kw'ekirwadde, ekitongole kitegedde obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okumanyisa abantu n'enkola z'obukuumi. Okusobola okulwanyisa amawulire amakyamu n'okutumbula ebyobulamu, bakola enteekateeka ey'okubulirira abantu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki poto pa two ma okato cokcok-ki, dul enoni oniang ni mite tutwal me rweyo lwak i kom peko man ki dong timo jami mapat-pat me gwoko kwo pa dano. Me lweny i kom lok ma pe atir ki tyelo kor lok me yot kom, gitye ka yubu yub me konyo dano weng.
teo_prompt: Katupitos abwangun naka adeka naka ekorona, abu erionget koany eipud loka aisisianakin itunga ka aidar ayuwara. Kanu aitiji akiro nuarokok ka aitopolor nuka angaleu, eutasi kesi aitolomun ainapeta nuka adolonokin itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru efupi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, amuti 'da esu ra kini le 'ba ma fe o'bi eyini imbata mbeleru azini le 'ba ma 'ye e'yo eyi ageitema ni 'diyi. E'yo enzoru 'diyi atrizu azini e'yo alata ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, eyi otita imbatani 'diyi e'do.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okubarukaho kw'oburwaire obwahati, ekitongore kyetegyereize ekyetengo ky'amaani ky'okumanyisa abantu n'okukora emiringo y'okwerinda. Okurwanisa amakuru agatahikire n'okutunguura eby'amagara, bariyo nibakora enteekateeka y'okuhitsya abantu boona.

eng_prompt: In response to the ongoing crisis, humanitarian organizations have mobilized resources to support vulnerable populations. As a result, refugees have been provided with food to eat in this pandemic.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ekizibu ekigenda mu maaso, ebitongole ebiyamba abantu bikungaanyizza eby'obugagga okuyamba abantu abateesobola. N'ekivuddemu, abanoonyiboobubudamu baweereddwa emmere ey'okulya mu kiseera kino eky'ekirwadde.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko matye kombedi, dule ma konyo dano gu jogo jami me konyo joo ma peko tye i komgi. Macalo adwogi ne, kimiyo cam ki luring ayella I kare man me two korona.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu elosi akonye, apotu iriongeta lu ingaranakinete itunga otukutu agangat nejaas lu ican. Kanuka ngun, ejaikitai ikerai inyamat kotoma apakio kanu nuka ekorona.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru 'di ma aza kozu, amuti azakoma fepi 'diyi tra afa ayuzaru 'diyi 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alia 'diyi ma aza kozu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba fe emunyale eyini nyaka eyini nya sa'wa azo 'dezaniri ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi oburikugyenda omu maisho,ebitongore ebirikuhwera abantu birundaine ebintu by'okuhwera abantu abatarikwebaasa. N'ekyarugiremu, empungi ziheirwe eby'okurya omu bwire bw'endwara ruranda nsi egi.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing humanitarian crisis, aid organizations mobilized to provide essential supplies. They recognized the urgent need for nourishment among the displaced families.
lug_prompt: Olw'obwetaavu bw'abantu obweyongera, ebitongole ebigaba obuyambi byekunga okugaba ebintu ebikulu. Baategedde obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'emmere mu maka agaasengulwa.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko ma dano tye ka kato ki iye, dule ma miyo kony guyube me miyo jami ma mite pi kwo pa dano. Gu niang ni miti me cam tye matek tutwal I kin gangi ma orweny ki I kabedogi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu itunga, apotu iriongeta lu engarakinete itunga imorikikinos aijaikin iboro lu itwasamao. Apotu kesi kojenutu eipuda lo engeso lo inyamat kanejaas ikalia lu aponi itobwounai.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo 'ba eyini 'diyi ma aza kozu ri ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma alea, amuti azakoma fepi 'diyi tra eyi afa orodriru 'diyi awazu. Eyi esu e'yo 'bani lezu nyaka nyazu mbeleru familia eyini aa'zu angu ndundu eyi ma alea ku 'diyi ma eselea ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'abantu obweyongyeire,ebitongore ebirikuhwera abantu bikakoresa amaani gaabyo kuhayo ebintu ebikuru. Bakareeba ekyetengo ky'amaani eky'eby'okurya omu maka agabingirwe.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing challenges faced by local communities, the organization sought to implement sustainable development initiatives. To achieve their goals effectively, they recognized the importance of collaboration with key stakeholders.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okusoomoozebwa okweyongera abantu b'omu kitundu kwe basanga, ekitongole kyagezaako okussa mu nkola enteekateeka z'enkulaakulana ey'olubeerera. Okusobola okutuukiriza ebiruubirirwa byabwe obulungi, baategeera obukulu bw'okukolagana n'abakwatibwako abakulu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko matye kamede ma lwak tye ka nongo, dul ne otemo keto yub me dongo lobo matye anyim itic. Pi cobo miti gi maber, guniang ber pa winye ki joo ma pigi tego.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu itereikina keda itunga luka atutubet, abu atukot ngin kotam aitegear nuepedorete ayangaun apol. Kanu aitodolikin alosikinetekec ejok, apotu kesi kojenutu ajokis naka aiswamanara keda itunga luapolok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ongulumu eyini esu 'diyi ma aza kozu, amuti 'da nda e'yo angu ezoma ni ewu drile ri ma alea 'diyi 'yezu. Otita eyini 'diyi esuzu kililiru, eyi esu orodri ti ecita 'ba ambo eyi pie 'diyiniri ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi obweyongyeire oburikushangwa abantu b'omubyaro,ekitongore kikagyezaho kuta omunkora enteekateeka z'entunguuka. Okuhikiiriza ebigyendererwa byabo kurungi, bakamanya omugasho gw'okukwatanisa n'abantu abakuru.

eng_prompt: In an effort to address social inequalities, the charity developed a new outreach program. Their mission focused on providing support and resources to those in need.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okugonjoola obutali bwenkanya mu mbeera z'abantu, ekitongole ky'obwannakyewa kyatondawo enteekateeka empya ey'okubayamba. Ekigendererwa kyabwe kyali ku kuwa obuyambi n'ebikozesebwa eri abo abali mu bwetaavu.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me lweny i kom peko me apoka-poka ikin lwak, dul ma miyo kony bot lwak guyubu yub manyen me konyo dano. Yub meggi obedo me miyo kony ki jami ma mite bot lupeko.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuka itunga, abu erionget loka agangat kitolomu ainapeta nuitetiak. Alosikinetekec arai ainakin agangat keda iboro nejaas lu ican.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo esele coza ni 'diyi ma aza kozu, amuti 'ba azakoma fepi 'diyi e'do otita azi o'diruni. Asisile yiniri 'ba asi atita azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi fezu 'ba afa koko 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okukora ahaburinganiza, ekitongore ky'obuhwezi kikakora enteekateeka nsya y'okuhwera abantu. Omurimo gwabo gukaba nigugyenderera okuheereza obuhwezi n'ebintu abo abatarikwebaasa.

eng_prompt: In response to the escalating humanitarian crisis, the organization was established to address the urgent needs of displaced individuals. Since then, it has focused on delivering essential support and resources to those affected.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obuzibu bw'abantu obweyongera, ekitongole kyatandikibwawo okukola ku byetaago eby'amangu eby'abantu abaasengulwa. Okuva olwo, essira litadde ku kuwa obuyambi n'ebintu ebikulu eri abo abakoseddwa.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko me kony ma tye kamede, kicako dul eni me tyeko peko pa dano ma orwenyo gangi gi. Nicake I kare enoni, oketo cwinye I kom miyo kony ki jami ma mite bot jo ma onongo peko.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuka itunga, aponi itolomunai atukot ngin kanu aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga luekerete. Ageun kapak kangin, epodokinit aijaikin agangat nejaas ngul luetirorit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo 'ba eyini 'diyi ma aza kozu ri ma omgbo ni tuzu, 'ba e'do amuti 'da e'yo 'ba eyini le mbeleru 'diyi ma aza kozu. E'dozu sa'wa 'dasi, eri 'ba asi atita azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi fezu 'ba e'yo ni 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'abantu obweyongyeire,ekitongore kikatebwaho kukora ahabyetaago by'abantu ababingirwe. Kuruga obwo, kitwire nikigyenderera okuhisya obuhwezi n'ebintu ebirikwetengwa ahari abo abateganisiibwe.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing needs of the local communities, the organization launched a comprehensive outreach program. Their efforts have successfully provided essential resources to multiple areas in need.
lug_prompt: Olw'obwetaavu bw'abantu b'omu kitundu obweyongera, ekitongole kyatongoza enteekateeka y'okubayamba. Kaweefube waabwe atuuse ku buwanguzi mu kuwa obuyambi obwetaagisa mu bitundu eby'enjawulo ebirimu obwetaavu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me dongo miti pa lwak, dul ne oyabo yub me konyo dano weng. Tute gi okelo jami ma mite pi kabedo mapol ma peko tye iye.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga luka atutubet, abu erionget kitegea ainapeta nuka aitodolikin itunga. Apotu aswam kec ijaikisi iboro luipudasi aiboisio nuipu luejaasi keda ipudesia.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako ongulumu eyini tupi 'diyi ma aza kozu, amuti 'da e'do otita azi eyini ani ecozu eyi ma aza kozu. Okpo yini 'diyi fe drile suzaru afa orodriru 'diyi angu karakara lepi 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Omu kugarukamu ebyetaago by'abantu b'omubyaro,ekitongore kitandikireho enteekateeka y'okubahwera. Amaani gaabo garetsire obuhwezi omu myanya mingi erikwetenga obuhwezi.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing number of displaced individuals, the organization has developed a comprehensive strategy. Their focus is on addressing the urgent needs of those seeking safety and support.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula omuwendo gw'abantu abasengulwa ogweyongera, ekitongole kikoze enteekateeka enzijuvu. Essira balitadde ku kukola ku byetaago eby'amangu eby'abo abanoonya obukuumi n'obuyambi.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel dano ma orwenyo gangi gi, dul ne okatti ki yoo mapat-pat mapat-pat. Gitye ka keto cwinygi tutwalle I kom tyeko peko pa dano matye ka yenyo gwok ki kony.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin enaaba loepol noi loka itunga luekeriaka, etolomu erionget ainapeta nuipu. Alosikinet kec erai aitemokin ipudesia luka ngul lu ekotosi ayuwar keda agangat.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba angu kokoru 'diyi ma kalafe tupi tutu ri ma aza kozu, amuti 'da e'do otita azi dria eyi ma dria. Asi 'baza yiniri afa 'bani le mbeleru 'ba tambaza azini atita ndapi 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omuhendo gw'abantu abarikuhunga omu maka gaabo ogweyongyeire, ekitongore kitandikireho enteekateeka nungi. Ekigyendererwa kyabo n'okukora aha byetaago by'abo abarikusherura oburinzi n'obuhwezi.

eng_prompt: After months of uncertainty and hardship, the long-awaited news finally arrived. They had been granted permission to start anew in a safe country.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'obutali bukakafu n'ebizibu, amawulire agaali galindiriddwa okumala ebbanga eddene gaatuuka. Baali baweereddwa olukusa okutandika obuggya mu nsi ennungi.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me bedo ki akala-kala ki peko, lok angea ma kibedo kakuru pi kare malac dong oo. Kimiinigi twero me cako ticgi odoco I lobo ma ber.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka amamus acamanar keda atiokisio, aponi kodolokinai iyemuto luedaunitai apak naepol noi. Aponi koinakinai kes apedor ageun bobo kotoma akwap naeyuwara.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani aa'zu e'yo kokoru azini e'yo ewaru ma alia 'bori ma vutia, o'duko 'bani ebi te sawa ezu ri eca asizu ra. Ba fe yi dri rukusa e'dozu o'diru kari kililiru ni ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi g'obutetegyerezibwa hamwe n'oburemeezi, amahurire agabaire garindirwe kumara obwire buraingwa gakahika. Bakaba baheirwe orusa kutandika busya omu eihanga eririmu obusingye.

eng_prompt: After days of uncertainty and hunger, the aid workers finally delivered much-needed supplies to the camp. With the arrival of fresh food, the atmosphere shifted as hope filled the air.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'ennaku z'obutali butebenkevu n'enjala, abakozi b'obuyambi kyaddaaki baatuusa ebintu ebyetaagibwa ennyo mu nkambi. Ng'emmere empya etuuse, embeera yakyuka era essuubi lyajjula mu bbanga.
ach_prompt: Ingee nino mapol me peko ki kec, lutic me miyo kony I agiki ne gukelo jami ma mite tutwal I camp. I kare ma cam manyen obino, jami olokke dok dano mapol gubedo ki gen.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka apaarasia nuipu nuka amamus ajenanut keda etenge, apotu eswamak luka agangat koyangautu iboro luipudasi kesi noi okabin. Keda adolun naka inyamat luitetiak, abu ejautene kijulakin ido abu amuno kilelebun kokwam.
lgg_prompt: O'du e'yo ewaru azini abiri ma vutia, 'ba azakoma fe'baa 'diyi asizu afa 'bani le saaru 'diyi eji kembe yi ma alia ra. Nyaka o'diru ni ecazu 'bori ma vutia, e'yo oja i asi'baza be.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ebiro by'okwerarikirira hamwe n'enjara, abakozi b'obuhwezi bakahisya ebintu ebirikwetengwa munonga omu kampu. Okuhika kw'eby'okurya ebishemeire, embeera ekahinduka kandi amatsiko gakajura omumwanya.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing number of displaced individuals, the government has implemented various programs to ensure their basic needs are met. One of the key areas of focus is ensuring that all refugees have access to adequate nutrition.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula omuwendo gw'abantu abasengulwa ogweyongera, gavumenti etadde mu nkola pulogulaamu ez'enjawulo okulaba nga ebyetaago byabwe ebisookerwako bituukirira. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu eby'okussaako essira kwe kulaba ng'abanoonyiboobubudamu bonna bafuna emmere emala.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel dano ma orwenyo gangi gi, gamente okatti ki yub mapat-pat me neno ni jami ma mite pi kwo gi ki cobo. Tenge acel ma pire tek ma omyero ki nen ni luring ayela weng tye ki cam ma oromo.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin enaaba loepol noi loka itunga luekotosi aibwot, etolomu apugan ainapeta nuegelegela kanu aanyun ebe itodolikinitai ipudesia kec. Adiopet kotoma aiboisio nuepolok nuibusakinit aswam ngesi awanyun ebe edumunenete ikerai kere inyamat luedolitos.
lgg_prompt: E'yo kalafe 'ba angu kokoru 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma e'yosi, gamete 'ba otita ndundu eyi nezu ra kini afa eyini lele aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa' E'yo azi okporu 'bani asi 'bazu drinia ri eri nezu ra kini emunyale dria eyi nyaka nyaza kililiru ri esu ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omuhendo gw'abantu abarikuhunga omu maka gaabo ogweyongyeire,gavumenti eteireho enteekateeka nyingi okureeba ngu ebyetaago byabo by'omutaano byahikiirizibwa. Kimwe aha bintu ebikuru ebishemereire kutaho amaani n'okureeba ngu empungi zoona zitunga eby'okurya ebirikumara.

eng_prompt: In response to the ongoing economic challenges, officials held a meeting to discuss budget cuts across various sectors. As a result, the government decreased the number of provisions for the refugees.
lug_prompt: Olw'okusoomoozebwa kw'ebyenfuna okugenda mu maaso, abakungu baatuuza olukiiko okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku kukendeeza ku mbalirira mu bitongole eby'enjawulo. N'ekyavaamu, gavumenti yakendeeza ku bungi bw'ebintu ebiweebwa abanoonyiboobubudamu.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me biacara matye kawot anyim, lutic gubedo ki kacoke me nywako lok I kom ngolo byek me lim I tenge mapat-pat. Macalo adwogi ne, gamente odwoko piny wel jami ma kimiyo ki luring ayela.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuka ikapun, apotu eswamak kiswamata airiamun kanu aitemitem nuka aitub ebajet kotoma iriongeta luegelegela. Kanuka ngun, abu apugan itidisia iboro lu ijaikitai ikerai.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu, azi'ba eyi 'ye mitingi agbatara gbazu e'yo 'bani bajeti ma omgbo esizu esele ndundu eyi ma alea ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, gamete esi afa feza emunyale eyini 'diyi ma kalafe ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'entaasya oburikugyenda omu maisho, abakuru bakakora orukiiko rw'okuhanuura aha kushara embaririra omu bitongore bitari bimwe na bimwe. N'ekyarugiremu,gavumenti ekakyendeza aha bintu ebirikuheebwa empungi.

eng_prompt: In many parts of the world, poverty remains a pervasive issue. As a result, countless individuals struggle to meet their basic needs.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu by'ensi bingi, obwavu bukyali kizibu kya maanyi. N'ekivuddemu, abantu bangi bafuba okulaba nga batuukiriza ebyetaago byabwe.
ach_prompt: I but lobo mapol, can pud tye peko madit tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, dano mapol tye ka yele me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aiboisio nuipu nuka akwap, eringa ican erai ationis naepol noi. Kanuka ngun, etionikinit itunga luipu aitodolikin ipudesia kec.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru ma kala karakara eyi ma alea, alio ni nga po'di e'yo 'ba dria ni. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara eyi dri ci afa eyini lele aa'zu edriru 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bicweka bingi eby'ensi, obworo n'oburemeezi bw'amaani. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu baingi nibarwana kuhikiiriza ebyetengo byabo.

eng_prompt: In times of hardship and joy alike, many have turned to their faith for strength and guidance. As a result, expressions of gratitude have flourished within the community.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obuzibu n'essanyu, bangi baddukidde mu kukkiriza kwabwe okufuna amaanyi n'obulagirizi. N'ekivuddemu, okwebaza kweyongedde mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko ki yom-cwiny, dano mapol olokke bot dini gi pi nongo teko ki tira. Macalo adwogi ne, nyuto pwoc omede tutwal I kin lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nuka atiokisio keda aiyalama, apotu itunga luipu koloto aiyuunikec kanu agogong keda aingarenikinio. Kanuka ngun, apolor aitodianareta nuka aisiyalamikin kotunga.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru azini ayiko ni 'diyi ma alea, 'ba karakara eyi oja eyi ma aita eyi ma alea okpo esuzu azini imbata esuzu. E'yo 'disi, e'yo 'bani awa'difo e'dazu 'diyi ma omgbo tu ongulumu eyi ma alea tutu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi hamwe n'okushemererwa, baingi bahindukire okwikiriza kwabo kutunga amaani n'obwebembezi. N'ekyarugiremu, okwebaza kweyongyeire omu bantu.

eng_prompt: The organization has been actively working in the community for several years, addressing various needs and challenges faced by its members. Through its dedicated efforts, individuals have benefited in multiple ways.
lug_prompt: Ekitongole kibadde kikola nnyo mu kitundu okumala emyaka egiwerako, nga kikola ku byetaago eby'enjawulo n'okusoomoozebwa kwa bammemba baakyo. Mu kaweefube waayo, abantu baganyuddwa mu ngeri nnyingi.
ach_prompt: Dul eni obedo katic matek tutwal I kabedo ne pi mwaki mapol, kun tiyo I kom peko mapat-pat ma lumemba gi nongo. Dano mapol gunongo ber pa yub eni I yo mapol.
teo_prompt: Iswamai erionget ngol kagogong kotoma atutubet kanu ikar luipu, aitemokin ipudesia luegelegela keda atiokisio nuetereikina keda imebanakec. Kotoma agogongu ke, apotu itunga imedautu koiponesio luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Amuti 'da ebi azi nga okporu ongulumu eyi ma alea eli karakara eyi ma alea, e'yo ewaru 'ba eri ma alea 'diyini esu 'diyi ma aza kozu. Okpo erini 'ba asi driasi risi, 'ba eyi esu orodri geri karakara eyi si.
nyn_prompt: Ekitongore kitwire nikikora munonga omu bantu okumara emyaka mingi, nikikora ahabyetaago hamwe n'oburemeezi oburikushangwa ba memba baakyo. Ahabw'amaani gaayo, abantu bagasirwe omu miringo mingi.

eng_prompt: In the aftermath of the devastating storm, the local markets were left in ruins, and supplies dwindled rapidly. As a result, many families found themselves struggling to find basic necessities.
lug_prompt: Oluvanyuma lw'omuyaga ogw'amaanyi, obutale bw'omu kitundu bwalekebwa nga bufuuse matongo, n'ebyamaguzi ne bikendeera mangu. N'ekyavaamu, amaka mangi geesanga nga galwana okufuna ebyetaago by'obulamu obwa bulijjo.
ach_prompt: I ngee kot ma okelo peko madit tutwal, cuk me tedero odoko obur, ki jami acata ojwik oyot-oyot tutwal. Macalo adwogi, gangi mapol gunongo tek tutwal me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ekwam loapol noi, aponi kojalakinai isokonin luka atutubet kwap, ido apotu iboro ikidioko noi. Kanuka ngun, apotu ikalia luipu odumutu ebe etiono adumun iboro luipudasi kesi.
lgg_prompt: Oli okporu 'da ma vutia, 'ba ku cu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'deta ru, dika afa ayuzaru 'diyi esi mbeleru. E'yo 'disi, familia karakara eyi esu eyi dri ci afa lele aa'zu edriru 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'eihunga, obutare bw'omukyanga bukasigara busisikaire, kandi eby'okurya bikahwaho munonga. N'ekyarugiremu, amaka maingi gakatunga oburemeezi bw'okutunga ebirikwetengwa.

eng_prompt: In light of the ongoing humanitarian crisis, it is crucial to address the basic needs of those affected. Ensuring that all individuals have access to essential resources is a moral obligation that cannot be overlooked.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku buzibu bw'abantu obugenda mu maaso, kikulu nnyo okukola ku byetaago by'abo abakoseddwa. Okukakasa nti abantu bonna bafuna ebintu ebikulu buvunaanyizibwa obw'empisa obutasobola kubuusibwa maaso.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me konyo dano matye kawot anyim, pire tek tutwal me miyo jami ma mite pi joo ma onongo peko. Neno ni dano weng tye ki gum me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo obedo tic ma pire tek ma pe watwero cayo ne.
teo_prompt: Katupitos ationis na itunga, ejokuna noi aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga luetirorit. Aanyun ebe itunga kere edumunenete iboro lu itwasamao erai ibore yenibusakinit apodokinit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru 'ba eyini aa'zu ewu drialeri ma alea ri ma e'yosi, eri orodriru e'yo 'ba e'yo ni 'diyi ma aza kozu. Le 'ba ma ne ra kini 'ba dria eyi ma esuta afa eyini lele aa'zu edriru 'diyi ma alea ri eri e'yo azi 'bani eco adi ku ni i.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'abantu oburikugyenda omu maisho, n'eky'omugasho kukora aha byetaago by'abo abakosirwe. Okureeba ngu abantu boona bahikwaho ebintu ebikuru n'obujunaanizibwa obutarikubaasa kwehuzya.

eng_prompt: As the number of displaced individuals continues to rise due to ongoing conflicts and natural disasters, it is crucial for the government to address their urgent needs. Providing adequate support for refugees not only fulfills humanitarian obligations but also fosters social stability and integration.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuwendo gw'abantu abasenguddwa gweyongera okulinnya olw'entalo ezigenda mu maaso n'obutyabaga obw'obutonde, kikulu nnyo gavumenti okukola ku byetaago byabwe eby'amangu. Okuwa abanoonyiboobubudamu obuyambi obumala tekikoma ku kutuukiriza buvunaanyizibwa bw'obuntubulamu naye era kireetawo obutebenkevu mu bantu n'okwegatta.
ach_prompt: Kit ma wel dano ma orwenyo gangi gi tye ka medde ameda pi lweny matye kawot anyim ki peko ma poto atura, pire tek tutwal ni gamente omyero ocob peko gi. Miyo kony ma oromo ki luring ayela pe cobo miti me konyo dano keken ento bene kelo ber bedo ki ribbe ikin dano.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata enaaba loka itunga luekerete koreriakec kanuka ingungeta keda atiokisio nu akwap, ejokuna apugan aitemokin ipudesia kec. Aijaikin agangat na ejok nejaas ikerai mam itodolikini aswamisinei nu itunga bon konye eyangauni ainapakina keda aimorikikina.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba angu kokoru 'diyi ni mu drile tu e'yo ngiringiri ni mupi drile azini e'yo ewaru nyakuni 'diyisi, eri orodriru gamete ni e'yo 'yezu e'yo eyini le mbeleru 'diyi ma aza kozu. Atita kililiru feza emunyale eyini ri ni lu e'yo 'ba eyini 'diyi ma aza kozu ku te eri vini asianzu eji o'bi eyi ma eselea tualu eyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okuba omuhendo gw'abantu abarikuruga omu maka gaabo nigugumizamu nigweyongyera ahabw'entaro n'ebihikiirizi ebirikugyenda omu maisho, nikikuru gavumenti kukora ahabyetengo byabo. Okuheereza empungi obuhwezi oburikumara, tikirikumaraho kuhikiiriza obujunanizibwa bw'abantu, kureka n'okureetaho obutebekana omu bantu hamwe n'okukwatanisa.

eng_prompt: In light of recent challenges faced by the community, the leadership has convened to discuss potential initiatives. They believe that enhancing support systems is crucial for fostering a healthier environment.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kusoomoozebwa abantu kwe basanga gyebuvuddeko, abakulembeze batuula okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nteekateeka eziyinza okukolebwa. Balowooza nti okutumbula enkola z'obuyambi kya mugaso nnyo mu kutumbula embeera ennungi.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko ma lwak tye kanongo cokcok-ki, lutela gubedo ka lok I kom yub mapat-pat matwero bedo tye. Gitye ki niyee ni medo rwom me yub me miyo kony pire tek tutwal pi gwoko yot kom ma ikabedo wa.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nuetereikina keda itunga luka atutubet, apotu engarenok iriamunos kanu aitemitem nuiswama. Iyuunitos kesi ebe aitojokar ewai lo igangit erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopolor aijar najokan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ongulumu eyini esu o'diru 'diyisi, drice'ba eyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo ndundu eyini eco 'ye ra 'diyi ma dria. Eyi ai ra kini geri atita fezu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ri eri orodriru angu ama agei ri ma alata otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi obu abantu batungire juba, abebembezi beeteeraine kuhanuura aha bintu ebirikubaasa kukorwa. Nibateekateeka ngu okwongyera aha buheereza n'eky'omugasho omu kutunguura eby'obuhangwa.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the urgent need for intervention, community leaders gathered to discuss the alarming situation. They were deeply concerned about the welfare of the residents who were suffering from neglect and inadequate resources.
lug_prompt: Olw'okumanya obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okuyingira mu nsonga, abakulembeze b'ekitundu baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku mbeera eyeeraliikiriza. Baali beeraliikirivu nnyo ku mbeera y'abatuuze abaali babonaabona olw'okulagajjalirwa n'obutaba na bikozesebwa bimala.
ach_prompt: Lutela me kabedo gunongo ni mitte ni omyero gutim gin mo oyot-oyot tutwal, man oweko gucokke me nywako lok I kom peko matye ni. Gubedo ki lworo madit tutwal I kom kwo pa lutedero ma onongo gitye ka canne ki can lim ma pe oromo.
teo_prompt: Apotu engarenok luka atutubet kowanyutu eipud loka atipet kanu aitemitem ejautene loetiono noi. Apodokinit kesi noi nuikamunitos aijar naka itunga luapotu ijalijalasi keda iboro luikidioko.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu e'yo 'yezu mbeleru ri ma dria, drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi tra eyi e'yo nzezu e'yo ewaru 'da ma dria. Eyi ndra asi otiza be 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma edri eyini candi esupi e'yo 'bani eyi adizu risi azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma ako si 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okumanya ngu hariho ekyetengo ky'amaani, abeebembezi b'ebyanga baketeeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha nshonga egyo. Bakaba nibafayo munonga ahamagara g'abatuuragye abaabaire nibabonabona ahabw'okunagaijura hamwe n'ebintu ebitarikumara.

eng_prompt: The organization is dedicated to improving global health and ensuring access to nutritious food for all. Their mission focuses on eradicating hunger and promoting sustainable agricultural practices.
lug_prompt: Ekitongole kyewaddeyo okutumbula ebyobulamu mu nsi yonna n'okukakasa nti abantu bonna bafuna emmere erimu ebiriisa. Ekigendererwa kyabwe kiri ku kumalawo enjala n'okutumbula enkola z'obulimi eziwangaala.
ach_prompt: Dul eni tye ki miti me ilo malo rwom me yot kom I wilobo ki neno ni dano weng tye ki cam matye ki moc cam maber. Miti gi tye me lweny i kom peko me kec ki medo rwom me pur.
teo_prompt: Ekapakina atukot ngin aitojokar angaleu naka akwap kere ka aanyun ebe edumunenete itunga kere inyamat luejaasi keda iponesio luajokak. Alosikinetekec erai aikisar etenge ka aitopolor iponesio luka akor luepedorete angetakin.
lgg_prompt: Amuti 'da fe i e'yo rua ala ma omgbo otuzu wudrikurusiri ma dria dika eri fe 'ba dria eyini nyaka muke 'diyi esuzu. Asisile yiniri 'ba asi abiri droza ma dria azini geri agirikica ni ewu drile ri ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ekitongore kyehaireyo kutunguura eby'amagara omunsi yoona n'okureeba ngu buri omwe yaatunga eby'okurya ebirimu ebiriisa. Ekigyendererwa kyabo n'okumaraho enjara n'okutunguura eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing humanitarian crisis, officials have been assessing the needs of displaced populations. As a result, the government will increase the number of food supplies for refugees.
lug_prompt: Olw'obuzibu bw'abantu obweyongera, abakungu babadde beetegereza ebyetaago by'abantu ababundabunda. N'ekinaavaamu, gavumenti ejja kwongera ku bungi bw'emmere eweebwa abanoonyiboobubudamu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko me konyo dano matye kamede, lutic gubedo ka neno miti pa dano ma oryemogi ki I kabedogi. Macalo adwogi ne, gamente bimedo cam ma kimiyo ki luring ayela.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu itunga, eutasi eswamak airereonor ipudesia luka itunga lu aponi itobwounai. Kanuka ngun, ebuni apugan aiyatakin inyamat lu ijaikitai ikerai.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo 'ba eyini 'diyi ma aza kozu ri ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma e'yosi, azi'ba eyi e'bi e'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu 'diyi ma ale andri. E'yo 'disi, gamete ni mu nyaka fe emunyale eyini ri ma kalafe otu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'abantu obweyongyeire, abakungu batwire nibashwijuma ebyetaago by'abantu ababingirwe omu maka gaabo. Ekyarugiremu,gavumenti neija kwongyera ahaby'okurya ebirikuherezibwa empungi.

eng_prompt: In light of the increasing food insecurity faced by many families, it is crucial for authorities to take action. Addressing this issue requires a comprehensive approach to ensure that everyone has access to nutritious meals and essential resources.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bbula ly'emmere eryeyongera amaka mangi lye gasanga, kikulu nnyo ab'obuyinza okubaako kye bakolawo. Okukola ku nsonga eno kyetaagisa enkola ey'awamu okulaba nga buli omu afuna emmere erimu ebiriisa n'ebintu ebikulu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me can cam matye kamede I gangi mapol, pire tek tutwal ni lutela omyero gutim gin mo. Cobo peko man mito yoo acel me neno ni dano weng tye ki cam matye ki moc cam ki jami ma mite pi kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Katupitos amamus na inyamat lu itereikina keda ikalia luipu, erai ibore yenepol noi apedorosio aswam nuiswama. Kanu aitemokin ationis na ekoto itunga kere aanyun ebe epedorete itunga kere adumun inyamat lu enyamete ejok keda iboro lu itwasamao.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru nyaka ako ni familia karakara eyini esu ri ma dria, eri orodriru okpo e'ipi eyini e'yo 'yezu. E'yo 'di ma aza kozu le geri 'bani ecozu nezu ra kini 'ba dria eco nyaka rua ma rua ala be azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi esu ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'okurya obweyongyeire omu maka maingi, ab'obushoborozi bashemereire kugira eki bakozire. Okukora aha nshonga egi nikyetengyesa enteekateeka y'omutaano kureeba ngu buri omwe atunga eby'okurya ebirimu ebiriisa hamwe n'ebintu ebirikwetengwa.

eng_prompt: In a surprising move, the local government announced new restrictions on media access. As a result, journalists have been disbanded from the district meetings.
lug_prompt: Mu ngeri eyeewuunyisa, gavumenti y'ebitundu yalangiridde obukwakkulizo obupya ku mikutu gy'empuliziganya. N'ekyavaamu, bannamawulire bagobeddwa mu nkiiko za disitulikiti.
ach_prompt: I yoo ma obedo me ngeng tutwal, gamente me tedero okati ki cik manyen me gengo tic pa odi poko ngec. Macalo adwogi ne, ki ryemo lucoo lok angeya ki I kacoke me district.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aswamisioit na itegelikina, abu apugan naka atutubet kolimo ikisila luitetiak mama ejaasi luka iyemuto. Kanuka ngun, alemar arotak iyemuto kotoma airiamununeta nuka edisitrikt.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azi osutaru ni ma alia, gamete angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri azi e'yo o'diru e'yo oyuza ni 'diyi ma esuta ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba dro 'ba osisia ni 'diyi mitingi distrikiti ni 'diyi ma alea risi te.
nyn_prompt: Omu muringo ogurikutangaaza, gavumenti y'ebyaro ekarangirira obukwakurizo busya aha mikutu y'amahurire. N'ekyarugiremu, abanyamakuru babingirwe omu nkiiko za disiturikiti.

eng_prompt: In recent meetings, community leaders expressed concerns about the district's visibility and communication with residents. As a result, it became clear that the district lacks a public relations department.
lug_prompt: Mu nkiiko ezaakaggwa, abakulembeze b'ekitundu baalaga obweraliikirivu ku kulaba kwa disitulikiti n'empuliziganya n'abatuuze. N'ekyavaamu, kyalabika bulungi nti disitulikiti terina kitongole kya nkolagana na bantu.
ach_prompt: I kacoke ma okato cokcok-ki, lutela me kabedo mapat-pat gunyutu lworo I kom kit ma districts nen kwede ki lok ki lutedero. Macalo adwogi ne, onen atyer kamaleng ni distrik peke ki dul makemme ki lok ki lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamununeta pac, apotu engarenok luka atutubet itodutu aiyalongongokec kanuikamunitos apedor naka edisitrikt keda einer keda itunga. Kanuka ngun, apotu kojenutu ebe emamiatatar edisitrikt keda edipatiment loka arucokina keda itunga.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi o'diru 'diyi ma alea, drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi ece asi otiza eyidri e'yo distrikiti ni e'dazu ri ma dria tualu e'yo nzeza 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi pie ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, eca e'da kililiru kini distrikiti 'da vu enyati o'bi eyi ma eselea ri yo.
nyn_prompt: Omu nkiiko ezihweireho, abeebembezi b'ekyanga boorekire okwerarikirira kwabo ahabw'okureebeka kwa disiturikiti hamwe n'empurizagana n'abatuuragye. Ekyarugiremu, kikarebeka butunu ngu disiturikiti teine kitongore ky'okukwatanisa n'abantu.

eng_prompt: In the midst of growing public concern, the district chairman addressed the community to provide reassurance. He emphasized that the situation was under control and that external influences were being exaggerated.
lug_prompt: Wakati mu kweraliikirira kw'abantu okweyongera, ssentebe wa disitulikiti yayogeddeko eri abantu okubagumya. Yakikkaatirizza nti embeera eri wansi w'obuyinza era nti ebikolwa eby'ebweru biyitiridde.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lwak tye ki lworo madit tutwal, won kom me district oloko ki lwak me cuku cwiny gi. En oketo cwinye tutwal I kom ni peko ne dong tye I te loc dok ni jami ma aa ki I lobo ma woko tye ka kelo peko mapol tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aiyalongongo naka itunga, abu apolon eicolong loka edisitrikt iner nejaas itunga. Abu ngesi kitogogong ebe ejai ejautene loepedorio aitikitik ido eutai aijulanakin akiro nuka akwapin nukokinga.

eng_prompt: In today's fast-paced world, staying updated on current events is essential. One of the most reliable sources for information is the daily press.

ach_prompt: I lobo me kareni ma jami time oyot-oyot tutwal, bedo ki ngec matut I kom jami matye katimme kombedi pire tek tutwal. Kabedo acel ma dano geno me nongo ngec en aye gajeti akwana me nino ducu.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo naejaasi keda esipidi loepol noi, ejokuna noi aijen nuiswamasi. Idiopet koboro lu itigogongoritai kanu aikam iyemuto.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alia, aa'zu e'yo yi 'yepi sawa 'disi 'diyi ma dria ri eri orodriru. Geri azi alu 'bani ecozu o'duko esuzu asi'baza be 'diyi ma azi eri karatasi e'yo laza be o'du driasi 'diyi.

eng_prompt: In today's digital age, social media has become an integral part of our daily lives. Many people are curious about how these platforms can positively impact communication and community engagement.
lug_prompt: Mu mulembe gwa digito ogw'ennaku zino, emikutu emigattabantu gifuuse kitundu kya bulamu bwaffe obwa bulijjo. Abantu bangi baagala okumanya engeri emikutu gino gye giyinza okukyusaamu empuliziganya n'okukwataganya abantu.
ach_prompt: I kare man me tic ki intanet, kabedo me nywako lok me intanet dong odoko gin ma pire tek tutwal I kwowa me nino ducu. Dano mapol tye ki miti me ngeyo kit ma yub magi twero loko kwede lok ki lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nu nuka elago, erai elago ibore yenepol noi kotoma aijar wok naka nginiparan. Ekotosi itunga luipu ajenun epone loepedoriata iponesio luka elago aitojokar einer keda aiswamanar itunga.

eng_prompt: In today's fast-paced world, staying informed about environmental issues is more important than ever. Various platforms provide insights and updates on ecological events and developments.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ey'amangu, okusigala ng'omanyi ku nsonga z'obutonde bw'ensi kya mugaso nnyo okusinga bwe kyali kibadde. Emikutu egy'enjawulo giwa amagezi n'ebipya ku bibaddewo ku butonde n'enkulaakulana.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma jami tye ka time oyot-oyot tutwal, bedo ki ngec i kom lok makwako cwec ma orumuwa pire tek tutwal. Yub mapat-pat miyo ngec ki ngec manyen I kom jami matye katime I kabedo ma orumuwa ki dongo lobo mapat-pat matye katime.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo naejaasi keda esipidi loepol noi, ejokuna noi aijen nuikamunitos ejautene lo akwap. Einanakinete iponesio luegelegela akiro nuikamunitos akiro nuka isuban keda apol.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alia, aa'zu o'dukoti be e'yo angu amani aa'zu alenia 'diyi ma dria ri eri orodriru aga oku driorisi. Pari o'dukoti ofezu ndundu 'diyi ondua fe azini o'dukoti fe e'yo yi 'yepi angu ama agei ri ma dria azini e'yo angu ezoma ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba erimu amaani maingi, okumanya ebirikukwata aha buhangwa bw'ensi n'eky'omugasho munonga. Emikutu etari emwe neeha amakuru agarikukwata ahaby'obuhangwa hamwe n'entunguuka.

eng_prompt: Objectivity is a fundamental principle in journalism, as it ensures that information is presented fairly and accurately. Maintaining impartiality helps build trust with the audience and upholds the integrity of the news.
lug_prompt: Okubeera n'ekigendererwa kya mugaso mu by'amawulire, kubanga kikakasa nti amawulire gaweebwa mu bwenkanya era mu butuufu. Okukuuma obutasosola kiyamba okuzimba obwesige mu balabi n'okukuuma obwesimbu bw'amawulire.
ach_prompt: Bedo agonya obedo cik ma pire tek tutwal I lok angeya, pien neno ni lok angeya kicwalo maber dok atir. Bedo labongo apokapoka konyo me dongo gen ikin luwinyo lok angeya ki bene gwoko ber pa lok angea.
teo_prompt: Abeit erai ainapeta nuepolok noi nuka airot iyemuto, naarai itodunit ebe itodiaritai akiro koipone kaloejok ido kopone kaloejok. Ajaut keda atiakatiaka ingarakini aiduk amunokina kanejaas itunga ka aidar abeit naka iyemuto.
lgg_prompt: ꞋBani eꞌyo ꞌyezu eꞌyo kokoru ꞌdiyi eri eꞌyo okporu ꞌbani ꞌye eꞌyo osisia ni ꞌdiyi ma dria, yini ndrezu kini ꞌba oꞌduko ece kililiru azini kililiru. E'yo opendu kokoru ri ma tambaza ni fe asi'baza si 'ba e'yo 'dupi 'diyi ma eselea dika eri fe o'dukoti 'diyi ma aa e'yo ada be.
nyn_prompt: Okwetegyerezana n'omusingye gw'omugasho omu by'amahurire, ahabw'okuba nikyoreka ngu amakuru nigaheebwa omu muringo oguhikire kandi ogurikwetegyerezibwa. Okutashoroora, nikihwera omu kwombeka obwesigye omu bantu n'okurinda amazima g'amahurire.

eng_prompt: As the pandemic unfolded, people sought reliable information to understand the evolving situation. Various news outlets and platforms took on the responsibility of disseminating crucial updates and guidelines.
lug_prompt: Ekirwadde bwe kyagenda kyeyongera, abantu baanoonya obubaka obwesigika okutegeera embeera egenda mu maaso. Emikutu gy'amawulire egy'enjawulo n'emikutu gy'empuliziganya gyatwala obuvunaanyizibwa bw'okusaasaanya amawulire n'ebiragiro ebikulu.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma two opoto, dano guyenyo ngec ma genne me niang ngo matye katimme. Odi coyo lok angea mapat-pat gukwanyo tic me poko ngec ki cik mapigi tego.
teo_prompt: Kapak na abwangunor adeka naka ekorona, apotu itunga odumutu akiro nuka abeit kanu amisiikin ejautene loejai. Apotu luka iyemuto luegelegela kodumutu aswam naka aisiarakin akiro keda aicoreta nuepolok.
lgg_prompt: Azo ongulumu karakara eyi ezapiri ni ecaria, o'bi eyi nda o'dukoti asi'baza be 'diyi e'yo i 'yepi 'diyi vazu. Pari o'dukoti edrizu 'diyi azini pari o'dukoti edrizu 'diyi 'du azi o'dukoti orodriru 'diyi awazu azini azita o'bale o'dukoti edrizu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oburwaire ku bwarugireho, abantu bakasherura amakuru agarikwesigwa, okubaasa kwetegyereza entunguuka y'embeera. Emikutu y'amahurire etari emwe n'emwe ekatwara obujunanizibwa bw'okujanjaaza amakuru n'ebiragiro ebikuru.

eng_prompt: In today's fast-paced information age, the media plays a crucial role in shaping public perception. As news breaks and stories unfold, the audience becomes increasingly engaged and seeks to verify the details presented.
lug_prompt: Mu mulembe gwa leero ogw'amawulire ag'amangu, emikutu gy'amawulire gikola omulimu munene mu kubumba endowooza z'abantu. Nga amawulire gakulukuta n'emboozi nga zitambula, abalabi beeyongera okwenyigiramu n'okunoonya okukakasa ebisingawo ebiragibwa.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma lok angeya tye kawot oyot-oyot tutwal, odi poko ngec tye ki tic madit tutwal I yubu tam pa lwak. Ka lok angea obino ki ododo ma tye katimme, luwinyo lok gi bedo ki miti madit tutwal dok gi yenyo me niang lok matut makikatti kwede.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nu nuka aijulakin akiro, iswamaete arotak iyemuto aswam naepol noi kotoma aitodolikin aomisio nuka itunga. Kwape itolomunono iyemuto keda akiro, ekotosi itunga ajenun akiro nu itodiaritai.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa 'di ma alea o'dukoti edripi mbeleru ri ma alea, geri o'dukoti edrizu 'diyi azi okporu nga e'yo o'bi eyini ega 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo efupi o'diru azini o'duko yi e'doria, 'ba emu'ba 'diyi e'yo yi 'ye dika yi le e'yo dria 'bani ece 'diyi ma ale andri ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire obu obw'amakuru g'ahonaaho, abanyamakuru nibakora omurimo gw'amaani omu kuhindura emiteekateekyere y'abantu. Amahurire ku garikuhinduka n'ebirikugyenda omu maisho, abantu nibeeyongyera kwejumba kandi basherure okuhamya ebirikugambwaho omu bwijwire.

eng_prompt: As the role of journalists continues to evolve in the digital age, it's essential to consider the types of events that foster meaningful engagement and information exchange. Understanding the needs of the media can help organizations determine which gatherings would be most beneficial for both parties.
lug_prompt: Ngomulimu gwa bannamawulire gugenda mu maaso okukyuka mu mulembe gwa digito, kya mugaso okulowooza ku bika by'emikolo ebitumbula okukwatagana okw'amakulu n'okuwanyisiganya amawulire. Okutegeera ebyetaago by'abamawulire kisobola okuyamba ebitongole okusalawo enkungaana ki eziganyula enjuyi zombi.
ach_prompt: Kit ma tic pa lucoo lok angea tye kamede ki dongo I kare me nyonyo pa munu, pire tek tutwal me tamo I kom kwai yub ma kelo kubbe ki lok angeya. Niang miti pa lucoo lok angea twero konyo dul mapat-pat me niang kacokke mene ma ber pi dul aryo weng.
teo_prompt: Kwape elosi aswam naka arotak iyemuto aijulakin kotoma apakio kanu nuka elago, ejokuna noi aomoom iponesio luepedorete aitopolor aiswamanara keda aimor akiro. Amisiikin ipudesia luka arotak iyemuto ingarakini iriongeta ajenun aiboisio nuepedorete aimedaun.
lgg_prompt: Azi 'ba osisia ni 'diyiniri ni mu drile i ojazu ewu 'di ma alea, eri orodriru e'yo yi 'yepi e'yo yi 'yepi 'diyi ma eselea 'diyi ma e'yo egazu. E'yo 'ba e'yo oyuzani 'diyi ma e'yo vazu ri eco amuti yi ma aza ko e'yo otuta ngo yi ngapi orodriru amuti iri 'diyi driri ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Omurimo gw'abanyamakuru nigugumizamu nigweyongyera omu myaka ya digito, n'eky'omugasho okureeba emiringo y'emikoro erikureetaho okukoragana n'okugarukanisa amakuru. Okwetegyereza ebyetengo by'abanyamakuru nikibaasa kuhwera ebitongore kumanya enteerane ezirikubaasa kugasira abantu boona.

eng_prompt: In today's digital age, the rapid dissemination of news and updates has become essential for keeping the public informed. Various platforms and technologies have emerged to facilitate this swift communication.
lug_prompt: Mu mulembe gwa digito ogw'ennaku zino, okusaasaanya amawulire amangu n'ebipya kifuuse kikulu mu kukuuma abantu nga bamanyi. Emikutu ne tekinologiya eby'enjawulo bivuddeyo okwanguyiza empuliziganya eno ey'amangu.
ach_prompt: I kare me intanet me kare-ni, cwalo lok angeya oyot-oyot dong odoko gin ma pire tek tutwal me weko lwak bedo ki ngec. Yub mapat-pat me kubbe ki diro me tet mapat-pat okatti me weko lok man time oyot-oyot tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nu nuka elago, akorio na iyemuto katipet erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitijenikin itunga. Apolor iponesio luegelegela keda etatai loakwana kanu aitapatan einer lo atipet.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa 'di ma alea, o'duko eyi awazu mbeleru ri eca orodriru o'bi eyini imbata fezu. Afa ndundu eyi efu e'yo nzeza okposi 'di ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bwa digito obwa hati, okujanjaaza amahurire ahonaaho n'amahurire ag'omutaano kihindukire eky'omugasho omu kumanya abantu. Emikutu n'ebya tekinorogye etari emwe n'emwe, birugireho okuhwera omu by'empurizagana.

eng_prompt: In today's world, where misinformation can spread rapidly, it's crucial to consider the implications of sharing sensitive data. Certain details may be withheld to protect national security or individual privacy.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero, amawulire amakyaamu we gasobola okusaasaana amangu, kya mugaso okulowooza ku biva mu kugabana obubaka obw'ekyama. Ebintu ebimu biyinza okukwekebwa okukuuma eby'okwerinda by'eggwanga oba eby'obwannannyini by'omuntu.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma ite kare ni, kama ngec ma pe atir twero nyaa oyot, pire tek tutwal me tamo I kom adwogi me poko ngec ma mite. Lok mukene kitwero kano woko pi gwoko ber bedo pa lobo onyo kwo pa ngat acel acel.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap na ilolo, ne epedoriata akiro nuka aisab aisiarakin atipet, ejokuna noi aomoom nuepedorete atakanun kotoma aimor akiro nuka aiyeyea. Aticepak mam eponio aitijenar akiro ace kanu ayuarite ayuwara naka akwap keda aiyeyea naka itunganan.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alia, e'yo onzi ni i erezu mbeleru, eri orodriru e'yo ewaru e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi awazu 'diyi ma dria. Ba eco e'yo azi 'diyi ma ta mba ageitema kari niri ma tambazu kani ku e'yo 'ba ma ngulupi ni 'diyi ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba, ahu amakuru agatahikire garikubaasa kujanjaara juba, n'eky'omugasho kumanya ebirikubaasa kuruga omu kugabana ebirikukwata aha bantu. Ebirikukwataho ebimwe nibibaasa kutangirwa okurinda ebyokwerinda by'eihanga nainga eby'omuntu weena.

eng_prompt: In a democratic society, the role of the media is crucial for ensuring transparency and accountability. To fulfill this responsibility, journalists gather insights and perspectives from various sources within the community.
lug_prompt: Mu demokulasiya, omulimu gw'emikutu gy'empuliziganya gwa mugaso nnyo mu kukakasa obwerufu n'embalirira. Okutuukiriza obuvunaanyizibwa buno, bannamawulire bakungaanya amagezi n'endowooza okuva mu nsibuko ez'enjawulo mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: I te loc alwak, tic pa odi poko ngec obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me neno ni ada ki kor tic tye. Me cobo tic man, lucoo lok angea coko ngec ki tam ma aa ki bot lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda aseo naka itunga, epol noi aswam naka arotak iyemuto kanu awanyun ebe ejai aica ka aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere akiro. Kanu aitodolikin aswamukec, etukete arotak iyemuto akiro keda aomisio nuegelegela kanejaas itunga.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu democracia ni ma alea, azi 'ba e'yo oyuzani 'diyi niri eri okporu e'yo ada ni azini geri 'bani e'yo 'yezu 'diyi ma dria. Azi 'di 'yezu, 'ba osisia ni 'diyi e'yo eyi ma dria 'diyi tra engazu angu ndundu eyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu demokurasiya,omurimo gw'abanyamakuru n'ogw'omugasho munonga omu kureetaho amazima n'embaririra. Okuhikiiriza obujunaanizibwa obu, abanyamakuru nibarundaana ebiteekateeko kuruga omu myanya etari emwe n'emwe omu bantu.

eng_prompt: As we assess the landscape of journalism in Uganda, it's important to understand the diversity and reach of our media outlets. Can you provide an overview of the current media environment in the country?
lug_prompt: Nga twekenneenya embeera y'ebyamawulire mu Uganda, kikulu okutegeera enjawulo n'okutuuka kw'emikutu gyaffe egy'amawulire.
ach_prompt: Ka watye ka neno kit ma lok angea tye kwede I lobo Uganda, pire tek tutwal me niang kit ma odi poko ngec mapat-pat tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Kwape sio aanyanar ejautene loka airot iyemuto ko Uganda, ejokuna noi amisiikin aiboisio nuegelegela nuka arotak iyemuto wok.
lgg_prompt: Amani angu e'yo osisia ni kari Uganda niri ma alea ri ma ale andriria, eri orodriru e'yo ama vile pari o'dukoti edrizu 'diyi ma wura ndundu 'diyi vazu.
nyn_prompt: Twaba nitushwijuma entwaza y'eby'amahurire omu Uganda, ni kikuru kwetegyereza oburungi n'oburungi bw'emikutu yaitu y'amahurire.

eng_prompt: Urban areas are often seen as hubs of opportunity and innovation. As a result, they become focal points for businesses and entrepreneurs looking to expand their reach.
lug_prompt: Ebibuga bitera okutunuulirwa ng'ebifo eby'emikisa n'obuyiiya. N'ekivuddemu, zifuuka ebifo ebikulu eby'obusuubuzi n'abasuubuzi abanoonya okugaziya okutuuka kwabwe.
ach_prompt: Kabedo matye I boma madongo pol kare kineno gi macalo kabedo ma dano twero nongo iye gum me timo jami manyen. Macalo adwogi ne, gudoko kama lutim biacara ki lutim biacara ma gimito medo rwom me tic gi tye iye.
teo_prompt: Ewanyunitai aiboisio nu otaun kwape aiboisio nu itolomere iboro luitetiak. Kanuka ngun, eraunete kesi aiboisio nuepolok noi nuka agwelanar keda agwelanarak lu ekotosi aitanyanyar aiboisio kec.
lgg_prompt: Ba angu tawuni ru 'diyi ndre ekile pari drileba ni azini e'yo o'diru 'diyi ni 'diyi ru. E'yo 'disi, eyi eca angu tujari 'yepi tualu 'ba tujari 'yepi 'diyi pie eyini ani ecozu eyi ma angu ezoma ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Endembo nizikira kureebwa nk'emyanya y'emigisha n'okujumbura. N'ekyarugiremu, nibihinduka emyanya y'okukorerwamu bizinesi hamwe n'abashubuzi abarikwenda kwongyera aha buheereza bwabo.

eng_prompt: Uganda's administrative structure is organized into various levels to facilitate governance and service delivery. At the local level, these divisions play a crucial role in managing resources and implementing policies.
lug_prompt: Enkola y'obukulembeze mu Uganda etegekeddwa mu mitendera egy'enjawulo okusobola okwanguyiza enfuga n'obuweereza. Ku mutendera gw'ebyalo, ebitongole bino bikola omulimu gwa maanyi mu kuddukanya ebintu n'okussa mu nkola amateeka.
ach_prompt: Yub me tela me lobo Uganda kiyubu I rwom mapat-pat wek odwok rwom me tela ki miyo kony. I rwom me tedero, dul mapat-pat magi timo tic mapire tek tutwal I doro jami ki keto cik itic.
teo_prompt: Ejaasi apugan nako Uganda keda adokena nuegelegela kanu aitapatan epugae keda aijanakin. Kotoma atutubena nu okwap, iswamaete atutubena nu aswam naepol noi kanu aidar iboro ka aitegear ainapeta.
lgg_prompt: Ba oti otita e'yo driceza ni kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi ma alea esele ndu ndu eyini ani e'yo driceza ni azini azakoma fele o'bi eyidri ri ma omgbo otuzu. Ongmbo angu ndundu eyi ma alea, esele coza 'diyi azi okporu 'ye afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma tambazu azini azita eyi 'bazu 'yeta ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Enkora y'obwebembezi omu Uganda, etebekanisiibwe omu mitendera etari emwe n'emwe, okubaasa kuhwera omu bwebembezi n'obuheereza. Aha rurengo rw'ebyaro,ebitongore ebi nibikora omurimo gw'amaani omu kureeberera eby'obugaiga n'okuta ebiragiro omu nkora.

eng_prompt: As urban populations continue to grow, the demand for infrastructure and services increases significantly. This surge in population often leads to a need for improved transportation networks.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuwendo gw'abantu mu bibuga gweyongera okukula, obwetaavu bw'ebizimbe n'obuweereza bweyongera nnyo. Okweyongera kw'omuwendo gw'abantu kuleetera obwetaavu bw'entambula ennungi.
ach_prompt: Ka wel dano tye kamede ki dongo i boma, miti me gedo ki kony bene mede tutwal. Medde pa wel dano ipol kare kelo miti me yubu yoo me wot.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata enaaba loka itunga kotoma oibuga, iyata eipuda lo iboro ka aijanakino. Apolou na na itunga eyangauni eipud loka aiteteun elose loajokan.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba eyini aa'zu aku ambu tawuni ru 'diyi ma alea ri ni mu drile tu, lezu afa ayuzaru azini azakoma fele o'bi eyidri 'diyi pie ri ma omgbo ni tu ra. E'yo 'ba eyini tuzu 'dileri ni e'yo 'ba eyini lezu geri eyini acizu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ri eji.
nyn_prompt: Omuhendo gw'abantu omu ndembo, niguguma nigweyongyera, ekyetengo ky'ebyombeko hamwe n'obuheereza nikyeyongyera munonga. Okweyongyera kw'omuhendo gw'abantu nikureetaho ekyetengo ky'entambura nungi.

eng_prompt: Having a major urban center nearby can significantly enhance a region's reputation and economic opportunities. Cities often serve as cultural and commercial hubs, attracting talent and investment.
lug_prompt: Okubeera n'ekibuga ekinene okumpi kisobola okutumbula erinnya ly'ekitundu n'emikisa gy'ebyenfuna. Ebibuga bitera okukola nga ebifo by'ebyobuwangwa n'ebyobusuubuzi, okusikiriza ebitone n'okusiga ensimbi.
ach_prompt: Bedo ki city madit cok twero ilo malo rwom me kabedo enoni ki gum me timo biacara. Cities ipol kare tiyo macalo kabedo me tekwaro ki biacara, ma kelo talanta ki biacara.
teo_prompt: Ajaut keda aiboisit naepol noi naeyapie keda eibuga epedori aitojokar ekiror loka aiboisit keda arerengesio nuka edumune loka ikapun. Iswamaete duc isitei kwape aiboisio nuka einono keda agwelanar, ingalaunete atalantan keda agwelanar.
lgg_prompt: Aa'zu aku ambu tawuni ru 'diyi ma ageia ci ri eco angu 'da ma ru ma omgbo otu tualu drileba robia esuzu 'diyi pie. Aku ambo eyi tutuni azi nga ekile angu e'yo suruni azini tujari ni 'diyi ru, eyini ani feta Munguni fe 'diyi ejizu tualu angu lonyi vuti aleza ni 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Okugira orurembo ruhango haihi nikibaasa kutunguura eiziina ry'ekyanga hamwe n'emigisha y'eby'entaasya. Endembo nizikora nk'emyanya y'eby'obuhangwa hamwe n'eby'obushubuzi, ekirikureeta emyoga hamwe n'eby'obushubuzi.

eng_prompt: As urban areas continue to grow and evolve, they become vital hubs for innovation and economic activity. This dynamic shift often leads to increased investment and infrastructure improvements in surrounding regions.
lug_prompt: Nga ebibuga byeyongera okukula n'okukulaakulana, bifuuka ebifo ebikulu eby'obuyiiya n'emirimu gy'ebyenfuna. Enkyukakyuka eno ey'amaanyi etera okuviirako okusiga ensimbi n'okulongoosa ebizimbe mu bitundu ebiriraanyeewo.
ach_prompt: Ka kabedo me boma madongo tye kamede ki dongo ki dongo, gi doko kabedo mapire tek tutwal me kelo jami manyen ki timo biacara. Aloka-loka eni ipol kare kelo medo rwom me keto lim I tic ki yubu jami mapat-pat I but lobo matye cok.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinitos aiboisio nuka itaunin apoloun, eraunete kesi aiboisio nuepolok noi nuka aitolomunun iboro keda aswamisinei nuka ikapun. Aijulanakineta nu eyangaunete aipikakin ikapun keda aitojokar aiboisio nu idunyare.
lgg_prompt: Angu tawuni ru 'diyi ni mu drile zozu azini zoria, eyi eca angu orodriru e'yo ndundu eyi edezu azini e'yo robiani 'diyi 'yezu 'diyi ru. Ojata okporu 'diri ni tutuni fe lonyi vuti aleza ma omgbo tuzu azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu angu ama agei 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Endembo ku zirikugumizamu nizikura n'okutunguuka, nizihinduka emyanya y'omugasho y'okujumbura hamwe n'emirimo y'eby'entaasya. Empindahinduka egi neetuma abantu beyongyera kutamu sente n'okutunguura ebyombeko omu byanga ebirikwetorwaire.

eng_prompt: Arua district is known for its rich cultural heritage and diverse landscapes. Many people are curious about its geographical location within Uganda.
lug_prompt: Disitulikiti ya Arua emanyiddwa olw'ebyobuwangwa n'ebifo eby'enjawulo. Abantu bangi baagala okumanya ekifo kyayo mu Uganda.
ach_prompt: Arua obedo dictrik ma oywek pi tekwaro ki kabedo ma pat pat ma en tye iye. Dano mapol tye ki miti me ngeyo kabedo ne I lobo Uganda.
teo_prompt: Ejenara edisitrikta loka Arua kanu inonosio keda aiboisio nuegelegela. Ekotosi itunga luipu aijen aiboisit ke ko Uganda.
lgg_prompt: Ba ni distrikiti Arua niri e'yo a'bini 'diyi ma omgbo angirisi tualu angu ndundu 'diyi pie. Ba karakara eyi le ni angu erini aa'zu kari Uganda niri ma alea ri ma dria saaru.
nyn_prompt: Disiturikiti ya Arua nemanywa ahabw'obuhangwa bwayo n'oburungi bwayo. Abantu baingi baine ekihika ky'okumanya omwanya gw'eihanga omuri Yuganda.

eng_prompt: In today's world, the infrastructure of a city relies heavily on various essential services. Among these, a reliable power supply is crucial for its functionality and growth.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero, ebizimbe by'ekibuga byesigama nnyo ku bintu ebikulu eby'enjawulo. Mu bino, amasannyalaze agesigika ga mugaso nnyo eri enkola yaago n'okukula.
ach_prompt: I lobo me kareni, gedo me boma madit jenge tutwalle I kom jami ma mite pi kwo pa dano. I kin magi, mac ma pe rweny obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi dongo ne.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap na ilolo, ejai iboro luipu lu itwasamao koibuga. Kotoma iboro lu, ibusakinit itunga ajaut keda akim naepol noi kanu aswam kec keda apolokec.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alia, afa ayuzaru aku ambu cityniri ma alia 'diyi yi ati azakoma orodriru 'diyi ma dria. Afa 'diyi ma eselea, aci feza kililiru ri eri ma azi ngazu azini zozu.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba, ebyombeko by'orurembo nibyetengwa munonga aha buheereza bw'omugasho. Omuri ebi, amashanyarazi agarikwesigwa n'ag'omugasho munonga ahabw'okukora n'okukura.

eng_prompt: As we stand on the brink of unprecedented change, uncertainty looms over every decision we make. The possibilities ahead are as vast as they are unpredictable.
lug_prompt: Nga bwe tuyimiridde ku bunkenke bw'enkyukakyuka ezitabangawo, obutali bukakafu bujja ku buli kusalawo kwe tukola. Ebintu ebiyinza okubaawo mu biseera eby'omu maaso binene nnyo era tebiteeberezebwa.
ach_prompt: I kare ma watye I agiki me aloka-loka ma pud pe otimme I kare macon, bedo ki akala-kala tye I kom moko tam weng ma wamoko. Jami matye anyim tye mapol tutwal ma pe itwero niang I komgi.
teo_prompt: Kwape iboyete oni kotoma aijulanakineta numam iwanyunitai sek, ejai amamus acamanar kotoma aseununeta nuiswama oni. Ipu iboro luebeit aswam koingaren ido mam epedorio ajenun.
lgg_prompt: Ekile ama so pa ojata okporu 'diyi ma dria, e'yo azi amani 'ye 'diyi ma dria e'yo ni ovuzu e'yo kokoru. E'yo ecopi i 'yepi ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi angiri tu ekile 'ba econi ni ku le.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku turikwemerera aha muheru gw'empinduka etarabaireho, okubuzabuza kweyongyeire aha kusharamu kwona oku turikukora. Ebirikubaasa kubaho omu maisho n'eby'amaani kandi tibirikwetegyerezibwa.

eng_prompt: Urban development requires careful consideration of various factors, including population growth and infrastructure needs. To ensure a thriving community, strategic planning is essential.
lug_prompt: Enkulaakulana y'ebibuga yeetaaga okufaayo ennyo ku nsonga ez'enjawulo omuli okweyongera kw'omuwendo gw'abantu n'ebyetaago by'ebizimbe. Okusobola okukakasa nti ekitundu kikulaakulana, enteekateeka ennungi ya mugaso.
ach_prompt: Dongo boma mito tam matut I kom jami mapol, ma I kingi obedo dongo pa wel dano ki jami ma mite pi gedo. Pi neno ni kabedo moni tye ka dongo maber, yube maber pire tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Apol naka itaunin ekot airereonor iboro luegelegela, aimoriarit enaaba loka itunga keda iboro luipudasi itunga. Kanu awanyun ebe epoloete itunga, ejokuna noi aitemonokin.
lgg_prompt: Le 'ba ma ega e'yo ndundu eyi ma dria ra tawuni eyi ma ezota ma dria, 'ba eyi ma kalafe ni tuzu tualu afa ayuzaru 'diyi pie. Ongulumu ma zota nezu, otuta kililiru ri eri orodriru.
nyn_prompt: Entunguuka y'endembo neeyetenga okwetegyereza n'obwegyendesereza enshonga nyingi, otwariiremu okweyongyera kw'abantu n'ebyombeko. Okureeba ngu ekyanga kitunguuka, okuteekateekyera kurungi n'eky'omugasho.

eng_prompt: In today's interconnected world, collaboration among various groups is essential for driving progress. As a result, individuals and organizations are increasingly seeking to connect with others who share their goals and passions.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ekwataganye, okukolera awamu mu bibiina eby'enjawulo kya mugaso nnyo mu kuleetawo enkulaakulana. N'ekivuddemu, abantu ssekinnoomu n'ebitongole byeyongera okunoonya okukwatagana n'abalala abagabana ebigendererwa byabwe n'ebyo bye baagala.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma ite kare ni kubbe tye, ribbe ikin dul mapat-pat obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me kelo dongo lobo. Macalo adwogi ne, dano ki dule tye ka yenyo kubbe ki joo mukene matye ki miti ki miti marom.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo, aiswamanara kiding igurupun luegelegela erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopolor apol. Kanuka ngun, eutasi itunga keda iriongeta aimo arucokina keda luce luejaasi keda apeleikinata keda iboro lueminasi kesi.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alia, ti ecita amuti ndundu eyi ma eselea ri eri orodriru angu ezoma ni. E'yo 'disi, 'ba yi ma ngulupisi azini amuti yi ma eselea 'diyi curu'do geri nda yi ecizu 'ba yini asi 'bazu yi ma eselea azini afa yini leleri be 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba erikukwatanisa, okukwatanisa ahagati y'ebibiina ebitarikushushana n'eky'omugasho omu kutunguuka. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu n'ebitongore nibyeyongyera kusherura okuhikaana n'abandi abaine ebigyendererwa hamwe n'ebi barikukunda.

eng_prompt: When organizing an event, it's essential to ensure that all aspects are thoroughly evaluated. This includes understanding the needs of the attendees and the resources available.
lug_prompt: Bw'oba oteekateeka omukolo, kikulu okukakasa nti ebintu byonna byekenneenyezebwa bulungi. Kino kizingiramu okutegeera ebyetaago by'abaliwo n'ebikozesebwa ebiriwo.
ach_prompt: Ka itye ka yubu yub, pire tek tutwal me neno ni jami weng kitimo maber. Man kwako niang miti pa joo ma obedo tye ki jami ma tye.
teo_prompt: Arai itemonokini ijo epucit, ibusakinit aanyun ebe inwakio akiro kere ejok. Imoriarit ngin amisiikin ipudesia luka itunga lu ajaas keda iboro lu ejaas.
lgg_prompt: Ba ka omu azi otu, eri orodriru nezu ra kini 'ba e'yo dria 'diyi ma ale andri kililiru. E'yo 'di ma alia afa 'ba emu'ba 'diyi le 'diyi ma vata azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Waaba nootebekanisa omukoro, n'eky'omugasho kureeba ngu enshonga zoona ziteekateekwaho kurungi. Eki nikitwariramu okwetegyereza ebyetengo by'abaabaire bariho hamwe n'eby'okukoresa ebiriho.

eng_prompt: In order to foster community support and engagement, it is essential to educate residents about the benefits and goals of the new city initiative. This understanding will help ensure that the public is actively involved in the development process.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutumbula obuyambi n'okwenyigiramu kw'ekitundu, kya mugaso okusomesa abatuuze ku migaso n'ebiruubirirwa by'enteekateeka y'ekibuga ekipya. Okutegeeragana kuno kujja kuyamba okukakasa nti abantu beenyigira mu nkola y'enkulaakulana.
ach_prompt: Me kelo kony ki ribbe ikin lwak, pire tek tutwal me pwonyo lwak i kom ber pa yub me city manyen. Niang eni obi weko lwak bedo tye ikare me dongo lobo.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor agangat keda aisisianakin itunga, ejok aisisianakin itunga ajokisio keda apeleikinata nuka esite loitetet. Ebuni acamanar ngin aingarakin awanyun ebe ejaas itunga toma akiro nuka apol.
lgg_prompt: Lezu atita ongulumu eyini ri ma omgbo otuzu, eri orodriru imbata fezu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi dri orodri azini otita aku ambo o'diru 'diyiniri ma dria. Vata 'di ni nga fe o'bi eyini aa'zu e'yo angu ezoma ni 'diyi ma alea indi.
nyn_prompt: Okureetaho obushagiki n'okwetabamu kw'abantu, n'eky'omugasho kwegyesa abatuuragye aha migasho n'ebigyendererwa by'orurembo orusya. Okukwatanisa oku nikwija kuhwera abantu kwejumba omu ntunguuka.

eng_prompt: When developing a comprehensive framework for urban development, it is essential to consider various factors that influence the growth and sustainability of a city. This leads to the question of what must be included in a city structural plan?
lug_prompt: Mu kukola enteekateeka y'enkulaakulana y'ekibuga, kyetaagisa okulowooza ku nsonga ez'enjawulo eziviirako enkulaakulana n'okuwangaala kw'ekibuga.
ach_prompt: Ikare me yubu yub me dongo boma, pire tek tutwal me neno jami mapol ma kelo dongo ki dongo pa city.
teo_prompt: Kapak kana aitolomun ainapeta nuka apol naka itaunin, ejokuna aomoom akiro nuegelegela nuepedorete aitopolor apol keda apol naka eibuga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo dria angu ezoma ni aku ambo eyi ma alea ri ma e'dota ma alea, eri orodriru e'yo ndundu aku ambo eyi ma zota azini aa'ta ewu drile ri ma alea 'diyi ma e'yo egazu.
nyn_prompt: Waaba nookora enteekateeka y'entunguuka y'endembo, n'eky'omugasho okureeba enshonga nyingi ezirikureetaho entunguuka n'okutunguuka kw'orurembo.

eng_prompt: In today's rapidly evolving economy, individuals are constantly seeking ways to enhance their quality of life. One effective approach to achieving this goal is by leveraging the opportunities presented by commercialisation.
lug_prompt: Mu by'enfuna by'ennaku zino ebikulaakulana amangu, abantu buli kaseera banoonya engeri y'okutumbula omutindo gw'obulamu bwabwe. Engeri emu ennungi ey'okutuuka ku kiruubirirwa kino kwe kukozesa emikisa egiva mu by'obusuubuzi.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma lim tye ka dongo oyot-oyot tutwal, dano tye ka yenyo yoo me ilo malo rwom me kwo gi. Yo acel maber me cobo miti man obedo tic ki gum ma biacara kelo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loepol noi loka ikapun, eutasi itunga aimo iwaitin lu itojokaret aijar kec. Epone ediopebon loka aitodolikin alosikinet kana ngesi aitwasam arerengesio nu ijaikitos agwelanar.
lgg_prompt: E'yo lonyi ni curu'do tupi mbeleru 'diyi ma alea, 'ba eyi sa'wa driasi geri nda eyi ma edri otuzu. Geri azi orodriru 'bani ecozu e'yo 'di 'yezu ri eri geri ecozu drileba e'yo afa ozizaru 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ayuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'entaasya by'erizooba ebirikugyenda omu maisho, abantu nibaronda oburyo bw'okutunguura emituurire yaabo. Omuringo gumwe murungi gw'okuhikiiriza ekigyendererwa eki n'okukoresa emigisha erikuruga omu by'obushuubuzi.

eng_prompt: As the region continues to develop, investments in infrastructure have become a top priority for local authorities. Enhancing transportation links is essential for fostering economic growth and attracting new businesses.
lug_prompt: Nga ekitundu kigenda mu maaso okukulaakulana, okusiga ensimbi mu bikozesebwa kifuuse ekintu ekikulu eri ab'obuyinza mu byalo. Okutumbula entambula kya mugaso nnyo mu kutumbula ebyenfuna n'okusikiriza bizinensi empya.
ach_prompt: Ka twok piny eni tye kamede ki dongo, keto lim I gedo dong odoko gin ma lutela me tedero omyero guket iye cwinygi. Medo rwom me wot pire tek tutwal pi dongo lobo ki kelo biacara manyen.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokini aiboisit apol, erai aipikakin ikapun toma aduketa nuepolok noi mama ejaasi apedorosio nuka atutubet. Aitojokar elose nes ejok kanu aitopolor apol naka ikapun ka ayangaun ibiasaran luitetiak.
lgg_prompt: Angu 'da ni mu drile zozu, e'yo lonyi vuti aleza ni angu 'da ma alea ri eca curu'do e'yo okporu 'ba okpo e'iru angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyini. Afa acipa ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ri eri orodriru zota e'yo robiani 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu tualu tujari o'diru 'diyi ejizu.
nyn_prompt: Ekicweka ku kirikugumizamu nikyeyongyera kutunguuka, okukoresa esente omu byombeko kihindukire eky'omugasho munonga aha b'obushoborozi b'ebyaro. Okutunguura eby'engyenda n'eky'omugasho omu kutunguura eby'entaasya n'okureetaho bizinesi nsya.

eng_prompt: In today's global economy, countries rely heavily on trade to foster economic growth and strengthen diplomatic ties. As nations seek to expand their markets, they engage in various agreements and partnerships to facilitate commerce.
lug_prompt: Mu by'enfuna by'ensi yonna eby'ennaku zino, amawanga geesigama nnyo ku by'obusuubuzi okutumbula enkulaakulana mu byenfuna n'okunyweza enkolagana. Ng'amawanga ganoonya okugaziya obutale bwago, geenyigira mu ndagaano n'enkolagana ez'enjawulo okwanguyiza eby'obusuubuzi.
ach_prompt: I tenge me lim me wilobo ma ite kare ni, lobo mapat-pat jenge tutwalle I kom biacara me dongo lobo ki dongo wat ikin gi. I kare ma lobe mapat-pat tye ka yenyo yo me medo cato wilgi, gi winye I winye mapat-pat me weko cato wil bedo yot.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loka ikapun loka akwap kere, itwasamaete akwapin agwelanar kanu aitopolor apol keda aitogogong eidicane loajokan. Kwape ekotosi akwapin aitanyanyar esokoni kec, elomanarete kesi acamanar keda acamanar kanu aitapatan agwelanar.
lgg_prompt: E'yo lonyi ni curu'do wudrikurusiri ma alia, kari yi yi ati tujara ma dria tualu zota e'yo lonyi ni 'diyi ma alia azini yi ma eselea 'diyi ma okpo otuzu. Kari yini lezu cuu yini 'diyi ma ongmbo otuzu, yi fi otita azini ti ecita ndundu yi ma eselea e'yo tujarani 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'entatsya y'ensi yoona ey'erizooba, amahanga nigagyendera munonga aha by'obushuubuzi, okureetaho entunguuka n'okwongyera amaani omu by'obushuubuzi. Amahanga garikugyezaho kushanjuura obutare bwago, nigeetaba omu ndagaano z'obushubuzi ezitarikushushana.

eng_prompt: As I plan my trip to the northern region of Uganda, I'm curious about the transportation options available. Specifically, I want to know about the ease of travel between Arua city and Koboko district.
lug_prompt: Nga bwe nteekateeka olugendo lwange mu kitundu ky'obukiikakkono bwa Uganda, njagala okumanya ebyentambula ebiriwo. Okusingira ddala, njagala okumanya ku bangu bw'entambula wakati w'ekibuga kya Arua ne disitulikiti y'e Koboko.
ach_prompt: I kare ma atye ka yubbe me cito I kumalo me Uganda, abedo ki miti me ngeyo yoo me wot matye. Amito niang kit ma wot yot kwede ikin boma madit me Arua ki distrik me Koboko.
teo_prompt: Kwape euta eong aitemonokin alositeka toma atutubet nako Nyakoi nako Uganda, akoto eong ajenun nuikamunitos elose lo ejai. Kacut akoto eong ajenun eipone lo epatana alosit kiding esite loka Arua keda Koboko.
lgg_prompt: Mani acita mavileri otuzu kari Uganda niri ma woko oruleru ri ma alea risi, ma ava be geri acizu 'diyi ma dria. Le ma ma ni e'yo acizu Arua city pi ma eselea distrikiti Koboko niri be ri ma e'yo ra.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku ndikukora enteekateeka y'orugyendo rwangye omu kicweka ky'amatemba ga Uganda, nyine ekihika ky'okumanya eby'engyenda ebiriho. Okukira munonga, ninyenda kumanya oburungi bw'engyenda ahagati y'orurembo rwa Arua na disiturikiti ya Koboko.

eng_prompt: As I strolled through the bustling streets, I couldn't help but wonder about the vibrant life that fills the area. The energy of the city made me curious about the various events and attractions that draw people to downtown.
lug_prompt: Nga bwe ntambulatambula mu nguudo ezirimu abantu abangi, saasobola butalowooza ku bulamu obujjudde abantu mu kitundu ekyo. Amaanyi g'ekibuga gandeetera okwagala okumanya emikolo egy'enjawulo n'ebintu ebisikiriza ebisikiriza abantu mu kibuga.
ach_prompt: I kare ma atye ka wot I gudu ma dano dwong iye, pe atwero weko tamo I kom kwo matye I kabedo ne. Tek pa boma ne oweko abedo ki miti me ngeyo jami mapat-pat ma kelo dano I boma madit.
teo_prompt: Neautar eong alosit korotin luejaasi keda itunga luipu, mam eong apedori aimorikikin aijar naka itunga luipu noi kotoma aiboisit kangin. Agogong naka eibuga abu ijaik eong akoto aijen nuikamunitos iboro luegelegela lu ingalaunete itunga toma otaun.
lgg_prompt: Mani aciria nzila ocuzaru 'diyi ma alea, ma econi ndra e'yo ega e'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma dria ku. Okpo aku ambu cityniri ma alia ri fe ma dri ava 'ye e'yo ndundu 'diyi ma dria azini afa ndundu 'ba eyi ejipi aku ambu cityniri ma alea 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ku naabaire nintambura omu nguuto ezirimu abantu baingi, nkaba ntarikubaasa kureka kwebuuza aha magara g'omutaano agari omu mwanya ogwo. Amaani g'orurembo gakandeetera kwenda kumanya emikoro etari emwe n'emwe hamwe n'ebintu ebirikureeta abantu omu rurembo ahagati.

eng_prompt: Higher education plays a crucial role in shaping the future workforce and fostering critical thinking skills. As a result, many individuals seek out university institutions for their educational needs.
lug_prompt: Okusoma okw'oku ntikko kukola omulimu gwa maanyi mu kubumba abakozi b'omu biseera eby'omu maaso n'okutumbula obukugu mu kulowooza. N'ekivuddemu, abantu bangi banoonya amatendekero ga yunivasite olw'ebyetaago byabwe eby'okusoma.
ach_prompt: Kwan me rwom ma malo konyo tutwal I yubu lutic me kare me anyim ki dongo diro me tam. Macalo adwogi ne, dano mapol giyenyo gangi kwan me rwom ma malo pi miti gi me kwan.
teo_prompt: Asioman na okwap erai naepol noi kanu aitolomun eswamak lu oingaren ka aitopolor acoa na aomisio. Kanuka ngun, elosenenete itunga luipu aiboisio nuka eunibasite kanu asioman kec.
lgg_prompt: Onita uruleru ri ni azi okporu nga 'ba azi ngapi ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi ma edeta ma alea tualu ondua e'yo egazu kililiru 'diyi pie. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara eyi university eyi nda e'yo eyini le onita ni 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Obwegyese bw'ahaiguru nibukora omurimo muhango omu kutendeka abakozi b'omubiro by'omumaisho n'okutunguura emyoga y'okuteekateeka kurungi. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu baingi nibaronda amatendekyero ga Yunivasite ahabw'ebyetengo byabo by'obwegyese.

eng_prompt: Access to reliable energy sources is crucial for economic growth and infrastructure development. However, many regions struggle with inconsistent power availability, impacting various sectors.
lug_prompt: Okufuna ensibuko z'amasannyalaze ezeesigika kya mugaso nnyo eri enkulaakulana mu byenfuna n'enkulaakulana y'ebizimbe. Wabula, ebitundu bingi birwanagana n'ebbula ly'amasannyalaze, ekikosa ebitundu eby'enjawulo.

lug_prompt: Okufuna ensibuko z'amasannyalaze ezeesigika kya mugaso nnyo mu kutumbula enkulaakulana y'ebyenfuna mu bitundu ebikulaakulana. Mu kutumbula ebintu ebikozesebwa, ebitundu bisobola okusikiriza bizinensi n'okutumbula ebyenfuna by'ebitundu.

teo_prompt: Amisikin aomisio nuka ikisila nuikamunitos imusagon luegelegela erai ibore yenepol noi kanu amisiikin nuelomunete kotoma aswamisio nuarokok. Adiopet aswamisio kwape kangin naepedori ayangaun atiokisio nuepolok noi kotoma okisila ngesi amumu naka akuan mama ejai icie itunganan.
