nyn_prompt: Okwetegyereza ebiragiro ebirikushoboorora ebihagaro ebitarikushushana n'eky'omugasho omu kumanya ebirikubaasa kuruga omu bikorwa eby'akabi. Ekikorwa kimwe nk'ekyo ekirikubaasa kurugwamu ebizibu by'amaani omu biragiro n'okutuntuza omuntu.

eng_prompt: Understanding the legal definitions of various crimes is crucial for recognizing the severity of different offenses. One such crime that often leads to serious consequences is assault.
lug_prompt: Okutegeera ennyonyola y'amateeka ku bumenyi bw'amateeka obw'enjawulo kikulu nnyo mu kutegeera obunene bw'ebikolobero eby'enjawulo. Emu ku misango egyo egitera okuvaamu ebizibu eby'amaanyi kwe kukuba omuntu.
ach_prompt: Niang kit ma cik tito kwede bal mapat-pat obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me niang kit ma bal mapat-pat obedo rac kwede. Bal acel ma kelo adwogi marac tutwal obedo lweny i kom lutino anyira.
teo_prompt: Amisikin aomisio nuka ikisila nuikamunitos imusagon luegelegela erai ibore yenepol noi kanu amisiikin erono loka imusagon luegelegela. Adiopebon lo eyangauni atiokisio nuarokok ngesi aibu aisiol.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azita ni e'yo onzi ndundu eyi ma dria 'diyi ma vata vazu ri eri orodriru e'yo onzi ndundu eyini aa'zu onzi 'diyi ma omgbo onizu. E'yo azita onyoza 'dile 'diyi ma azi ecopi e'yo onzi ejipi ri 'bani 'ba eyi obizu okpo alea ri i.
nyn_prompt: Okwetegyereza ebiragiro ebirikushoboorora ebihagaro ebitarikushushana n'eky'omugasho omu kumanya oburemeezi bw'ebihagaro ebitarikushushana. Omushango gumwe ogurikukira kurugwamu ebikwatiraine n'okutuntuza omuntu.

eng_prompt: In many communities, tensions can escalate between individuals or groups, leading to potential confrontations. To address these issues effectively, local authorities often step in to mediate and restore peace.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi, obunkenke busobola okweyongera wakati w'abantu ssekinnoomu oba ebibinja, ekiviirako okulwanagana okuyinza okubaawo. Okusobola okukola ku nsonga zino obulungi, ab'obuyinza ku byalo batera okuyingirawo okutabaganya n'okuzzaawo emirembe.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol, telle twero mede ikin dano onyo gurup ma kelo lweny. Me tyeko lok magi maber, lutela me tedero ipol kare gidonyo iyub me kelo kuc.
teo_prompt: Kaiboisio nuipu, epedorete ingungeta aiyatakin kiding itunga keda igurupun, ido eyangauni ingungeta. Kanu aitemokin akiro nu ejok, elomanarete apedorosio nuka atutubena kanu ainyakakin ainapakin.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara eyi ma alea, e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi eco tu 'ba eyi ma eselea kaniku ongulumu eyi ma eselea ra eyini ani e'yo ejizu ra. E'yo 'diyi ma aza kozu kililiru, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi tutuni fi e'yo eyi ma eselea asianzu ejizu.
nyn_prompt: Omu byaro bingi, obunkenke nibubaasa kweyongyera ahagati y'abantu nainga guruupu, ekirikubaasa kurugwamu entaro. Okukora aha nshonga ezi kurungi, ab'obushoborozi b'ebyaro nibataahamu kugaruraho obusingye.

eng_prompt: In many communities, religious leaders play a vital role in the lives of their congregants. To fulfill their duties effectively, priests often choose to reside close to their place of worship.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi, abakulembeze b'enzikiriza bakola omulimu omukulu mu bulamu bw'abantu baabwe. Okutuukiriza emirimu gyabwe obulungi, abasumba batera okusalawo okubeera okumpi n'ebifo byabwe eby'okusinzizaamu.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol, lutela dini timo tic mapire tek tutwal I kwo pa lucristayo gi. Pi cobo tic gi maber, padi ipol kare yero me bedo cok ki kabedo gi me lega.
teo_prompt: Kaiboisio nuipu, iswamaete engarenok lu idiinin aswam na epol ajokis kotoma aijar naka ikuristayon kec. Kanu aitodolikin aswam kec ejok, ekotosi isaserodotin aiboi eidunya keda aiboisio nu ilipere kesi.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara eyi ma alea, drice'ba e'yo aitanisi 'diyi azi okporu nga 'ba eyivile kanisa 'diyi ma edri ma alea. Azi yini 'diyi 'yezu kililiru, padere eyi ma aku eyi aa pari eyini inzizu 'diyi ma agei.
nyn_prompt: Omu byaro bingi, abeebembezi b'ediini nibakora omurimo gw'amaani omu magara g'abantu baabo. Okuhikiiriza emirimo yaabo kurungi, abasesorodooti nibenda kutuura haihi n'emyanya yaabo y'okuramizamu.

eng_prompt: In many religious communities, the process of selecting leaders is essential for maintaining spiritual guidance and support. As part of this process, individuals are chosen to fulfill the role of priests.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu by'enzikiriza bingi, enkola y'okulonda abakulembeze ya mugaso mu kukuuma obulagirizi n'obuwagizi mu by'omwoyo. Nga ekitundu ku nkola eno, abantu balondebwa okutuukiriza omulimu gw'obusosodooti.
ach_prompt: I kabedo me dini mapol, yub me yero lutela pire tek tutwal pi gwoko tira ki kony me cwiny. Macalo but yub man, kiyero dano acel acel me cobo tic pa padi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma odini luipu, epone loka aseun engarenok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar aicoreta keda agangat. Kwape ediope kotoma ainapeta nu, eseunono itunga aitodolikin aswam naka isaserodotin.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu dini ni karakara eyi ma alea, geri drice'ba eyi opezu ri eri orodriru imbata fezu eyidri tualu atita fezu eyidri. Otita 'di ma azi ru, 'ba yi ope azi padere yiniri 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu madiini maingi, omuringo gw'okutoorana abebembezi n'ogw'omugasho ahabw'okurinda obwebembezi n'obuhwezi bw'eby'omwoyo. Nk'emwe aha nkora egi, abantu nibarondwa kuhikiiriza omurimo gw'obusesorodooti.

eng_prompt: Understanding the concept of individual rights is essential in any democratic society. At its core, the idea of liberty encompasses the ability to act according to one's own will.
lug_prompt: Okutegeera endowooza y'eddembe ly'omuntu kinnoomu kya mugaso mu kitundu kyonna ekya demokulasiya. Ku musingi gwayo, ekirowoozo ky'eddembe kizingiramu obusobozi bw'omuntu okukola nga bw'ayagala.
ach_prompt: Niang lok kom twero pa ngat acel acel pire tek tutwal I kabedo mo keken matye ki loc alwak. I tyene, tam me bedo agonya kwako kero pa ngat acel acel me timo gin ma en mito.
teo_prompt: Amisiikin nuikamunitos apedorosio nuka itunganan erai ibore yenepol noi kotoma apugan naka itunga. Kotoma akiroke, akirot naka ailajara imoriarit apedor naka itunganan aswam nu ekot ngesi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo drilemgbo 'ba alu alu ni 'diyi ma dria ri ma vata eri orodriru ongulumu dria democracia ni 'diyi ma alea. E'yo drinia, egata driwala ma dria ri ma alia okpo 'ba alu ni e'yo 'yezu i ma egata vusi.
nyn_prompt: Okwetegyereza ekiteekateeko ky'obugabe bw'omuntu n'eky'omugasho omubyobutegyeki. Omu musingye gwakyo, ekiteekateeko ky'obusingye nikitwariramu okubaasa kukora nk'oku omuntu arikwenda.

eng_prompt: In a society that values freedom of expression, individuals should feel empowered to share their thoughts and opinions. This principle is fundamental to fostering open dialogue and understanding among diverse perspectives.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu ekissa ekitiibwa mu ddembe ly'okwogera, abantu balina okuwulira nga baweereddwa obuyinza okugabana ebirowoozo byabwe. Omusingi guno gwa mugaso nnyo mu kutumbula okuteesa okw'amazima n'okutegeeragana mu ndowooza ez'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: I kabedo ma dano maro bedo agonya me lok, dano omyero gubed agonya me nywako tam gi. Cik man pire tek tutwal me kelo laro lok ki niang ikin dano matye ki tam mapatpat.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet naeyongit ailajara naka einer, ekot itunga apedor aimor aomisiokec keda aomisiokec. Erai na ainapeta nuepolok noi kanu aitopolorite aineranara ka apuponoro kanejaas itunga luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu 'bani driwala e'yo nzeza niri 'bazu okporu 'diyi ma alea, le 'ba ma ega eyi ma okpo ega eyi ma egata eyi awazu. E'yo 'di eri orodriru e'yo nzeza ngmboru azini vata ma omgbo otuzu e'yo ndundu eyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Omu bantu abarikutwara obugabe bw'okugamba nk'ekintu kikuru, abantu bashemereire kuhurira baine obushoborozi bw'okugamba ebiteekateeko byabo n'ebiteekateeko byabo. Omusingye ogu n'ogw'omugasho munonga omukureetaho empurizagana n'okwetegyerezana omu bantu b'emiringo etari emwe.

eng_prompt: In today's digital age, information spreads rapidly across social media and news platforms. You might be surprised at how quickly a story can reach people around the world.
lug_prompt: Mu mulembe gwa digito ogw'ennaku zino, obubaka busaasaana mangu ku mikutu emigattabantu n'emikutu gy'amawulire. Oyinza okwewuunya engeri emboozi gy'esobola okutuuka amangu ku bantu okwetooloola ensi yonna.
ach_prompt: I kare me intanet me kare-ni, ngec nya oyot-oyot tutwal I kabedo me nywako lok me intanet. Itwero bedo ki ngeng I kom kit ma lok moni oo kwede oyot bot dano I wilobo lung.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nu nuka elago, ekorete akiro katipet kolago keda aiboisio nu iyemuto. Ibusakinit jo aumokin epone loepedoriata akiro adolokin itunga kotoma akwap kere.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa 'di ma alea, o'duko eyi ere mbeleru geri o'dukoti edrizu oli aliasi 'diyi ma alea azini pari o'dukoti edrizu 'diyi ma alea. Mi eco ovu osuta si e'yo azi ni ecozu cazu 'ba wudrikuru ma kalasi ndulu 'diyi vu mbeleru ri si.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bwa digito obwa hati, amakuru nigajanjaara juba aha mikutu ya boona hamwe n'emikutu y'amahurire. Noobaasa kutangaara okureeba oku ekitebyo kirikubaasa kuhika ahari abantu omu nsi yoona.

eng_prompt: In a court of law, the credibility of testimonies can vary greatly. It is essential to distinguish between those who merely claim to have seen an event and those who can substantiate their accounts.
lug_prompt: Mu kkooti y'amateeka, obwesige bw'obujulizi busobola okwawukana ennyo. Kya mugaso okwawula wakati w'abo abagamba nti baalaba ekintu n'abo abasobola okukakasa bye boogera.
ach_prompt: I kot, gen pa caden twero bedo pat-pat tutwal. Pire tek tutwal me poko kin jo ma giwaco ni gineno gin moni ki jo ma gitye ki caden.
teo_prompt: Kotoma okooti loka ikisila, egelegela noi amunokina naka ajenanut. Erai ibore yenepol noi atiakakin kiding ngul luebakasi ebe asesenete nueswamauna keda ngul luepedorete aitogogong akiro kec.
lgg_prompt: Kotia, e'yo 'bani 'ba e'yo ecepi 'diyi ma e'yo a'ita ni 'diyi ma esele co esele saaru. Eri orodriru esele cozu 'ba lu 'yopi kini yi ndre e'yo azi ra 'diyi ma eselea 'ba ecopi e'yo yini 'diyi ecepi ra 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu kooti y'ebiragiro, obwesigwa bw'abajurizi nibubaasa kuba butarikushushana. N'eky'omugasho okwahura abo abarikugira ngu bareebire ekyabaireho n'abo abarikubaasa kworeka obuhame.

eng_prompt: Many people believe that challenging authority can lead to positive change. However, there are times when defiance can have negative consequences.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi bakkiriza nti okusomooza ab'obuyinza kusobola okuleetawo enkyukakyuka ennungi. Newankubadde, waliwo ebiseera okujeemera bwe kuyinza okuba n'ebivaamu ebibi.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol tye ki niyee ni pyem ki twero twero kelo aloka loka maber. Kadi bed kumeno, tye kare ma jemo twero kelo adwogi marac.
teo_prompt: Iyuunitos itunga luipu ebe ainingosit apedorosio eyangauni aijulanakineta nuajokak. Konye, ejaasi acie apakio nuepedorete aitepeg ajaut keda atiokisio nuarokok.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi ai ra kini e'yo 'ba okpo e'iru 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma dria ri eco ojata eji ra. Kani si, sa'wa azi 'bani e'yo a'dazu 'diyi eco ovu e'yo onzi 'diyi be ci.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibaikiriza ngu okuhakanisa ab'obushoborozi nikibaasa kureetaho empinduka nungi. Kwonka, hariho obwire obu okujeemera kurikubaasa kurugwamu ebintu bibi.

eng_prompt: In the hierarchical structure of the church, leadership roles are clearly defined. At the top of this structure is the Bishop, who oversees the spiritual and administrative functions of the clergy.
lug_prompt: Mu nsengeka y'ekkanisa, emirimu gy'obukulembeze ginnyonnyolwa bulungi. Ku ntikko y'enzimba eno ye bisopu, alabirira emirimu gy'eby'omwoyo n'enzirukanya y'emirimu gy'abakulembeze b'eddiini.
ach_prompt: I dul pa lutela me kanica, tic pa lutela ki niango gi maber tutwal. I wii dul man obedo Laneno, ma doro tic me dini ki tela pa lupwonye dini.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ainapeta nuka ekanisa, itetemitai ejok aswamisinei nuka engarenok. Koingaren naka aduketait kana erai ebisop, loeyait aswamisinei nuka ediini keda nuka eyaitene loka imakio.
lgg_prompt: Otita kanisa ni 'diyi ma alea, azi driceza ni 'diyi ece kililiru. E'yo 'di ma drilea Bisopi ni azi kanisa ni 'diyi ma dricepi azini azi driceza ni 'diyi ondrepi ni.
nyn_prompt: Omu nteekateeka y'ekanisa, emirimo y'obwebembezi neshoboororwa kurungi. Aha mutwe gw'ekitongore eki, ni bishopu, orikureeberera emirimo y'eby'omwoyo n'obwebembezi bw'abeebembezi b'ediini.

eng_prompt: In times of conflict and misunderstanding, it's essential to remember the bonds that unite us. Embracing compassion can heal wounds and strengthen our relationships.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obukuubagano n'obutategeeragana, kikulu nnyo okujjukira enkolagana etugatta. Okukwatirwa abalala ekisa kisobola okuwonya ebiwundu n'okunyweza enkolagana yaffe.
ach_prompt: Ikare me lweny ki apoka-poka, pire tek tutwal me poo I kom wat matye I kinwa. Bedo ki cwiny me kica twero cango awano ki jingo wat i kinwa.
teo_prompt: Kapak naka ingungeta keda amamus acamanar, ejokuna aiitun eidicane lo aimorikikin oni. Aingarakin aitim epedori angaleun ajimis ka aitogogong eidicane wok.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa ngiringiri ni azini vata ako ni 'diyi ma alia, eri orodriru ama ma e'yo egazu e'yo ama ecipi tualuri ma dria. Aa'ta asi ndriza be ri eco bile eyi ati dika ama ma eselea 'ba eyi ma eselea ri ma okpo enga ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'obutaikirizana n'obutetegyerezana, ni kikuru kwijuka enkoragana erikutukwatanisa. Okugirira abandi esaasi nikibaasa kutukiza ebironda n'okunyweza enkoragana yaitu.

eng_prompt: Maintaining a healthy lifestyle often involves being mindful of social interactions. By reducing the number of people we come into contact with, we can better manage our overall health and well-being.
lug_prompt: Okukuuma obulamu obulungi kitwaliramu okufaayo ku nkolagana n'abantu. Bwe tukendeeza ku muwendo gw'abantu be tukwatagana nabo, tusobola okuddukanya obulungi obulamu bwaffe.
ach_prompt: Gwoko yot kom I kare mapol kwako bedo ki tam I kom kit me kwo I kin dano. Ka wadwoko piny wel dano ma warwatte kwedgi, watwero gwoko yotkom wa ki kwo wa maber.
teo_prompt: Ajaut keda aijar na engalei imoriarit apodokinit aiswamanara keda itunga. Kowai lo aitidisiar enaaba loka itunga lu idumununei oni, ipedori oni aidar angalewok keda aijar wok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo aa'zu rua ala be ri ma tambazu ri ma alea e'yo aa'zu 'ba azi 'diyi pie ri ma dria. Aka kalafe 'ba amani emuzu ama eselea 'diyi ma omgbo esi, ama eco ama ma rua ala azini aa'ta muke ri ma ta mba kililiru ra.
nyn_prompt: Okuguma oine amagara marungi, nikitwariramu okurinda enkoragana yaawe n'abandi. Twakyendeeza aha muhendo gw'abantu abu turikukorengana nabo, nitubaasa kureeberera gye amagara gaitu.

eng_prompt: In an effort to boost tourism and foster international relations, the Ugandan government has updated its entry policies. As a result, travelers from various nations can now visit the country more easily.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula ebyobulambuzi n'okukulaakulanya enkolagana y'ensi yonna, gavumenti ya Uganda ekyusizza enkola zaayo ez'okuyingira. N'ekivuddemu, abatambuze okuva mu mawanga ag'enjawulo kati basobola okukyalira eggwanga mu bwangu.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me ilo malo rwom me limo piny ki dongo wat I kin lobo mapat-pat, gamente me Uganda oloko cik me donyo I lobo Uganda. Macalo adwogi ne, luwot ma aa ki ilobo mapat-pat dong twero limo lobo man oyot-oyot tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor ewai lo elatok ka aitopolor eidicane lo akwapin ace, ejulaki apugan naka Uganda ainapeta ke nuikamunitos alomar toma akwapin ace. Kanuka ngun, epatanikit kwana alotok luka akwapin nuegelegela aipejokin akwapuwok.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo omu eyini emuzu angu ndundu eyi onezu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu tualu aa'ta kari amve 'diyi pie ri ma omgbo otuzu, gamete Uganda niri oja azita erini 'ba fipi angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi ma dria 'diyi o'diru. E'yo 'disi, 'ba aci'ba enga'ba kari ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi eco curu'do mu omuru kari 'di ma alea ewakokoru.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura eby'oburambuzi n'okureetaho enkoragana n'amahanga goona,gavumenti ya Uganda ehindwire omu biragiro byayo ebirikukwata aha bantu abarikutaaha omu ihanga. N'ekyarugiremu, abagyenzi kuruga omu mahanga gatari gamwe nibabaasa kutaayaayira eihanga juba.

eng_prompt: In the logistics industry, efficient transportation is crucial for delivering goods to consumers. One of the primary methods for moving large quantities of merchandise is through the use of cargo trucks.
lug_prompt: Mu by'entambuza y'ebintu, entambula ennungi ya mugaso nnyo mu kutuusa ebyamaguzi eri abaguzi. Emu ku ngeri enkulu ey'okutambuza ebyamaguzi ebingi kwe kuyita mu kukozesa loole ezitambuza ebintu.
ach_prompt: I tenge me cato jami, yoo me wot maber pire tek tutwal me cwalo jami bot luwil. Yo acel ma pire tek me cwalo jami mapol tutwal obedo tic ki mutoka madongo ma tingo jami.
teo_prompt: Kotoma okampuni loka agwelanar iboro, epolok noi elose loajokan kanu aitodolikin iboro mama ejaasi agwelak. Ediopet kotoma iponesio luka aitolot iboro luipu erai aitwasam ilorei luitosomaete iboro.
lgg_prompt: Okalamvu afa ozizuri ma alia, acipa kililiru ri eri orodriru afa ozizaru 'diyi ejizu 'ba afa je'baa 'diyi vu. Geri azi okporu 'bani afa ozizaru 'diyi ojizu ongmbo angiri si ri geri mutukari nyiri 'diyi ma ayuzuri'i.
nyn_prompt: Omu kitongore ky'eby'entambura, engyenda nungi n'ey'omugasho munonga omu kuhitsya ebintu aha baguzi. Omuringo gumwe gw'okutambuza ebintu bingi n'okukoresa ebiiruka by'emigugu.

eng_prompt: In today's interconnected world, the people we choose to engage with can significantly influence our thoughts and actions. It's essential to consider the impact of our relationships on our well-being and personal growth.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ekwataganye, abantu be tusalawo okukolagana nabo basobola okukosa ennyo ebirowoozo byaffe n'ebikolwa byaffe. Kikulu okulowooza ku ngeri enkolagana gye tulina n'abalala gy'ekosaamu obulamu bwaffe n'enkulaakulana yaffe.
ach_prompt: I lobo me kareni ma kubbe tye iye, dano ma wayero me bedo kwedgi twero doro tam ki tic wa tutwal. Pire tek tutwal me tamo I kom adwoki pa wat ma watye kwede I kom kwo wa ki dongo pa dano.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo naerucokina, itunga lu iseuni oni aiswamanar keda kes epedorete aitodolikin aomisiowok keda aswamisiowok. Erai ibore yenepol noi aomoom epone loepedoriata eidicanekosi aijar wok keda apol.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alia, 'ba amani lezu aa'zu yi be 'diyi eco ama ma egata azini e'yo 'ye 'diyi oja ra. Eri orodriru ama ma ega e'yo amani aa'zu 'ba eyi pie ri ma okpo ama ma aa'ta muke ri ma dria tualu zota ama ma ngulupi niri be ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba erikukwatanisa, abantu abu turikucwamu kukorengana nabo, nibabaasa kukora kihango aha biteekateeko byaitu n'ebikorwa byaitu. N'eky'omugasho okureeba oku enkoragana yaitu erikukwata aha magara gaitu n'entunguuka yaitu.

eng_prompt: In a world where material wealth often takes precedence, it's easy to forget what truly matters. Ultimately, the value of our well-being far surpasses any financial gain we might achieve.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi obugagga gye butwalibwa ng'ekintu ekikulu, kyangu okwerabira ebintu ebikulu ennyo. Mu nkomerero, omuwendo gw'obulamu bwaffe gusinga amagoba gonna mu byenfuna ge tuyinza okufuna.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma lonyo me kom aye obedo gin ma pire tek loyo weng, wigi wil I kom jami ma pigi tego tutwal. I agiki ne, ber pa kwo wa kato magoba me lim ma watwero nongo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naepolor noi abar, epatana aimurokin nuepolok noi. Kawasia, ajokis naka aijar wok adepar ameda naka ikapun naepedori oni adumun.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'di ma alea lonyi afa lonyiru 'diyiniri ni ovuzu okporu tuni, eri ewakokoru e'yo orodriru 'diyi ma dria avizu. Asizu, orodri amani aa'zu muke ri aga orodri robia ni amani eco esu ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi ei eby'obugaiga birikukira kwebembera, kyanguhi kwebwa ebikuru munonga. Ekikuru munonga,omugasho gw'okuba gye kwaitu nigukira munonga eby'empiiha ebi turikubaasa kutunga.

eng_prompt: As the demand for timely deliveries increases, cargo drivers play a crucial role in the logistics chain. Their responsibilities extend beyond just driving; they must also prioritize the protection of the items entrusted to them.
lug_prompt: Ng'obwetaavu bw'okutambuza ebintu mu budde bweyongera, abavuzi b'emigugu bakola omulimu omukulu mu kutambuza ebintu. Obuvunaanyizibwa bwabwe busukka ku kuvuga kwokka; balina okukulembeza okukuuma ebintu ebibakwasibwa.
ach_prompt: Kit ma miti me cwalo jami I cawa kikome tye kamede kwede, ludwo mutoka ma tingo jami I cawa kikome timo tic mapire tek tutwal I yub me cwalo jami I cawa kikome. Ticgi pe obedo me dwoyo motoka keken, omyero bene guket gwoko jami ma kimiyo botgi obed gin ma pire tek.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyatakinor eipud loka aitodolikin iboro kotoma apak, ejaasi iderepan luka iboro keda aswam naepol noi kotoma aitodolikin iboro. Aswam kec mam erai airenge bon; ekot kes aisingarenit ayuarite iboro lu ijaikitai kes.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu 'bani afa eyi ejizu sa'wa dria ri ma omgbo ni tutu risi, dereva mutukari eyi ojipi 'diyi azi okporu ni nga e'yo 'bani afa eyi ejizu sa'wa dria ri ma alea. Azi yini 'diyi aga lu mutukari ti ojizu ri ra; le yi ma 'ba vini e'yo afa 'bani fele yi dri 'diyi ma tambazu ri okporu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu eby'okutwara ebintu omu bwire nibyeyongyera, abavugi b'ebintu nibakora omurimo gw'amaani. Obujunanizibwa bwabo nibukira aha kuvuga kwonka, bashemereire n'okwebembeza okurinda ebintu ebibaheirweyo.

eng_prompt: As the outbreak continues to spread, health officials are working tirelessly to address the growing number of cases. It is crucial for those affected to seek help promptly.
lug_prompt: Ng'okubalukawo kweyongera okusaasaana, abasawo bakola butaweera okukola ku muwendo gw'abalwadde ogweyongera. Kya mugaso nnyo abo abakoseddwa okufuna obuyambi amangu ddala.
ach_prompt: Kit ma two eni tye ka nya kwede, lutic yoto kom tye ka tic matek me lweny i kom wel dano matye ka nyaa. Pire tek tutwal pi jo ma peko otimme I komgi me nongo kony oyot oyot.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokini adeka aisiarakin, eutasi eswamak luka angaleu aswam agogongu kanu aitemokin enaaba loepol noi loka adekak. Erai ibore yenepol noi ngul luetirorit adumun aingarakinio katipet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo 'da ma ereta ni mu drile i erezu, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi azi nga okpo kokoru e'yo 'ba azo be 'diyi ma kalafe ni tuzu ri ma aza kozu. Eri orodriru 'ba e'yoni bi 'diyi ni azakoma ndazu mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Okubarukaho kw'endwara kuriyo nikweyongyera kujanjaara, ab'eby'amagara bariyo nibakora n'amaani kurwanisa omuhendo gw'abarwaire ogweyongyeire. N'eky'omugasho munonga abo abateganisiibwe okuronda obuhwezi bukiri kare.

eng_prompt: In the realm of healthcare, accurate diagnosis is crucial for effective treatment. One of the primary methods for determining a patient's health status involves conducting various tests.
lug_prompt: Mu byobulamu, okuzuula obulwadde obulungi kya mugaso nnyo mu bujjanjabi obulungi. Engeri emu enkulu ey'okuzuula embeera y'obulamu bw'omulwadde ezingiramu okukebera okw'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: I tenge me yot kom, niang two maber pire tek tutwal pi nongo yat maber. Yo acel ma pire tek me niang kit ma latwo tye kwede obedo timo pim mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aiboisit naka amukian, ajenun adekasinei ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu amukian najokan. Ediopet kotoma iwaitin lu itutuoritai kanu ajenun ejautene lo adekak imoriarit ainwakio na iponesio luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Arojo eyi ma alea, e'yo eti ondaza kililiru ri eri orodriru aro esuzu kililiru. Geri azi okporu 'bani ecozu 'ba azoru 'diyi ma rua ala esuzu ri ma azi eri 'bani eyi ma rua o'bizu.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'amagara, okucondooza kurungi n'eky'omugasho omu kuragurirwa kurungi. Omuringo gumwe gw'okumanya amagara g'omurwaire n'okukyebera ebintu bitari bimwe na bimwe.

eng_prompt: In times of great adversity, our strength lies in unity. Together, we can face any challenge that comes our way.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera ebizibu ennyo, amaanyi gaffe gali mu bumu. Nga tuli wamu, tusobola okwolekagana n'okusoomoozebwa kwonna okujja mu kkubo lyaffe.
ach_prompt: I kare me peko, kerowa tye I ribe. Ka watye kacel, watwero lweny i kom peko mo keken matye.
teo_prompt: Kapak naka atiokisio nuepolok, agogongu wok ejai aimorikikina. Nepepe, ipedori oni aitepeg adio ainingosit na ebuni orot wok.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru ma alia, okpo amani 'diyi ti ecita ma alia. Amuti tualu, ama eco e'yo ewaru dria emu'ba ama vu 'diyi ma dri fu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, amaani gaitu nigashangwa omu kukwatanisa. Hamwe,nitubaasa kurwanisa oburemeezi bwona oburikubaasa kutuhikaho.

eng_prompt: Collaboration is essential in overcoming the challenges we face. When we unite our efforts and resources, we unlock the potential for greater success.
lug_prompt: Okukwatagana kwa mugaso nnyo mu kuvvuunuka okusoomoozebwa kwe twolekaganye nakwo. Bwe tukwataganya amaanyi gaffe n'ebikozesebwa byaffe, tusumulula obusobozi bw'obuwanguzi obusingawo.
ach_prompt: Winye obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me lweny i kom peko ma wanongo. Ka waribo kero wa ki jami ma watye kwede, ci wabinongo loc madit.
teo_prompt: Erai aiswamanara naejok noi kanu aipikor atiokisio nu itereikina keda oni. Arai imorikikin oni agogonguwok keda iboro wok, ipedori oni aitodolikin akerianut naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Ti ecita eri orodriru e'yo ewaru amani esu 'diyi ndezu. Aka okpo amani 'diyi tualu afa amani 'diyi pie, ama nga drile suza amboru isu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okukwatanisa n'eky'omugasho omu kusingura oburemeezi obu turikushanga. Kuturikugaita amaani gaitu n'ebintu byaitu, nitubaasa kusingura munonga.

eng_prompt: Understanding the various strategies for engaging communities is essential for effective action. Different approaches to mobilization can yield diverse outcomes depending on the context and goals.
lug_prompt: Okutegeera engeri ez'enjawulo ez'okukwatamu ebitundu kya mugaso nnyo mu kukola obulungi. Enkola ez'enjawulo ez'okukunga abantu zisobola okuvaamu ebintu eby'enjawulo okusinziira ku mbeera n'ebigendererwa.
ach_prompt: Niang yoo mapat-pat me tic ki lwak obedo gin ma pire tek pi timo tic maber. Yoo mapat-pat me rweyo lwak twero kelo adwogi mapat-pat malubbe ki ngo ma otimme ki miti mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Amisiikin iwaitin luegelegela lu itunga epedorete aswam ejok. Iponesio luegelegela luka aikamanario epedorete ayangaun akiro nuegelegela kotupitete ejautene keda apeleikinata.
lgg_prompt: Geri ndundu 'bani ecozu ongulumu eyi ma eselea 'diyi vazu ri eri orodriru e'yo eyi 'yezu kililiru. Geri ndundu 'bani 'ba eyi trazu 'diyi eco agata ndundu eyi eji e'yo eyi 'yepi 'diyi vusi.
nyn_prompt: Okwetegyereza oburyo butari bumwe na bumwe bw'okureeta abantu omu byanga n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okukora kurungi. Emiringo etarikushushana y'okurundana abantu neebaasa kurugwamu ebintu bitari bimwe kurugirira aha nshonga n'ebigyendererwa.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing challenges faced by the organization, leadership decided to establish a specialized group. This group would focus on addressing specific issues and implementing effective solutions.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okusoomoozebwa okweyongera mu kitongole, obukulembeze bwasalawo okutondawo ekibinja eky'enjawulo. Ekibinja kino kyanditadde essira ku kukola ku nsonga ez'enjawulo n'okussa mu nkola eby'okugonjoola obulungi.
ach_prompt: Pi peko ma dul ne tye ka kato ki iye, lutela gumoko tamgi me cako dul mo matye ki ngec matut. Dul man biketo cwinygi tutwalle I kom cobo peko matye ki keto yoo me cobo peko eni itic.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu ejaas erionget, apotu engarenok koseutu aitolomun egurupu loitegelikina. Ebuni egurupu lo apodokinit aitemokin atiokisio nuegelegela ka aitegear iwaitin lu iswamaere ngun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru amuti 'da ni esu 'diyi ma aza kozu, driceza 'da ai amuti azi ndu ni e'dozu. Ongulumu 'diri nga asi 'ba e'yo azi 'diyi ma aza kozu azini e'yo otuza kililiru 'diyi 'bazu 'yeta ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi obweyongyeire omu kitongore, abebembezi bakasharamu kutandikaho guruupu ey'omutaano. Guruupu egi neija kuta amaani omu kukora aha nshonga ezimwe n'okuta omu nkora oburyo burungi.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent surge in COVID-19 cases, health officials are emphasizing the importance of safety measures. To protect our communities and prevent further spread of the virus, the public is urged to comply with the set lockdown guidelines.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kweyongera kw'abalwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe gyebuvuddeko, abakungu b'ebyobulamu bassa essira ku bukulu bw'ebiragiro by'obukuumi. Okukuuma ebitundu byaffe n'okutangira okusaasaana kw'akawuka, abantu bakubirizibwa okugoberera ebiragiro by'omuggalo ebyateekebwawo.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki medde pa wel dano matye ki two korona, lutic me yot kom tye ka cuko cwinygi tutwal I kom ber pa gwoko kwo pa dano. Me gwoko kabedo wa ki gengo nya pa kwidi, ki lego lwak me lubu cik me loro piny.
teo_prompt: Katupitos aiyatakinio naka adekasinei nuka COVID-19, isinyikokitos eswamak luka angaleu ajokis naka ayuwara. Kanu ayuarite itunga wok ka aitikitik awea naka ekorona, isinyikokitai itunga aitup aicoreta nuka agolokinio naka akwap.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba azo COVID-19 niri be 'diyi ma omgbo tuzu o'diru risi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi okpo 'ba e'yo ageitema ni 'diyi ma dria. Angu amavile 'diyi ma ta mbazu azini azo 'da ma ereta atrizu, 'ba ai o'bi eyi azita angu ti opiza ni 'diyi ma vuti obizu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'abarwaire ba COVID-19 ebiro ebi, abakuru omu by'amagara nibashagika omugasho gw'okukuratira ebiragiro by'okwerinda. Okurinda ebyanga byaitu n'okuzibira okujanjaara kw'akakooko, abantu nibashabwa kukuratira ebiragiro by'okukumiirirwa.

eng_prompt: In the healthcare system, specialized facilities play a crucial role in providing advanced care. These institutions are equipped to handle complex medical cases and ensure comprehensive treatment for their patients.
lug_prompt: Mu byobulamu, amalwaliro ag'enjawulo gakola omulimu munene mu kuwa obujjanjabi obw'omutindo. Amalwaliro gano galina ebikozesebwa okukola ku misango emizibu n'okujjanjaba abalwadde baabwe.
ach_prompt: I tenge me yot kom, odi yadi ma gitye ki ngec matut i kom lutwo timo tic mapire tek tutwal me miyo kony me yot kom ma rwom gi lamal. Odi yadi magi gitye ki jami weng ma mite me tic i kom lutwo matego tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma amukian, iswamaete aiboisio nuegelegela aswam naepol noi kanu aijanakin amukian naka adoketait naepol noi. Ejaas adekisia nu keda iboro lu epedorete aitemokin imusagon lu etioko ka amukian adekak kec ejok.
lgg_prompt: Arojo eyi ma alea, pari 'bani 'ba eyi ma ta mbazu 'diyi azi okporu 'ye azakoma fele e'yo rua ala nisi 'diyi fezu. Pari arojo ni 'diyi ma alia afa dria ci ecozu e'yo rua alanisi kongolokoru 'diyi ma aza kozu azini aro fezu 'ba azoru 'diyi dri dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kitongore ky'eby'amagara, amarwariro ag'omutaano nigakora omurimo gw'amaani omu kuheereza obujanjabi bw'omutindo gw'ahaiguru. Amarwariro aga, gaine ebikwato by'okukora aha mishango egumire n'okuragurira kurungi abarwaire baabo.

eng_prompt: In the realm of healthcare, individuals often seek medical attention when they experience unusual physical or mental changes. These changes can indicate the presence of an underlying condition that requires further evaluation.
lug_prompt: Mu byobulamu, abantu batera okunoonya obujjanjabi nga bafunye enkyukakyuka mu mubiri oba mu birowoozo. Enkyukakyuka zino zisobola okulaga okubeerawo kw'embeera eyetaagisa okwongera okwekenneenya.
ach_prompt: I tenge me yot kom, dano mapol cito ka nongo kony pa daktar kace ginongo alokaloka I komgi onyo adamgi. Aloka-loka magi twero nyutu bedo tye pa peko matye ma mito ni kimed kwed.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aiboisit naka amukian, etapit itunga aimo amukian arai etereikina keda aijulanakineta nuka akwan keda aomisiokec. Epedorete aijulanakineta ngun aitodun ebe ejai ationis na ekoto airereonor.
lgg_prompt: Angu alata niri ma alea, 'ba alu alu eyi aro nda eyi ma ruatia eyini e'yo rua ni 'diyi esuzu kani ku eyi ma omi eyi ojazu e'yo ndundu 'diyisi. Ojata 'diyi eco ece kini e'yo azi okporu lepi 'bani ecozu e'yo nde ma ale andrizu ra ni ci.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'amagara, abantu nibasherura obujanjabi baaba baine empindahinduka y'omubiri nainga ey'omutwe etari ya buriijo. Empindahinduka ezi nizibaasa kworeka oburemeezi oburikwetenga okucondoozibwa.

eng_prompt: In today's world, ensuring safety and protection in public spaces has become increasingly important. One effective measure that many organizations and municipalities are adopting is the installation of surveillance systems.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero, okukakasa obukuumi n'obukuumi mu bifo eby'olukale kyeyongedde okuba eky'omugaso. Ekimu ku bintu ebiyinza okukolebwa ebitongole bingi ne munisipaali kwe kuteekawo ebyuma ebiketta abantu.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma ite kare ni, gwoko ber bedo ki ber bedo I kabedo ma lwak tye iye dong odoko gin ma pire tek tutwal. Yo acel maber tutwal ma dul mapat-pat kacel ki municipality mapat-pat tye ka tic kwede en aye keto yub me bedo ki wang mabit i kom ngo matye katimme.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo, ajokunar noi aidar ayuwara kotoma aiboisio nuipu itunga. Idiopebore yenepedori iriongeta keda munisipaliti aswam ngesi aibwaikin iboro lu engicete.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alia, ageitema fezu angu o'bi yini 'diyi ma alia ri eca curu'do orodriru tu. E'yo azi orodriru amuti karakara azini munisipaliti eyini 'ye ri eri geri e'yo eti ondazu 'diyi ma osuta ni.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba, okureeba ngu hariho oburinzi n'oburinzi omu myanya y'abantu baingi, nikyeyongyera kuba eky'omugasho. Omuringo gumwe ogurikukora kurungi, ogurikwetengwa ebitongore bingi hamwe na ba munisiparite, n'okutaho ebyoma by'okurondooza.

eng_prompt: It is essential for organizations to ensure that contributions are allocated effectively. Transparency in the use of funds is crucial for maintaining donor trust.
lug_prompt: Kya mugaso nnyo ebitongole okukakasa nti ssente eziweebwayo zigabanyizibwa bulungi. Obwerufu mu nkozesa y'ensimbi kikulu nnyo mu kukuuma obwesige bw'abagabi b'obuyambi.
ach_prompt: Pire tek tutwal ki dul mapat-pat me neno ni cente ma gimiyo kitiyo kwede maber. Bedo ki ada I kom kit ma ki tiyo kwede ki lim pire tek tutwal pi gwoko gen pa lumii kony.
teo_prompt: Erai ibore yenepol noi kanu iriongeta awanyun ebe itwasamao ikapun ejok. Acamanara kotoma aitwasam ikapun erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar amuno naka lukojokotau.
lgg_prompt: Eri orodriru amuti eyini nezu ra kini 'ba robia fele 'diyi awa kililiru. E'yo ada geri robia ayuzuri ma alia ri eri orodriru asi'baza 'ba afa fe'baa 'diyi niri ma ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: N'eky'omugasho ebitongore okureeba ngu obuhwezi bukoresibwa kurungi. Okukora amazima omu nkoresa y'esente n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okurinda obwesigye bw'abagabi b'obuyambi.

eng_prompt: In many countries, the office of the prime minister plays a crucial role in shaping government policy and administration. Understanding the specific functions and responsibilities of this position in Uganda can provide insight into the nation's political landscape.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi nnyingi, woofiisi ya ssaabaminisita ekola omulimu gwa maanyi mu kukola enkola za gavumenti n'enzirukanya yaayo. Okutegeera emirimu egy'enjawulo n'obuvunaanyizibwa bw'ekifo kino mu Uganda kisobola okukuyamba okutegeera embeera y'eby'obufuzi mu ggwanga.
ach_prompt: I lobe mapol, gang tic pa lawii coko pa gamente timo tic mapire tek tutwal I yubu cik ki tela pa gamente. Niang tic ki tic pa dul enoni I lobo Uganda twero miyo niang matut I kom lok me cungu iwi bye me lobo man.
teo_prompt: Kakwapin nuipu, ejaasi eyapiesi loka eminisita lokapolon keda aswam naepol noi kotoma aitolomun ainapeta keda eyaitene loka apugan. Ajenun aswamisinei keda aswamisinei nuka adoketait kana ko Uganda epedori aingarakin oni amisiikin akiro nuka epolitikis loka akwap.
lgg_prompt: Kari karakara eyi ma alea, ofisi drile minista eyini ri ni azi okporu nga azita gamete ni 'diyi ma edeta ma alea. Azi azini azi pari 'di ma alia Ugandaa 'diyi vazu ri eco fe 'ba eyini e'yo onizu e'yo politiki ni kari 'di ma alea 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu mahanga maingi, ofiisi y'enganzi y'eihanga neekora omurimo gw'amaani omu kukora ebiragiro bya gavumenti hamwe n'obwebembezi. Okwetegyereza emirimo hamwe n'obujunaanizibwa bw'omurimo ogu omu Uganda, nikibaasa kutuhwera kumanya eby'obutegyeki bw'eihanga.

eng_prompt: In order to develop effective treatments and vaccines, substantial financial resources must be allocated to medical research. Without adequate funding, progress in combating illnesses will be severely hindered.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okufuna obujjanjabi obulungi n'eddagala erigema, ssente nnyingi zirina okuteekebwa mu kunoonyereza kw'ebyobujjanjabi. Awatali buyambi bumala, enkulaakulana mu kulwanyisa endwadde ejja kulemesebwa nnyo.
ach_prompt: Me yubu yat me cango two ki yat agwera maber, omyero ki ket lim madit tutwal I yub me kwed me yot kom. Labongo cente ma oromo, dongo lobo me lweny i kom two obi bedo tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitolomun amukian na ejok ka ikee luikisere ekato, ekot aipikakin ikapun luipu toma aingic. Arai emamei ikapun luedolitos, eponio aitikitik apol naka aitiji adekasinei.
lgg_prompt: Aro azini aro soza kililiru 'diyi esuzu, le 'ba ma 'ba robia angiri e'yo vuti ondaza ma dria. Robia feza kililiru kokoru, angu zota a'di 'dizu azo eyi be ri ni nga ovu atri saaru.
nyn_prompt: Okukora emibazi n'okugyema kurungi, esente nyingi zishemereire kuhebwa omu kucondooza ahaby'amagara. Hatariho sente ezirikumara, entunguuka omu kurwanisa endwara neija kuremererwa munonga.

eng_prompt: Effective financial management is crucial for maintaining a stable economy. Therefore, careful planning and allocation of resources are essential.
lug_prompt: Enkwata y'ensimbi ennungi ya mugaso nnyo mu kukuuma ebyenfuna nga bitebenkedde. N'olw'ekyo, okuteekateeka n'obwegendereza n'okugaba eby'obugagga bikulu nnyo.
ach_prompt: Tic ki lim maber obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me neno ni tic me lim tye maber. Pi meno, yub maber ki poko jami ma mite pire tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Aitemonokin ikapun ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar edumune loajokan loka ikapun. Kanuka ngun, epolok noi aitemonokin ka aikor iboro.
lgg_prompt: E'yo robia ni 'diyi ma tambazu kililiru ri eri orodriru e'yo robiani 'diyi ma ta mbazu kililiru. Ka'dini, otuta kililiru azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma awaza eri orodriru.
nyn_prompt: Enkora nungi y'okureeberera esente n'ey'omugasho ahabw'okureeberera eby'entaasya. N'ahabw'ekyo, okuteekateekyera n'obwegyendesereza n'okugaba ebintu n'eky'omugasho.

eng_prompt: In times of scarcity, the community prioritized the needs of its most vulnerable members. Resources were limited, so careful decisions had to be made about who would receive assistance.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'ebbula, ekitundu kyakulembeza ebyetaago by'abantu baakyo abateesobola. Ebikozesebwa byali bitono, n'olwekyo okusalawo okw'obwegendereza kwali kulina okukolebwa ku ani anaafuna obuyambi.
ach_prompt: Ikare me can cam, lwak guketo miti pa dano magoro obedo gin ma pire tek. Lim onongo nok, pi meno omyero kimok tam maber I kom anga ma onongo kony.
teo_prompt: Kapakio nu ekadakada, apotu itunga isingarenitos ipudesia luka itunga lu ican. Ikidioko iboro lu itwasamao, aso ibusakinit aitolomun aseununeta nuikamunitos lu epote adumun agangat.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa ewaru ma alia, ongulumu 'da 'du e'yo 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alia 'diyi ma dria okporu. Afa ayuzaru 'diyi ndra were, ka'dini le 'ba ma 'du e'yo kililiru 'ba ngapi azakoma esu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'eibura ry'ebintu, abantu bakakuza ebyetaago by'abantu baabo abatarikwebaasa. Eby'obugaiga bikaba bikye, n'ahabw'ekyo okucwamu kurungi kukakorwa ahari abo abaabaire nibaija kutunga obuhwezi.

eng_prompt: In discussions about social justice and support systems, it's important to identify groups that may face additional challenges. Understanding who is deemed vulnerable can help us address their needs more effectively.

eng_prompt: In response to the unexpected economic downturn, the government proposed additional funding to support essential services. After extensive debates and revisions, the financial plan was presented to parliament for approval.

lgg_prompt: Anyamgbolo amuti o'bi yini 'diyi ma alia ri eco 'ba ma asi 'ba gamete ma dria ra. E'yo 'disi, e'yo robia niri ma pamvu onezu ri eca orodriru e'yo robia ayuza geri onzi si ri atrizu.
nyn_prompt: Obushomankuzi omu bitongore bya gavumenti nibubaasa kutuma abantu baremwa kwesiga gavumenti. N'ekyarugiremu, okureberera eby'empiiha n'eky'omugasho omu kuzibira okukoresa kubi esente.

eng_prompt: As the world grapples with the ongoing pandemic, many organizations are facing unprecedented challenges. Effective leadership is crucial in navigating these uncertain times and ensuring the safety and well-being of their teams.
lug_prompt: Nga ensi yonna erwanagana n'ekirwadde bbunansi ekigenda mu maaso, ebitongole bingi byolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa okutabangawo. Obukulembeze obulungi bwa mugaso nnyo mu kutambuza ebiseera bino eby'obutali bukakafu n'okukakasa obukuumi n'obulungi bwa ttiimu zaabwe.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lobo tye ka lweny ki two ma opoto ni, dul mapat-pat tye ka nongo peko mapol tutwal. Tela maber pire tek tutwal I kare me peko eni ki neno ni lutic gi tye maber.
teo_prompt: Kwape euta akwap kere ainingosit keda adeka naka ekorona, ejaas iriongeta luipu keda atiokisio nuepolok noi. Engarenone loajokan erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitodolikin apakio nu nu mam ejena ka awanyun ebe eyuwara keda ajokis naka itimun kec.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru ni dri ciria e'yo azo 'dezaniri be, amuti karakara eyi e'yo ewaru ndundu eyi esu. Driceza kililiru ri eri orodriru sa'wa e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma alea, dika eri ageitema fe amuti eyivile 'diyini.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku ensi erikurwana n'endwara ruranda nsi erikugyenda omu maisho, ebitongore bingi nibishanga oburemeezi obutari bwa buriijo. Obwebembezi burungi n'obw'omugasho munonga omu kugumizamu omu bwire obu obutarikwetegyerezibwa, n'okureeba ngu tiimu zaabo ziine oburinzi n'amagara marungi.

eng_prompt: In discussions about national security and defense, various institutions play crucial roles. One key institution that often comes to mind is the military.
lug_prompt: Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo ku byokwerinda by'eggwanga, ebitongole eby'enjawulo bikola emirimu emikulu. Ekitongole ekimu ekikulu ekitera okujja mu birowoozo bye magye.
ach_prompt: I kare me nywako lok I kom gwoko kuc ki ber bedo pa lobo, dul mapat-pat timo tic mapire tek tutwal. Dul acel ma pire tek ma pol kare bino I wic en aye mony.
teo_prompt: Kotoma oineresinei nuikamunitos ayuwara keda ayuwara naka akwap, iswamaete iriongeta luegelegela aswam naepol noi. Atukot adiope naepol noi naebuni aomoom ngesi ajore.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza e'yo ageyitema ni kari ma dria 'diyi ma alia, amuti ndundu eyi azi okporu ni nga. Amuti azi okporu 'bani sawa driasi egale ma dria ri asikari eyi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kuhanuura ahaby'okwerinda n'okwerinda kw'eihanga, ebitongore bitari bimwe na bimwe nibikora emirimo y'amaani. Ekitongore kimwe ekikuru ekirikukira kwija omu biteekateeko n'amahe.

eng_prompt: Before embarking on any journey, it's essential to understand the foundational steps involved. Every endeavor begins with a crucial starting point that sets the tone for what follows.
lug_prompt: Nga tonnaba kutandika lugendo lwonna, kikulu okutegeera emitendera emikulu egirimu. Buli kaweefube atandika n'entandikwa enkulu eteekawo enkola eri ekiddako.
ach_prompt: Mapwod pe icako wot mo keken, pire tek tutwal me niang jami mapigi tego ma omyero itim. Tic mo keken cakke ki gin ma pire tek tutwal ma nyutu ngo ma obilubu.
teo_prompt: Erongo egeuna alosit aiboisit adio, ejokuna noi amisiikin iwaitin lu itolosio. Kangol aswam egeun keda ageunet naepol noi na itodunit epone lo ebeit atupakinit.
lgg_prompt: De nga po'di mi e'doni aci azi ma dria ku, eri orodriru e'yo okporu 'diyi vazu. E'yo dria ni e'do e'yo okporu e'dopi e'yo emupi 'diyi ma dria ri si.

eng_prompt: As the project deadline approached, the team gathered to discuss their progress and challenges. The leader emphasized the importance of increased effort to meet their goals.
lug_prompt: Nga ssalessale wa pulojekiti asembera, ttiimu yakungaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bigenda mu maaso n'okusoomoozebwa kwabwe. Omukulembeze yakkaatirizza obukulu bw'okweyongera okufuba okutuukiriza ebiruubirirwa byabwe.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma nino me agiki me tic cok, joo ne gugure me nywako lok I kom kit ma tic tye kawot kwede ki peko ma gitye ka kato ki iye. Latela oketo cwinygi tutwal I kom ber pa tute matek me cobo miti gi.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete apaarasia nuka awasia nuka epurojekt, apotu etimu kiriamunos kanu aitemitem apolokec keda atiokisio. Abu engarenon kitogogong ajokis naka aswam agogongu kanu aitodolikin alosikinetekec.
lgg_prompt: O'du asizu otita 'da niri ni ecazu ogogo, amuti 'da tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo eyini muzu drile ri ma dria tualu e'yo ewaru eyini esu 'diyi pie. Drice'ba 'da fe okpo orodri okpo 'bazu okporu eyini ani ecozu e'yo eyini lele 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Ebiro by'ahamuheru bya purogyekiti ku byahikire, tiimu ekateeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha ntunguuka yaabo hamwe n'oburemeezi bwabo. Omwebembezi akashoboorora omugasho gw'okukora n'amaani kuhikiiriza ebigyendererwa byabo.

eng_prompt: In a world where social media reigns supreme, many individuals are tempted to chase fleeting fame. However, the value of genuine connections often outweighs the allure of superficial recognition.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ejjudde emikutu emigattabantu, abantu bangi bakemebwa okunoonya ettutumu ery'akaseera obuseera. Newankubadde, omuwendo gw'okukwatagana okwa nnamaddala gusinga okusikiriza kw'okusiimibwa okw'okungulu.
ach_prompt: I lobo man kama kabedo me nywako lok me intanet loyo weng, dano mapol gitye ki atematema me yenyo yweka matye pi tutunu. Kadi bed kumeno, ber pa kubbe me ada ipol kare loyo miti me nongo ngec.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap na epuga noi elago, ekotosi itunga luipu aimo aijen na apak naedit. Konye, ajokis naka arucokina na abeit erai naepol noi adepar ajenara nakokinga.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'bani geri o'bi yini e'yo oyuzu oli aliasi 'diyi ma drileruri ma alia, 'ba karakara yi o'bi yi ma ru ku. Kani si, orodri e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma eselea kililiru 'diyiniri tuni aga e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma e'yo egazu ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi ei emikutu ya boona erikutegyeka munonga, abantu baingi nibagyezaho kuronda ekitiinisa ky'obwire bukye. Kwonka, omugasho gw'okukwatanisa okw'amazima nigukira ekitiinisa ky'okureebeka.

eng_prompt: The field of veterinary medicine plays a crucial role in ensuring the health and well-being of animals. Professionals in this discipline are trained to diagnose and treat a variety of conditions affecting both livestock and pets.
lug_prompt: Ekisaawe ky'obusawo bw'ebisolo kikola omulimu gwa maanyi mu kukuuma obulamu n'obulungi bw'ebisolo. Abakugu mu nsonga eno batendekebwa okuzuula n'okujjanjaba embeera ez'enjawulo eziruma ebisolo n'ebisolo by'omu nnyumba.
ach_prompt: Tenge me yot kom lee konyo tutwal I gwoko yot kom ki kwo pa lee. Ludiro ma tiyo i kom lok man ki pwonyo gi me niang ki tic i kom two mapat-pat matye ka yelo dyangi ki lee ma paco.
teo_prompt: Ewai lo ikee lu itiang nes iswamai ibore yenepol noi kanu awanyun angaleu ka aijar na itiang. Ipirioitin lu akiro nu itutuonoro kanu ajenun ka aimuke adekasinei nu ejaas ibaren keda ibaren.
lgg_prompt: Pari dakitari anyapa eyini 'diyi ma tambazu ri ni azi okporu nga e'yo anyapa eyini aa'zu rua ala be azini aa'zu muke ri ma dria. Ba imba 'ba onita be e'yo 'di ma alea 'diyi azo ndundu anyapa eyi pie 'diyi ma eti ondazu azini aro fezu.
nyn_prompt: Ekitongore ky'eby'amarwariro g'enyamaishwa nikikora omurimo gw'amaani omu kureebeka ngu amatungo gaba gye. Abakugu omu nshonga egi, nibatendekwa kumanya n'okuragurira oburemeezi bwingi oburikukwata aha matungo n'enyamaishwa.

eng_prompt: Ensuring the well-being of all living creatures is essential for maintaining ecological balance. This includes providing proper care, nutrition, and medical attention to domesticated and wild animals alike.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa obulungi bw'ebiramu byonna kya mugaso mu kukuuma obutonde. Kino kizingiramu okuwa obujjanjabi obutuufu, endya n'obujjanjabi eri ebisolo by'awaka n'ebisolo by'omu nsiko.
ach_prompt: Neno ni jami makwo weng tye maber pire tek tutwal pi gwoko cwec ma orumuwa. Man kwako miyo gwok maber, cam ki kony me yot kom bot lee ma gangi ki lum.
teo_prompt: Aimaniman aijar naka iboro kere luejarete ejok kanu aidar ejautene lo akwap. Imoriaritos nu aijanakin amukian najokan, ainyam najokan, keda amukian najokan mama ejaasi itiang luka ore keda lukokutwi.
lgg_prompt: Afa idri be 'diyi ma ta mbaza eri orodriru afa nyakuni 'diyi ma ta mbazu tro tro. Di ma eselea tambaza kililiru fezu, nyaka nyaza kililiru fezu, azini aro fezu anyapa aku eselea azini asea 'diyi dri indi.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu eby'obuhangwa byona biri gye n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okurinda obuhangwa bw'ensi. Eki nikitwariramu okureeberera kurungi, okurya kurungi, n'okuragurira enyamaishwa z'omuka hamwe n'ez'omwishwa.

eng_prompt: One effective method to combat climate change and promote biodiversity is through sustainable gardening practices. By engaging in activities like planting seeds, individuals can contribute to a healthier ecosystem.
lug_prompt: Engeri emu ennungi ey'okulwanyisa enkyukakyuka y'obudde n'okutumbula obutonde bwe nnima. Mu kwenyigira mu mirimu ng'okusimba ensigo, abantu basobola okuyamba ku mbeera y'obutonde obulungi.
ach_prompt: Yo acel maber loyo me lweny i kom alokaloka pa piny ki medo rwom me kwo pa cwec ma orumuwa en aye bedo ki poto maber. Dano twero weko cwec ma orumuwa bedo maber ka gu timo jami calo pito kodi.
teo_prompt: Epone ediopebon loka aitikitik aijulanakineta nuka ekuse ka etepe ka aitopolor iboro luegelegela erai aitwasam amisirin nuejokuka. Kowai lo aswam iboro kwape nat aira ikinyom, epedorete itunga aidar aijar najokan.
lgg_prompt: Geri azi orodriru ecozu a'di 'dizu e'yo angu mile ni ojazu ri be dika afa nyakuni 'diyi ma esele cozu ri eri geri amvu 'yazu kililiru risi. E'yo 'yeta ekile ori saza le 'diyi 'yerisi, 'ba eyi eco atita fe angu eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma rua ala ni.
nyn_prompt: Omuringo gumwe murungi gw'okurwanisa empindahinduka y'obwire n'okushongyera eby'obuhangwa n'obuhangwa n'okurabira omu mirimo y'obuhingi n'oburiisa. Omuntu ku arikwejumba omu mirimo nka okubyara embibo, naabaasa kuhwera omu kutunguura eby'obuhangwa.

eng_prompt: As the world grapples with the spread of the coronavirus, effective hygiene practices have become more crucial than ever. Health experts recommend various methods to reduce the risk of infection, including the use of sanitizers.
lug_prompt: Nga ensi yonna erwanagana n'okusaasaana kw'akawuka ka kolona, enkola ennungi ey'obuyonjo efuuse nkulu nnyo okusinga bwe kyali kibadde. Abakugu mu byobulamu bawa amagezi ku ngeri ez'enjawulo okukendeeza ku bulabe bw'okukwatibwa obulwadde, omuli n'okukozesa sanitayiza.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lobo tye ka lweny ki nya pa two corona, gwoko lengo pire tek tutwal. Ludiro me yot kom miyo tam I kom yoo mapat-pat me dwoko piny rwom me nongo two, ma I kingi obedo tic ki sanitizer.
teo_prompt: Kwape euta akwap kere aitiji awea naka ekorona, epol ajokis noi nuka aila. Icorakitos ipirioitin luka angaleu iponesio luegelegela kanu aitidisiar atiokisio nuka adekasinei, aimoriarit aitwasam sanitaiza.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru ni dri ciria azo coronavirusniri ma ereta be, geri alata kililiru 'diyi eca orodriru tu aga oku driorisi. Ba nita be e'yo rua ala nisi 'diyi fe imbata geri ndundu eyini ani ecozu azo eyi esuzu ri ma omgbo esizu, eyi ma eselea sanitayiza ayuzu.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku ensi erikurwanisa okujanjaara kw'akakooko ka korona, enkora nungi y'eby'obuyonjo n'ey'omugasho munonga. Abakugu omu by'amagara nibahabura emiringo mingi y'okukyendeeza akabi k'okukwatwa akakooko, otwariiremu n'okukoresa sanitaiza.

eng_prompt: The organization was established to support professionals in the field of animal care. Its members include a diverse group of specialists dedicated to advancing veterinary medicine.
lug_prompt: Ekitongole kyatandikibwawo okuyamba abakugu mu by'okulunda ebisolo. Bammemba baayo mulimu ekibinja ky'abakugu ab'enjawulo abeewaddeyo okutumbula eddagala ly'ebisolo.
ach_prompt: Dul eni kicako me konyo ludiro ma gwoko lee. I kin lumemba ne tye iye dul pa ludiro ma gitiyo matek me ilo malo rwom me tic pa daktari i kom lee.
teo_prompt: Aponi odukunai atukot ngin kanu aigang ipirioitin lu idarete itiang. Imoriaritos imeban ke egurupu lo ipirioitin lu ekotosi aitopolor ikee lu itiang.
lgg_prompt: Ba e'do amuti 'da atita fezu 'ba e'yo nipi anyapa eyi ma tambapi 'diyi dri. Memba erini 'diyi ma eselea ongulumu 'ba nita be e'yo anyapa eyini 'diyi ma dria angiri 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Ekitongore kikatebwaho kuhwera abakugu omu by'okureeberera enyamaishwa. Ba memba baayo harimu guruupu y'abakugu abarikwehayo kutunguura emibazi y'amatungo.

eng_prompt: Uganda has become a significant destination for displaced individuals seeking safety and stability. The ongoing conflicts and crises in neighboring countries have led to a surge in people fleeing their homes.
lug_prompt: Uganda efuuse ekifo ekikulu eky'abanoonyiboobubudamu abanoonya obukuumi n'obutebenkevu. Entalo n'ebizibu ebigenda mu maaso mu nsi eziriraanyeewo bireetedde abantu bangi okudduka mu maka gaabwe.

teo_prompt: Erai Uganda aiboisit naejok noi naepedorete ikerai aimo ayuwar keda ainapakina. Ingungeta keda atiokisio nu elosi akonye kotoma akwapin nu idunyare einakini itunga akerit oreriakec.
lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri eca angu azi orodriru 'ba angu kokoru 'diyi ni angu agei tema ni azini asianzu lepi 'diyini. Ngiringiri azini e'yo ewaru mupi drile kari jo ejele ru 'diyi ma alia 'diyi fe 'ba eyini aku eyivile 'diyi apazu ri ma omgbo ni tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Uganda ehindukire omwanya gw'omugasho gw'abantu abarikuruga omu maka gaabo, abarikuronda obusingye n'obutebekana. Entaro n'oburemeezi oburikugyenda omu maisho omu mahanga agatuherereire, bireesire okweyongyera kw'abantu abairuka omu maka gaabo.

eng_prompt: In today's fast-paced world, communication has become more accessible than ever. One of the most common methods people use to connect is through voice calls.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ey'amangu, empuliziganya efuuse nnyangu okusinga bwe kyali kibadde. Emu ku ngeri abantu gye bakwataganamu kwe kuyita mu masimu.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma jami tye ka time oyot-oyot tutwal, kubbe dong odoko yot tutwal. Yo acel ma dano tiyo kwede me kube obedo goyo cim.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo na esipidi noi, epatana einer adepar kapakio nukokau. Ediopet kotoma iwaitin lu itwasamaete itunga kanu arucokina erai ainom esimu.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alia, e'yo nzeza eca curu'do ewakokoru aga oku driorisi. Geri alu 'ba eyini eyi ecizu eyi ma eselea ri eri geri eyini eyi omvezu o'duko si ri i.

eng_prompt: It is our responsibility to protect the planet for future generations. By making conscious choices in our daily lives, we can make a significant impact.
lug_prompt: Buvunaanyizibwa bwaffe okukuuma ensi eri emirembe egijja. Bwe tusalawo obulungi mu bulamu bwaffe obwa bulijjo, tusobola okukola kinene.
ach_prompt: Obedo tic wa me gwoko lobo pi anyim. Ka wamoko tam maber I kwowa me nino ducu, watwero kelo alokaloka madit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Erai aswam wok ayuarite akwap kanu aijar naka itunga lu oingaren. Kowai lo aiswamaun aseununeta nuajokak kotoma aijar wok, ipedori oni aswam ibore yen ejok.

nyn_prompt: N'obujunanizibwa bwaitu okurinda ensi ahabw'eminyeeto. Twacwamu gye omu magara gaitu aga buriizooba, nitubaasa kukora kihango.

eng_prompt: In a world filled with diverse cultures and traditions, the reasons for celebration are as varied as the people who partake in them. From personal milestones to global events, the opportunities to honor life's moments are endless.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ejjudde obuwangwa n'obulombolombo obw'enjawulo, ensonga z'okujaguza za njawulo nga abantu abeetabamu. Okuva ku bikulu by'omuntu ku bibaddewo mu nsi yonna, emikisa gy'okussa ekitiibwa mu biseera by'obulamu tegikoma.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma opong ki tekwaro ki tekwaro ma padi padi, tyen lok me kwero tye mapadi padi calo dano matye ikin gi. Nicake I kom jami ma otimme I kwo pa ngat acel acel naka wa I yub mapat-pat manonge I wilobo lung, gum me woro kare me kwo pe gik.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda inonosio keda inonosio luegelegela, iponesio luka ainumunum egelegela kwape itunga luejaasi toma. Anyoun kotoma aiboisio nuapolok kitoni aiboisio nuka akwap kere, ejaasi arerengesio nuka aiitun aijar naejok noi.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru ma alia suruni azini a'bi yi be tre, asisile ayiko zuzani 'diyi ndu ndu ekile 'ba fi'ba yi ma alia 'diyi le. E'dozu e'yo orodriru 'diyi ma dria kpere e'yo wudrikuru si 'diyi ma dria, drileba inzita fezu e'yo idri ni 'diyi ma dria 'diyi asi koko.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi eijwire eby'obuhangwa n'emigyenzo etarikushushana,eshonga z'okujaguza tizirikushushana nk'abantu abarikukwejumbamu. Kuruga aha bintu ebirikukwata aha muntu kuhisya aha mikoro y'ensi yoona, emigisha y'okuheereza ekitinisa obwire bw'amagara, terikuhwaho.

eng_prompt: In order to ensure the health and well-being of the community's pets, the village council has decided to establish a dedicated veterinary service. This initiative aims to provide accessible and quality care for all animals residing in the area.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa obulamu n'obulungi bw'ebisolo by'omu kitundu, akakiiko k'ekyalo kasazeewo okutondawo ekitongole ky'obusawo bw'ebisolo. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okuwa obujjanjabi obwangu era obw'omutindo eri ebisolo byonna ebibeera mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni gangi pa dano tye ma komgi yot, kancil me caro omoko tamgi me cako gang tic pa daktari lee. Yub man tye ki miti me miyo kony me yot kom ki rwom me gwoko lee weng matye ikabedo eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun angaleu keda aijar naka itiang lu atutubet, abu ekansulo lo ocaalo koseu adukun aiboisit naka amukian na itiang. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun ngesi aijanakin amukian naejok nejaas itiang lu aiboiete katutubet.
lgg_prompt: Lezu nezu ra kini anyapa aku eselesi 'diyi ma rua ala azini aa'zu onyiru, kanisulu calo niri asi e'yo 'du arojo anyapa eyini 'diyi ma tambazu ni e'dozu. Otita 'di ma asisile lezu azakoma fele anyapa aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma tambazu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu amatungo g'omukyanga gaine amagara marungi, akakiiko k'ekyaro kashaziremu kutandikaho eirwariro ry'amatungo. Enteekateeka egi negyenderera okureeberera gye enyamaishwa zoona eziri omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: In today's digital age, effective communication is essential for personal and professional growth. Leveraging online tools can significantly enhance visibility and engagement.
lug_prompt: Mu mulembe gwa digito ogw'ennaku zino, empuliziganya ennungi ya mugaso mu nkulaakulana y'omuntu n'ey'ekikugu. Okukozesa ebikozesebwa ku mutimbagano kisobola okutumbula ennyo okumanyibwa n'okukwatagana.
ach_prompt: I kare me intanet me kareni, lok maber pire tek tutwal pi dongo pa ngat acel acel. Tic ki nyonyo me intanet twero medo rwom me neno ki winyo lok pa dano.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nu nuka elago, epolok noi einer kanu apol naka itunganan keda aswam. Aitwasam iboro luka elago epedori aitojokar ajenara keda aswam.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa 'di ma alea, e'yo nzeza kililiru ri eri orodriru zota 'ba ma ngulupi ni azini azi ngazu kililiru ri ni. Afa ayuzaru oli aliasi 'diyi ma ayuta eco 'ba eyi ma mile otu dika eyi ma eselea 'ba eyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka ya digito ey'erizooba, okuhurizagana kurungi n'okw'omugasho omu kutunguuka kw'omuntu n'omumyoga ye. Okukoresa ebikwato bya intaneeti, nikibaasa kwongyera amaani omu kureebeka n'okukoresa abantu.

eng_prompt: We believe that collaboration across borders can lead to innovative solutions. Therefore, we encourage participation from individuals and organizations around the globe.

lgg_prompt: Ama a'i ra kini ti ecita kari eselea kari eselea 'diyi ma eselea ri eco fe 'bani e'yo eyi ma aza kozu geri o'diru 'diyisi ra. Ka'dini, ama ava fe fizu engazu 'ba yi ma ngulupisi azini amuti yi vu wudrikuru ma kalasi dria.

eng_prompt: In a society governed by rules and regulations, it is essential for individuals and organizations to understand their rights and responsibilities. This understanding empowers them to navigate the legal landscape effectively.
lug_prompt: Mu bantu abafugibwa amateeka n'ebiragiro, kya mugaso eri abantu ssekinnoomu n'ebitongole okutegeera eddembe lyabwe n'obuvunaanyizibwa. Okutegeera kuno kubawa amaanyi okutambulira mu mbeera y'amateeka obulungi.

eng_prompt: As the nation faced new challenges, the cabinet gathered to discuss the latest developments. Everyone was eager to hear the president's directives this time round.
lug_prompt: Ng'eggwanga lisanga okusoomoozebwa okupya, kabineti yakungaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bigenda mu maaso. Buli omu yali yeesunga okuwulira ebiragiro bya pulezidenti ku mulundi guno.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lobo ne tye ka nongo peko manyen, lumemba me cabinet gugure me nywako lok I kom jami matye katime. Dano ducu gubedo ki miti me winyo lok pa ladit lobo I kare-ni.
teo_prompt: Kwape etereikina akwap keda atiokisio nuitetiak, apotu iminisitan iriamunos kanu aitemitem akiro nuitetiak nuiswamasi. Akotosi itunga kere apupokin aicoreta nuka lokapolon akwap.
lgg_prompt: Kari ni dri fuzu e'yo ewaru o'diru 'diyisi, minisita eyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo o'diru 'diyi ma dria. Ba dria de ava azita purezidenti ni 'diyi erizu sawa 'disi.
nyn_prompt: Eihanga ku ryatungire oburemeezi obusya, aba minisita bakateeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha bintu ebyabaireho. Buri omwe akaba aine ekihika ky'okuhurira ebiragiro by'omwebembezi w'eihanga omurundi ogu.

eng_prompt: In response to the global pandemic, we recognized the urgent need for support and mobilized our resources. As part of our commitment to community health, we decided to make a significant financial contribution.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ekirwadde bbunansi, twakitegedde obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'obuyambi era ne tukungaanya ebyetaago byaffe. Ng'ekimu ku bikolwa byaffe eby'obutebenkevu mu kitundu, twasalawo okuwaayo obuyambi bw'ensimbi obw'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me poto pa gemo ma opoto ni, waniang ni kony tye kamitte tutwal dok wacoko jami ma watye kwede. Macalo but yub wa me miyo kony me yot kom ikabedo wa, wamoko tam wa me miyo kony me lim madit tutwal.

lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru azo 'dezaniri ma e'yosi, ama esu e'yo 'bani atita lezu mbeleru ri ra azini ama tra afa amani 'diyi. E'yo amani owizu e'yo alata ni ongulumu eyi ma alea ri ma azi ru, ama asi 'du e'yo robia fezu omgbo angirisi.

eng_prompt: I value open communication in our discussions. It's important that we share our thoughts candidly.
lug_prompt: Njagala nnyo empuliziganya ennungi mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo kwaffe. Kya mugaso okugabana ebirowoozo byaffe mu bwesimbu.

lgg_prompt: Ale e'yo nzeza ngmboru ama vile e'yo onzeza ma alia ri ma orodri. Eri orodriru amani ama ma egata awazu e'yo ada be.

eng_prompt: In our community, we believe in the power of collaboration and support. Each person brings their unique skills and resources to the table.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu kyaffe, tukkiririza mu maanyi g'okukolagana n'okuwagira. Buli muntu aleeta obukugu n'ebintu bye eby'enjawulo ku mmeeza.
ach_prompt: I kabedo wa, watye ki niyee I kom teko pa winye ki kony. Dano acel-acel kelo diro ki jami gi mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubetekosi, iyuunit sio agogong naka aimorikikina keda agangat. Nginitunganan eyangauni acoa ke ka iboro luitegelikina.

nyn_prompt: Omu kyanga kyaitu, nitwikiriza omu maani g'okukwatanisa n'obuhwezi. Buri muntu naareeta emyoga ye ey'omutaano n'ebintu bye aha meeza.

eng_prompt: In response to the community's urgent need for better healthcare facilities, a fundraising campaign was launched. Many influential figures stepped forward to support the initiative.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu bw'ekitundu obw'amangu obw'obujjanjabi obulungi, kaweefube w'okusonda ssente yatandikibwawo. Abantu bangi ab'amaanyi baavuddeyo okuwagira enteekateeka.

teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka itunga kanu amukian najokan, aponi kitegearai aituk ikapun. Apotu itunga luipu luejenara kopotu kanu aigang aswamisioit ngin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ongulumu eyini lezu arojo muke 'diyi esuzu mbeleru risi, 'ba e'do otuta robia trazu ri. Ba okporu karakara eyi efu drile atita fezu e'yo 'da ni.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ekyetengo ky'abantu eky'eby'amagara marungi, bakatandikaho ehururu y'okushorooza esente. Abantu b'amaani baingi bakarugayo kushagika enteekateeka egyo.

eng_prompt: As we assess the current state of our community, it's clear that we need to explore new strategies for growth. Identifying key areas for improvement is essential to fostering a thriving economy.
lug_prompt: Nga twekenneenya embeera y'ekitundu kyaffe eriwo kati, kyeyoleka bulungi nti twetaaga okunoonyereza ku bukodyo obupya obw'okukulaakulana. Okuzuula ebitundu ebikulu eby'okulongoosaamu kya mugaso mu kutumbula ebyenfuna.
ach_prompt: Ka watye ka neno kit ma kabedo wa tye kwede kombedi, nen atyer kamaleng ni omyero wanong yoo manyen me dongo lobo. Niang kabedo mapigi tego ma omyero kitim iye aloka-loka pire tek tutwal pi dongo lobo.
teo_prompt: Kwape sio airereor ejautene loka itunga wok, ecai cut ebe ibusakinit oni aimo iwaitin luitetiak luka apol. Ajenun aiboisio nuepolok nuibusakinit aitojokar ejok kanu aitopolor edumune loka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Amani e'yo ama vile ongulumu ma alia sawa 'disi ri ma ale andriria, eri e'da kililiru kini le ama ma nda geri o'diru zota ni 'diyi. Angu okporu otuzaru 'diyi ma e'dazuri eri orodriru e'yo robiani zozu.
nyn_prompt: Kuturikwetegyereza embeera y'ekyanga kyaitu obwahati, nikyoreka butunu ngu twine kuronda oburyo busya bw'okutunguuka. Okureeba ebintu ebirikwetengwa kutunguuka n'eky'omugasho omukureetaho entunguuka omu by'entaasya.

eng_prompt: After extensive discussions and careful consideration of various viewpoints, the committee convened to evaluate the proposals on the table. Ultimately, some decisions were reached at by the committee.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa ennyo n'okulowooza ennyo ku ndowooza ez'enjawulo, akakiiko kaatuula okwekenneenya ebiteeso ebyali ku mmeeza. Mu nkomerero, okusalawo okumu kwatuukiddwako akakiiko.
ach_prompt: Ingee nywako lok matut ki tam matut I kom tam mapat-pat, dul ne gubedo tye me neno tam ma obedo iwi komgi. I agiki ne, dul ne omoko tam mogo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aineranara noi keda airereonor aomisio nuegelegela, abu ekomiti iriamunos airereor aomisio nu ejaas. Kawasia, apotu ekomiti kodolokisi aomisio ace.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza angiri ma vutia azini egata ndundu eyi ma ale andrizu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, komiti 'da tra eyi e'yo 'bani lele 'diyi ma ale andrizu. Asizu, komiti 'da 'du e'yo azi eyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhanuura munonga n'okushwijuma n'obwegyendesereza enshonga nyingi, akakiiko kakashutama kushwijuma ebiteiso ebyabaire biri aha meeza. Ekyarugiremu, ebiteiso ebimwe bikaikirizibwa akakiiko.

eng_prompt: In any organization, financial integrity is paramount. This is why individuals in key financial roles must be reliable and accountable.
lug_prompt: Mu kitongole kyonna, obwesimbu mu by'ensimbi bwe bukulu. Eno y'ensonga lwaki abantu abali mu bifo ebikulu eby'ebyensimbi balina okuba abeesigika era abavunaanyizibwa.
ach_prompt: I dul mo keken, gwoko cente pire tek tutwal. Man aye tyen lok ma oweko dano matye ki twero me tic ki lim omyero gubed jo ma genne dok bene gunyut kor tic gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma orionget ediokere, ejokuna noi aingada ikapun. Ngun ngesi ibusakinitor itunga luejaasi toma aiboisio nuapolok nuka ikapun araut lu emunoi ka lu itwasamaete ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Amuti ciri ma alea, e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma tambazu ri eri orodriru ndeni. Di e'yo 'bani 'ba azi okporu e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ma ovu asi'baza be azini e'yo yi 'yepi 'diyi ma dria.

eng_prompt: Despite knowing the health risks, he continued to light up every day. Concerned for his well-being, his family members urged him to stop smoking.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga yali amanyi obulabe eri obulamu bwe, yeeyongera okukoleeza buli lunaku. Olw'okufaayo ku bulamu bwe, ab'omu maka ge baamusaba alekere awo okunywa sigala.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni en onongo ngeyo rac pa two, en omede ki lyeto mac nino ki nino. Pi lworo ma tye I kom kwo ne, lugang ne guwaco ni ojuk mato taa.
teo_prompt: Karaida ajeni ngesi atiokisio nuka angaleu, abu ngesi inyikok aica kanginipaaran. Kanu apodokinit aijarake, apotu lukokaleke ilipata ngesi apalar aimat esigala.
lgg_prompt: Erini tro e'yo onzikanya rua ala ni 'diyi nizu ra ti, eri mu drile aci fezu o'du driasi. Asi otiza eri ma edri ma e'yosi, 'ba familia eriniri ma alia 'diyi a'i eri taba seza kuzu ja.
nyn_prompt: N'obu araabe yaabaire naamanya akabi akari omu magara gye, akagumizamu naaka burizooba. Ahabw'okwerarikirira amagara gye, ab'eka ye bakamushaba kurekyeraaho okureesa.

eng_prompt: Recent studies have shown that certain health conditions can exacerbate the severity of COVID-19 symptoms. Among these conditions, smoking has emerged as a significant risk factor.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga nti embeera z'obulamu ezimu zisobola okwonoona obubonero bwa ssenyiga omukambwe. Mu mbeera zino, okunywa sigala kivuddeyo ng'ensonga ey'obulabe.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto ni two mukene twero balo lanyut me two korona. I kin peko magi weng, mato taa tye macalo peko madit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Itodunit aingic napac ebe ejaas iponesio ice luka angaleu luepedorete aiyatakin ijenuneta luka adeka naka ekorona. Kotoma ojautene kalo, etakanuni aimat esigala kwape ationis naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ebipi o'diru 'diyi ece kini e'yo rua ala nisi 'diyi eco azo COVID-19 niri ma wura eza ra. E'yo 'diyi ma eselea, taba seza efu e'yo azi onzi angiri ni ru.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka ngu embeera z'eby'amagara ezimwe nizibaasa kwongyera oburemeezi bw'obubonero bwa COVID-19. Omu mbeera ezi, okureesa kweyongyeire nk'ekintu ky'akabi munonga.

eng_prompt: The human body relies on various systems to maintain homeostasis and support life. One of these essential systems is responsible for gas exchange and oxygen delivery.
lug_prompt: Omubiri gw'omuntu gwesigama ku nkola ez'enjawulo okukuuma homeostasis n'okuyimirizaawo obulamu. Emu ku nkola zino enkulu evunaanyizibwa ku kukyusa omukka n'okutambuza omukka gwa oxygen.
ach_prompt: Kom dano jenge I kom jami mapat-pat me gwoko kwo. Acel I kin yub magi ma pigi tego obedo tic me weko yamo ma ki lwongo ni oxygen oo bot dano.
teo_prompt: Ibusakinit akuan itunganan aswam iboro luegelegela kanu aidar aijar. Idiopet koboro lu epol ajokis erai lo ikamunitos nuka ekwam keda aitodolikin ekwam.
lgg_prompt: Rua 'ba a'da niri asi'ba afa ndundu eyi ma dria ecozu aa'ta muke 'diyi ma ta mbazu azini aa'zu edriru. Afa azi alu orodriru 'diyi ma azi eri e'yo oli ojazu azini oli seza oli seza oli seza oli seza oli seza oli seza oli seza oli seza oli seza oli seza oli seza oli seza oli seza oli seza oli seza oli seza oli seza oli seza oli seza oli seza oli seza oli seza oli seza oli seza oli seza oli seza
nyn_prompt: Omubiri gw'omuntu nigutegyekwa ebintu bitari bimwe na bimwe, kugira ngu gume nigukorera hamwe, n'okureeberera amagara. Emwe aha nkora egi neejunanizibwa aha kuhindura omwika hamwe n'okureeta omwika gw'okwisya.

eng_prompt: The long-term effects of smoking can be devastating on the body. Many people underestimate the damage that tobacco can inflict on their respiratory system.
lug_prompt: Ebiva mu kunywa sigala biyinza okuba eby'akabi eri omubiri okumala ebbanga eddene. Abantu bangi banyooma obulabe taaba bw'ayinza okuleeta ku ngeri gye bassaamu.
ach_prompt: Adwogi marac ma mato taa kelo pi kare malac twero balo kom dano. Dano mapol pe gingeyo awano ma taa kelo I kom yoo me yweyo pa dano.
teo_prompt: Aswamisio nuka apak naepol nuka aimat esigala emunarete akuan. Mam itunga luipu ejenete atiokisio nuepedori etaba aswam kotoma aiyeng.
lgg_prompt: E'yo taba seza ni sawa ezu ri ma alea 'diyi eco rua eza ra. Ba karakara eyi e'da e'yo onzi taba ni eco 'ye eyi ma geri eyini oli sezu 'diyi ma dria ri ku.
nyn_prompt: Ebyarugire omu kureesa kumara obwire buraingwa, nibibaasa kuba eby'akabi aha mubiri. Abantu baingi tibarikwetegyereza akabi ak'etaabe erikubaasa kukora aha myanya yaabo y'okwitsya.

eng_prompt: Health educators emphasize the dangers of tobacco use. They aim to instill healthy habits in young minds.
lug_prompt: Abasomesa b'ebyobulamu bassa essira ku kabi akali mu kukozesa taaba. Baluubirira okussa emize emirungi mu birowoozo by'abato.
ach_prompt: Lupwonye me yot kom gi loko i kom rac pa mato taa. Gitye ki miti me pwonyo lutino ki kit me kwo maber.
teo_prompt: Isisianakinak lu angaleu isisianakinete atiokisio nu aimat esigala. Ekotosi kesi aisisianakin idwe iponesio luajokak.
lgg_prompt: Ba onita fepi e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi okpo fe e'yo onzi taba ma ayuza ma dria. Eyi 'ba asi adriza alata ni 'diyi 'ba oderu 'diyi ma omi eyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Abeegyesa b'eby'amagara nibashagika akabi akari omu kukoresa etaabe. Ekigyendererwa kyabo n'okwegyesa emicwe mirungi omu minyeeto.

eng_prompt: Maintaining a strong immune system is crucial for overall health. Various factors, such as poor nutrition and chronic stress, can weaken the body's defenses.
lug_prompt: Okukuuma abasirikale b'omubiri nga ba maanyi kya mugaso nnyo eri obulamu okutwalira awamu. Ensonga ez'enjawulo, gamba ng'endya embi n'okunyigirizibwa okutawona, bisobola okunafuya eby'okwerinda by'omubiri.
ach_prompt: Gwoko kom dano ma komgi tek obedo gin ma pire tek pi yotkom. Tye jami mapol ma twero weko komwa doko goro calo peko me cam ki par mapol.
teo_prompt: Ajaut keda agogong naka aokot erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka angaleu. Akiro nuegelegela kwape nat amamus ainyam ejok keda aiyalongong naepol, epedorete aitolitol ayuwara na akwan.
lgg_prompt: Afa rua ma okpo a'di 'dizu 'diyi ma tambazu ri eri orodriru rua ala ni. E'yo ndu ndu ekile nyaka nyaza kililiru ku azini e'yo asi otiza ru 'diyi eco rua ma okpo a'di 'dizu ri esi ra.
nyn_prompt: Okutunga abasirikare b'omubiri b'amaani n'eky'omugasho aha magara gaawe. Enshonga nyingi, nk'endya mbi hamwe n'okwerarikirira, nibibaasa kukyendeeza amaani g'omubiri.

eng_prompt: With the increasing evidence linking smoking to various health issues, it is crucial for individuals who smoke to consider the long-term effects of their habit. Awareness of the risks associated with tobacco use can lead to more informed choices regarding their lifestyle.
lug_prompt: Olw'obukakafu obweyongera obukwataganya okunywa sigala n'ebizibu by'obulamu eby'enjawulo, kikulu nnyo eri abantu ssekinnoomu abanywa sigala okulowooza ku biva mu muze gwabwe ogw'ebbanga eggwanvu. Okumanyisibwa ku kabi akali mu kukozesa taaba kusobola okuviirako okusalawo okulungi ku ngeri y'obulamu bwabwe.
ach_prompt: Ki caden matye kamede ma kubu mato taa ki peko me yot kom mapat-pat, pire tek tutwal ki dano ma mato taa me tamo i kom adwogi marac ma timgi kelo pi kare malac. Ngec I kom rac pa mato taa twero weko ngat moni moko tam maber I kom kit me kwone.
teo_prompt: Keda aitogogongoret naepol noi naerucokinit aimat esigala keda atiokisio nuipu nuka angaleu, ejokuna noi itunga lu emasete esigala aomoom atiokisio nuka apak naepol nuka aswam kec. Aisisianakino nuikamunitos atiokisio nu ikamanara keda aimat esigala epedori ayangaun aseununeta nuikamunitos aijar kec.
lgg_prompt: Afa e'dapi kini taba seza ni e'yo rua ala ni ndundu 'diyi pie, eri orodriru 'ba taba sepi 'diyi ma ega e'yo onzi sawa ezu 'diyi ma dria. E'yo onzikanya efipi taba ma ayuza beri ma dria ri eco fe 'ba eyini e'yo 'duzu geri eyini aa'zu ri ma dria kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obuhame obweyongyeire oburikukwatanisa okureesa n'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara, n'eky'omugasho aha bantu abarikureesa kuteekateeka aha kabi ak'obwire buraingwa akarikuruga omu mize yaabo. Okumanya akabi akarikuruga omu kukoresa etaabe, nikibaasa kubahwera kucwamu gye aha bikwatiraine n'emituurire yaabo.

eng_prompt: The respiratory system plays a crucial role in sustaining life. At the heart of this system are the lungs, which facilitate the exchange of oxygen and carbon dioxide.
lug_prompt: Enkola y'okussa ekola omulimu gwa maanyi mu kuyimirizaawo obulamu. Ku mutima gw'enkola eno kwe kuli amawuggwe, agasobozesa okuwanyisiganya omukka gwa oxygen ne kaboni dayokisayidi.
ach_prompt: Yweyo konyo totwal I gwoko kwo pa dano. I cwiny yub man tye iye oboo, ma weko yamo ayweya ki yamo carbon dioxide winye.
teo_prompt: Ewai lo eyengane iswamai ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar aijar. Kotoma atutubet kana eraasi iukoi, lu igangakitos aijulakin ekwam lo ekwam keda ekwam lo ekwam.

eng_prompt: In the late 19th century, European powers sought to expand their agricultural exports in Africa. As part of this effort, they identified Uganda as a suitable region for cash crop cultivation.
