eng_prompt: To ensure proper care and support during their treatment, patients are required to follow specific protocols. One of the key guidelines is that every patient is supposed to go to referral hospitals with a medical attendant.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa obujjanjabi obutuufu n'obuyambi mu bujjanjabi bwabwe, abalwadde beetaagibwa okugoberera emitendera egy'enjawulo. Ekimu ku biragiro ebikulu kiri nti buli mulwadde alina okugenda mu malwaliro amanene n'omusawo.
ach_prompt: Pi nongo kony ki gwok maber ikare me nongo yat, lutwo omyero gulub cik mapat-pat. Cik acel ma pire tek en aye ni lutwo weng omyero gucit iot yat madongo ki latic me ot yat.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun amukian najokan ka agangat kapak kana amukian, ekotoi adekak atupakin ainapeta ace. Adiopet kotoma aicoreta nuapolok erai ebe ekot ngin adekan alosit adekisia nuapolok keda eswaman.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba azoru 'diyi ma ta mbazu kililiru azini atita fezu sa'wa eyini aro esuzu risi, le eyi ma obi azita azi 'diyi ma vuti. Azita okporu 'diyi ma azi eri kini le 'ba dria azoru 'diyi ma mu arojo ambo 'diyi ma alea 'ba azi ngapi arojoa 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Okuhamya ngu abarwaire nibatunga obuhwezi n'okureebererwa kurungi, abarwaire bashemereire kukuratira ebiragiro. Kimwe ahabiragiro ebikuru n'okugira ngu buri murwaire ashemereire kuza omu marwariro amahango aine omushaho.

eng_prompt: After several delays and breakdowns during emergencies, the community has started to lose faith in the emergency services. Many residents have expressed their concerns about the ambulance's performance.
lug_prompt: Oluvanyuma lw'okulwawo n'okulemererwa mu biseera by'obwetaavu obw'amangu, abantu batandise okufiirwa obwesige mu buweereza bw'amangu. Abatuuze bangi balaze obweraliikirivu bwabwe ku nkola ya ambyulensi.
ach_prompt: Ingee galle ki poto pa jami mapol I kare me peko ma opoto atura, lwak ocako rwenyo gen I kom kony me peko ma opoto atura. Lutedero mapol gunyutu lworo gi i kom kit ma ambulance tye katimo kwede.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aiyap keda aibiror naka iboro kotoma apakio nu engeso, mam itunga emunokina aijaanakinio naka engeso. Apotu itunga luipu itodutu aiyalongongo kec kanu eswamae lo amotoka nadekis.
lgg_prompt: Sawa ezaza azini e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma vutia, ongulumu eyi e'do asi'baza 'ba e'yo mbeleru 'diyi ma dria ri avi ra. Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea karakara eyi e'da asi otiza eyini e'yo ambulance 'da ni 'ye ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okukyerererwa hamwe n'okuremwa kukora omu bwire bw'ebihikiirizi, abantu batandikire kufeerwa obwesigye omu buheereza bw'eby'ahonaaho. Abatuuragye baingi boorekire okwerarikirira kwabo aha nkora ya ambyurensi.

eng_prompt: As the night shift progressed, the number of critical cases began to rise unexpectedly. With limited resources and staff shortages, the nurse felt an increasing sense of urgency and concern for the well-being of the patients.
lug_prompt: Ekiro bwe kyagenda kiyitawo, omuwendo gw'abalwadde abakambwe gwatandika okulinnya mu ngeri etasuubirwa. Olw'ebikozesebwa ebitono n'ebbula ly'abakozi, abasawo baawulira obwetaavu obw'amangu n'okufaayo ku bulungi bw'abalwadde.
ach_prompt: I kare ma tic me dyewor tye ka mede, wel dano matye ki peko me two korona omede tutwal. Ki jami ki lutic ma nok tutwal, nac ne owinyo kit ma ber bedo pa lutwo tye ka mede kwede.
teo_prompt: Neautar aijulanakineta nuka akware, abu enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adekasinei nuarokok kogeu aiyatakin. Keda ikapun lu ikidioko keda eswamak lu ikidioko, apotu anasin kowanyutu eipud loka aijar naka adekak.
lgg_prompt: Sawa 'bani azi ngazu inisi ri ni mu drile, kalafe 'ba azoru 'diyi niri e'do tu e'yo 'bani ega kokoru. Afa ayuzaru azini 'ba azi ngapi 'diyi ma kalafe were si, nasi 'da ega e'yo mbeleru azini asi 'baza be 'ba azoru 'diyi ma ta mbaza ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omurimo gw'ekiro ku gwagumire nigugyenda omu maisho, omuhendo gw'abarwaire abaine oburwaire bw'amaani gwatandika kweyongyera. Ahabw'ebintu bikye hamwe n'eibura ry'abakozi, abashaho bakeehurira ekihika ky'okureeberera abarwaire.

eng_prompt: After the accident, the patient was in visible distress and needed immediate attention. The nurse quickly assessed the situation and rushed to help.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'akabenje, omulwadde yali alabika mu buzibu era nga yeetaaga okulabirirwa mu bwangu. Omusawo yakebera mangu embeera era n'ayanguwa okuyamba.
ach_prompt: Ingee nongo awano me gudi, latwo ne onongo tye I peko matek tutwal dok onongo mito kony oyot-oyot tutwal. Nac ongiyo ngo matye katimme oyot-oyot ci oringo ka miyo kony.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka akangas, ajai adekan toma ationis naepol noi ido akoto aingarakinio katipet. Abu anaasit koany atipet ejautene kosodi akerit aingarakin.
lgg_prompt: Drileonzi 'da ma vutia, 'ba azoru 'da ri e'yo ewaru ma alea, dika eri le azakoma mbeleru. Nurse 'da one e'yo 'da mbeleru azini ari i muzu azakoma fezu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'akabenje,omurwaire akaba aine oburemeezi bw'amaani kandi akaba nayetenga okuragurirwa ahonaaho. Naasi akeetegyereza ahonaaho embeera yaahunga kuhwera.

eng_prompt: After a thorough examination, the doctor determined that the patient was severely malnourished and needed immediate nutritional support. To aid in the recovery process, a meal plan was devised to help restore the patient's health.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukebera obulungi, omusawo yakizuula nti omulwadde yali alina endya embi era nga yeetaaga obuyambi bw'emmere mu bwangu. Okuyambako mu nteekateeka y'okuwona, enteekateeka y'emmere yakolebwa okuyamba okuzzaawo obulamu bw'omulwadde.
ach_prompt: Ingee pime matut, daktar oniang ni latwo ne tye ki peko me two neto dok mito kony me cam oyot-oyot tutwal. Me konyo I yoo me cang pa latwo, kiyubu yub me cam me dwoko yot kom pa latwo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ainwakio ejok, abu emuron kodum ebe mam adekan edekasi ejok ido ekotosi agangat na inyamat katipet. Kanu aingarakin adekan angaleun, aponi kitolomunai ainapeta nuka ainyam kanu aingarakin adekan angaleun.
lgg_prompt: Bani eri andrizu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, dakitari esu kini 'ba azoru 'da ma nyaka nyaza onzi tu dika eri le azakoma nyaka nyaza niri mbeleru. Azakoma fezu e'yo atita esuzuri ma alia, 'ba ede otita nyaka nyazani 'ba azoru 'da ma rua ala esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okukyebera gye, dokita akashanga ngu omurwaire abaire aine endya mbi munonga kandi akaba nayetenga obuhwezi bw'eby'okurya ahonaaho. Okuhwera omumuringo gw'okukira, enteekateeka y'eby'okurya ekateebwaho okugaruraho amagara g'omurwaire.

eng_prompt: After assessing the patient's condition and vital signs, it became clear that they require more advanced medical care. The current facility lacks the necessary resources to provide adequate treatment.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukebera embeera y'omulwadde n'obubonero bwe, kyazuuka nti beetaaga obujjanjabi obw'omulembe. Eddwaliro eririwo teririna bikozesebwa okusobola okuwa obujjanjabi obumala.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo kit ma lutwo tye kwede ki lanyut ma pigi tego, onen atyer kamaleng ni gimito kony me yot kom me rwom ma malo. Ot yat matye kombedi peke ki jami ma mite me miyo kony me yot kom ma oromo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereonor ejautene loka adekan keda ijenuneta luka aijar, aponi kojenunai ebe ekotosi kesi amukian naepol noi. Adekis na ejai kwape kwana emamiatatar keda iboro lu itwasamao kanu amukian adekasinei.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba azoru 'diyi ma rua ri ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, eri eca kililiru kini eyi le azakoma arojo ni okporu 'diyi. Pari arojo ni sawa 'disi ri ma alea afa ayuzaru aro fezu kililiru 'diyi yo.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma embeera y'omurwaire hamwe n'obubonero bwe, kikarebeka butunu ngu nibetenga obujanjabi bw'omutindo gw'ahaiguru. Eirwariro eriho hati, tiriine by'okukoresa kuragurira kurungi.

eng_prompt: After consulting with the doctors, the family realized that their loved one needed specialized care that the current facility could not provide. Faced with this urgent situation, the relatives will strive and take their patient to another hospital.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwebuuza ku basawo, aba famire baakiraba nti omwagalwa waabwe yeetaaga obujjanjabi obw'enjawulo ekitongole ekiriwo kati bwe kitasobola kuwa. Nga boolekaganye n'embeera eno ey'amangu, ab'enganda bajja kufuba okutwala omulwadde waabwe mu ddwaliro eddala.
ach_prompt: Inge lok ki daktari, lugang ne guniang ni lamarogi mito kony me yot kom ma ot yat matye kombedi pe twero miyo. I kare me peko eni, wadi gubi yele me cwalo latwo gi I ot yat mukene.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingitun akiro keda imurok, apotu lukokalekec ojenutu ebe ekotosi aminakec amukian na itegelikina na mam adekis naejai kopana epedori aijaikin. Kanu ejautene lo lo engeso, epote ipajan aswam kagogong ayangar adekakec adekis acie.
lgg_prompt: Erini e'yo nzezu dakitari yi be 'bori ma vutia, familia 'da esu ra kini le 'ba yini leletu 'diyi ma esu azakoma wura ndu 'diyi arojo curu'do 'diyi ma alea ku. E'yo mbeleru 'di be, ori'ba eyi nga okpo 'ba eyi ma 'ba azoru 'diyi jizu arojo nduni ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okwebuuza aha bashaho, eka eketegyereza ngu omukundwa waabo akaba nayetenga okuragurirwa okw'omutaano oku eirwariro eriho obwahati ritarikubaasa kuheereza. Ahabw'embeera y'akabi egi, abanyabuzaare nibaija kurwana kutwara omurwaire waabo omwirwariro erindi.

eng_prompt: After experiencing persistent symptoms, the doctor recommended that the patient seek specialized care. Following the evaluation, a referral was made to the appropriate hospital for further treatment.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okufuna obubonero obutasalako, omusawo yakubirizza omulwadde okufuna obujjanjabi obw'ekikugu. Oluvannyuma lw'okukebera, baasindikibwa mu ddwaliro erisaanira okufuna obujjanjabi obulala.
ach_prompt: Inge nongo lanyut me two matye ka medde anyim, dakta owaco ni latwo omyero onong kony pa ludiro. Ingee ngiyo kit ma tic tye kwede, kicwalo dano I ot yat ma opore pi nongo kony me yot kom.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ajaut keda aanyuneta nuepolok, abu emuron icorak adekan adumun amukian naka ipirioitin. Akaulo naka aingic, aponi ijukarai adekis naedolit kanu amukian naepol.
lgg_prompt: E'da ecetaru 'diyi esuzu 'bori ma vutia, dakitari ai 'ba azoru 'da aro esuzu 'ba nita be angiri 'diyi vu. E'yo eti ondazu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba pe 'ba ma ti arojo kililiru 'diyi ma alea aro esuzu drile.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okureeba obumanyiso oburikugumaho, dokita akahabura omurwaire kuronda obujanjabi bw'abakugu. Bwanyima y'okushwijuma, bakatwara omurwaire omu irwariro eririkwetengwa kwongyera kuragurirwa.

eng_prompt: Concerns had been raised about the quality of care provided in the local clinic. After reviewing the situation, the district officials were unhappy with the help of the nurse towards the patient.
lug_prompt: Obweraliikirivu bwali buleeteddwa ku mutindo gw'obujjanjabi obuweebwa mu malwaliro g'omu kitundu. Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya embeera, abakungu ba disitulikiti tebaali basanyufu n'obuyambi bwa nnansi eri omulwadde.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo tye I kom rwom me kony me yot kom ma kimiyo I ot yat me tedero. Ingee neno ngo matye katimme, lutic me district cwinygi pe obedo yom ki kony pa nurse bot latwo.
teo_prompt: Aponi itodunai aiyalongong kanu adoketait na amukian na ijaikitai adekisia nu okwap. Akaulo naka airereor ejautene, mam eswamak luko disitrikt eyalamasi kanu aingarakinio naka anaasin mama ejaasi adekak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza ni 'diyi efu e'yo azakoma fele o'bi eyidri ri ma wura ma dria. E'yo 'da onezu 'bori ma vutia, azi'ba distrikiti ni 'diyi aa'ni ayikosi azakoma nasi ni fe 'ba azoru 'diyi dri ri si ku.
nyn_prompt: Hariho okwerarikirira aha mutindo gw'obujanjabi oburikuheebwa omu irwariro ry'ekyaro. Ahanyima y'okushwijuma embeera, abakuru aha disiturikiti tibarashemerereirwe obuhwezi bwa naasi ahabarwaire.

eng_prompt: Despite their efforts to implement new policies, the recent failure in the program's execution left the district leaders feeling frustrated. They had hoped for a successful outcome to demonstrate their effectiveness in managing the district's challenges.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga baakola kaweefube okussa mu nkola amateeka amapya, okulemererwa kw'enteekateeka gyebuvuddeko kwaleka abakulembeze ba disitulikiti nga bennyamivu. Baali basuubira ebinaavaamu ebirungi okulaga obusobozi bwabwe mu kukwasaganya okusoomoozebwa kwa disitulikiti.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gutiyo matek me keto cik manyen itic, peko ma otimme cokcok-ki oweko lutela me district gubedo ki cwer cwiny. Gubedo ki gen me nongo adwogi maber me nyutu ni gitye ki kero me lweny i kom peko matye I district.
teo_prompt: Karaida iswamaete kesi kagogongu aitegear ainapeta nuitetiak, abu komen aitodolikin ainapeta ngun kojalak engarenok luka edisitrikt epalunitos. Aomitos kesi ebe ebuni akiro ngun aitodun ebe epedorete kesi aitemokin atiokisio nuka edisitrikta.
lgg_prompt: Yi ma okpo ni tro ovuzu azita o'diru 'diyi 'bazu 'yeta ma alia ra ti, e'yo 'bani e'de o'diru otita 'di ma 'yeta ma alia 'diyi fe drice'ba distrikiti ni 'diyi dri candi ra. Eyi ma asi 'baza ndra e'yo drile suza niri ma dria eyini ani ecozu e'dazu eyi ma okpo e'yo distrikitia 'diyi ma aza kozu ra.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho amaani gaabo g'okuta ebiragiro ebisya omu nkora, okuremwa kwa puroguraamu kukasiga abeebembezi ba disiturikiti baine amaani. Bakaba baine amatsiko g'okureebeka ngu nibasingura oburemeezi bwa disiturikiti.

eng_prompt: Despite numerous meetings and discussions, the team struggled to align their goals and strategies. As a result, their efforts have not yielded the desired outcomes for the district.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde waaliwo enkiiko nnyingi n'okukubaganya ebirowoozo, ttiimu yafuba okukwataganya ebiruubirirwa n'obukodyo bwayo. N'ekivuddemu, kaweefube waabwe tafunye bibala bya disitulikiti bye baagala.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni kacoke ki nywako lok obedo tye mapol, dul tuku ne obedo ka yele me cobo miti gi. Macalo adwogi ne, tute gi pe okelo adwogi maber ma gimito pi district.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaas airiamununeta keda ipegeta luipu, abu etimu kotam aimorikikin alosikinetekec keda iponesiokec. Kanuka ngun, mam aswam kec eyaunit akiro nu ekotoi kanuka edisitrikta.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi karakara azini e'yo onzeza ma talasi, amuti 'da esu e'yo ewaru e'yo eyini lele 'diyi 'yezu tualu geri eyini eyi 'yezu 'diyi pie. E'yo 'disi, okpo eyini 'ba ri esuni e'yo eyini le distrikiti ni 'diyi ku.
nyn_prompt: Oyihireho enkiiko nyingi n'okuhanuura, tiimu ekabonabona kuhikaanisa ebigyendererwa n'emitendera yaabo. N'ekyarugiremu, amaani gaabo tigarugiremu ebirikwetengwa aha disiturikiti.

eng_prompt: Frustration has been mounting among the citizens as they witness a series of unfulfilled promises and ineffective policies. Many feel abandoned and disillusioned, leading to a growing sense of despair about their future.
lug_prompt: Obwennyamivu bweyongedde mu bannansi nga balaba ebisuubizo ebitali bituukiridde n'enkola ezitali nnungi. Bangi bawulira nga basuuliddwa era nga baweddemu essuubi, ekibaleetera okweyongera okuggwaamu essuubi ku biseera byabwe eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: Cwer cwiny tye ka mede ikin anywali kace gitye kaneno cikke mapol ma pe gucobbe ki cik ma pe tiyo maber. Dano mapol giwinyo calo ki weko gi dok cwiny gi pe yom, man weko gi bedo ki lworo i kom anyim gi.
teo_prompt: Apolor aiyalongong kanejaas itunga nawanyunia kesi aisumuneta numam itodolikinitai keda ainapeta numam iswamaete ejok. Ipu itunga lu epupete epalunitai ido mam epodokinito, ido eyangaununei kesi aiyalongong noi kanuikamunitos ingarenikec.
lgg_prompt: Candi e'bi tu kari anzi eyi ma eselea eyini ndrezu e'yo 'bani owizu eyi 'yepi ku 'diyi azini azita azi ngapi muke ku 'diyi. Ba karakara eyi ega kini 'ba ku eyi dika eyi ma asi eza ra, e'yo 'di fe eyini aa'zu asi nyoza be ewu eyivile drialeri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okwerarikirira kweyongyeire omu bantu, ahabw'okureeba ebiraganiso ebitarikuhikiirira hamwe n'ebiragiro ebitarikukora. Baingi nibahurira barekirweho kandi baine amaganya, ekirikubareetera kugira amaganya aha biro byabo by'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: After a tragic accident on the highway, emergency services rushed him to the nearest medical facility. Despite the doctors' best efforts, his condition deteriorated rapidly.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'akabenje ak'entiisa ku luguudo olukulu, abasawo b'amangu baamuddusa mu ddwaliro ery'okumpi. Wadde ng'abasawo baakola kyonna ekisoboka, embeera ye yeeyongera okwonooneka.
ach_prompt: Ingee nongo awano me gudu I gudu madit, joo ma miyo kony oyot oyot gutere I ot yat macok. Kadi bed ni daktari gutemo matek tutwal, kome omedde ameda marac.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka akangas naronon korot, apotu lu engeso koyangasi ngesi adekis na eyapie. Karaida apotu imurok iswamata kagogongu, abu ejauteneke kibiror noi.
lgg_prompt: Drileonzi onzi nzila dria ri ma vutia, 'ba azakoma mbeleru 'diyi ari eri arojo enyia ndeni ri ma alea. Dakitari eyini tro e'yo 'yezu okporu ra ti, eri ma wura eza i mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'akabenje k'amaani aha ruguuto, ab'eby'amagara g'ahaiguru bakamutwara aha irwariro eriri haihi. N'obu abashaho baraabe bataireho amaani, embeera ye ekasisikarira kimwe.

eng_prompt: As the flames engulfed the building, panic surged through her veins. With each passing second, she knew she had to act quickly to escape the impending danger.
lug_prompt: Omuliro bwe gwakutte ekizimbe, yatya nnyo. Buli katikitiki akaayitawo, yali akimanyi nti alina okubaako ky'akolawo amangu okuwona akabi akaali kabindabinda.
ach_prompt: I kare ma mac omako ot ne, lworo omake adada. I kare weng ma okato, en onongo ngeyo ni myero otim gin mo oyot-oyot me lwi ki I peko matye kabino ni.
teo_prompt: Nealomunia akim aduketait ngin, abu akurianu kogeu alomar toma aijarake. Kangolikaru loatubor, ajeni ngesi ebe ibusakinit ngesi aswam katipet kanu alakun ationis naebunit.
lgg_prompt: Aci aci ni jo 'da ma alea ri si, ori e'do eri ma ari eyi ma alea. Sekendi alu alu ma vutia, eri nii kini le ma 'ye e'yo mbeleru ecozu e'yo ewaru emupi 'diyi apazu.
nyn_prompt: Omuriro ku gwatandikire kuturira ekyombeko, akagira obwoba. Buri sikonda eyabaire ehingwireho, akaba naamanya ngu aine kukora juba okwetantara akabi akaabaire kari haihi kubaho.

eng_prompt: Despite facing increasing threats and hostility, the commitment of health workers to their mission remains unwavering. They understand the vital role they play in the community's well-being and refuse to back down in the face of adversity.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga boolekaganye n'okutiisibwatiisibwa okweyongera n'obukyayi, obumalirivu bw'abakozi b'ebyobulamu eri omulimu gwabwe tebukyukakyuka. Bategeera omulimu omukulu gwe bakola mu bulungi bw'ekitundu era bagaana okudda emabega nga boolekaganye n'ebizibu.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gitye ka nongo bura ki gero mapol, miti pa lutic yoto kom i kom tic gi pud pe ojwik. Guniang tic ma pire tek ma gitye kwede pi ber bedo pa lwak dok gikwero dok cen ikare me peko.
teo_prompt: Karaida etereikina keda aitukurianeta keda amumu, amamete eswamak lu adekis ainakina toma aswamukec. Ejenete kesi aswam naepol noi na iswamaete kesi kotoma aijar naka itunga ido mam epedorete aibiror kotoma atiokisio.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ori gbaza ni azini a'di 'diza ni tupi 'diyi ma talasi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ma asi 'baza e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma dria ri ma omgbo esi ku. Eyi e'yo orodriru eyini nga ongulumu eyini aa'zu muke ri ma dria ri va dika eyi leni e'yo ewaru eyi ma alea ku.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okutiinatiinisa n'obwinazi obweyongyeire, abakozi b'ebyamagara nibahamira aha mirimo yaabo. Nibetegyereza omurimo gw'omugasho ogu barikukora omu by'obuhangwa kandi nibanga kugaruka enyima omu bwire bw'oburemeezi.

eng_prompt: As the pandemic escalated and government resources became stretched, the need for a coordinated response grew increasingly urgent. In this context, various stakeholders recognized the critical role that non-government organisations could play in addressing the crisis.
lug_prompt: Ng'ekirwadde bbunansi kyeyongera era n'ebikozesebwa bya gavumenti ne bikendeera, obwetaavu bw'okukolagana mu bwangu bweyongera. Mu mbeera eno, abakwatibwako ab'enjawulo baalaba omulimu omukulu ebitongole by'obwannakyewa gwe byalina okukola mu kugonjoola ekizibu.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma two korona omede ki dongo ki jami ma gamente tiyo kwede, miti me timo gin mo ma rwate obedo kamedde anyim. I lok man, dano mapol guniang tic ma dul ma pe jenge I kom gamente twero timo me tyeko peko eni.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyatakinor adeka naka ekorona keda ikapun luka apugan, apolor noi eipud loka aitemokin ngun. Kowai kalo, apotu itunga luegelegela kojenutu epone loepedoriata iriongeta luka apugan aitemokin ationis ngin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo 'dezaniri ni tuzu uru dika afa gameteni 'diyi ma ongmbo ni tuzu, e'yo 'bani lezu e'yo nde ma aza kozu tualu ri ma okpo tu ra. E'yo 'di ma alea, 'ba ambo ndundu eyi esu azi okporu amuti gamete ma pala ku 'diyini eco nga e'yo ewaru 'di ma aza kozu ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Endwara ruranda nsi ku yaayeyongyeire n'eby'obugaiga bya Gavumenti, ekyetengo ky'okugarukamu omu muringo ogurikwetengwa kikaguma nikyeyongyera. Omu nshonga egi, abaine akakwate omu by'obutegyeki bakareeba omurimo muhango ogurikubaasa kukorwa ebitongore ebitari bya gavumenti omu kurwanisa oburemeezi.

eng_prompt: Due to recent budget cuts and declining revenue, the local government is struggling to meet the needs of its community. As a result, essential programs and services are being severely impacted.
lug_prompt: Olw'okusala ku mbalirira gyebuvuddeko n'okukendeera kw'omusolo, gavumenti y'ebitundu erwana okutuukiriza ebyetaago by'ekitundu kyayo. N'ekivuddemu, pulogulaamu n'obuweereza ebikulu bikoseddwa nnyo.
ach_prompt: Pi ngolo byek me lim ma okato cokcok-ki ki wel lim matye kadok piny, gamente me tedero tye ka tute matek me cobo miti pa lwak. Macalo adwogi ne, yub ki tic mapigi tego tye kadeno can.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aitidisiar ebajet keda aitidisiar ikapun, etionikinit apugan naka atutubet aitodolikin ipudesia luka itunga. Kanuka ngun, eutasi ainapeta nuepolok keda aijanakino aitolitol noi.
lgg_prompt: Otita aje robia niri ma omgbo esizu azini robia esuza ma omgbo esizu ri ma e'yosi, gamete angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri ni dri ci e'yo 'ba eyini le 'diyi ma aza kozu. E'yo 'di ma e'yosi, otita azini azakoma orodriru 'diyi e'yo 'ye onzi onzi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okushara embaririra y'eihanga hamwe n'okutuubya kw'esente, gavumenti y'ebyaro eriyo neteganisibwa okuhikiiriza ebyetengo by'abantu baayo. N'ekyarugiremu, enteekateeka n'obuheereza ebikuru biriyo nibiteganisibwa munonga.

eng_prompt: To ensure the success and development of our community, we are implementing a new initiative aimed at fostering collaboration among local organizations. This initiative will establish clear expectations and consequences for their contributions to the district's progress.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa obuwanguzi n'enkulaakulana y'ekitundu kyaffe, tuli mu kuteeka mu nkola enteekateeka empya egendereddwamu okutumbula enkolagana wakati w'ebitongole by'omu kitundu. Enteekateeka eno ejja kuteekawo ebisuubirwa ebitangaavu n'ebinaavaamu ku bye bakola mu nkulaakulana ya disitulikiti.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni loc ki dongo lobo obedo tye ikabedo wa, watye katic ki yub manyen ma tye ki miti me kelo winye ikin dule ma ikabedo wa. Yub man bikelo jami ma omyero gubed ki gen iye ki adwoki me tic gi i kom dongo lobo pa district.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe ejai akerianut keda apol naka atutubetekosi, iuta sio aitegear ainapeta nuitetiak nuka aimorikikina kiding iriongeta luka atutubet. Ebuni ainapeta ngun aitolomun aomisio nu ecaete ka nu ebeit aswam kanu apol naka edisitrikta.
lgg_prompt: Aa'zu e'yo drile suza ni azini angu ezoma ni ongulumu amavileri ma alea ri ni, ama otuta azi o'diru ni 'ye lezu ti icita ma omgbo otuzu amuti angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eselea. Otita 'di ni nga e'yo 'bani ega eyi ma dria kililiru tualu e'yo eyini nga 'ye distrikiti ma zota ma alea 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Okuhamya obusinguzi n'entunguuka y'ekyanga kyaitu, turiyo nituta omunkora enteekateeka ensya erikugyenderera okureetaho okukwatanisa omu bitongore by'omubyaro. Enteekateeka egi neija kutaho ebirikuteekateekwaho n'ebirikubaasa kubaho aha ntunguuka ya disiturikiti.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent challenges faced by local schools, the state government announced a new funding initiative. As a result, the district received aid at the district level.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okusoomoozebwa kw'amasomero g'omu kitundu gyebuvuddeko, gavumenti y'essaza yalangiridde enteekateeka empya ey'okuvujjirira. N'ekyavaamu, disitulikiti yafuna obuyambi ku mutendera gwa disitulikiti.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko ma gangi kwan me tedero tye ka kato ki iye cokcok-ki, gamente oyubu yub manyen me nongo lim. Macalo adwogi ne, district onongo kony I rwom me districts.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuetereikina keda isomeroi luka atutubet, abu apugan naka akwap kolimo ainapeta nuitetiak nuka aigang ikapun. Kanuka ngun, abu edisitrikt odum agangat ko disitrikt.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru sukulu angu 'da ma alea 'diyini esu o'diru 'diyi ma aza kozu, gamete kari 'di ma alea ri azi e'yo robia fezu o'diru ni. E'yo 'disi, distrikiti esu atita eyi distrikiti eyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi obu amashomero g'omubyaro garikurabamu,gavumenti y'eihanga ekarangirira enteekateeka nsya y'okushashurira amashomero. Ekyarugiremu, disiturikiti ekatunga obuhwezi aha rurengo rwa disiturikiti.

eng_prompt: In response to the rising number of Covid-19 cases in the community, the district held an emergency meeting to discuss safety measures. After evaluating the needs of local schools and facilities, they decided to take immediate action.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula omuwendo gw'abalwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe ogweyongera mu kitundu, disitulikiti yatuuza olukiiko olw'amangu okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okwekuumamu. Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya ebyetaago by'amasomero g'omu kitundu n'ebifo, baasalawo okubaako kye bakolawo mu bwangu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel dano matye ki two korona, district obedo ki kacoke ma opoto atura me nywako tam i kom kit me gwoko kwo pa dano. Ingee neno jami ma mite pi gangi kwan me tedero, gumoko tamgi me timo gin mo cut.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka naka ekorona, abu edisitrikt iriamunos kanu aitemitem nuka ayuwara. Akaulo naka airereor ipudesia luka isomeroi keda aiboisio, apotu kesi koseutu aswam katipet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo kalafe azo Covid-19 niri ni tuzu ongulumu eyi ma alea risi, distrikiti 'ye mitingi mbeleru agbatara gbazu e'yo ageitema ni 'diyi ma dria. Bani e'yo sukulu angu 'da ma alea 'diyini le 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, eyi 'du e'yo 'ye indikindi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omuhendo gw'abarwaire ba korona ogweyongyeire omu bantu, disiturikiti ekakora orukiiko rw'amaani, okuhanuura ahaby'okwerinda. Bwanyima y'okushwijuma ebyetaago by'amashomero g'omubyaro hamwe n'ebintu ebirikwetengwa, bakasharamu kukora ahonaaho.

eng_prompt: The two entities have collaborated on various community initiatives over the years. Their ongoing partnership has fostered mutual trust and understanding.
lug_prompt: Ebitongole ebibiri bikwataganye ku mirimu gy'ekitundu egy'enjawulo okumala emyaka. Enkolagana yaabwe egenda mu maaso etumbudde obwesige n'okutegeeragana.
ach_prompt: Dul aryo egoni gutiyo kacelo pi mwaki mapol. Ribbe meggi matye kawot anyim okelo gen ki winye ikin gi.
teo_prompt: Eswamaete atukona ngun aarei nepepe kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela kokaru lu atuboros. Aimorikikina kec na elosi akonye eyangaunit amunokina keda apuponoro.
lgg_prompt: Amuti iri 'diyi nga azi tualu e'yo ndundu ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma dria eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea. Eyi ma ti ecita mupi drile ri otu asi'baza eyi ma eselea tualu vata be.
nyn_prompt: Ebitongore bibiri bikoreire hamwe omu mirimo y'ebyaro etari emwe kumara emyaka mingi. Enkoragana yaabo erikugyenda omu maisho, ereesireho obwesigye n'okwetegyerezana.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent health initiative aimed at improving hygiene practices, the district has implemented a program to distribute essential supplies. As part of this effort, the district received soap which will help in facilitating hand washing.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula enteekateeka y'ebyobulamu gye buvuddeko egendereddwamu okutumbula eby'obuyonjo, disitulikiti etadde mu nkola enteekateeka y'okugaba ebintu ebikulu. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, disitulikiti yafuna ssabbuuni ajja okuyamba mu kunaaba engalo.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me yub me yot kom ma otime cokcok-ki ma tye ki miti me ilo malo rwom me lengo, district okatti ki yub me poko jami ma mite pi kwo pa dano. Macalo but tic man, distrik onongo cabun ma obi konyo ilok me lwoko cing.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitodolikin ainapeta nuka angaleu nuitegelikina kanu aitojokar aila, etolomu edisitrikt ainapeta nuka aikor iboro lu itwasamao. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, abu edisitrikt odum asabunyu na ingarakini ailot akanin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu alata ma omgbo otuzu o'diru ri ma e'yosi, distrikiti 'ba otita azi afa orodriru 'diyi awazu. Okpo 'di ma azi ru, distrikiti esu sabuni ngapi azakoma fepi dri ojiza ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Omu kugarukamu enteekateeka y'eby'amagara erikugyenderera okutunguura eby'obuyonjo, disiturikiti etandikireho enteekateeka y'okugaba ebintu ebikuru. Nk'ekicweka ky'amaani aga, disiturikiti ekatunga esabuuni erikwija kuhwera omu kunaaba engaro.

eng_prompt: As the number of COVID-19 cases continues to rise, the community is facing unprecedented challenges. To effectively combat this health crisis, collaboration among residents and local organizations is essential.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuwendo gw'abalwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe gweyongera okulinnya, ekitundu kyolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa okutabangawo. Okusobola okulwanyisa obulungi ekizibu ky'ebyobulamu kino, okukolagana wakati w'abatuuze n'ebitongole by'omu kitundu kya mugaso.
ach_prompt: Kit ma wel dano matye ki two korona tye ka medde, lwak tye kanongo peko mapol tutwal. Me lweny i kom peko me yot kom eni, ribbe ikin lwak ki dule ma ikabedo moni pire tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka naka ekorona, etereikina itunga keda atiokisio nuegelegela. Kanu aitikitik atiokisio nu nuka angaleu, epolok noi aiswamanara kiding itunga keda iriongeta luka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba azo COVID-19 niri be 'diyi ni tutu, ongulumu eyi e'yo ewaru ndundu eyi esu. E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi 'diri ma aza kozu kililiru, ti ecita 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eselea amuti angu 'da ma alea 'diyi pie ri eri orodriru.
nyn_prompt: Omuhendo gw'abarwaire ba COVID-19 nigugumizamu nigweyongyera, abantu nibatunga oburemeezi obutari bwa buriijo. Okurwanisa oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara, okukwatanisa ahagati y'abatuuragye n'ebitongore by'ebyaro n'eky'omugasho.

eng_prompt: As the number of COVID-19 cases continued to rise, the community faced unprecedented challenges in managing public health. In response to the growing crisis, local officials recognized the need for a collaborative effort.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuwendo gw'abalwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe gweyongera okulinnya, abantu baayolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa okutabangawo mu kuddukanya ebyobulamu by'olukale. Olw'obuzibu obweyongera, abakungu b'ebyalo baalaba obwetaavu bw'okukolaganira awamu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma wel dano matye ki two korona omedde, lwak gunongo peko mapol tutwal I tic me gwoko yotkom pa lwak. Macalo adwogi me peko matye kamede, lutic me tedero guneno ber pa tic kacelo.
teo_prompt: Neyatakinor enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka naka COVID-19, apotu itunga odumutu atiokisio nuepolok noi kotoma aidar angaleu naka itunga. Kanu aitemokin ationis na eyapie, apotu eswamak luka atutubet kojenutu eipud loka aimorikikina.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba azo COVID-19 niri be 'diyi ni tuzu drile, ongulumu eyi esu e'yo ewaru ndundu eyi e'yo alata ni 'diyi ma aza kozu. E'yo ewaru ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma omvitaa, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi esu e'yo lezu okpo 'bazu tualu ri ma orodri ra.
nyn_prompt: Omuhendo gw'abarwaire ba COVID-19 ku gwagumire nigweyongyera, abantu bakashanga oburemeezi bw'amaani omu kukora ahaby'amagara g'abantu. Ahabw'oburemeezi obweyongyeire, abakuru b'ebyaro bakareeba ekyetengo ky'okukorera hamwe.

eng_prompt: In light of recent challenges faced by healthcare professionals, the district held a meeting to address the pressing issues within the community. During this discussion, they emphasized the importance of providing adequate resources and support for health workers.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kusoomoozebwa abakugu mu byobulamu kwe basanga gyebuvuddeko, disitulikiti yatuuza olukiiko okukola ku nsonga ez'amangu mu kitundu. Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo kuno, bakkaatiriza obukulu bw'okuwa abasawo ebikozesebwa n'obuyambi ebimala.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko ma lutic yoto kom tye kanongo cokcok-ki, district obedo ki kacoke me cobo peko matye ikin lwak. Ikare me nywako lok eni, guketo cwinygi tutwal I kom ber pa miyo kony ki kony ma oromo ki lutic yoto kom.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nuetereikina keda eswamak luka angaleu, abu edisitrikt iriamunos aitemokin atiokisio nuepolok noi kotoma atutubet. Kotoma opeget lo, apotu kesi kitogogongoto ajokis naka aijaikin agangat nejaas eswamak lu adekis.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ni esu o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, distrikiti 'ye mitingi e'yo ewaru ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu. Sawa agbatara 'di vurisi, eyi 'ba asi orodri afa ayuzaru 'diyi fezu azini atita fezu azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi dri ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi obu abakugu omu by'amagara barikurabamu, disiturikiti ekakora orukiiko kukora aha nshonga z'abantu. Omu kuhanuura oku, bakahamya omugasho gw'okuheereza abashaho eby'okukoresa ebirikumara n'obuhwezi.

eng_prompt: In light of recent budget changes and community feedback, the district is committed to enhancing its resource management strategies. To achieve this, a comprehensive plan will be implemented to address the needs of all schools.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku nkyukakyuka mu mbalirira gye buvuddeko n'ebiteeso by'abantu, disitulikiti yeewaddeyo okutumbula enkola zaayo ez'okuddukanya eby'obugagga. Okutuukiriza kino, enteekateeka enzijuvu ejja kuteekebwa mu nkola okukola ku byetaago by'amasomero gonna.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki aloka-loka me byek me lim ma otime cokcok-ki ki tam pa lwak, district ocikke me ilo malo rwom me tic ki lim. Me cobo man, kibiketo yub maber me cobo miti pa gangi kwan weng.
teo_prompt: Katupitos aijulanakineta nuka ebajet keda aomisio nuka itunga, ekapakina edisitrikt aitojokar iponesioke luka aidar iboro. Kanu aitodolikin ngun, eponio aitegear ainapeta nuikamunitos ipudesia luka isomeroi kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ojata bajeti ni o'diru 'diyi ma dria tualu o'dukoti feza ongulumu eyini 'diyi pie, distrikiti owi i geri erini afa lonyiru 'diyi ma tambazu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo 'di 'yezu, 'ba nga otita azi 'ye e'yo sukulu dria eyini le 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Kurugirira aha mpindahinduka y'embaririra eyabaireho obwahati hamwe n'ebiteiso by'abantu, disiturikiti eyehaireyo kutunguura enkora yaayo y'okureeberera eby'obugaiga. Okuhikiiriza eki, enteekateeka nungi neija kutebwa omu nkora, okukora ahabyetaago by'amashomero goona.

eng_prompt: In response to the rising number of cases, the hospital administration prioritized the safety of its staff. As a result, the health workers have obtained the protective equipment used in treating patients.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula omuwendo gw'abalwadde ogweyongera, abaddukanya eddwaliro baakulembeza obukuumi bw'abakozi baabwe. N'ekivuddemu, abasawo bafunye eby'okwekuumisa ebikozesebwa mu kujjanjaba abalwadde.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel lutwoo, ludito me ot yat guketo gwoko luticgi obedo gin ma pire tek. Macalo adwogi ne, lutic yoto kom gunongo jami ma gwoko komgi ikare me tic i kom lutwo.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin enaaba loka adekak, abu eyaitene lo adekis kisingaren ayuwara naka eswamakakec. Kanuka ngun, adumutu eswamak lu adekis iswamasia lu ayuara kanu aimukia adekak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba azo be 'diyi ma kalafe tupi tutu ri ma e'yosi, driceza arojo niri 'ba e'yo azi'ba eyini 'diyi ma tambazu ri okporu. E'yo 'disi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi esu afa tambaza fepi 'diyi aro fezu 'ba azoru 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omuhendo gw'abarwaire ogweyongyeire, abarikukurira eirwariro bakebembeza eby'okwerinda kw'abakozi baabo. N'ekyarugiremu, abashaho batungire ebikwato by'okwerinda ebirikukoresibwa omu kuragurira abarwaire.

eng_prompt: Residents have expressed growing concerns about the lack of timely medical assistance during emergencies. To address these issues, the district needs to establish ambulance services in the area.
lug_prompt: Abatuuze balaze obweraliikirivu obweyongera olw'obutafuna bujjanjabi mu budde mu biseera by'obwetaavu obw'amangu. Okusobola okukola ku nsonga zino, disitulikiti yeetaaga okuteekawo empeereza ya ambyulensi mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Lutedero gunyutu lworo madit tutwal I kom peko me nok pa kony me yot kom ikare me peko ma opoto atura. Me tyeko peko magi, district omyero oket ambulance ikabedo eni.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga itodutu aiyalongongokec kanu amamus na amukian kotoma apakio nu engeso. Kanu aitemokin akiro nu, ekot edisitrikt aitolomun amotokan nuadekis katutubet.
lgg_prompt: Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ece asi otiza eyini e'yo azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma esuta sa'wa dria si ri ma ako si. E'yo 'diyi ma aza kozu, le distrikiti ma e'do ambulansi eyi angu 'da ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Abatuuragye boorekire okwerarikirira ahabw'obutaheebwa obuhwezi bw'eby'amagara omu bwire bukye omu bwire bw'ebihikiirizi. Okukora aha nshonga ezi, disiturikiti eshemereire kutaho obuheereza bwa ambyurensi omukyanga.

eng_prompt: In recent assessments, community feedback highlighted significant gaps in the quality of services provided. As a result, local leaders are prioritizing strategies to enhance efficiency and responsiveness in the district.
lug_prompt: Mu kwekenneenya okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko, abantu baalaze ebituli mu mutindo gw'obuweereza obuweereddwa. N'ekivuddemu, abakulembeze b'ebyalo bakulembeza enteekateeka z'okutumbula obulungi n'obwangu mu disitulikiti.
ach_prompt: I kwed ma otime cokcok-ki, adwoki pa lwak onyuto apoka-poka madongo I rwom me kony ma kimiyo. Macalo adwogi ne, lutela me tedero gitye ka keto cwiny gi i kom yoo me medo rwom me tic i district.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aingic napac, abu abongokinet naka itunga kitodu aibucanara naepol noi kotoma adoketait naka ejanakine lo ijaikitai. Kanuka ngun, eutasi engarenok luka atutubena aisingarenit iwaitin lu itojokaret eswamae loajokan kodisitrikt.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza o'diru 'diyi ma alea, o'duko ongulumu eyini fe 'diyi e'da e'yo onzi 'diyi geri azakoma fele o'bi eyidri ri ma alea. E'yo 'disi, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi geri eyini ecozu e'yo eyi 'yezu kililiru distrikiti 'da ma alea 'diyi 'ba okporu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kucondooza okwakozirwe juba, abantu bakareetaho oburemeezi bw'amaani omu buheereza oburikuheebwa. N'ekyarugiremu, abebembezi b'ebyaro nibata omutima aha nkora nungi omu disiturikiti.

eng_prompt: As the number of confirmed cases continues to rise, local health officials are increasingly concerned about the impact on the community. In response to this urgent situation, the district has to mobilize and inform people about the spread of covid nineteen.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuwendo gw'abalwadde abakakasiddwa gweyongera okulinnya, abakungu b'ebyobulamu mu byalo beeyongera okweraliikirira ku ngeri abantu gye bayinza okukwatibwako. Mu kwanukula embeera eno ey'amangu, disitulikiti erina okukunga n'okumanyisa abantu ku kusaasaana kwa ssenyiga omukambwe.
ach_prompt: I kare ma wel dano matye ki two tye ka medde, lutic me yot kom tye ka paro pi adwogi ne I kom lwak. Me cobo peko man ma opoto atura, district omyero gu rwee ki niang lwak i kom nya pa two korona.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata enaaba loka adekak, epodokitos eswamak luka angaleu nuikamunitos epone loepedoriata itunga. Kanu aitemokin ejautene lo lo engeso, ekot edisitrikt aisinyikokin ka aitijenikin itunga nuikamunitos awea naka ekorona.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba 'bani esu azo be 'diyi ni tutu, azi'ba arojo ni angu 'da ma alea 'diyi asi otiza be e'yo erini eco 'ye ongulumu eyi ma dria ri ma dria. E'yo ewaru 'di ma aza kozu, le distrikiti ma tra azini ma lu o'bi eyini e'yo azo korona niri ma ereta ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Omuhendo gw'abarwaire oguhamiibwe nigugumizamu nigweyongyera, ab'eby'amagara omu byaro beeyongyeire kwerarikirira ebirikukwata aha bantu. Ahabw'embeera egi, disiturikiti eshemereire kurundana n'okumanyisa abantu ebirikukwata aha kujanjaara kwa korona.

eng_prompt: As the number of COVID-19 cases continues to rise, it has become increasingly clear that many individuals are not adhering to the established health guidelines. To ensure public safety and compliance, stronger measures must be implemented.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuwendo gw'abalwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe gweyongera okulinnya, kyeyoleka bulungi nti abantu bangi tebagoberera biragiro by'ebyobulamu ebyateekebwawo. Okusobola okukakasa obukuumi bw'abantu n'okugondera amateeka, ebiragiro ebikakali birina okuteekebwa mu nkola.
ach_prompt: I kare ma wel dano matye ki two korona tye ka medde, nen atyer kamaleng ni dano mapol pe tye ka lubu cik me yot kom ma kiketo. Me neno ni lwak tye agwoka ki lubu cik, omyero ki ket yub matek tutwal itic.

nyn_prompt: Omuhendo gw'abarwaire ba COVID-19 niguguma nigweyongyera, nikyeyoreka butunu ngu abantu baingi tibarikukuratira ebiragiro by'ebyamagara. Okureeba ngu abantu baine obusingye n'okworobera ebiragiro, ebiragiro by'amaani bishemereire kuta omu nkora.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent increase in violations of public safety regulations, it has become clear that stricter enforcement measures are necessary. Community members have expressed concerns about the lack of compliance with the established guidelines.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kweyongera mu kutyoboola amateeka g'obukuumi bw'olukale gyebuvuddeko, kyeyoleka bulungi nti amateeka amakakali geetaagibwa. Abantu b'omu kitundu balaze obweraliikirivu olw'obutagoberera biragiro ebyateekebwawo.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki medde pa turu cik me gwoko ber bedo pa lwak cokcok-ki, nen atyer kamaleng ni omyero ki med rwom me keto cik itic. Lwak gunyutu lworo gi i kom pe lubu cik ma kiketo.
teo_prompt: Katupitos aiyatakinio naka ikisila luka ayuwara kama ejaasi itunga, ecai cut ebe ibusakinit aitigogong ainapeta nuka ayuwara. Apotu itunga luka atutubet itodutu aiyalongongokec kanu amamus atupakinit aicoreta nuitolomunitai.

eng_prompt: Health officials have reported a significant increase in cases in the area. As a result, community members are being urged to take precautions.

ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni two korona tye ka nyaa ki lworo ma tye kamedde I kom yotkom ki ber bedo, dano mapol me kabedo mapatpat guyero me gure pi nongo kony me cwiny. Niye gi ma pe lokke oweko guketo yub me dini gi me bedo gin ma pire tek loyo lworo me two.

ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni two korona tye ka nyaa, nen calo dano mapol dong gucako keto cwinygi I kom jami mukene mapigi tego I kwogi. Macalo adwogi ne, miti madit tutwal I kom cik me yot kom ki gwokke I kom two dong odok piny tutwal.

eng_prompt: Despite ongoing health concerns and restrictions, many individuals are choosing to come together in social settings. This trend has sparked debates about safety and personal freedom.
