lug_prompt: Wadde nga gavumenti efubye okussaawo amateeka amakakali, bannansi bangi bakyagenda mu maaso n'obutafaayo ku mateeka. N'ekyavaamu, abakungu b'ebyobulamu beeyongera okweraliikirira olw'omuwendo gw'abalwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe ogweyongera mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gamente tye ka yele me keto cik mapigi tego itic, anywali mapol pud tye ka cayo cik. Macalo adwogi ne, lutic me yot kom tye ki lworo madit tutwal I kom wel dano matye ki two korona I kabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Karaida iswamat apugan kagogongu kanu aitodolikin ikisila, inyikokinitos itunga luipu apalunit ikisila. Kanuka ngun, iyalongongosi eswamak luka angaleu kanu aiyatakin na enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka naka COVID-19.
lgg_prompt: Gamete ni tro okpo 'ba e'yo okporu 'diyi 'yezu ra ti, kari anzi karakara eyi mu drile azita eyi ma vuti obizu ku. E'yo 'disi, azi'ba alatani o'bi eyini 'diyi ma asi otiza e'yo kalafe COVID-19 niri ni tuzu ongulumu eyi ma alea ri ma dria tutu.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho amaani ga gavumenti okureetaho ebiragiro by'amaani, abatuuragye baingi bagumiizemu kukyanga ebiragiro. N'ekyarugiremu, abakuru omu by'amagara beeyongyeire kwerarikirira ahabw'omuhendo gw'abarwaire ba COVID-19 ogweyongyeire omu bantu.

eng_prompt: Effective collaboration between local authorities and the community is essential for maintaining trust and ensuring public safety. To achieve this, proactive communication is necessary to keep residents informed and engaged.
lug_prompt: Enkolagana ennungi wakati w'abakulembeze b'ebitundu n'abantu ba bulijjo ya mugaso mu kukuuma obwesige n'obukuumi bw'abantu. Okutuukiriza kino, empuliziganya ennungi yeetaagibwa okukuuma abatuuze nga bamanyi era nga bakwatibwako.
ach_prompt: Ribbe maber ikin lutela me tedero ki lwak pire tek tutwal pi gwoko gen ki gwoko ber bedo pa lwak. Me cobo man, kubbe maber mite pi weko lutedero bedo ki ngec dok gubed ki miti.
teo_prompt: Aiswamanara najokan kiding apedorosio nuka atutubet keda itunga erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar amunokina ka ayuwar itunga. Kanu aitodolikin ngun, ibusakinit einer ejok kanu aitijenikin itunga.
lgg_prompt: Ti ecita kililiru okpo e'ipi angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi ma eselea ongulumu eyi pie ri eri orodriru asi'baza ma tambazu azini ageitema fezu o'bi eyini. E'yo 'di 'yezu, e'yo nzeza kililiru ri eri orodriru 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyini e'yo 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Okukwatanisa kurungi ahagati y'abebembezi b'ebyaro hamwe n'abantu b'omubyaro, n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okurinda obwesigwa n'oburinzi bw'abantu. Okuhikiiriza eki, empurizagana nungi neeyetengwa, kugira ngu abatuuragye bagume nibamanya kandi bakore.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing unrest in the community, local authorities issued a warning about the importance of adhering to safety protocols. Despite the clear guidelines, many individuals continued to disregard the rules, prompting law enforcement to take action.
lug_prompt: Olw'obutabanguko obweyongera mu kitundu, ab'obuyinza baalabudde ku bukulu bw'okugoberera amateeka g'obukuumi. Newankubadde ebiragiro byali bitegeerekeka bulungi, abantu bangi beeyongedde okubuusa amaaso amateeka, ekyaleetedde abakuumaddembe okubaako kyebakola.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lweny matye kamede i kin lwak, lutela me tedero guciko dano i kom ber pa lubu cik me gwoko kuc. Kadi bed ni cik ne obedo atir, dano mapol omede ki cayo cik ne, ma oweko lutic cik gucako timo gin mo.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin amumu na iyata noi kotoma atutubet, apotu apedorosio kikwenyasi itunga nuikamunitos ajokis naka aitup ainapeta nuka ayuwara. Karaida ecaete aicoreta ngun, apotu itunga luipu kongeroto aibil ikisila, ido abu koinak ipolisin aswam nuiswama.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ongulumu eyi ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tuzu risi, drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi fe bile ndu liza orodri 'bani azita agei tema ni 'diyi ma vuti obizu ri ma dria. Azita o'bale kililiru 'diyi ma talasi, 'ba karakara eyi mu drile azita 'da eyi ma dria ku, eyini ani fezu 'ba azita eyi ma ta mbapi 'diyini e'yo 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obutabanguko obweyongyeire omu bantu, ab'obushoborozi bakahereza okurabura aha mugasho gw'okukuratira ebiragiro by'okwerinda. Oihireho ebiragiro ebirikwetegyerezibwa kurungi, abantu baingi bakagumizamu kutahurikiza ebiragiro, ekyareteire abarikukwatisa ebiragiro kukora.

eng_prompt: In today's fast-paced world, the pressure to succeed and maintain financial stability has reached unprecedented levels. As a result, individuals often prioritize their professional obligations over their personal well-being.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ey'amangu, akazito k'okutuuka ku buwanguzi n'okukuuma obutebenkevu mu byenfuna kutuuse ku ddaala eritabangawo. N'ekivuddemu, abantu batera okukulembeza obuvunaanyizibwa bwabwe obw'ekikugu okusinga obulungi bwabwe.
ach_prompt: I lobo me kareni ma jami tye ka time oyot-oyot tutwal, lyeto me cobo miti ki bedo ki cente madwong dong oo I rwom ma lamal tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, dano ipol kare gi tero tic gi calo gin ma pire tek loyo ber bedo gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo naepatana aijulujuleta, ejai eipud loka akerianar ka aidar ejautene loajokan loka ikapun toma adoketait naepol noi. Kanuka ngun, etapit itunga aisingarenit aswamukec adepar aijarakec.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alia, e'yo lezu drile suza esuzu azini e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma tambazu ri ma omgbo ca curu'do ongmbo angiri si. E'yo 'disi, 'ba yi e'yo yini azi ngazu 'diyi 'du okporu aga e'yo yini yi ma ngulupi ni 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba erikutamburira ahonaaho, oburemeezi bw'okusingura n'okurinda obutebeekana omu by'entaasya, buhikire aha rurengo rutabaireho. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu nibakira kwebembeza emirimo yaabo kukira ebyetengo byabo.

eng_prompt: Despite numerous initiatives aimed at community engagement, there remains a significant gap in awareness and participation among the population. This lack of effective communication has hindered progress on key issues.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde waliwo enteekateeka nnyingi ezigendereddwamu okwenyigiramu kw'abantu, wakyaliwo ekituli ekinene mu kumanyisa n'okwenyigiramu mu bantu. Obutabeera na mpuliziganya nnungi kiremesezza enkulaakulana ku nsonga enkulu.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni yub mapat-pat tye me rweyo lwak, rwom me ngec ki bedo tye pa lwak pud tye mapol tutwal. Bedo peke pa kubbe maber eni oweko dongo lobo I kom lok mapigi tego odoko tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Karaida ipu iboro lu ekotoi aswam kanu aimorikikin itunga, eringa ejai atiakatiaka naepol noi kotoma aijen keda aimorikikina kanejaas itunga. Amamus na einer ejok isimiki apol kotoma akiro nuepolok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu ongulumu eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma kalafe angiri ri ma talasi, e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma mile ozizu azini eyi ma eselea ri ma eselea ri nga po'di ci. E'yo nzeza kililiru ri ma ako 'di atri zota e'yo okporu 'diyi ma dria ci.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho enteekateeka nyingi ezirikugyenderera okukoresa abantu, hakiriho omwanya muhango omu kumanya n'okwejumba omu bantu. Oburemeezi bw'empurizagana buremesize entunguuka aha nshonga enkuru.

eng_prompt: In an effort to enforce compliance with local regulations, authorities have implemented strict measures. As a result, the police have confiscated property of people who have failed to obey the directives.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okukakasa okugobererwa kw'ebiragiro by'ekitundu, ab'obuyinza bataddewo enkola enkakali. N'ekivuddemu, poliisi ewambye ebintu by'abantu abalemeddwa okugondera ebiragiro.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me neno ni lutela me tedero lubu cik ma kwako tedero, guketo cik matek tutwal itic. Macalo adwogi ne, abili gumako jami pa dano ma pe olubu cik.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitigogong aitup ikisila luka atutubet, apotu apedorosio itolomutu ikisila luegogong. Kanuka ngun, apotu ipolisin ikamasi iboro luka itunga lumam etupitos aicoreta.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu azita o'bale angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma vuti obizu, drice'ba eyi 'ba e'yo okporu 'diyi 'yeta ma alea. E'yo 'disi, polisi eyi 'du 'ba azita vuti obipi ku 'diyi ma lonyi eyi ci.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okukuratira ebiragiro by'ebyaro, ab'obushoborozi bateireho enkora y'amaani. Ekyarugiremu, poriisi ekwasire ebintu by'abantu abaremirwe kukuratira ebiragiro.

eng_prompt: As the pandemic continues to escalate, governments around the world are implementing stricter measures to control the spread of the virus. In light of the rising case numbers, compliance with health regulations has become imperative for public safety.
lug_prompt: Ng'ekirwadde bbunansi kyeyongera okusajjuka, gavumenti okwetooloola ensi yonna zissa mu nkola enkola enkakali okusobola okutangira okusaasaana kw'akawuka. Okusinziira ku muwendo gw'abalwadde ogweyongera, okugoberera ebiragiro by'ebyobulamu kifuuse kya nkizo eri obukuumi bw'abantu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma two korona tye kamede ki nya, gamente mapat-pat me wilobo tye ka keto cik matek me gengo nya pa two eni itic. Ma lubbe ki medde pa wel dano matye ki two corona, lubu cik me yot kom pire tek tutwal pi ber bedo pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata adeka naka ekorona, eutasi apuganisinei nuka akwap kere aitolomun ikisila luitikitikete awea naka ekorona. Kanu aiyatakin enaaba loka adekak, atupakinit ikisila luka angaleu erai ibore yenepol noi kanu ayuara na itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo 'dezaniri ni mu drile tuzurisi, gamete wudrikurusi ndulu 'diyi geri okporu 'diyi 'ba e'yo azo 'dezaniri ma ereta atrizu. Kalafe 'ba azo be tupi 'diyi ma e'yosi, azita e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma vuti obiza eca orodriru o'bi yi ma agei tema ni.
nyn_prompt: Oburwaire bwa korona ku burikuguma nibweyongyera,gavumenti okwetorora ensi yoona ziriyo nizitandikaho emiringo y'amaani y'okurwanisa okujanjaara kw'akakooko ka korona. Ahabw'okugira ngu omuhendo gw'abarwaire gweyongyeire, okukuratira ebiragiro by'ebyamagara n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okwerinda kw'abantu.

eng_prompt: In an effort to combat the spread of misinformation during the pandemic, authorities have implemented strict measures. As a result, those disseminating false information about the virus will face legal consequences.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okulwanyisa okusaasaana kw'amawulire amakyaamu mu kiseera ky'ekirwadde bbunansi, ab'obuyinza bataddewo enkola enkakali. N'ekinaavaamu, abo abasaasaanya amawulire ag'obulimba ku kawuka bajja kufuna ebiva mu mateeka.
ach_prompt: I tute me gengo nyayo lok goba I kare me poto pa gemo eni, lutela guketo cik matek tutwal itic. Macalo adwogi ne, joo ma cwalo lok goba i kom kwidi man binongo adwogi ne malube ki cik.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitikitik awea na akiro nuka aisab kotoma apakio kanu nuka ekorona, apotu apedorosio itolomutu ikisila luegogong. Kanuka ngun, ngul lu ekorete akiro nuka aisab nuikamunitos adeka naka ekorona epote aitelekaar kotoma okisila.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo onzi eyi ma ereta atrizu sawa azo 'dezanirisi, drice'ba eyi 'ye e'yo okporu 'diyi 'yeta ma alea. E'yo 'disi, 'ba o'duko enzoru 'diyi erepi azo 'da ma dria 'diyi nga dri fu e'yo azita palaa 'diyi be ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okurwanisa okujanjaara kw'amakuru g'ebishobobo omu bwire bw'ekigwereerezi, ab'obushoborozi bateireho enkora y'amaani. N'ekyarugiremu, abo abarikujanjaaza amakuru g'ebishuba agarikukwata aha kakooko ka muzibwe nibaija kutwarwa omu kooti.

eng_prompt: Due to the ongoing health crisis, the administration has implemented new protocols to ensure the safety of patients and staff. As a result, the hospital has limited its accessibility to only specific people.
lug_prompt: Olw'obuzibu bw'ebyobulamu obugenda mu maaso, abakulembeze bataddewo emitendera emipya okukakasa obukuumi bw'abalwadde n'abakozi. N'ekivuddemu, eddwaliro likomekkerezza abantu abatonotono okuyingira.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me yot kom matye kawot anyim, ludito tic guketo cik manyen me gwoko lutwo ki lutic. Macalo adwogi ne, ot yat tye ki dano manok keken ma twero donyo iye.
teo_prompt: Kanuka ationis naka angaleu na elosi akonye, etolomu eyaitene ainapeta nuitetiak kanu awanyun ebe eyuwara adekak keda eswamak. Kanuka ngun, mam adekis epedori adolokin itunga luipu bon.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi mupi drile ri ma e'yosi, driceza 'da 'ba azita o'diru 'diyi nezu ra kini 'ba azoru 'diyi azini azi'ba eyi ma tambaza kililiru. E'yo 'disi, arojo 'da fe lu 'ba azi 'diyi ni muzu arojo 'da ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi oburikugyenda omu maisho omu by'amagara, abarikukurira ekitongore bateire emihanda misya okurinda abarwaire n'abakozi. N'ekyarugiremu, eirwariro riine abantu bakye abarikubaasa kuhikayo.

eng_prompt: In times of difficulty, individuals often feel a strong urge to reach out to those they care about. This desire to provide assistance stems from a deep sense of empathy and connection.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera ebizibu, abantu batera okuwulira okwagala okw'amaanyi okutuuka ku abo be bafaako. Okwagala okuwa obuyambi kuva ku kusaasira okw'amaanyi n'okukwatagana.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko, dano ipol kare giwinyo miti matek tutwal me konyo joo ma gi paro pigi. Miti me miyo kony eni aa ki I cwiny me kica ki ribbe.
teo_prompt: Kapakio nuetioko, epupete itunga eipud loepol noi loka adolokin ngul lu epodokitos kesi. Ekot lo loka aijaikin agangat elomunit kama ejai aitim keda arucokina.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru ma alia, 'ba yi ma ngulupisi 'diyi sawa driasi ava okporu isu cazu 'ba yini asi 'bazu yi ma dria 'diyi vu. Leta 'bani lezu azakoma fezu 'diri enga asi ndriza azini ti ecita aliarisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, abantu nibenda kuhwera abo abubarikufaho. Ekigyendererwa ky'okuheereza obuhwezi nikuruga omu kusaasibwa n'okukwatanisa.

eng_prompt: In light of the ongoing health crisis, the hospital has implemented new visitor policies. These measures aim to ensure the safety and well-being of both patients and staff.
lug_prompt: Olw'obuzibu bw'ebyobulamu obugenda mu maaso, eddwaliro litaddewo amateeka amapya agakwata ku kukyalira abagenyi. Ebintu bino bigendererwamu okukuuma abalwadde n'abakozi.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me yot kom matye kawot anyim, ot yat okatti ki cik manyen me gwoko wele. Yub magi tye pi gwoko ber bedo pa lutwo ki lutic.
teo_prompt: Katupitos ationis naka angaleu na elosi akonye, etolomu adekis ainapeta nuitetiak nuka ipejok. Alosikinet naka iboro lu erai awanyun ebe eyuwara keda aijar naka adekak keda eswamak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi mupi drile 'diyi ma e'yosi, arojo 'da 'ba azita o'diru 'ba emu'ba omuru 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'diyi lezu nezu ra kini 'ba azoru 'diyi azini azi'ba 'diyi ma ageitema azini aa'ta muke ri ci.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara oburikugyenda omu maisho, eirwariro riteire omu nkora ebiragiro bisya by'abagyenyi. Ebiragiro ebi bigyendereire kurinda abarwaire n'abakozi.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent health concerns, the hospital has implemented strict hygiene protocols. To ensure the safety of patients and staff, adherence to these guidelines is mandatory.
lug_prompt: Olw'ebizibu by'ebyobulamu ebibaddewo gye buvuddeko, eddwaliro litadde mu nkola amateeka amakakali agakwata ku buyonjo. Okukakasa obukuumi bw'abalwadde n'abakozi, okugoberera ebiragiro bino kikakatako.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me yot kom matye cokcok-ki, ot yat oketo cik matek tutwal me gwoko lengo. Pi gwoko ber bedo pa lutwo ki lutic, lubu cik magi obedo gin ma pire tek.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuikamunitos aiyalongong naka angaleu, etolomu adekis ainapeta nuka aila. Kanu awanyun ebe eyuwara adekak keda eswamak, ibusakinit aitup aicoreta nu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma e'yosi, arojo 'da 'ba azita alata ni okporu 'diyi 'yeta ma alea. Azi'ba azini 'ba azoru 'diyi ma tambazu, le 'ba ma obi azita 'diyi ma vuti.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'embeera y'eby'amagara eriho obwahati, eirwariro riteire omu nkora engyenderwaho y'eby'obuyonjo. Okuhamya oburinzi bw'abarwaire hamwe n'abakozi, okukuratira ebiragiro ebi n'eky'omugasho.

eng_prompt: To ensure the safety and well-being of patients, it is essential to manage the flow of people within the hospital. Excessive visitors can lead to increased noise levels and potential health risks for vulnerable patients.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa obukuumi n'obulungi bw'abalwadde, kya mugaso okukwasaganya entambula y'abantu mu ddwaliro. Abagenyi abangi basobola okuleetawo amaloboozi mangi n'obulabe eri obulamu bw'abalwadde abateesobola.
ach_prompt: Pi gwoko ber bedo pa lutwo, pire tek tutwal me doro wot pa dano I ot yat. Welo ma dwong tutwal twero kelo woo madwong ki peko me yot kom pa lutwo ma goro.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe eyuwara keda aijar naka adekak, ejokuna aitikitik elose lo itunga kadekis. Epedorete ipejok luipu ayangaun acelanar naepol ka atiokisio nuka angaleu naka adekak lu ican.
lgg_prompt: Lezu 'ba azoru 'diyi ma ta mbazu, eri orodriru e'yo 'ba eyini acizu arojo eyi ma alea ri ma aza kozu. Omu eyi ma omgbo angiri ri eco fe o'duko eyi ma omgbo tuzu dika eyi eco azo fe 'ba azoru 'diyi dri ra.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu abarwaire nibatereera, n'eky'omugasho kureeberera entambura y'abantu omwirwariro. Abagyenyi baingi nibabaasa kureeta orwari rw'amaani n'akabi aha magara g'abarwaire abatarikwebaasa.

eng_prompt: In response to the rising number of COVID-19 cases in the community, health officials have been urging local institutions to take immediate action. As a result, the hospital has put forward various guidelines to combat the virus.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula omuwendo gw'abalwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe ogweyongera mu kitundu, abakungu b'ebyobulamu babadde bakubiriza ebitongole by'ebitundu okubaako kye bikola mu bwangu. N'ekivuddemu, eddwaliro litaddewo ebiragiro eby'enjawulo okulwanyisa akawuka.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel dano matye ki two korona, lutic me yot kom gubedo ka lego gangi tic mapat-pat me timo gin mo oyot-oyot. Macalo adwogi ne, ot yat okatti ki yoo mapat-pat me lweny i kom kwidi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin enaaba loka adekak luka COVID-19 kotoma atutubet, isinyikokitos eswamak luka angaleu iriongeta luka atutubet aswam katipet. Kanuka ngun, etolomu adekis aicoreta nuegelegela kanu aitikitik adeka.
lgg_prompt: E'yo kalafe COVID-19 niri ni tuzu ongulumu eyi ma alea risi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ebi amuti eyi ai e'yo 'yezu mbeleru. E'yo 'disi, arojo 'da e'do azita ndundu eyi a'di 'dizu azo korona niri be.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omuhendo gw'abarwaire ba COVID-19 ogweyongyeire omu bantu, abakuru omu by'amagara batwire nibashaba ebitongore by'omubyaro kukora ahonaaho. N'ekyarugiremu, eirwariro riteireho engyenderwaho nyingi z'okurwanisa akakooko.

eng_prompt: In order to maintain safety and hygiene standards within the hospital, strict policies have been implemented regarding food delivery. As a result, all food must be provided through the designated hospital services.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukuuma omutindo gw'obukuumi n'obuyonjo mu ddwaliro, amateeka amakakali gateekeddwawo ku bikwata ku kugaba emmere. N'ekivuddemu, emmere yonna erina okuweebwa okuyita mu bitongole by'eddwaliro ebyateekebwawo.
ach_prompt: Me gwoko lengo ki ber bedo I ot yat, kiketo cik matek tutwal I kom poko cam. Macalo adwogi ne, cam weng omyero ki mi ki ot yat ma kicimo.
teo_prompt: Kanu aidar adoketait na ayuara ka aila kadekis, aponi ibwaikinai ainapeta nuikamunitos aikor inyamat. Kanuka ngun, ekot inyamat kere aijanakin kotoma adekisia nu eseunitai.
lgg_prompt: Azita okporu 'diyi 'ba e'yo nyaka awaza ma dria arojo 'da ma alea eyini ani ecozu e'yo rua ala ni 'diyi ma tambazu. E'yo 'disi, le 'ba ma awa nyaka dria geri arojo ni 'diyi vusi.
nyn_prompt: Okugumizamu n'omutindo gw'eby'okwerinda n'eby'obuyonjo omwirwariro, ebiragiro by'amaani biteirwe omu nkora ebirikukwata aha kuheereza abantu eby'okurya. N'ekyarugiremu, eby'okurya byona bishemereire kuheebwa kurabira omu marwariro agateirweho.

eng_prompt: In response to the rising number of infectious disease cases, the government held an emergency meeting to discuss public health measures. As a result, the ministry of health directed all hospitals to restrict the entry of people.
lug_prompt: Olw'omuwendo gw'abalwadde b'endwadde ezisiigibwa ogweyongera, gavumenti yatuuza olukiiko olw'amangu okuteesa ku ngeri y'okukuumamu obulamu bw'abantu. N'ekyavaamu, minisitule y'ebyobulamu yalagira amalwaliro gonna okukugira abantu okuyingira.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel dano matye ki two ma kobo oyot, gamente obedo ki kacoke ma opoto atura me nywako tam i kom yoo me gwoko yot kom pa lwak. Macalo adwogi ne, jang gamente ma loyo lok kom yoto kom ociko odi yadi weng me gengo donyo pa dano.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin enaaba loka adekasinei nu ikopas, abu apugan ingalau airiamun na engeso kanu aitemitem nuka angaleu naka itunga. Kanuka ngun abu erionget loka angaleu icorak adekisia kere aitikitik alomar naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo kalafe tupi 'ba azo otipi 'diyi be 'diyi ma e'yosi, gamete 'ye mitingi mbeleru e'yo nzezu geri alata o'bi eyini 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, okalamvu alataniri fe azita arojo dria yi dri 'ba yini efizu 'diyi atrizu ci.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omuhendo gw'abarwaire b'endwara ezirikuturira ogweyongyeire,gavumenti ekakora orukiiko rw'amaani kuhanuura ahaby'amagara g'abantu. N'ekyarugiremu, minisiture y'eby'amagara ekaragiira amarwariro goona okuzibira abantu kutaahamu.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent outbreak, health officials were increasingly concerned about the spread of the infection. To address this urgent issue, the ministry wanted to prevent hospitals from harbouring the disease.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kubalukawo kw'ekirwadde gye buvuddeko, abakungu b'ebyobulamu beeyongera okweraliikirira ku kusaasaana kw'obulwadde. Okusobola okukola ku nsonga eno ey'amangu, minisitule yali eyagala okutangira amalwaliro okukyaza ekirwadde.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki poto pa two ma okato cokcok-ki, lutic me yot-kom gubedo ki lworo madit tutwal I kom nya pa two eni. Me tyeko peko man ma opoto atura, gangkal ne obedo ki miti me gengo odi yadi me gwoko two eni.
teo_prompt: Katupitos abwangun naka adeka naka ekorona, apotu eswamak luka angaleu kopodokisi aiyalongong kanu awea naka adeka. Kanu aitemokin ationis na naepol noi, akoto erionget aitikitik adekisia kotoma aidar adeka.
lgg_prompt: E'yo efupi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ovu asi otiza be e'yo azo 'da ma ereta ma dria. E'yo mbeleru 'di ma aza kozu, okalamvu le ndra arojo eyi atri azo 'da ma tambaza si.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okubarukaho kw'oburwaire obwahwireho, abakuru omu by'amagara bakaba beerarikirire okujanjaara kw'oburwaire. Okukora aha nshonga egi, minisiture ekaba neeyenda kuzibira amarwariro okurinda oburwaire.

eng_prompt: The surge in patients due to the recent outbreak has overwhelmed the healthcare system. As a result, all hospitals are struggling to manage the increasing demand for medical care.
lug_prompt: Omuwendo gw'abalwadde ogweyongedde olw'okubalukawo kw'ekirwadde gyebuvuddeko awo guzitooweredde ekitongole ky'ebyobulamu. N'ekivuddemu, amalwaliro gonna galwana okukwasaganya obwetaavu bw'obujjanjabi obweyongera.
ach_prompt: Medde pa wel lutwo pi poto pa two ma okato cokcok-ki obalo yub me yot kom. Macalo adwogi ne, odi yadi weng tye ka yele me cobo miti me nongo kony me yot kom matye kamede.
teo_prompt: Apol naka adekak kanuka abwangun naka adeka naka ekorona nes epuga noi nuka amukian. Kanuka ngun, eutasi adekisia kere ainingosit aitikitik eipuda lo eyatakin lo amukian.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba azoru 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu e'yo azo efupi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi ri fe e'yo arojo ni 'diyi ma omgbo ni tu ra. E'yo 'disi, arojo dria eyi dri ci e'yo 'ba eyini lezu aro esuzu ri ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Omuhendo gw'abarwaire ogweyongyeire ahabw'okubarukaho kw'oburwaire obwahati, gukozire eby'amagara maingi. N'ekyarugiremu, amarwariro goona nigarwana kurwanisa oburemeezi bw'abantu abarikwenda obujanjabi obweyongyeire.

eng_prompt: Due to a significant increase in patient volume and limited resources, the healthcare system is undergoing major changes. As a result, the hospitals will no longer provide health services for simple illnesses.
lug_prompt: Olw'omuwendo gw'abalwadde ogweyongera ennyo n'ebikozesebwa ebitono, ebyobulamu bigenda mu maaso n'enkyukakyuka ennene. N'ekyavaamu amalwaliro tegajja kuddamu kuwa bujjanjabi ku ndwadde ennyangu.
ach_prompt: Pi wel lutwo matye kamede tutwal ki jami ma nok, yub me yot kom tye ka kato ki I alokaloka madit tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, odi yadi pe dong gubi miyo kony me yot kom pi two matino tino.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aiyatakino na adekak keda ikapun lu ikidioko, ejai aijulanakineta nuipu noi toma aiboisio nuka amukian. Kanuka ngun, mam bobo adekisia epedorete aijanakin nuka adekasinei nuepataka.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba azoru 'diyi ma kalafe ni tuzu tu azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma kalafe ni ovuzu weresi risi, geri e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi curu'do ojata amboru isu. E'yo 'disi, arojo eyi ngani asi azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi fe azo ewakokoru 'diyisi ku.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omuhendo gw'abarwaire ogweyongyeire hamwe n'oburemeezi bw'eby'obugaiga, enkora y'eby'amagara eriyo neehinduka munonga. N'ekyarugiremu, amarwariro tigarikwija kugaruka kuheereza obuheereza aha ndwara nkye.

eng_prompt: In order to manage the increasing number of admissions, the hospital has implemented a new protocol for patient discharges. This strategy focuses on optimizing bed availability and ensuring timely care for those in need.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okuddukanya omuwendo gw'abalwadde ogweyongera mu malwaliro, eddwaliro litaddewo enkola empya ey'okusiibulwa kw'abalwadde. Enteekateeka eno essira eritadde ku kwongera ku bungi bw'ebitanda n'okulaba nti abo abali mu bwetaavu bajjanjabibwa mu budde.
ach_prompt: Me tic i kom wel lutwo matye kadonyo I ot yat, ot yat okatti ki yoo manyen me tic I kom lutwo ma ki kwanyo gi ki I ot yat. Yub man keto cwinygi tutwalle I kom medo rwom me kabutu pa lutwo ki gwoko lutwo ikare ki kome.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitikitik enaaba loka adekak lu iperikinitai adekis, etolomu adekis ainapeta nuitetiak nuka alacakin adekak adekis. Itereikit ainapeta ngun aitojokar ajaut naka itadan ka awanyun ebe eponio aidar lu ican.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'bani 'ba azoru 'diyi 'bazu arojoa ri ma aza kozu, arojo 'da 'ba azita o'diru 'bani 'ba azoru 'diyi ofuzu arojoa 'diyi ma dria. Otita 'di 'ba asi kitanda eyi ma esuta ma omgbo otuzu azini 'ba azakoma lepi 'diyi ma tambazu sa'wa dria.
nyn_prompt: Okubaasa kurwanisa omuhendo gw'abarwaire ogweyongyeire, eirwariro riteire omu nkora engyenderwaho nsya y'okusiibura abarwaire. Enteekateeka egi neeta amaani omu kutunguura obuheereza bw'ebitanda n'okureeba ngu abo abarikwetenga obuhwezi nibatunga obuhwezi bukiri kare.

eng_prompt: In a desperate attempt to escape the oppressive conditions within the walls, a group of inmates devised a risky plan. As the night fell, tensions rose, and the stakes became deadly.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okudduka embeera ezinyigiriza munda mu bisenge, ekibinja ky'abasibe kyakola enteekateeka ey'obulabe. Ekiro bwe kyagenda kiyitawo, obunkenke ne bweyongera era n'ebikondo ne bifuuka eby'obulabe.
ach_prompt: I temo matek tutwal me lwi ki I kwo matek tutwal matye I kor cel, dul pa mabuc mogo guyubu pulan marac tutwal. Ikare ma piny odoko col, lworo omedde, ki lyeto bene odoko rac tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aitam aisiyengun kotoma ojautene loetiono noi kotoma arwatat, abu egurupu loka iwenan kitolom ainapeta nuarokok. Neadolunia akware, apotu ingungeta kiyatakinos, ido apotu atutubena ngun kopedosi aiyar itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo lezu e'yo ewaru angu 'da ma alea 'diyi apazu ri ma alea, ongulumu aru ru 'diyi e'do otuta azi onzi ni. Ini ni ecaria, asi otiza tu uru, azini pati eyi eca 'ba eyi o'dipi 'diyi ru.
nyn_prompt: Omu kugyezaho munonga okutoroka omu mbeera mbi, guruupu y'abasibe ekakora enteekateeka y'akabi. Obwire ku bwabaire nibugyenda nibugwa, obunkenke bukaba nibweyongyera, kandi emiti ekaba n'ey'akabi munonga.

eng_prompt: After a violent disturbance at the state prison, several inmates managed to break free during the chaos. Authorities quickly apprehended a few, but the manhunt continues for the remaining escapees.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'obutabanguko mu kkomera ly'eggwanga, abasibe abawerako baasobola okutoloka mu kavuyo. Ab'obuyinza banguwa okukwata abatonotono, naye omuyiggo gugenda mu maaso ku batoloka abasigaddewo.
ach_prompt: Inge lweny ma obedo tye I gang buc pa gamente, mabuc mapol gulwi I kare me kuku kuku enoni. Luloc omako jo manok oyot, ento lutim aranyi ma odong pwod tye ka yenyo gi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka amumu kotoma ojera loka apugan, apotu iwenan luipu kopedosi alakun kotoma amumu kangin. Apotu apedorosio kikamasi icetunga katipet, konye inyikokinitai ameja naka ngul luapotu kosiata.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni ma vutia arujo kari niri ma alea, aru karakara eyi apa eyi sa'wa ngiringiri nirisi ra. Okpo e'ipi eyi obi 'ba azi eyi mbeleru, te 'ba azi apapi 'bo 'diyi ma dori ni mu drile.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'akaimukiriro aha kihome ky'eihanga, abasibe baingi bakatoroka omu kavuyo. Ab'obushoborozi bakahonaaho kukwata bakye, kwonka okuhiiga abasigaire nikugyenda omu maisho.

eng_prompt: Despite numerous reports of potential escape attempts, the warden insisted that the current measures were sufficient. However, many staff members began to notice signs of negligence in the daily routines.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde waaliwo alipoota nnyingi eziraga nti waliwo abantu abaali bagezaako okutoloka, omukuumi w'ekkomera yakikkaatiriza nti enkola eziriwo kati zimala. Newankubadde, abakozi bangi baatandika okwetegereza obubonero bw'obulagajjavu mu mirimu gyabwe egya buli lunaku.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni adwogi tic mapol tye i kom jo ma otemo ngwec, lador ot moko cik owaco ni jami ma gitye katimo kombedi tye ma oromo. Kadi bed kumeno, lutic mapol gucako neno lanyut me goro I ticgi me nino ducu.
teo_prompt: Karaida ipu iripotan luka itunga luekotosi akerit, abu edaran kitogogong ebe edolitos iwaitin lu ejaas kwape kwana. Konye, apotu eswamak luipu kogeutu asesen ijenuneta luka apalunit aswamisio nuka nginiparan.
lgg_prompt: O'duko karakara yini lezu apazu 'diyi ma talasi, agu angu ma ta mbapiri si asi kini e'yo 'bani 'ye sawa 'disi 'diyi ca ra. Kani si, azi'ba karakara eyi e'do e'da eceta e'yo eyi 'yepi o'du driasi 'diyi ma alea ku 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho ripoota nyingi ezirikworeka ngu abantu babaire nibagyezaho kutoroka, omukuumi akagira ngu enkora eriho obwahati ekaba neekumara. Kwonka abakozi baingi bakatandika kureeba obubonero bw'okunagaijura omu mirimo yaabo eya buriizooba.

eng_prompt: As the pandemic spread rapidly, fear and anxiety gripped the prison population. Many inmates began to discuss their desperate desire to escape the confines of their cells to avoid the looming threat of the virus.
lug_prompt: Ekirwadde bwe kyeyongera okusaasaana, abantu bangi mu makomera baatandika okweraliikirira. Abasibe bangi baatandika okwogera ku ky'okuba nti baagala nnyo okuva mu kaduukulu kaabwe okwewala akabi akali mu kukwatibwa akawuka.
ach_prompt: I kare ma two korona omede ki nya oyot, lworo ki lworo omako mabuc mapol. Lumabuc mapol gucako lok I kom miti gi matek tutwal me weko bucgi wek pe gubed ki lworo me nongo two corona.
teo_prompt: Neautar adeka naka ekorona aisiarakin katipet, abu akuriau keda aiyalongong kodum itunga luka iwenan. Apotu iwenan luipu kogeutu einer nuikamunitos eipudakec loepol noi loka anyoun kotogokec kanu aisac aitukurianeta nuka adeka naka ekorona.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo 'dezaniri ni i erezu mbeleru, ori azini asi otiza bi 'ba arujoa 'diyi. Ba aru ru karakara 'diyi e'do e'yo nze e'yo eyini le saaru apazu engazu arujo eyivile 'diyi ma alea ri ma dria e'yo ewaru azo korona niri ma e'yosi ri atrizu.
nyn_prompt: Oburwaire ku bwabaire nibujanjaara juba, okutiina n'okwerarikirira bikakwata abantu b'omu bihome. Abasibe baingi bakatandika kugamba aha kyetengo kyabo ky'okuruga omu kihome, okwetantara akabi k'akakooko ka muzibwe.

eng_prompt: After the recent escape from the maximum-security facility, authorities are on high alert. They have deployed additional resources to track down the fugitives.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okutoloka mu kkomera erikuumibwa ennyo gyebuvuddeko awo, ab'obuyinza bali ku bunkenke. Bataddewo ebikozesebwa ebirala okunoonya abadduka.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngwec ma otime cokcok-ki ki I gang buc ma ki gwoko maber tutwal, lutela tye atera tutwal. Guketo jami mukene me yenyo jo ma guringo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aisiyengun kotoma aiboisit naidarere ayuwara naepol noi, ekapakina apedorosio noi. Aponi ibwaikinai iboro luipu kanu aimo lu ekerete.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani apapi arujo ageitema okporu 'da ma alea ri ma vutia, drice'ba eyi mile be saaru. Ba o'ba afa azi eyi dika 'ba apapi 'diyi ma vuti obizu.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okutoroka kuruga omu kihome ky'eby'okwerinda eby'amaani, ab'obushoborozi beeteekateekire munonga. Bayongyeireho eby'okukoresa okurondoora abahungi.

eng_prompt: Reports have emerged detailing the alarming state of the correctional facilities. Many inmates are struggling to survive amidst inadequate resources and neglect.
lug_prompt: Lipoota zifulumye nga ziraga embeera embi eri mu makomera. Abasibe bangi balwana okwebeezaawo wakati mu bintu ebitono n'okulagajjalirwa.
ach_prompt: Adwogi tic mapat-pat okatti ma nyutu kit ma gangi buc tye kwede. Lumabuc mapol tye ka tute matek me kwo kadi bed ni jami ma mite nok dok bene ki cayo gi.
teo_prompt: Aponi kitolomunai iripotan luitodunitos ejautene loaronon loka aiboisio nu isibei. Iwenan luipu eutasi ationis aijar naarai ikidioko iboro lu itwasamao ka apalunit.
lgg_prompt: O'duko efu e'yo angu arujo eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma wura onzi 'diyi ma dria. Aru'ba karakara eyi dri ci aa'zu edriru afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma ako azini adi ma talasi.
nyn_prompt: Hariho ripoota ezirikworeka oburemeezi oburi omu bihome. Abasibe baingi nibarwana kubaho ahabw'ebintu ebitarikumara hamwe n'okunagaijura.

eng_prompt: The atmosphere in the facility had become increasingly tense as the days dragged on. Many inmates felt their voices were ignored and their needs unmet.
lug_prompt: Embeera mu kkomera yeeyongera okuba ey'obunkenke ng'ennaku zigenda ziyitawo. Abasibe bangi baawulira nti amaloboozi gaabwe gaali tegawulirwa era nga n'ebyetaago byabwe tebituukiddwaako.
ach_prompt: Kwo I ot yat ne omede ki bedo tek tutwal I kare ma nino tye ka kato anyim. Lumabuc mapol giwinyo calo dwon gi pe ki winyo dok pe ki cobo miti gi.
teo_prompt: Apolor noi aiyalongong kotoma aiboisit kangin. Apotu iwenan luipu kowomitos ebe mam epupokino akiro kec ido mam itodolikinitai ipudesia kec.
lgg_prompt: Angu arojo 'da ma alea ri eca ndra asi otiza ru o'du driasi. Ba aru ru karakara 'diyi ega kini 'ba 'ba asi o'duko yini 'diyi ma dria ku dika 'ba 'duni afa yini lele 'diyi ku.
nyn_prompt: Embeera omu eirwariro ekaba eyeyongyeire kuba ey'obunkenke nk'oku eizooba ryabaire nirigyenda omu maisho. Abasibe abaingi bakaba nibateekateeka ngu eiraka ryabo tiririkuhurirwa kandi ebyetengo byabo tibirikuhikiirizibwa.

eng_prompt: As the days turned into weeks, the overcrowded cells became a suffocating nightmare. Desperation grew among the inmates as they faced the harsh reality of their confinement.
lug_prompt: Ennaku bwe zaagenda zifuuka wiiki, ebisenge ebyali bijjudde abantu byafuuka bizibu nnyo. Okuggwaamu essuubi kweyongera mu basibe bwe baayolekaganye n'embeera embi ey'okusibibwa kwabwe.
ach_prompt: I kare ma nino odoko cabit, ot buc ma opong tutwal-li odoko peko madit tutwal. Lworo omedde ikin lumabuc ikare ma gunongo peko me bedo I buc.
teo_prompt: Kwape apotu aparasia kijulakinos isabitin, apotu iculi lueleleba keda itunga koraunutu ationis naepol noi. Apotu iwenan kibiroros noi nawanyunia kesi ejautene loaronon loka aiwen kec.
lgg_prompt: O'du yini ecazu sabiti ru 'boria, arujo 'da eyi ma alea 'ba eyi ma omgbo ni tu ri eca e'yo onzi 'dileni ru. Asi otiza zo aru 'da eyi ma eselea eyini aa'ria e'yo ewaru eyini aa'zu arujoa 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Eizooba ku ryahindukire esande, ebihome ebyabaire birimu abantu baingi bikahinduka ekirooto kibi munonga. Okwerarikirira kweyongyeire omu basibe, obu bareebire oburemeezi bw'okukomwa kwabo.

eng_prompt: As the chaos unfolded and the guards were distracted, the escapees made their move. They dashed toward the exit, knowing their only hope lay in the shadows of their loyal supporter.
lug_prompt: Obwegugungo bwe bwagenda bweyongera era abakuumi ne bawugulibwa, abadduka baakola ekkubo lyabwe. Baafubutuka nga boolekedde okufuluma, nga bakimanyi nti essuubi lyabwe lyokka lyali mu kisiikirize ky'omuwagizi waabwe omwesigwa.
ach_prompt: I kare ma kuku-kuku obedo tye dok lukur-piny onongo gitye ki tam mapat-pat, luring ayela ne gutimo gin ma omyero gutim. Gu ngweco me cito woko, kun gingeyo ni gen gi tye I tipo pa lucwakgi ma lugen.
teo_prompt: Neautar amumu ajaun kosodete isilikalei aisiyengun, apotu luakokwaros kiswamata nuepedorete kesi aswam. Apotu kesi kokerata alosit okek, ejenete ebe amuno kec bon ejai toma aingadisia nuka egangitokokec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri niri ni ecaria dika 'ba ageitema ni 'diyi ma asi fu, 'ba apa'ba 'diyi 'ye e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi. Eyi ari mu angu fuzuria, eyini nii ra kini eyi ma asi'baza lu 'ba eyi atipi asi'baza be 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Obwimukiriro ku bwabaire nibweyongyera kandi abakuumi nibaburwa amaani, abatorokire bakakora ekirikubaasika. Bakahunga barikuza aha muryango, barikumanya ngu amatsiko gaabo gakaba gari omu bicuucu by'omushagiki waabo omwesigwa.

eng_prompt: In light of recent developments regarding prison reform, the government issued a series of directives aimed at improving conditions and rehabilitation efforts. As a result, the Uganda prison service heed to the presidential directives.
lug_prompt: Olw'enkulaakulana eyaliwo gye buvuddeko ku bikwata ku nnongoosereza mu makomera, gavumenti yafulumya ebiragiro eby'enjawulo ebigendereddwamu okutumbula embeera n'okuzza obuggya. N'ekyavaamu, ekitongole ky'amakomera mu Uganda kyassaayo omwoyo ku biragiro bya pulezidenti.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki ma lubbe ki kelo aloka-loka I buc, gamente okatti ki cik mapol ma tye ki miti me yubu kwo pa mabuc kacel ki yub me roco mabuc. Macalo adwogi ne, dul me Uganda Prison Service owinyo lok pa ladit lobo.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuapotu kotakanutu kopana kanu aijulakin iwenan, abu apugan kitolomu aicoreta nuepedorete aitojokar ejautene loka iwenan keda aisiteteun kesi. Kanuka ngun abu Erionget Loka Iwenan kotup aicoreta nuka lokapolon akwap.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu ezoma o'diru arujo eyi ma alea ri ma e'yosi, gamete fe azita karakara eyi geri arujo eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu tualu okpo 'bani eyi edezu o'diru ri pie. E'yo 'disi, azi'ba arujo eyini kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi obi azita purezidenti ni 'diyi ma vuti.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'entunguuka eyabaireho ebiro ebi, gavumenti ekataho ebiragiro ebirikugyenderera okutunguura emituurire y'ebihome hamwe n'okubihunduuza. N'ekyarugiremu,ekitongore ky'ebihome omu Uganda kikahurikiza ebiragiro by'omwebembezi w'eihanga.

eng_prompt: Given the increasing challenges in maintaining safety and order within correctional facilities, it is essential to assess the current staffing levels. A thorough evaluation of the security needs reveals a significant gap in personnel.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kusoomoozebwa okweyongera mu kukuuma obukuumi n'obutebenkevu mu makomera, kya mugaso okwekenneenya omuwendo gw'abakozi oguliwo kati. Okwekenenya obulungi ebyetaago by'ebyokwerinda kulaga ekituli ekinene mu bakozi.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko matye kamedde I gwoko ber bedo ki ber bedo I gangi buc, pire tek tutwal me neno rwom pa lutic matye kombedi. Kwed matut I kom jami ma mite pi gwoko kuc nyutu apoka-poka madit I kin lutic.
teo_prompt: Koipone kalo aiyatakin ainingosia nuka aidar ayuwara keda ainapakina kotoma aiboisio nu isibei, ejokuna aanyanar adoketait naka eswamak. Aingic ejok ipudesia luka ayuwara itodunit ebe ejai ekadakada loepol noi loka eswamak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru angu arujo eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma tambazu ri ma omgbo ni tutu risi, eri orodriru 'ba arujo eyi ma alea 'diyi ma kalafe ma ale andrizu. E'yo 'bani angu agei tema ni 'diyi ma ale andrizu kililiru ri ece e'yo 'ba azi ngapi 'diyi ma esele coza ni.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi obweyongyeire omu kurinda obusingye n'obutereera omu bihome, ni kikuru kushwijuma omuhendo gw'abakozi abariho hati. Okushwijuma gye ebyetaago by'eby'okwerinda nikyoreka eibura ry'amaani omu bakozi.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent challenges faced by the community, various groups have mobilized to provide assistance. Among these, Christian-based organizations have stepped in to offer their support to the district.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okusoomoozebwa abantu kwe basanga gyebuvuddeko, ebibiina eby'enjawulo bikungaanye okuwa obuyambi. Mu bino, ebitongole by'abakrisitaayo biyingiddewo okuwa obuyambi bwaabyo eri disitulikiti.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko ma lwak tye kanongo cokcok-ki, dul mapat-pat guribbe me miyo kony. I kingi, dul mapat-pat ma jenge I kom lucristayo gukati me miyo kony gi bot district.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu ejaas itunga, atukokinos igurupun luegelegela kanu aijaikin agangat. Kotoma ngul, alomutu iriongeta lu ikurisitayon kanu aigang edisitrikt.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ongulumu eyini esu eturisi 'diyi ma aza kozu, amuti ndundu eyi tra eyi azakoma fezu. Eyi ma eselea, amuti Kristayo ru 'diyi fi atita eyini fezu distrikiti 'da ni.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi obu abantu batungire, guruupu nyingi zitandikire kuhayo obuhwezi. Omuri ebi, ebitongore by'abakurisitaayo, bitaireho obuhwezi bwabyo aha disiturikiti.

eng_prompt: In response to the ongoing health crisis, local charities have been mobilizing resources to support vulnerable communities. One such initiative focused on improving hygiene practices in orphanages throughout the region.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ekizibu ky'ebyobulamu ekigenda mu maaso, ebibiina by'obwannakyewa bibadde bikungaanya eby'obugagga okuyamba abantu abateesobola. Ekimu ku bintu ebyakolebwa kwe kutumbula eby'obuyonjo mu bifo ewakuumirwa bamulekwa mu kitundu kyonna.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko me yot kom matye kawot anyim, dule ma konyo lupeko gubedo ka rayo lim me konyo lwak ma peko tye i komgi. Yub acel ma kit meno obedo me ilo malo rwom me lengo I gangi pa lutino kic I but lobo man weng.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ationis naka angaleu na elosi akonye, etukonokinos iriongeta lu ingaranakinete itunga lu ican. Adiopebon kwape kangin apodokinit aitojokar aiboisio nuka aiboisio nu idarere ikokiok katutubet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi mupi drile 'diyi ma aza kozu, amuti azakoma fepi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ebi afa ayuzaru 'diyi tra ongulumu e'yo ewaru ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu. E'yo azi alu 'dile ri 'ba asi alata ma omgbo otuzu aku emvuanzi eyi ma tambazu 'diyi ma alea angu 'di ma alea ndulu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara oburikugyenda omu maisho, ebitongore by'obuhwezi by'omubyaro bitandikire kurundaana ebintu by'okuhwera abantu abatarikwebaasa. Enteekateeka emwe nk'egyo ekaba eri ey'okutunguura eby'obuyonjo omu maka g'efuuzi omu kicweka kyona.

eng_prompt: As the community gathered for the emergency meeting, concerns about the rising infection rates filled the room. The health officer took the podium, addressing the anxious crowd with a sense of urgency.
lug_prompt: Abantu bwe baakuŋŋaanira mu lukiiko olw'amangu, okweraliikirira olw'omuwendo gw'abakwatibwa obulwadde okweyongera kwajjula ekisenge. Omukungu w'ebyobulamu yalinnye ku kituuti n'ayogera eri abantu abaali beeraliikirivu.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma lwak gugure pi kacokke ma opoto atura, lworo I kom medde pa two opong I ot. Latic me yot kom ocito iwi kom, oloko ki lwak ma onongo gitye ki lworo matek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Neautar itunga atukonokin kanuka airiamunet na engeso, apotu aiyalongongo kanu aiyatakin naka adekasinei kilelebunos. Abu eswaman loka angaleu kojaikin toma oicolong, abu kiner keda itunga luejaasi keda aiyalongong.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu eyini trazu mitingi e'yo mbeleru 'da ma alea risi, asi otiza e'yo azo eyi ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma dria ri ga angu 'da ma alea tre. Azi'ba alatani 'da tu podium dria, erini e'yo nzezu o'bi asi otiza be 'diyi pie e'yo azi mbeleru si.
nyn_prompt: Abantu ku barikuteeranira hamwe omu rukiiko rw'amaani, okwerarikirira ahabw'oburwaire obweyongyeire kweijuza ekishengye. Orikukurira eby'amagara, akaza aha mukoro, yaagamba abantu abaabaire beerarikirire.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent health concerns, the local government has prioritized public hygiene measures. As part of this initiative, the municipal council has ensured that hand washing terminals are all over the place.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira kw'ebyobulamu okwakaggwa, gavumenti y'ebitundu ekulembedde enkola z'obuyonjo mu bantu. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, akakiiko ka munisipaali kaakakasizza nti ebifo eby'okunaabiramu engalo biri buli wamu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko me yot kom matye cokcok-ki, gamente me tedero oketo cwinygi tutwalle I kom gwoko lengo pa lwak. Macalo but yub man, municipality council otyeko neno ni kabedo me lwoko cing tye kaweng.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuka angaleu, abu apugan naka atutubet isingarenit nuka aila. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, abu ekansulo loka emunisipaliti koany ebe ejai aiboisio nu ilosere akanin aiboisio kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma aza kozu, gamete angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri 'ba e'yo alata ni o'bi eyi ma eselea ri okporu. Otita 'di ma azi ru, kanisulu munisipaliti niri ne ra kini pari dri ojizu 'diyi angu 'da ma alea dria.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti y'ebyaro, ahabw'enshonga z'eby'amagara, eteire amaani omu by'obuyonjo bw'abantu. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi,akakiiko ka munisiparite kareebire ngu emyanya y'okunaabiramu engaro eri buri hamwe.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent surge in virus cases, the health authorities have recommended immediate safety measures. As a result, the market management has been directed to display sanitizers to control the virus.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kweyongera kw'abalwadde b'akawuka gyebuvuddeko, ab'ebyobulamu bawadde amagezi ku ngeri y'okwekuumamu mu bwangu. N'ekyavaamu, abaddukanya akatale balagiddwa okwanika sanitayiza okusobola okutangira akawuka.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki medde pa wel dano matye ki two eni, lutic yoto kom guwaco ni omyero ki tii ki yoo mapat-pat me gwokke ki two eni. Macalo adwogi ne, ludito me cuk ki lego gi me nyuto sanitizer me gengo nyayo two eni.
teo_prompt: Katupitos aiyatakinio naka adekasinei nuka ekorona, apotu apedorosio nuka angaleu icorakisi itunga aitikitik adekasinei. Kanuka ngun, ecorakin eyaitene lo esokoni aibwaikin esaninitaiza kanu aitikitik ekorona.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba azo be 'diyi ma kalafe tuzu o'diru ri ma e'yosi, drice'ba alata ni 'diyi fe imbata geri 'bani ecozu eyi ma ta mbazu mbeleru 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba fe driceza cuu niri ni azita afa 'bani 'ba eyi ma rua o'dizu 'diyi 'bazu angu ndundu eyi ma alea azo korona niri ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'abarwaire b'akakooko ka muzibwe, ab'ebitongore by'ebyamagara bahabwiire ngu habeho eby'okwerinda ahonaaho. N'ekyarugiremu, abarikukurira akatare, baragiirwe kworeka sanitaiza kwenda kurwanisa akakooko.

eng_prompt: In response to the rapidly spreading virus, health officials launched a public awareness campaign. They emphasized the importance of personal hygiene and preventive measures to protect the community.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okusaasaana kw'akawuka, abakungu b'ebyobulamu baatandikawo kaweefube w'okumanyisa abantu. Baassa essira ku bukulu bw'obuyonjo bw'omuntu n'enkola z'okwetangira okukuuma ekitundu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me nyaa pa two corona, lutic me yot kom gucako yub me rweyo lwak. Guketo cwiny gi i kom ber pa gwoko lengo ki gengo nyayo two i kom dano pi gwoko lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin awea na ekorona, apotu eswamak luka angaleu kogeutu aisisianakin itunga. Apotu kesi kitogogongoto ajokis naka aila ka aitikitik adekasinei kanu ayuarite itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo korona niri ma ereta okposi ri ma e'yosi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi e'do otita imbata fezu o'bi eyidri. Eyi 'ba okpo orodri alata ma dria tualu geri 'bani ecozu e'yo eyi atrizu 'diyi pie ongulumu eyi ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburwaire obweyongyeire kujanjaara juba, ab'ebyamagara batandikireho ehururu y'okumanyisa abantu. Bakashoboorora omugasho gw'obuyonjo hamwe n'ebindi ebirikubaasa kurinda abantu.

eng_prompt: In response to rising health concerns and the need for improved sanitation, community leaders have been advocating for better hygiene practices. As a result, local organisations are increasing the number of handwashing terminals in the area.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira kw'ebyobulamu okweyongera n'obwetaavu bw'okwongera ku buyonjo, abakulembeze b'ekitundu babadde balwanirira enkola z'obuyonjo ennungi. N'ekivuddemu, ebitongole by'omu kitundu byongera ku bungi bw'ebifo we banaabira engalo mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me yot kom matye kamede ki miti me gwoko lengo, lutela me kabedo mapatpat gubedo ka cuku cwiny dano me gwoko lengo. Macalo adwogi ne, dul mapat-pat me tedero tye ka medo kabedo me lwoko cing I kabedo eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongongo naka angaleu keda eipuda lo aiyatakin aila, eutasi engarenok luka atutubet aitigogong nuka aila. Kanuka ngun, iyatakitos iriongeta luka atutubet aiboisio nu ilosere akanin katutubet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo rua ala ma dria tupi tu 'diyi ma aza kozu azini lezu alata ma omgbo otuzu, drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi ebi a'di 'di 'yeta alata ni muke 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, amuti angu 'da ma alea 'diyi angu dri ojizu 'diyi ma kalafe otu angu 'da ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Abeebembezi b'ebyanga babaire nibarwanirira enkora nungi y'eby'obuyonjo ahabw'enshonga z'eby'amagara hamwe n'ekyetengo ky'obwegyendesereza. N'ekyarugiremu,ebitongore by'ebyaro nibyongyera aha myanya y'okunaabiramu engaro omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: Health officials have been monitoring the spread of the virus in neighboring areas. It is crucial for the community to take proactive measures to protect themselves.
lug_prompt: Ab'ebyobulamu babadde balondoola okusaasaana kw'akawuka mu bitundu ebiriraanyeewo. Kya mugaso nnyo eri ekitundu okubaako kye kikola okwekuuma.
ach_prompt: Lutic yoto kom gubedo ka neno kit ma two ne tye ka nya kwede ikabedo ma orumuwa. Pire tek tutwal ki lwak me timo jami weng ma twere me gwokke.
teo_prompt: Angicete eswamak lu adekis awea na ekorona kaiboisio nu idunyare. Erai ibore yenepol noi itunga aswam kagogongu kanu ayuwar awate kec.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ebi e'yo azo korona niri ma ereta angu jo ejele ru 'diyi ma alea ri ma pamvu one. Eri orodriru ongulumu eyini e'yo eyi 'yezu eyi ma ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: Ab'ebyamagara batwire nibarondoora okujanjaara kw'akakooko omu myanya eyetorwaire. N'eky'omugasho munonga abantu kukora kyona ekirikubaasika okwerinda.

eng_prompt: In response to recent concerns about safety and security, the local authorities have decided to take action. They have called for a collaborative effort between market management and the community to address these issues effectively.
lug_prompt: Olw'okweraliikirira okwaliwo gye buvuddeko ku bikwata ku bukuumi n'obutebenkevu, ab'obuyinza mu byalo basazeewo okubaako kye bakolawo. Basabye wabeewo enkolagana wakati w'abaddukanya akatale n'abantu b'omu kitundu okusobola okukola ku nsonga zino obulungi.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo ma obedo tye cokcok-ki I kom gwoko kuc ki ber bedo, lutela me tedero gumoko tamgi me timo gin mo. Gu lego ni lutic me cuk omyero gutii kacelo ki lwak me cobo peko eni maber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongong naka ayuwara keda ayuwara, aseutu apedorosio nuka atutubet aswam nuiswama. Apotu kesi ilipata aimorikikina kiding eyaitene lo esokoni keda itunga aitemokin akiro nu ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza o'diru e'yo ageitema ni 'diyi ma dria, drice'ba angu ma alia 'diyi asi e'yo 'du e'yo 'yezu ra. Eyi ai okpo tualu driceza cuu niri ma eselea ongulumu eyi pie e'yo 'diyi ma aza kozu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwerarikirira okurikukwata ahaby'okwerinda, ab'obushoborozi b'ebyaro bashaziremu kukora. Bashabire okukwatanisa ahagati y'abebembezi b'akatare hamwe n'abantu b'omukyanga kukora aha nshonga ezi kurungi.

eng_prompt: After months of investigation and surveillance, the authorities finally uncovered a web of deceit among the inmates. Their efforts led them to a key figure who orchestrated the elaborate scheme.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okunoonyereza n'okulondoola, ab'obuyinza baasembye okuzuula obulimba mu basibe. Kaweefube waabwe yabaviirako okufuna omuntu omukulu eyateekateeka enteekateeka eyo.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwee mapol me kwed ki bedo ki wang mabit I kom mabuc, lutela gunongo ni mabuc mapol gubedo lutim bal. Tute gi okelogi bot ngat ma odoro yub eni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka aingic keda aingic, apotu apedorosio odumutu akiro nuka akoko kanejaas iwenan. Apotu aswam kec koyangautu kesi mama ejai etunganan loapolon loabu kitemok ainapeta ngun.
lgg_prompt: Mba vuti ondaza azini e'yo eti ondaza ma vutia, drice'ba eyi esu asizu e'yo aramu ni 'diyi aru 'da eyi ma eselea. Okpo eyini 'ba ri fe eyini 'ba okporu otita 'da otupi 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okucondooza n'okucondooza, ab'obushoborozi bakahendera bashanga oburugo bw'obushumankuzi omu basibe. Amaani gaabo gakareetaho omuntu mukuru owabaire atebekanisa enteekateeka y'amaani.

eng_prompt: In the dimly lit cell, whispers of rebellion circulated among the inmates, igniting a spark of hope for freedom. Among them, one man stood out, known for his cunning intellect and strategic mind.
lug_prompt: Mu kasenge akatono, okuwuubaala kw'obujeemu kwasaasaanira mu basibe, ne kireetawo essuubi ly'eddembe. Mu bo, omusajja omu yeeyoleka, amanyiddwa olw'amagezi ge n'obukodyo bwe.
ach_prompt: I ot buc ma mac pe ryeny maber tutwal, winyo lok me jemo obedo kawot I kin lumabuc, ma okelo gen me bedo agonya. I kingi, lacoo acel onen tutwal, ma oywek pi ryekone ki tam ma en tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aiboisit naejaasi keda aica naedit, apotu akiro nuka abenyak kilelebunos kiding iwenan, ido abu koyangau amuno naka ailajara. Kokidingikec, ajai etunganan loetegelikina, loejenara noi kanu acoa ke keda acoa naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Arujo 'da ma alea aci kokoru, e'yo 'bani 'ba aru ru 'diyi ma dria 'diyi aci asi 'baza be driwala ma dria. Yi ma eselea, agupi alu fu amve, 'ba ni eri ma ondua onduaru azini egata okporu 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kashengye k'ekihome akarimu omushana mukye, okwetomboita kukajanjaara omu basibe, ekyaretsireho amatsiko g'obusingye. Omuri bo, hakaba hariho omushaija omwe owabaire ari ow'omutaano, arikumanywa ahabw'obwengye bwe n'ebiteekateeko bye.

eng_prompt: Frustration and despair filled the prison walls as inmates grappled with their harsh realities. Amidst the growing unrest, a charismatic leader emerged, urging them to take action.
lug_prompt: Obwennyamivu n'okuggwaamu essuubi byajjula ebisenge by'ekkomera ng'abasibe balwanagana n'embeera yaabwe embi. Wakati mu butabanguko obweyongera, omukulembeze ow'amaanyi yavaayo n'abakubiriza okubaako kye bakolawo.
ach_prompt: Cwer cwiny ki turcwiny opong I ot buc I kare ma lumabuc gubedo ka lweny ki kwo matek ma gitye iye. I kare ma lweny tye ka mede, latela mo ma kite ber tutwal obino ka cuko cwinygi me timo gin mo.
teo_prompt: Apotu aiyalongongo keda aiyalongongo kilelebunos toma arwatat lu iwenan lu itereikina keda aijarakec naronon. Kokiding naka amumu naepol noi, abu engarenon loajokan kolom kosodi aisinyikokin kes aswam nuekotosi kesi.
lgg_prompt: Asi nyoza azini ava ako ga arujo ma abi yi ma alia 'ba aru ru 'diyi ni dri ciria e'yo ewaru yini 'diyi be. E'yo ngiringiri ni tupi 'diyi ma talasi, drice'ba azi onyiru ni efu eyisi eyini imbata fezu eyidri e'yo 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Okwerarikirira n'okwerarikirira bikaruga omu bihome nk'abasibe barikurwanagana n'emituurire yaabo egumire. Ahagati y'obutabanguko obweyongyeire, omwebembezi w'amaani akarugayo, yaabashaba kugira ekibakora.

eng_prompt: An extensive review of the facility's protocols revealed alarming deficiencies. As the investigation progressed, it became clear that the prison was not adequately equipped to handle potential threats.
lug_prompt: Okwekenenya ennyo enkola z'ekitongole kyazudde obunafu obweraliikiriza. Okunoonyereza bwe kwagenda mu maaso, kyategeerekeka bulungi nti ekkomera teryalina bikozesebwa bimala okusobola okukwasaganya abantu abayinza okuba ab'obulabe.
ach_prompt: Kwed matut I kom cik ma doro tic pa ot yat man onyuto goro mapol tutwal. Ikare ma kwed tye ka mede, onen atyer kamaleng ni buc ne pe tye ki jami weng ma mite me lweny i kom lutim bal.
teo_prompt: Airereonor ainapeta nuka aiboisit kangin abu kitodu aibucaret naepol noi. Neautar aingic alosit, abu kotakanu ebe mam ejokuna iboro lu ejok kanu aitikitik lukasurup.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma ale andrizu kililiru ri e'da e'yo ewaru eyi. E'yo eti ondaza ni mu drile, eri eca e'da kini arujo 'da ma alea afa ayuzaru 'diyi cani e'yo 'ba e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi ma aza kozu ku.
nyn_prompt: Okushwijuma engyenderwaho y'eirwariro, kikareetaho oburemeezi bw'amaani. Okucondooza ku kwagyendeire omu maisho, kikarebeka butunu ngu ekihome kikaba kitarikwetengwa kukora aha bintu ebirikubaasa kutiinisa abantu.

eng_prompt: After a lengthy investigation, authorities have gathered enough evidence to link the suspects to the crime scene. As a result, the three prisoners have been charged with murder.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza okumala ebbanga eddene, ab'obuyinza bakungaanyizza obujulizi obumala okukwataganya abateeberezebwa n'ekifo awazzibwa omusango. N'ekyavaamu, abasibe abasatu bavunaanibwa gwa butemu.
ach_prompt: Ingee timo kwed pi kare malac, lutela guyubu caden ma oromo me kubu jo mabyek me bal tye I komgi ki kama bal otime iye. Macalo adwogi ne, kimoro adot me nek i kom mabuc adek ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic apak naepol, apotu apedorosio otukutu aitogogongoret naedolit kanu arucokinit lu ekamunitai keda aiboisit naiswamauna ngun. Kanuka ngun, aponi itepesenai iwenan iuni kanu eyarit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza ezu 'bori ma vutia, drice'ba eyi tra afa ecetaru 'bani ecozu eyi ecizu 'ba 'bani ega eza e'yo ra ada 'diyi pie angu e'yo onzi 'yezu 'da ma alea. E'yo 'disi, 'ba li aru na 'da eyi ma dria e'yo 'bani eyi 'dizu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza kumara obwire buraingwa, ab'obushoborozi batungire obuhame oburikumara, okuhikaanisa abarikuteekateekwaho kukora ebihagaro n'omwanya ahu ebihagaro byabeireho. N'ekyarugiremu, abasibe bashatu bajunaanwa orubanja rw'obwisi.

eng_prompt: As the night fell and the guards changed shifts, a hushed tension filled the air. The opportunity for freedom lay before them, yet not everyone was willing to take the risk.
lug_prompt: Ekiro bwe kyagenda kiyitawo era abakuumi ne bakyusakyusa, waaliwo obunkenke bungi. Omukisa gw'eddembe gwali mu maaso gaabwe, naye si buli omu nti yali mwetegefu okukola akabi.
ach_prompt: I kare ma piny odoko col ci lukur-piny guloko ticgi, lworo madit obedo tye. Gum me bedo agonya obedo tye I nyimgi, ento pe dano weng onongo tye atera me keto kwogi I peko.
teo_prompt: Neadolio kware kosodete edarak aijulanakin aijulujuleta, apotu aiyalongongo kilelebunos kokwam. Ajaasi kesi keda arereng naka ailajara, konye mam itunga kere ekapakina aimusung ngun.
lgg_prompt: O'du ni ecaria azini 'ba ageitema ni 'diyi oja yi ma o'duko si, asi otiza aliaru ni ga angu ma alia dria. Drileba driwala niri ndra yi ma drilea, te 'ba dria ovuni avasi e'yo ewaru 'da 'duzu ku.
nyn_prompt: Obwire ku bwabaire nibugyenda nibuziba kandi abakuumi nibahindukana, haabaho okwerarikirira omu myanya. Omugisha gw'obusingye gukaba guri omu maisho gaabo, kwonka ti buri omwe ngu akaba ayeteekateekire kutwara akabi.

eng_prompt: After the alarm was raised early this morning, authorities mobilized all available resources. Eyewitnesses reported seeing the escapees heading towards the nearby woods.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa alamu okuwulirwa ku makya ga leero, ab'obuyinza baakunga ebintu byonna ebiriwo. Abaabaddewo baategeezezza nti baalaba abadduse nga boolekera ebibira ebiriraanyeewo.
ach_prompt: Inge miyo lok angeya odiko matin, lutela guyubu jami weng matye. Lucaden guwaco ni guneno luring ayela ne ka cito I bunga matye cok.

nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okubarukaho kw'oburwaire obwahati, ni kikuru okuta omu nkora oburyo bw'okuzibira okujanjaara kw'akakooko. Okuhamya oburinzi bw'abantu, twine kugira eki twakora ahonaaho aha bikwatiraine n'abo abakwasirwe akakooko.

eng_prompt: After collapsing during the game, the athlete was quickly assessed by the medical staff. Concerned about his condition, the paramedics arrived on the scene to provide immediate care.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okugwa mu muzannyo, omuzannyi yakeberebwa abasawo. Olw'okweraliikirira embeera ye, abasawo baatuuka mu kifo awaali akabenje okuwa obujjanjabi obw'amangu.
ach_prompt: Inge poto pa langwec I kare me tuko, lutic yoto kom gungiyo kome oyot-oyot tutwal. Pi lworo I kom kit ma en tye kwede, lutic yoto kom gu oo I kabedo ne me miyo kony me yot kom oyot-oyot.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aibiror kotoma abolia, apotu eswamak luka angaleu kongicata akeran. Kanu apodokinit ejautene ke, apotu imurok luka adekis kodolokisi aiboisit ngin kanu aijaikin amukian katipet.
lgg_prompt: Erini e'dezu avita ma alia 'bori ma vutia, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi andri 'ba ongusi. Asi otiza be e'yo eri ma wura ma dria, 'ba azoru 'diyi eca angu 'da ma alea azakoma fezu mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okugwa kihuumura omu muzaano, omwiruki akakyeberwa juba abashaho. Ahabw'okwerarikirira ahabw'embeera ye, abashaho bakahika aha mwanya okuheereza obujanjabi ahonaaho.

eng_prompt: Recent studies have shown varying outcomes in the effectiveness of treatments for COVID-19. As healthcare professionals monitor patient progress, they are eager to assess the overall response to the current therapies being administered.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga ebivaamu eby'enjawulo mu buwanguzi bw'obujjanjabi bwa ssenyiga omukambwe. Nga abakugu mu byobulamu balondoola enkulaakulana y'abalwadde, baagala nnyo okumanya engeri obujjanjabi obuweebwa mu kiseera kino gye bukolamu.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto adwogi mapat-pat I kom tic pa yat me cango two korona. I kare ma lutic yoto kom tye ka neno kit ma lutwo tye ka wot kwede, gitye ki miti me niang kit ma yat tye ka tic kwede.
teo_prompt: Aingic napac itodunit akiro nuegelegela nuka amukian naka adeka naka ekorona. Kwape ewanyanarete ipirioitin luka angaleu apol naka adekak, ekotosi kesi aanyun epone loepedoriata kesi aimuke adekasinei.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza o'diru 'diyi ece e'yo ndundu aro azo COVID-19 niri ma aza kozu 'diyi ma dria. Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi eyini muzu 'ba azoru 'diyi ma zota ma pamvu onezu, eyi ava be e'yo 'ba eyini 'ye aro eyini fele 'diyi ma dria ri onezu.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka ebitarikushushana omu kuragurira akakooko ka korona. Nk'oku abakugu omu by'amagara barikureebuuza entunguuka y'omurwaire, nibenda kumanya oburemeezi bw'emibazi eriho obwahati.

eng_prompt: As the pandemic continues to evolve, many are concerned about the impact on public health. Recent reports have prompted questions about the current statistics regarding fatalities.
lug_prompt: Ng'ekirwadde bbunansi kigenda mu maaso, bangi beeraliikirivu ku ngeri gye kinaakosaamu obulamu bw'abantu. Lipoota ezifulumizibwa gye buvuddeko zireeseewo ebibuuzo ku bibalo by'abafudde.
ach_prompt: I kare ma two korona tye ka medde anyim, dano mapol tye ki lworo I kom adwogi ne I kom yotkom pa lwak. Adwogi tic ma otime cokcok-ki okelo lapeny I kom wel dano ma otoo I can me gudu.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinit adeka naka ekorona aijulanakin, epodokitos itunga luipu nuikamunitos epone loepedoria ngesi aitolitol angaleu naka itunga. Apotu iripotan lu atuboros koyangautu aingiseta nuikamunitos aiwadikaeta nuka atwakisia nuka itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo 'dezaniri ni mu drile drile, 'ba karakara eyi asi otiza be e'yo erini eco 'ye o'bi eyi ma rua ala ma dria ri ma dria. O'duko efupi o'diru 'diyi eji zita eyi kalafe 'ba odrapi drileonzi eyi ma alea sa'wa 'disi 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oburwaire bwa korona ku burikugumizamu nibugyenda omu maisho, baingi niberarikirira oku burikukwata aha magara g'abantu. Ripoota eziherize kukorwa zireesireho okubanganisa aha bibaro by'abantu abarikufa.

eng_prompt: In response to rising crime rates in the area, local authorities have decided to take a firmer stance. As a result, the police are enforcing the laws.
lug_prompt: Olw'obumenyi bw'amateeka obweyongera mu kitundu, ab'obuyinza mu byalo basazeewo okuba abanywevu. N'ekyavaamu, poliisi ekwasisa amateeka.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa rwom me timo bal I kabedo eni, lutela me tedero gumoko tamgi me cung matek. Macalo adwogi ne, abili tye ka keto cik itic.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin abilibilio naka ikisila kotoma aiboisit, aseutu apedorosio nuka atutubet aitikitik ngun. Kanuka ngun, eutasi ipolisin aitwasam ikisila.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azita onyoza ma omgbo angu 'da ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tuzu risi, drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi 'du e'yo okporu eyi 'yezu. E'yo 'disi, polisi eyi azita eyi ma ta mba.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obukozi bw'ebibi obweyongyeire omu kyanga, ab'obushoborozi b'ebyaro bashaziremu kukora ekirikubaasika. N'ekyarugiremu, poriisi neekwatisa ebiragiro.

eng_prompt: As communities begin to reopen and hold events, health officials are concerned about the potential risks involved. Many experts warn that large crowds can facilitate the transmission of infectious diseases.
lug_prompt: Nga ebitundu bitandika okuggulawo n'okutegeka emikolo, abakungu b'ebyobulamu beeraliikirivu olw'obulabe obuyinza okubaawo. Abakugu bangi balabula nti abantu abangi basobola okwanguyiza okusaasaana kw'endwadde ezisiigibwa.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lwak tye ka yabo ki yubu yub mapat-pat, lutic me yot-kom tye ki lworo I kom peko ma twero bedo tye. Ludiro mapol giwaco ni dano mapol twero nyayo two ma kobo oyot.
teo_prompt: Kwape egeunete aiboisio apukor ka aitolot aiboisio, epodokitos eswamak luka angaleu atiokisio nuepedorete alomun. Ikwenyaritos ipirioitin luipu ebe epedorete itunga luipu awear adekasinei nu ikopas.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu eyini e'doria e'yo eyi ma ti zizu dika e'yo eyi 'yezu, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi asi otiza be e'yo ewaru ecopi 'yepi ra 'diyi ma dria. Ba e'yo nipi saaru 'diyi fe bile ndu liza kini ongulumu karakara eyi eco fe azo eyi ma ereta ni ecazu ewakokoru ra.
nyn_prompt: Abantu kubarikutandika kwiguraho n'okukora emikoro, ab'eby'amagara niberarikirira akabi akarikubaasa kubaho. Abakugu baingi nibarabura ngu abantu baingi nibabaasa kwongyera aha kujanjaara kw'endwara ezirikuturira.

eng_prompt: In today's fast-paced world, the role of information dissemination is crucial. Various professionals contribute to this field, including those who gather and report news.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ey'amangu, omulimu gw'okusaasaanya amawulire gwa mugaso nnyo. Abakugu ab'enjawulo bayambako mu mulimu guno, omuli n'abo abakung'aanya amawulire n'okugafulumya.
ach_prompt: I lobo me kareni ma jami woto oyot-oyot tutwal, tic me poko ngec obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal. Ludiro mapol gi konyo I tic man, I kingi tye iye joo ma coko ki coyo lok angea.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo na esipidi noi, epol ajokis naka aisiarakin akiro. Ipirioitin luegelegela kes igangitos aswam na, aimoriarit ngul lu ingalaunete ka aikam iyemuto.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alia e'yo yi 'yepi mbele mbele 'diyi ma alia, orodri o'duko ma ereta niri eri okporu. Ba onita be angiri 'diyi azi nga pari 'di ma alia indi, 'ba e'yo efu'ba 'diyi trapi azini e'yo oyu'ba 'diyi ma dria indi.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba erimu amaani, omurimo gw'okujanjaaza amakuru n'ogw'omugasho munonga. Abakugu baingi nibahwera omu murimo ogu, otwariiremu n'abo abarikurundaana amahurire.

eng_prompt: In light of recent events that have challenged our democratic principles, it is crucial for us to address the growing concerns about justice and accountability. Upholding our legal framework is essential for maintaining public trust and stability.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku ebyo ebibaddewo gye buvuddeko awo ebisoomooza enkola yaffe eya demokulasiya, kikulu nnyo gye tuli okukola ku nsonga ezikwata ku bwenkanya n'obuvunaanyizibwa. Okunywerera ku mateeka gaffe kikulu nnyo mu kukuuma obwesige n'obutebenkevu mu bantu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki ma okelo peko i kom cik ma doro tela pa lwak, pire tek tutwal ni omyero walok i kom lok matye kamedde I kom ngolo kop matir ki miyo kor tic. Gwoko cik ma watye kwede pire tek tutwal pi gwoko gen ki ber bedo pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuapotu kotakanutu pac kanu ainingosit ainapeta nuka apugan, ejokuna noi oni aitemokin atiokisio nuepolok nuikamunitos etube loajokan keda aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun. Aitogogong ikisila erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar amuno keda ainapakina kanejaas itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ebipi i 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yo si, e'yo amani lezu ama ma 'ye e'yo ewaru e'yo liza kililiru ri ma dria 'diyi ma aza kozu. Azita amavile 'diyi ma tambazu ri eri orodriru asi'baza o'bi eyini ri ma tambazu azini asianzu ejizu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebintu ebibaireho juba ebirikuteganisa enkora yaitu y'oburingaaniza, n'eky'omugasho munonga ahariitwe kukora aha nshonga ezirikukwata aha buringaaniza n'obujunanizibwa. Okukuratira ebiragiro byaitu n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okurinda obwesigye n'obutebekana omu bantu.

eng_prompt: If you witness any suspicious activity or feel unsafe in your surroundings, it's important to take action. Remember, your safety and the safety of others is a priority.
lug_prompt: Bw'olaba ekintu kyonna ekiteeberezebwa oba okuwulira nga tolina bukuumi mu kitundu kyo, kikulu okubaako ky'okola. Jjukira nti obukuumi bwo n'obw'abalala bwe bukulu.
ach_prompt: Kace ineno tim mo keken ma byek tye I kome onyo iwinyo ni pe itye agwoka I kabedo ma orumu ni, pire tek tutwal me timo gin mo. Wii opo ni gwoko kwo ni ki kwo pa dano mukene obedo gin ma pire tek.
teo_prompt: Arai iwanyuni jo aswamisio nu eomitai ebe mam ijo iyuwara kotoma aiboisit kon, ibusakinit jo aswam nuikamunitos ngun. Kiituni ebe ayuwara kon keda ayuwara naka luce nes ibusakinit aisingarenit.
lgg_prompt: Eka e'yo azi 'bani ega kokoru 'diyi ndre kani ku mi ega kini angu mi agei 'diyi ma ageyi te ku, eri orodriru e'yo 'yezu. Mi ma ega, mi ma ageitema azini 'ba azi 'diyi ma ageitema eri e'yo okporu ni.
nyn_prompt: Ku orikureeba ekintu kyona ekirikuteekwateekwaho, n'eky'omugasho okukikora. Ijuka, oburinzi bwawe hamwe n'obw'abandi n'obw'omugasho munonga.

eng_prompt: When someone is arrested, they may have the option to secure their release before trial. Understanding the criteria for obtaining a police bond is essential for those in this situation.
lug_prompt: Omuntu bw'akwatibwa, ayinza okusalawo okuteebwa nga tannawozesebwa. Okutegeera emitendera gy'okufuna akasiimo ka poliisi kya mugaso eri abo abali mu mbeera eno.
ach_prompt: Ka kimako ngat moni, twero bedo ki yoo me nongo kony me gonye mapwod pe ki ngolo kop iwigi. Niang ngo ma mite me nongo waraga me bedo mabuc mawoko pa abili pire tek tutwal ki joo matye I peko man.
teo_prompt: Arai ikamanario itunganan, epedorete kesi alacakin kesi erongo emusago. Amisiikin nutupitono kanu adumun ikapun luka polis erai ibore yenepol noi kanejaas ngul luejaasi toma ojautene kalo.
lgg_prompt: Ba ka 'ba azini bi, eri eco nga e'yo 'du 'bani eri ofuzu de nga po'di 'ba obini eri ku. E'yo 'bani ecozu polisi yi ma ti ta mbazuri esuzu 'diyi ma vata eri orodriru 'ba e'yo 'di ma alea 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Omuntu ku arikukwatwa, naabaasa kugira eky'okukora kurekurwa atakagiire omu kooti. Okwetegyereza engyenderwaho y'okutunga akasiimo ka poriisi n'eky'omugasho ahari abo abari omu mbeera egi.

eng_prompt: The Supreme Court serves as the highest judicial authority in the country, handling cases of significant legal importance. Many people wonder about the types of offences that fall under its jurisdiction.
lug_prompt: Kkooti ensukkulumu ekola ng'ekitongole ekiramuzi eky'oku ntikko mu ggwanga, ekikola ku misango egy'omugaso mu mateeka. Abantu bangi beebuuza ku misango egiri wansi w'obuyinza bwayo.
ach_prompt: Kot madit loyo weng tiyo macalo lungol kop madit loyo weng I lobo man, ma tiyo I kom lok mapigi tego tutwal. Dano mapol gipenye I kom kwai bal matye I te twero ne.
teo_prompt: Iswamai ekooti lokapolon kwape atukot naepol noi naka ikatubok kotoma akwapuwok, itemonokinete imusagon lu epol ajokis. Ipu itunga lu ejenete nuikamunitos imusagon lu ejai toma apedorosiokec.
lgg_prompt: Dwani uruleruri ni azi nga ekile amuti e'yo liza ni uru ndeni kari 'di ma alea ri le, dika eri kesi okporu azita palaa 'diyi ma aza ko. Ba karakara eyi osu e'yo azita onyoza ni 'diyi ma wura eyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Kooti enkuru neekora nk'ekitongore ky'oburamuzi eky'ahaiguru omu ihanga, ekirikukora aha mishango y'omugasho omu biragiro. Abantu baingi nibeebuuza ebikwatiraine n'emishango erikukorwa gavumenti egi.

eng_prompt: After the incident, it's important to document everything that happened. Make sure you gather your thoughts before heading to the police station.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'akabenje, kikulu okuwandiika buli kimu ekyabaddewo. Kakasa nti otegeka ebirowoozo byo nga tonnaba kugenda ku sitenseni ya poliisi.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngo ma otimme, pire tek me coyo jami weng ma otime. Nen ni igamo tam ma megi mapwod pe icito I tecen pa abili.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka akangas, ejokuna aiwadik akiro kere nuapotu kotakanutu. Koany ebe imorikikin ijo aomisiokon eringa eloto polis.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'da ma vutia, eri orodriru afa dria i 'yepi 'diyi osizu va. Le mi ma ega e'yo eyi ma dria rakaka de nga po'di mi muni polisi'a ku.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ekyabaireho, n'eky'omugasho kuhandiika buri kimwe ekyabaireho. Reeba ngu orundaana ebiteekateeko byawe otakagiire aha poriisi.

eng_prompt: My current phone is constantly freezing and the battery barely lasts a few hours. I've been considering my options for a while now.
lug_prompt: Essimu yange eriwo kati esigala ezira era bbaatule yaayo emala essaawa ntono. Mbadde ndowooza ku ngeri gye nnyinza okukikolamu okumala akaseera kati.
ach_prompt: Cim mega matye kombedi bedo ka ngic tutwal dok battery ne pe tiyo pi cawa mapol. Abedo ka tam I kom gin ma atwero timone pi kare malac dong.
teo_prompt: Etapit ekasimu aibwo noi ido mam abaturen ejai adaun isawan idis. Auta eong aomoom nuipedori eong aswam kwana adaun apak naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Ma vile simu sawa 'disi ri ni sa'wa driasi ambizaru azini betru ri ni sawa 'du were. Ma ebi e'yo mani eco 'ye 'diyi ma dria ega sawa ezu 'bo.

eng_prompt: The investigation has revealed several potential leads, but we need to narrow down our focus. As we gather more evidence, it's crucial to identify the key individuals involved.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza kuzudde abantu bangi abayinza okututuusaako akabi, naye twetaaga okukendeeza ku bye tussaako essira. Nga tukung'aanya obujulizi obulala, kikulu nnyo okuzuula abantu abakulu abakwatibwako.
ach_prompt: Kwed okatti ki ngec mapol, ento omyero wamede ki keto cwiny wa I kom lok enoni. Ka watye ka coko caden mapol, pire tek tutwal me niang dano mapigi tego matye I lokke.
teo_prompt: Abu aingic kitodu itunga luipu luepedorete aingarenikin, konye ibusakinit oni aitidisiar akiro wok. Neautar sio atukun aitogogongoret nuipu, ejokuna noi ajenun itunga luapolok luejaasi toma.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza 'da e'da 'ba ecopi e'yo 'yepi ra 'diyi karakara, te le ama ma 'ba asi e'yo amani 'ye 'diyi ma dria ra. Amani afa ecetaru 'diyi trazu drile, eri orodriru 'ba orodriru e'yo nde ma alia 'diyi ma ru esuzu.

eng_prompt: In the context of understanding the powers and responsibilities of the executive branch, it's important to explore the various tools at the president's disposal. One key aspect of this is the issuance of presidential directives, which can significantly influence policy and governance.
lug_prompt: Mu kutegeera obuyinza n'obuvunaanyizibwa bw'olukiiko olufuzi, kya mugaso okwekenneenya ebikozesebwa eby'enjawulo pulezidenti by'alina. Ekimu ku bikulu mu kino kwe kuwa ebiragiro bya pulezidenti, ebiyinza okukyusa ennyo enkola n'enfuga.
ach_prompt: I kare me niang twero ki tic pa dul ma doro tic pa gamente, pire tek tutwal me niang jami tic mapat-pat ma ladit lobo tye kwede. Gin acel ma pire tek tutwal I lok man obedo miyo cik pa ladit lobo, ma twero kelo alokaloka madit I kom cik ki tela.
teo_prompt: Kanu amisiikin apedorosio keda aswamisinei nuka eyapiesi lokapolon akwap, ejok aanyanar iboro luegelegela luejaasi keda lokapolon akwap. Adiopet koboro luepolok noi nuikamunitos ngun ngesi aitolomun aicoreta nuka lokapolon akwap, nuepedorete aijulakin ainapeta keda epugae.
lgg_prompt: E'yo okpo azini azi okalamvu executive niri ni 'diyi ma dria, eri orodriru afa ndu ndu purezidenti ni 'diyi ma ale andrizu. E'yo azi okporu 'di ma azi eri azita purezidenti ni 'diyi ofuzu, ecopi e'yo azita ni azini driceza ni 'diyi ojapi ra 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Omu nshonga y'okwetegyereza obushoborozi n'obujunaanizibwa bw'ekitongore ekirikureeberera eihanga, n'eky'omugasho okushwijuma ebikwato ebirikukoresibwa omwebembezi w'eihanga. Kimwe aha bintu ebikuru ebirikukwata ahari eki n'okuheereza ebiragiro by'omwebembezi w'eihanga, ebirikubaasa kuhindura munonga ebiragiro n'obwebembezi.

eng_prompt: To prevent the spread of infectious diseases, it is crucial to adopt proper hygiene practices. One of the simplest yet most effective measures is to ensure that everyone washes their hands regularly.
lug_prompt: Okutangira okusaasaana kw'endwadde ezisiigibwa, kikulu nnyo okugoberera enkola ennungi ey'obuyonjo. Ekimu ku bintu ebyangu era ebikola obulungi kwe kukakasa nti buli omu ayoza engalo buli kaseera.
ach_prompt: Me gengo nya pa two ma kobo, pire tek tutwal me gwoko lengo. Yo acel ma yot dok tiyo maber loyo weng en aye me neno ni dano weng lwoko cingi kare ki kare.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitikitik awea naka adekasinei nu ikopas, ejokuna noi aidar aila. Adiopet kotoma iwaitin lu epatana konye lu iswamaete ejok ngesi awanyun ebe ilosenenete itunga akaninikec duc.
lgg_prompt: Azo eyi ma ereta atrizu, eri orodriru e'yo alata ni 'diyi 'duzu. E'yo azi ewakokoru te azi ngapi muke ndeni 'diyi ma azi eri nezu ra kini 'ba dria ma oji yi ma dri sawa driasi.
nyn_prompt: Okuzibira okujanjaara kw'endwara ezirikuturira, n'eky'omugasho okukuratira emicwe mirungi y'eby'obuyonjo. Kimwe aha bintu ebirikubaasa kukorwa kurungi n'okureeba ngu buri omwe naayozya engaro ze buri kaire.

eng_prompt: As the pandemic spread across the globe, health officials warned about the increasing number of cases. The virus quickly became a major public health concern, affecting millions worldwide.
lug_prompt: Ekirwadde bwe kyeyongera okusaasaana mu nsi yonna, ab'ebyobulamu baalabula ku kweyongera kw'omuwendo gw'abalwadde. Akawuka kafuuka ekizibu ky'ebyobulamu eky'amaanyi, ne kakosa obukadde n'obukadde bw'abantu mu nsi yonna.
ach_prompt: I kare ma two korona tye ka nya I wilobo lung, lutic me yot kom gu ciko dano i kom wel lutwo matye kamede. Two eni odoko peko madit tutwal I yot kom pa lwak, ma okelo peko I kom dano milion mapol I wilobo lung.
teo_prompt: Kwape ekorora adeka naka ekorona akwap kere, apotu eswamak luka angaleu ikwenyasi nuikamunitos enaaba loepol loka adekak. Abu ekorona koraun ationis naepol noi naka angaleu naka itunga, ido abu itolitol imilionin luka itunga kotoma akwap kere.

eng_prompt: In many developing regions, access to reliable electricity is a critical factor for economic growth. Understanding the implications of energy shortages can shed light on broader economic challenges faced by these communities.
