eng_prompt: As the coffee industry plays a crucial role in Uganda's economy, understanding the consumption patterns can provide valuable insights. Many people are curious about the demographics and trends surrounding coffee consumption in the country.

eng_prompt: The government has been implementing various initiatives to address poverty and improve economic opportunities for citizens. One of these initiatives is the Operation Wealth Creation program, which aims to empower individuals through financial support and training.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti ebadde eteeka mu nkola enteekateeka ez'enjawulo okulwanyisa obwavu n'okutumbula emikisa gy'ebyenfuna eri bannansi. Emu ku nteekateeka zino ye pulogulaamu ya Operation Wealth Creation, egenderera okutumbula abantu nga bayita mu buyambi bw'ensimbi n'okutendekebwa.

lgg_prompt: Afa ayuzaru arojoa 'diyi ma cu tu e'yo 'ba azoru 'diyi ni efizu curu'do ri ma e'yosi. E'yo 'disi, ama e'yo ewaru 'diyi esu e'yo amani le aci ni 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ekyetengo ky'ebikwato by'eby'amagara kyeyongyeire ahabw'okugira ngu abarwaire beyongyeire. N'ekyarugiremu, nitubugana oburemeezi bw'amaani omu kuhikiiriza ebyetengo byaitu by'amashanyarazi.

eng_prompt: The city council convened to discuss the pressing issues facing our community. One of the key points on the agenda was the funding for the newly proposed task force.
lug_prompt: Olukiiko lw'ekibuga lwatudde okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nsonga ez'amangu ekitundu kyaffe ze kyolekaganye nazo. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ebyali ku lukalala lw'ebyo ebyali bigenda okukolebwa kwe kuwa ssente akakiiko k'abakungu akapya.
ach_prompt: Lutela me city gubedo kacoke me nywako lok I kom peko matye I kabedo wa. Gin acel ma pire tek ma obedo I kin jami ma omyero gutim obedo miyo lim ki dul ma kicimo manyen me doro lok kom corona.
teo_prompt: Abu ekansulo lo esite iriamunos kanu aitemitem atiokisio nu ejaas atutubetekosi. Adiopet kotoma akiro nuepolok nuikamunitos ainapeta ngun ngesi nuka aijaikin ikapun mama ejai atukot naka itunga luingaranakinete luce.
lgg_prompt: Kanisulu aku ambu city niri niri tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo okporu amavile ongulumu 'da ni esu 'diyi ma dria. E'yo azi okporu otita 'da ma alea ri ma azi ri robia fele amuti 'ba opele o'diru 'diyi dri ri i.
nyn_prompt: Akakiiko k'orurembo kakwatanisa kuhanuura aha nshonga z'amaani eziri omu kyanga kyaitu. Kimwe aha bintu ebikuru ebyabaire biri aha nteekateeka, n'okushashurira akakiiko akasya.

eng_prompt: In response to recent health concerns, the government has emphasized the importance of maintaining public safety. To address these issues effectively, the Ministry of Health is ensuring that standard operating procedures are followed.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira kw'ebyobulamu okwakaggwa, gavumenti ekkaatirizza obukulu bw'okukuuma obukuumi bw'abantu. Okusobola okukola ku nsonga zino obulungi, minisitule y'ebyobulamu ekakasa nti emitendera egiri ku mutindo gigobererwa.
ach_prompt: I kare ma gamente odok I kom peko me yot kom ma otime cokcok-ki, en oketo cwinye I kom ber pa gwoko ber bedo pa lwak. Me tyeko peko magi maber, jang gamente ma loyo lok kom yoto kom tye ka neno ni lubo yoo me tic ma ki keto pi gengo nyayo two.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuka angaleu, abu apugan kitogogong ajokis naka aidar ayuwara naka itunga. Kanu aitemokin akiro nu ejok, euta erionget loka angaleu awanyun ebe etupitai nutupitono.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi o'diru 'diyi ma aza kozu, gamete fe okpo orodri 'bani o'bi yi ma ta mbazuri ma dria. E'yo 'diyi ma aza kozu kililiru, okalamvu alataniri ni ndre kini 'ba azita vuti obi.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti erikugarukamu okwerarikirira kw'eby'amagara okwabaireho obwahati, ekashoboorora omugasho gw'okurinda eby'amagara g'abantu. Okukora aha nshonga ezi kurungi, minisiture y'eby'amagara eriyo neehamya ngu engyenderwaho nungi nizikuratirwa.

eng_prompt: Before we proceed with the project, we need to clarify the financial resources available. Can you provide an overview of the expected costs involved?
lug_prompt: Nga tetunnagenda mu maaso na pulojekiti, twetaaga okulambika ensimbi eziriwo.
ach_prompt: Mapwod pe wacito anyim ki yub eni, omyero kong waniang yoo me nongo lim ma tye.
teo_prompt: Erongo sio elosi keda epurojekt, ekot oni ajenun ikapun lu ejaas.
lgg_prompt: De nga po'di ama mu drile otita 'da be ku, le ama ma ni geri robia esuzu 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Tutakagumiizemu na purogyekiti, twine kumanya esente eziriho.

eng_prompt: Maintaining good hygiene practices is essential in reducing the spread of infectious diseases. One of the most effective measures individuals can take is to ensure their hands are clean.
lug_prompt: Okukuuma obuyonjo kya mugaso mu kukendeeza okusaasaana kw'endwadde ezisiigibwa. Ekimu ku bintu abantu bye basobola okukola kwe kufuba okulaba nti emikono gyabwe gibeera miyonjo.
ach_prompt: Gwoko lengo obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me gengo nya pa two ma kobo ikin dano. Yo acel maber loyo ma ngat acel acel twero timo en aye me neno ni cinge tye maleng.
teo_prompt: Aidar aila ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitikitik awea naka adekasinei nu ikopas. Adiopet koboro luepedorete itunga aswam nes awanyun ebe elai akaninikec.
lgg_prompt: Yeta alata ni 'diyi ma tambazu ri eri orodriru e'yo azo eyi erepi 'diyi ma ereta ma omgbo esizu. E'yo azi 'ba alu alu eco 'ye kililiru ndeni ri eri kini eyi ma dri eyi alaru.
nyn_prompt: Okukuratira engyesho n'eky'omugasho omu kukyendeeza okujanjaara kw'endwara ezirikuturira. Kimwe aha bintu by'omugasho munonga ebi abantu barikubaasa kukora, n'okureeba ngu engaro zaabo nizejunda.

eng_prompt: The hiring process is in full swing as the company seeks to fill the open position. After reviewing several applications, the team has narrowed it down to a few promising candidates.
lug_prompt: Enkola y'okugaba emirimu egenda mu maaso nga kkampuni enoonya okujjuza ebifo ebikalu. Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya okusaba okw'enjawulo, ttiimu ekendeezezza ku bantu abatono abeesimbyewo abasuubiza.
ach_prompt: Yub me coyo lutic tye kawot anyim kit ma dul ne tye ka yenyo yoo me cobo tic matye. Ingee ngiyo waraga me penyo pi tic mapol, dul ne odwoko piny wel lutino kwan matye ki gen.
teo_prompt: Ejai ainapeta nuka aipagis itunga kwape ekampuni lo ekoto ailelebikin itunga lu ejai aiboisit. Akaulo naka airereonor aiwadikaeta nuipu, abu etimu kitidisia kesi kitoni ikidioko luejaasi keda apedor.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi 'duzu ri ni mu drile amuti 'da ni lezu pari azi ngazu 'diyi ma alea 'diyi sizu. E'yo waraga 'bani si 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, amuti 'da esi 'ba 'bani lele 'diyi ma kalafe ra.
nyn_prompt: Enkora y'okupangisa abantu eriyo neeyongyera ahabw'okugira ngu kampuni negyezaho kwijuza omwanya oguriho. Bwanyima y'okushwijuma okushaba kwingi, tiimu ekakyendeeza aha bantu bakye abarikwetenga.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent increase in local crime rates, the community has decided to enhance security measures. As part of this initiative, surveillance cameras have been put in place.
lug_prompt: Olw'obumenyi bw'amateeka obweyongedde mu kitundu gye buvuddeko, abantu basazeewo okwongera amaanyi mu by'okwerinda. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, kkamera ezilondoola ziteekeddwawo.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa rwom me timo bal ma otime cokcok-ki, lwak gumoko tamgi me medo rwom me gwoko kuc. Macalo but yub man, ki keto camera me bedo ki wang mabit I kom dano.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin naka abilibilio naka ikisila, aseutu itunga aitogogong ayuwara. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, aponi ibwaikinai akameran nu engicete.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ongmbo e'yo onzi 'yezu angu 'da ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tuzu o'diru risi, ongulumu eyi ai e'yo ageyitema ni 'diyi ma omgbo ra. E'yo 'di ma azi ru, 'ba 'ba kamera angu onezu 'diyi angu 'da ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obukozi bw'ebibi obweyongyeire omu byaro, abantu bashaziremu kwongyera ahaby'okwerinda. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, za kamera z'okurambura ziteirweho.

eng_prompt: In light of the ongoing pandemic, our team has been researching effective strategies for public health. We have compiled our findings into a comprehensive document.
lug_prompt: Olw'ekirwadde bbunansi ekigenda mu maaso, ttiimu yaffe ebadde enoonyereza ku ngeri ennungi ey'okukuumamu obulamu bw'abantu. Tukuŋŋaanyizza ebizuuliddwa byaffe mu kiwandiiko ekijjuvu.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me two korona matye kawot anyim, lutic wa gubedo ka yenyo yoo maber me gwoko yot kom pa lwak. Wacoko ngo ma wanongo I buk ma opong ki jami weng.
teo_prompt: Katupitos adeka naka ekorona na elosi akonye, euta etimukosi aingic iwaitin lu iswamaete ejok kanu angaleu naka itunga. Apotu sio atukoto akiro kosi toma aiwadikaet naejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo 'dezaniri ma e'yosi, ama vile amuti 'diyi ebi geri onyiru 'diyi onda e'yo alata o'bi yiniri ma dria. Ama tra e'yo amani esu 'diyi tualu kokobi angiri ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburwaire oburiho obwahati, tiimu yaitu etwire nekora okucondooza ahaby'amagara g'abantu. Twatungire ebiturikushanga omu kihandiiko ky'amaani.

eng_prompt: Despite significant advancements in medical research and public health initiatives, certain infectious diseases continue to pose a severe threat to global health. Among these, malaria remains a leading cause of mortality, particularly in tropical regions.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde wabaddewo enkulaakulana mu kunoonyereza ku byobulamu ne mu nteekateeka z'ebyobulamu, endwadde ezimu ezisiigibwa zikyali za bulabe eri obulamu bw'ensi yonna. Mu bino, omusujja gw'ensiri gwe gusinga okutta abantu naddala mu bitundu eby'obutiti.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni kwed me yotkom ki yub me yot kom tye ka dongo tutwal, two mukene ma kobo ikin dano pud tye ka kelo peko madit tutwal I kom yotkom pa dano I wilobo lung. I kin magi, malaria pud obedo gin ma kelo too pa dano mapol tutwalle I kabedo ma piny lyet.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejai apol naepol noi kotoma aingic naka angaleu keda nuka angaleu naka itunga, eringa adekasinei ace nuikopasi inyikokinitos aitukurian angaleu naka akwap kere. Kotoma aiboisio nu, eringa eimidi nes eyangauni atwanare naepol noi, kacut kotoma aiboisio nu ekwam.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu ezoma ni 'diyi ma talasi e'yo vuti ondaza e'yo rua alanisi azini e'yo o'bi eyini 'diyi ma dria ra ti, azo azi eyi ecopi eyi erepi ra 'diyi nga po'di e'yo onzi 'ye e'yo rua ala ni wudrikuru si 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'diyi ma eselea, malaria ni nga po'di e'yo 'ba eyini odrazu okporu ndeni ri'I, tutuni angu drioru 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho entunguuka y'amaani omu kucondooza ahaby'amagara hamwe n'enteekateeka y'eby'amagara g'abantu, endwara ezimwe ezirikuturira nizigumizamu kuba akabi aha magara g'ensi yoona. Omuri ebi, omushwija gw'ensiri nigwo gurikukirayo kureeta okufa, okukira munonga omu myanya y'obutagasi.

eng_prompt: The outbreak has spread rapidly across the region, raising concerns among health officials. As a result, numerous individuals have shown symptoms consistent with the illness.
lug_prompt: Okubalukawo kw'ekirwadde kusaasaanidde mangu mu kitundu kyonna, ekireeseewo okweraliikirira mu bakungu b'ebyobulamu. N'ekivuddemu, abantu bangi balaze obubonero obukwatagana n'obulwadde.
ach_prompt: Poto pa two eni onya oyot totwal I but lobo man ma oweko lutic me yot kom tye ki lworo. Macalo adwogi ne, dano mapol gunyutu lanyut me two eni.
teo_prompt: Akoraki adeka ngin katipet kotoma aiboisit kangin, ido eyangauni aiyalongong kanejaas eswamak luka angaleu. Kanuka ngun, itunga luipu itodunitos ijenuneta luka adeka.
lgg_prompt: E'dota azo 'da niri ere i angu 'di ma alea dria mbeleru, e'yo 'di fe asi otiza azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ma eselea. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara eyi e'da wura azo 'da ni 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Okubarukaho kw'endwara kujanjaire juba omu kicweka kyona, ekirikureetaho okwerarikirira omu bakuru b'ebyamagara. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu baingi boorekire obubonero bw'endwara.

eng_prompt: In light of recent events and to ensure public safety, the local authorities have implemented strict regulations. As a result, no movements are allowed during the curfew time.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bibaddewo gyebuvuddeko era okukakasa obukuumi bw'abantu, ab'obuyinza mu byalo bataddewo amateeka amakakali. N'ekivuddemu, tewali kutambula kukkirizibwa mu biseera bya kafyu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki ki bene me gwoko ber bedo pa lwak, lutela me tedero guketo cik matek tutwal itic. Macalo adwogi ne, pe ki yee wot I kare me curfew.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuapotu kotakanutu pac keda kanu awanyun ebe eyuwara itunga, apotu apedorosio nuka atutubet ibwaikisi ikisila luegogong. Kanuka ngun, mam ecamakitai alosit kapak naka ekalitini.
lgg_prompt: E'yo i 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi azini lezu o'bi eyini aa'zu ageitema be, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi 'ba azita okporu 'diyi 'yeta ma alea. E'yo 'disi, 'ba leni 'ba ma aci sawa 'bani lezu 'ba ma aciku ri ma alea ku.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebyabaireho obwahati n'okureeba ngu ebyokwerinda by'abantu, ab'obushoborozi aha kyaro bateireho ebiragiro by'amaani. N'ekyarugiremu, tihaine orikwikirizibwa kutambura omu bwire bwa kafyu.

eng_prompt: As the pandemic continues to impact our daily lives, many are searching for effective strategies to combat the spread of the virus. With new variants emerging and vaccination rates fluctuating, it's crucial to explore all possible measures.
lug_prompt: Ng'ekirwadde bbunansi kyeyongera okukosa obulamu bwaffe obwa bulijjo, bangi banoonya engeri ennungi ez'okulwanyisa okusaasaana kw'akawuka. Olw'ebika by'eddagala ebipya okuvaayo n'emiwendo gy'okugema okukyuka, kikulu nnyo okunoonyereza ku ngeri zonna ezisoboka.
ach_prompt: Kit ma two korona tye ka medde ki balo kwo wa, dano mapol tye ka yenyo yoo me lweny i kom nya pa two eni. Kit ma kwai two mapat-pat manyen tye kabino kwede ki rwom me gwero dano bene tye ka loke, pire tek tutwal me yenyo yoo weng ma twere.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokit adeka aitolitol aijar wok naka nginiparan, eutasi itunga luipu aimo iwaitin lu iswamaete ejok kanu aitikitik awea naka ekorona. Keda iponesio luitetiak lu etakanunete keda aijulanakineta nuka aikis ekato, ejokuna noi aimo iwaitin kere lu epedorio aswam.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo 'dezaniri ni mu drile ama edri o'du driasi ri ojazu, 'ba karakara eyi geri kililiru 'diyi nda a'di 'dizu azo 'da ma ereta be. E'yo esele o'diru 'diyi ni efuzu azini aro soza ma ongmbo ni i ojazurisi, eri orodriru geri dria ecopi ra 'diyi ondazu.
nyn_prompt: Oburwaire burikugumizamu kuteganisa amagara gaitu aga buriizooba, baingi nibasherura oburyo burungi bw'okurwanisa okujanjaara kw'akakooko. Ahabw'endwara nsya ezirikurugaho hamwe n'emihendo y'okugyema, n'eky'omugasho okuronda oburyo bwona oburikubaasika.

eng_prompt: I'm curious to learn more about the diverse experiences that shape who we are. Can you share a bit about your heritage?
lug_prompt: Njagala nnyo okumanya ebisingawo ku bintu eby'enjawulo ebitukwatako.
ach_prompt: Atye ki miti madit me pwonyo jami mapol I kom jami ma otimme I kwowa ma weko wadoko dano ma watye.
teo_prompt: Akoto eong ajenun nuipu nuikamunitos iboro luegelegela luiswamaete oni.
lgg_prompt: Ale saaru e'yo onizu e'yo ndundu amani esu 'diyi ma dria.

eng_prompt: I'm curious about your dietary preferences. Are there any specific foods you avoid?
lug_prompt: Njagala okumanya emmere gy'oyagala.

teo_prompt: Akoto eong aijen inyamat lu ikoto jo.
lgg_prompt: Ma ava be afa mini lele nyaka nyazaru 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ninyetenga kumanya eby'okurya ebi orikukunda.

eng_prompt: As the world continues to grapple with the ongoing pandemic, many people are seeking to understand the transmission dynamics of the virus. It's crucial to know how the virus spreads to take appropriate precautions and protect ourselves and others.
lug_prompt: Nga ensi yeeyongera okulwanagana n'ekirwadde bbunansi ekigenda mu maaso, abantu bangi banoonya okutegeera engeri akawuka gye kasaasaanamu. Kikulu nnyo okumanya engeri akawuka gye kasaasaanamu okusobola okwegendereza n'okwekuuma awamu n'abalala.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lobo tye ka lweny ki two ma opoto ni, dano mapol tye ka mito niang kit ma kwidi ne kobo kwede. Pire tek tutwal me ngeyo kit ma kwidi ne kobo kwede wek wagwokke ki jo mukene.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinit akwap kere ainingosit keda adeka naka ekorona, eutasi itunga luipu aimo amisiikin epone loekorere adeka. Erai ibore yenepol noi ajenun epone loekorere ekorona kanu aitikitik awatewok keda luce.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru ni mu drile a'di 'dizu azo ongulumu karakara eyi ezapiri be, 'ba karakara eyi le geri azo 'da ni i erezu ri va. Eri orodriru tu nizu geri azo 'da ni i erezu ri ma dria ecozu tambaza kililiru 'diyi 'duzu ama ma ngulupi ma ta mbazu tualu 'ba azi 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku ensi erikugumizamu n'okurwanagana n'oburwaire oburiho, abantu baingi nibenda kwetegyereza oku akakooko ka korona karikujanjaara. N'eky'omugasho kumanya oku akakooko karikujanjaara, kugira ngu tukore eby'okwerinda n'okwerinda n'abandi.

eng_prompt: Before we can draw any conclusions, it's essential to gather more data. To ensure the accuracy of our findings, we need to do tests in the laboratory.
lug_prompt: Nga tetunnatuuka ku kusalawo kwonna, kya mugaso okukung'aanya obubaka obulala. Okusobola okukakasa obutuufu bw'ebituzuuliddwa, twetaaga okukebera mu laabu.
ach_prompt: Mapwod pe wa tyeko lok mo, pire tek tutwal me nongo ngec mukene. Me neno ni jami ma wanongo tye kakare, omyero watim pim I ot pim.
teo_prompt: Erongo sio epedori aitolomun adiokirot, ibusakinit oni atukun akiro nuipu. Kanu aanyun abeit naka akiro kosi, ekot oni ainwakio kaiboisit nainwakere.
lgg_prompt: De nga po'di ama econi e'yo azini 'du ku, eri orodriru e'yo azi eyi trazu drile. E'yo amani esu 'diyi ma adriza kililiru ri nezu, le ama ma 'ye obita eyi angu 'bani afa eyi o'bizu 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Tutakatandikire kugamba ekintu kyona, niky'omugasho kurundaana ebirikukwata aha nshonga. Okuhamya ngu ebiturikushanga nibihikire, twine kukyebera omu rabaratore.

eng_prompt: Due to budget constraints and space limitations, our hospital has had to make difficult decisions regarding its facilities. As a result, we only have one laboratory in the hospital.
lug_prompt: Olw'obuzibu bw'embalirira n'ebbula ly'ebifo, eddwaliro lyaffe lifunye okusalawo okukaluba ku bikwata ku bifo byalyo. N'ekivuddemu, tulina laabu emu yokka mu ddwaliro.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me lim ki kabedo, ot yatwa omyero omok tam matek tutwal I kom jami ticgi. Macalo adwogi ne, watye ki ot pim acel keken I ot yat.
teo_prompt: Kanuka ationis na ebajet keda aiboisit na ikidioko, ajai adekisikosi aiswamaun aseununeta nuetioko nuikamunitos aiboisio ke. Kanuka ngun, ijaasi sio keda aiboisit adiope bon na inwakere adekis.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru bajeti ni azini angu ni 'diyisi, arojo amavileri 'du e'yo ewaru 'diyi e'yo afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, ama vu lu pari azo o'bizuri arojo 'di ma alia alu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'embaririra hamwe n'omwanya mukye, eirwariro ryaitu riine kukora okusharamu kugumire aha bikwatiraine n'ebyombeko byaryo. N'ekyarugiremu,twine rabaratore emwe yonka omwirwariro.

eng_prompt: We understand that you're eager to receive your results. Unfortunately, there has been a delay in processing.
lug_prompt: Tukitegedde nti weesunga okufuna ebyava mu bigezo byo. Eky'ennaku, wabaddewo okulwawo mu kukola ku nsonga.
ach_prompt: Wangeo ni itye ki miti me nongo adwogi ticci. Ki gum marac, tic tye ka galle.
teo_prompt: Ijeni sio ebe ikoto ijo noi adumun akiro kon. Nukaiturur, eyangaikitai aiyap kotoma aitemonokin akiro ngun.
lgg_prompt: Ama vaa ra kini mi avasi agata mini 'diyi esuzu. Drile onziru, sawa eza e'yo 'yezu ci.
nyn_prompt: Nitumanya ngu oine ekihika ky'okutunga ebyarugire omu bigyezo byawe. Eky'obusaasi, hatwireho okukyerererwa omu kukora emirimo.

eng_prompt: After conducting several tests and reviewing the patient's history, the medical team gathered to discuss their findings. They expressed concern over the unusual symptoms and the lack of clear answers.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukebera ennyo n'okwetegereza ebyafaayo by'omulwadde, abasawo baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bye baazudde. Baalaga obweraliikirivu olw'obubonero obutali bwa bulijjo n'obutaba na bya kuddamu bitegeerekeka.

eng_prompt: Uganda is home to some of the most breathtaking natural wonders in Africa. Among these, the stunning waterfalls along the River Nile draw visitors from around the globe.
lug_prompt: Uganda erimu ebimu ku bitonde ebyewuunyisa mu Afirika. Mu bino, ebiyiriro ebyewuunyisa ku mugga Nile bisikiriza abagenyi okuva mu nsi yonna.
ach_prompt: Lobo Uganda tye ki jami ma beco tutwal I lobo Afrika. I kin magi, pii ma mol mamwonya tutwal I nget nam Nile kelo wele ma aa ki I but lobo mapat-pat me wilobo.
teo_prompt: Ejaasi Uganda keda iboro ice luibusiak noi koAfrica. Kotoma ngul, icilena luibusiak noi luka ecilet loka Nile ingalaunete ipejok luka akwap kere.
lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri aku e'yo nyakuni onyiru ndeni Africaa 'diyi ma azi eyini. Diyi ma eselea, yi e'depi ndrizaru yi rapi rara Nile niri ma dria 'diyi omu eyi eji engazu wudrikuru ma kalasi kuru 'diyi vu.
nyn_prompt: Uganda n'eihanga ry'eby'obuhangwa ebirikutangaaza munonga omuri Afirika. Omuri ebi, ebisharara ebirikutangaaza aha rubaju rw'omugyera Nile, nibireeta abagyenyi kuruga omunsi yoona.

eng_prompt: As I study the geography of Africa, I'm curious about the various waterways that connect to major rivers. Specifically, I want to know which rivers are flowing towards the Nile.
lug_prompt: Nga bwe nsoma ebyafaayo bya Afirika, njagala okumanya amakubo g'amazzi ag'enjawulo agakwatagana n'emigga eminene. Okusingira ddala, njagala kumanya migga ki egikulukuta nga gigenda ku mugga Kiyira.
ach_prompt: Ka atye ka kwano lok kom kabedo me lobo Afrika, abedo ki miti me ngeyo yoo mapat-pat me pii ma kubu kulu madongo. Ki lok ada, amito ngeyo kulu mene matye ka mol me cito I nam Nile.
teo_prompt: Neisisia eong akiro nuikamunitos akwap nako Africa, akoto eong aijen iponesio luka akipi luerucokina keda icileta luapolok. Kacut akoto eong ajenun ecilet bo ani elelete kitoni Nile.
lgg_prompt: Mani e'yo angu ndundu Africa ni 'diyi ma dria oniria, ma ava be geri yi esele ndu ndu yi ecipi yi ara ambo 'diyi pie 'diyi ma dria. Le ma ma ni yi ara a'di yi acipi muzu Nile vu 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku ndikushoma ebyafaayo bya Afirika, ninyetenga kumanya emihanda y'amaizi etarikushushana erikuhika aha migyera mikuru. Okukira munonga, ninyenda kumanya emigyera erikushuka erikuza aha mugyera Nile.

eng_prompt: I can't believe they spent so much on a vehicle. Just look at the luxury features and sleek design!
lug_prompt: Sikikkiriza nti baasaasaanya ssente nnyingi bwe zityo ku mmotoka. Weetegereze ebintu eby'ebbeeyi ne dizayini ennungi!
ach_prompt: Pe atwero ye ni gutiyo ki cente madit tutwal I wilo motoka. Nen jami ma beco tutwal ki kit ma kiyubu kwede!
teo_prompt: Mam eong acamunit ebe apotu kesi itosomata ikapun luipu kanu agwel emotoka. Kosesen iboro luibusiak ka aitemonokineta nuibusiak
lgg_prompt: Ma econi a'i kini yi eza mutukari ma dria angiri 'dini ku. Le mi ma ndre lu afa ajeru 'diyi tualu afa edeza onyiru 'diyi pie
nyn_prompt: Tindikwikiriza ngu bakashohoza esente nyingi munonga kugura emotoka. Reeba ebintu by'omuhendo hamwe na dizayini nungi!

eng_prompt: Before we proceed with the project, it's crucial to assess its viability. Can you confirm if you have carried out the feasibility study?
lug_prompt: Nga tetunnagenda mu maaso na pulojekiti, kikulu nnyo okwekenneenya obusobozi bwayo.
ach_prompt: Mapwod pe wacito anyim ki yub eni, pire tek tutwal me niang kit ma tic man twero wot kwede.
teo_prompt: Erongo sio elosi keda epurojekt, ejokuna aanyun ebe epedori oni aitodolikin epurojekt ngol.
lgg_prompt: De nga po'di ama mu drile otita 'da be ku, eri orodriru amani ecozu e'yo 'yezu ra 'diyi ma ale andrizu.
nyn_prompt: Tutakagiire omu maisho na purogyekiti, n'eky'omugasho kushwijuma oku erikubaasa kubaho.

eng_prompt: The delicate ecosystem is already under threat from pollution and development. We need to protect the natural habitat for the wildlife that depends on it.
lug_prompt: Embeera y'obutonde etali nnungi eri mu matigga olw'obucaafu n'enkulaakulana. Twetaaga okukuuma obutonde obubeeramu ebisolo by'omu nsiko ebibirimu.
ach_prompt: Cwec ma orumuwa dong tye kama rac tutwal pi balo kabedo wa ki dongo lobo. Omyero wagwok kabedo pa cwec ma orumuwa.
teo_prompt: Ejaas aiboisio nu eyuwara noi toma aimusungeta kanuka amunar keda apol. Ekot oni ayuarite aiboisio nuka isuban lu ejaas keda itiang lukokutwi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu ezapi azini angu ezoma ni 'diyi e'bi angu 'da ma ta mba ra. Le ama ma mba angu amani aa'zu alenia 'diyi ma ta anyapa asea 'diyi ni aa'zu alenia 'diyi ma ta.
nyn_prompt: Eby'obuhangwa ebitarikwebaasa biri omu kabi ahabw'okusiisikara hamwe n'entunguuka. Twine kurinda eby'obuhangwa eby'enyamaishwa ebirikwetengwa.

eng_prompt: In any project or program, understanding the effectiveness of strategies is crucial. This leads to the important question of how are monitoring and evaluation done?
lug_prompt: Mu pulojekiti oba pulogulaamu yonna, okutegeera obulungi bw'obukodyo kikulu nnyo.
ach_prompt: I yub onyo yub mo keken, niang kit ma yub tye ka tic kwede pire tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma opurojekt arai ainapeta kere, ejokuna noi amisiikin eswamae loka ipurojektin.
lgg_prompt: Otita azini otita ciri ma alea, geri 'bani azi ngazu 'diyi ma orodri vazu ri eri orodriru.
nyn_prompt: Omu purogyekiti yoona nainga puroguraamu, okwetegyereza oburungi bw'enkora n'eky'omugasho munonga.

eng_prompt: Understanding the biological processes that occur in the female body is essential for promoting health and well-being. One significant aspect of this is the menstrual cycle, which is a natural part of growing up for many girls.
lug_prompt: Okutegeera enkola y'ebiramu ebikolebwa mu mubiri gw'omukazi kya mugaso mu kutumbula obulamu n'obulungi. Ekimu ku bikulu mu kino kwe kugenda mu nsonga z'ekikyala, nga kino kitundu kya butonde mu kukula kw'abawala bangi.
ach_prompt: Niang kit ma kwo pa mon woto kwede I komgi pire tek tutwal pi ilo malo rwom me yot kom pa mon. Gin acel ma pire tek I kom lok man obedo kare me two dwe, ma obedo kare me dongo pa anyira mapol.
teo_prompt: Amisiikin epone loiswamata angor kotoma akwan erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitojokar angaleu keda aijar najokan. Adiopet koboro lu epol ajokis nuikamunitos akiro nuikamunitos ilapio, erai ibore yeniswamauna apesur nuipu kotoma apoloun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo yi 'yepi rua oku yini ma alia 'diyi ma vata eri orodriru alata azini aa'ta muke ri otuzu. E'yo azi orodriru e'yo 'di ma dria ri eri e'yo ezoanzi eyini zozu ri i.
nyn_prompt: Okwetegyereza emirimo y'omubiri gw'omukazi n'eky'omugasho omu kutunguura amagara n'amagara marungi. Omuringo gumwe ogw'omugasho omuri eki n'okugyenda omubiro by'obushwere, ekirikuba kiri ekicweka ky'obuhangwa ky'okukura kw'abaishiki baingi.

eng_prompt: Each department submits its financial proposals and justifications for the upcoming year. After thorough review and discussion, the final budget is prepared for presentation.
lug_prompt: Buli kitongole kiwaayo ebiteeso byakyo eby'ensimbi n'ensonga zaakyo ez'omwaka ogujja. Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya n'okukubaganya ebirowoozo, embalirira esembayo etegekebwa okwanjulwa.
ach_prompt: Dipatmen acel-acel cwalo cente gi ki tyen lokgi pi mwaka matye kabino ni. Ingee ngiyo ki nyamo lok matut, kiyubu byek lim me agiki me kelo bot lwak.
teo_prompt: Kangol edipatiment einanakini aomisioitike nuka ikapun kanu ekaru ngol. Akaulo naka airereonor ka aitemitem, itemonokino ebajet lo awasia kanu aitodiar.
lgg_prompt: Arakala alu alu ni e'yo erini lele robia esuzu eli drusirisi 'diyi ma ti pe. Ba otita ajeni asizuri ma ale andrizu azini agbatara gbazu drinia 'bori ma vutia.
nyn_prompt: Buri kitongore nikiheerezayo enteekateeka yakyo y'esente n'eshonga zaakyo ez'omwaka ogurikwija. Bwanyima y'okushwijuma n'okuhanuura, embaririra y'ahamuheru neetebeekanisibwa kworekwa.

eng_prompt: After months of escalating tensions and violence, community leaders recognized the urgent need for collaboration. In response, various local groups came together to form a united front against the unrest.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'obunkenke n'obutabanguko okweyongera, abakulembeze b'ekitundu baalaba obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okukolagana. Mu kwanukula, ebibinja by'abantu b'omu byalo eby'enjawulo byakolera wamu okulwanyisa obutabanguko.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe ma telle ki tim gero omede, lutela me kabedo guneno ni omyero gutii kacelo. Macalo adwogi ne, dul mapat-pat me tedero guribbe kacel me lweny i kom jemo ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luiyatakinor atiokisio keda amumu, apotu engarenok luka atutubet kojenutu eipud loka aiswamanara katipet. Kwape abongokinet, apotu igurupun luipu luka atutubet kimorikikinos kanu aitogogong amumu.
lgg_prompt: Mba eyi ma vutia e'yo ngiringiri ni tupi 'diyi ma vutia, drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi esu e'yo aa'zu tualu ri ma orodri mbeleru. E'yo 'di ma omvitaniria, ongulumu angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi emu tualu ti ecita ejizu e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi g'obutaikirizana n'obutabanguko kweyongyera, abebembezi b'ebyanga bakareeba ngu hariho ekyetengo ky'amaani ky'okukwatanisa. Omu kugarukamu, guruupu z'ebyaro ezitarikushushana zikakwatanisa kukora ekibiina ky'okurwanisa akeimukiriro.

eng_prompt: Access to clean water is essential for maintaining health and hygiene. It plays a crucial role in our daily lives and overall well-being.
lug_prompt: Okufuna amazzi amayonjo kya nkizo mu kukuuma obulamu n'obuyonjo. Kikola kinene nnyo mu bulamu bwaffe obwa bulijjo ne mu mbeera yaffe ey'awamu.
ach_prompt: Nongo pii maleng pire tek tutwal pi gwoko yot kom ki lengo. Tye ki tic mapire tek tutwal I kwowa me nino ducu ki bedo maber.
teo_prompt: Adumunun akipi nu elaete ejok kanu aidar angaleu ka aila. Ejaasi keda aswam naepol noi kotoma aijar wok naka nginiparan keda aijar najokan.
lgg_prompt: Yi ala esuzu eri orodriru alata ma tambazu. Eri azi okporu nga ama ma edri o'du driasi azini aa'ta muke ri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Okutunga amaizi marungi n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okurinda amagara n'obuyonjo. Nikikora omurimo gw'amaani omu magara gaitu aga buriizooba hamwe n'amagara gaitu.

eng_prompt: I need to check the water supply before we start the irrigation. Can you tell me how many litres of water are in that tank?
lug_prompt: Nneetaaga okukebera amazzi nga tetunnatandika kufukirira.
ach_prompt: Omyero anen kit ma pii tye kwede mapwod pe wacako pur.
teo_prompt: Akoto eong awanyun ewai lo akipi eringa egeuna aicokicok akipi.
lgg_prompt: Le ma ma andri yi ma tambaza de nga po'di ama e'doni ori eyi ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Ninyetenga kukyebera oburugo bw'amaizi tutakatandikire okuhinga.

eng_prompt: Corruption has become a pervasive issue that undermines our nation's progress and development. It is essential for us to unite and take a stand to restore integrity and accountability in our institutions.
lug_prompt: Obuli bw'enguzi bufuuse kizibu ekibunye buli wamu ekitaataaganya enkulaakulana y'eggwanga lyaffe. Kya mugaso nnyo gye tuli okwegatta n'okusitukiramu okuzzaawo obwesimbu n'obuvunaanyizibwa mu bitongole byaffe.
ach_prompt: Camucana odoko peko madit tutwal ma balo dongo lobo wa. Pire tek tutwal ki wan me ribe ki cung matek me dwoko ber bedo ki kor tic I gangi tic wa.
teo_prompt: Araun amidicio naka apiyai ationis naepol noi na itidisiari apol keda apol naka akwap wok. Erai ibore yenepol noi oni aimorikikin kosodete aitolomun adoketait na abeit kotoma atukonawok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo anyamgbolo niri eca curu'do e'yo azi kari amavile ri ma zota azini zota atripi ni i. Eri orodriru ama dri ti ecita 'bazu azini pa sozu e'yo ada azini e'yo yi 'yepi 'diyi ogozu amuti amavile 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Obushumankuzi buhindukire enshonga y'amaani erikushiisha entunguuka n'entunguuka y'eihanga ryaitu. N'eky'omugasho ngu tukwatanise kandi tukore ekirikubaasika kugaruraho amazima n'obujunaanizibwa omu bitongore byaitu.

eng_prompt: I heard you recently started a new job in the media industry. How's that going for you?
lug_prompt: Mpulidde nti waakatandika omulimu mu kitongole ky'eby'empuliziganya.
ach_prompt: Awinyo ni cokcok-ki icako tic manyen I odi poko ngec.
teo_prompt: Apupunit eong ebe ageunit jo aswam naitetet kotoma okampuni loka airot iyemuto.
lgg_prompt: Ma eri kini mi e'do nga azi o'diruni okalamvu e'yo oyuzani 'diyi ma alia eturisi.
nyn_prompt: Mpuriire ngu obwahati otandikire omurimo omusya omu by'empurizagana.

eng_prompt: As the political landscape continues to evolve, citizens are increasingly eager to participate in the democratic process. In response to this growing interest, the electoral commission is preparing for the upcoming election next year.
lug_prompt: Ng'embeera y'ebyobufuzi yeeyongera okukyuka, bannansi beeyongera okwagala okwetaba mu nkola ya demokulasiya. Mu kwanukula obwetaavu buno obweyongera, akakiiko k'ebyokulonda kateekerateekera okulonda okujja omwaka ogujja.
ach_prompt: Kit ma lok me cungu iwi bye tye ka lokke kwede, anywali tye ki miti matek me bedo tye I yub me tela pa lwak. Macalo adwogi me miti eni matye kamede, dul madoro yer tye ka yubbe pi yer matye kabino I mwaka manyen.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinitos aijulakin ejautene loka politikis, ekotosi itunga noi ajaikin toma ainapeta nuka aseo naka itunga. Kanu aitemokin ngun, euta ekomision loka aseo aitemonokin kanuka aseo na ebunit okaru ngol.
lgg_prompt: E'yo politiki ni 'diyi ni mu drile ojazu, kari anzi eyi ma ava tu pa tu e'yo democracia ni 'diyi ma alea indi. E'yo 'ba eyini lezu tuzu 'di ma aza kozu, amuti e'yo opetaa ni ondrepi Electoral Commission ni otuta 'ye opeta emupi 'diyi ni eli drusirisi.
nyn_prompt: Enkora y'eby'obutegyeki ku erikugumizamu neehinduka, abatuuragye beyongyeire kugira ekihika ky'okwejumba omu by'obugabe bw'okusharamu. Ekitongore ky'eby'oburuuru kiriyo nikitebeekanisiza akaruuru akarikwiija omwaka ogurikwija.

eng_prompt: As global trade continues to evolve, many investors are curious about the currencies used for pricing various goods. Understanding the relationship between commodities and their pricing currencies is essential for making informed investment decisions.
lug_prompt: Ng'obusuubuzi bw'ensi yonna bweyongera okukulaakulana, bamusigansimbi bangi baagala okumanya ssente ezikozesebwa mu kugula ebintu eby'enjawulo. Okutegeera enkolagana wakati w'ebyamaguzi n'ebbeeyi yabyo mu ssente kya mugaso mu kukola okusalawo okulungi mu by'okusiga ensimbi.
ach_prompt: I kare ma biacara me wilobo tye kamede ki dongo, lutim biacara mapol tye ki miti me ngeyo wel cente ma kitiyo kwede me wilo jami mapat-pat. Niang wat matye ikin jami acata ki wel cente meggi pire tek tutwal pi moko tam me keto lim I biacara.
teo_prompt: Kwape elosi agwelanar naka akwap kere aijulanakin, ekotosi agwelanarak nuipu ajenun ikapun lu itwasamao kanu etiai loka iboro luegelegela. Amisiikin eidicane loejai kiding iboro keda itiaisinei kec erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitolomun ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo tujarani wudrikurusi ndulu ri ni mu drile, 'ba karakara lonyi vuti ale'ba 'diyi ma ava sende 'bani ayu afa ndundu eyi ma aje otuzu 'diyi ma dria. E'yo esele coza afa ozizaru 'diyi ma eselea aje yini 'diyi pie ri ma vata eri orodriru peta lonyi vuti aleza ni 'diyi 'duzu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku eby'obushubuzi omunsi yoona birikugyenda omu maisho, abashubuzi baingi nibenda kumanya esente ezirikukoresibwa omu kushashura ebintu bitari bimwe na bimwe. Okwetegyereza enkoragana eri ahagati y'ebintu n'emihendo yaabyo n'eky'omugasho omu kukora encwamu nungi omu by'obushubuzi.

eng_prompt: In discussions about ethics and legality, it's important to clarify the boundaries of acceptable behavior. Many people often confuse gifts or favors with illicit practices, leading to the question: What is considered bribery?
lug_prompt: Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo ku mpisa n'amateeka, kya mugaso okulambika ensalo z'enneeyisa ekkirizibwa.
ach_prompt: I kare me nywako lok I kom cik, pire tek tutwal me niang wang coo pa tim ma kiyee.
teo_prompt: Kotoma oineresinei nuikamunitos iponesio ka ikisila, ejokuna aitetem nuka iponesio luajokak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza e'yo adriza ala ma dria azini e'yo azita palaa 'diyi ma dria ri ma alea, eri orodriru e'yo 'yeta 'bani a'i 'diyi ma eselea 'diyi ecezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kuhanuura ebikwatireine n'emitwarize n'ebiragiro, n'eky'omugasho kushoboorora ensharo z'emitwarize erikwikirizibwa.

eng_prompt: In a democratic society, transparency and accountability are essential principles. Therefore, it is crucial that citizens are empowered to seek and obtain relevant data.
lug_prompt: Mu demokulasiya, obwerufu n'embalirira misingi mikulu. N'olw'ekyo, kya mugaso nnyo bannansi okuweebwa obuyinza okunoonya n'okufuna obubaka obukwatagana.
ach_prompt: I te loc alwak, bedo ki ada ki tic ki kor tic obedo cik ma pigi tego. Pi meno, pire tek tutwal ni ki mi twero ki anywali me yenyo ki nongo ngec ma mite.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda aseo naka itunga, aica keda aitodunit eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun eraasi nutupitono. Kanuka ngun, ejokuna noi aitigogong itunga aimo ka adumun akiro nuikamunitos akiro ngun.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu democracia niri ma alea, e'yo ada azini geri 'bani e'yo 'yezu 'diyi ma dria ri eri e'yo okporu ni eyi. Ka'dini, eri orodriru 'bani kari anzi eyini okpo fezu e'yo orodriru 'diyi ndazu azini eyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu demokurasiya, amazima n'embaririra n'emisingye mikuru. N'ahabw'ekyo, n'eky'omugasho munonga, abatuuragye kuhebwa amaani g'okuronda n'okutunga ebihandiiko ebirikukwata aha nshonga.

eng_prompt: While the outcome may not be what you hoped for, it's important to remember that the legal process can be unpredictable. Focus on the positive aspects and the lessons learned from this experience.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde ebinaavaamu biyinza obutaba nga bwewabadde osuubira, kikulu okukijjukira nti enkola y'amateeka eyinza okuba nga tetegeerekeka. Essira lisse ku birungi n'eby'okuyiga okuva mu bino.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed adwogi ne pe twero bedo kit ma imito kwede, pire tek me poo ni yoo me cik pe ngene. Ket cwinyi I kom jami mabeco ki pwony ma inongo ki I gin man ma otimme.
teo_prompt: Karaida mam aticepak ebuni akiro ngun araun nu iwomit jo, ejokuna aiitun ebe mam ijo ijeni epone lo ebeitor aswam. Ekot ijo apodokinit iboro luajokak keda aisisiaeta nu isisiaunitai kotoma akiro nu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo efupi ri ka tro ovu e'yo mini asi 'baza be ri ku ti, eri orodriru e'yo egazu kini e'yo azita palaa 'diyi ma dria ri eco ovu e'yo 'bani nile ku ri'I. Le mi ma 'ba asi e'yo onyiru 'diyi ma dria azini e'yo mini oni e'yo 'di ma alea 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: N'obu ebyarugyemu birikubaasa kutari ebi waabaire nooteekateeka, n'eky'omugasho kwijuka ngu enkora y'ebiragiro terikwetegyerezibwa. Ta omutima aha birungi n'eby'okwega kuruga omuri eki.

eng_prompt: After the trial concluded, the judge announced the sentencing. The courtroom buzzed with anticipation as the defendant was led away in handcuffs.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'omusango okuggwa, omulamuzi yalangiridde ekibonerezo. Kkooti yabadde mu ssanyu nga omuwawaabirwa atwalibwa ng'asibiddwa emiguwa.
ach_prompt: Inge tyeko pido ne, langol kop owaco pwod ma kibingolo. Lwak gubedo ki ur madit tutwal I ot kot I kare ma ngat ma ki keto bal iwiye ni kitere I buc.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na angetakin emusago, abu ekatubon kolimo etube. Apotu itunga luiboiete okooti kojaasi keda aiyalama naarai aponi oyangarai lo iwosatai keda arokok akanin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo liza ma vutia, 'ba e'yo lipiri azi e'yo liza ma dria ra. O'bi dwani ma alia 'diyi ovu ndra ayikosi 'bani agu 'bani toleri ma ti ojizu kelekelea.
nyn_prompt: Okuhurira orubanja ku kwahwaire, omuramuzi akarangirira ekifubiro. Kooti ekajaguza munonga obu orikujunaanwa yaatwarwa omu nkomwa.

eng_prompt: The excitement in the air is palpable as we prepare to share our latest developments with the media. Our team has been working tirelessly, and now it's time to reveal our hard work to the public.
lug_prompt: Essanyu eriri mu bbanga lirabika nga twetegekera okugabana ebituukiddwako n'emikutu gy'amawulire. Ttiimu yaffe ebadde ekola butaweera, era kati kye kiseera okulaga abantu emirimu gyaffe.

ach_prompt: Atye ki miti me ngeyo kwai dyangi ma itye kwede.
teo_prompt: Akoto eong ajenun nuikamunitos ibaren luegelegela lu ijatatar ijo.
lgg_prompt: Ma ava be anyapa eselesi mini 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Nyine ekihika ky'okumanya amatungo maingi agu oine.

eng_prompt: I'm curious about your agricultural operations. How much land do you cultivate for your crops?
lug_prompt: Njagala okumanya ebyo bye mukola mu bulimi.
ach_prompt: Atye ki miti me ngeyo kit ma wutimo kwede pur.
teo_prompt: Akoto eong ajenun nuikamunitos akoru kon.
lgg_prompt: Ale saaru e'yo mini 'ye agirikica ma dria 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Nyine ekihika ky'okumanya emirimo yaawe y'obuhingi n'oburiisa.

eng_prompt: After months of intense surveillance and intelligence gathering, law enforcement finally pinpointed the location of the insurgent's hideout. A coordinated operation was launched to apprehend the suspects involved in the ongoing conflict.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi mingi nga balondoola n'okukungaanya amawulire agakwata ku by'okwerinda, abakuumaddembe baasobola okuzuula ekifo abayeekera we baali beekwese. Ekikwekweto ekikwasaganyizibwa kyatandikibwawo okukwata abateeberezebwa okwenyigira mu lutalo olugenda mu maaso.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me bedo ki wang mabit tutwal I bedo ki wang mabit kacel ki coko ngec, lutic cik dong gunongo kama adwii ne tye ka kane ie. Ki cako tic mapat-pat me mako jo ma byek tye I komgi I kom lweny matye kawot anyim.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka aingic ka aituk akiro, apotu ipolisin kodumutu aiboisit naejaatar abenyak. Aponi kitegearai aswamisioit naka aikamanar ngul lu eomitai ebe ajaas toma ojie lo elosi akonye.
lgg_prompt: Mba eyi ma vutia e'yo eti ondaza okporu azini e'yo eti ondaza ni 'diyi trazu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi esu asizu angu 'ba gburundua ru 'diyi ni eyi ozizuri ra. Ba e'do e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi 'yezu tualu 'diyi 'ba 'bani ega eyi 'ye e'yo ngiringiri ni mupi drile 'diyi ma alea 'diyi obizu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okurondooza n'okurundaana ebirikukwata aha by'okwerinda, abarikukwatisa ebiragiro bakahendera baamanya ahu abahekyera baabaire beesherekyeire. Ekikwekweto kikateebwaho okukwata abarikuteekateekwaho kuba bejumbire omu butabanguko oburiyo nibugyenda omu maisho.

eng_prompt: In times of division and conflict, it is essential for us to come together and find common ground. By fostering understanding and compassion, we can create a more unified environment.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'enjawukana n'obukuubagano, kya mugaso nnyo gye tuli okwegatta n'okunoonya ekintu kye tukkiriziganyaako. Bwe tukuza okutegeera n'obusaasizi, tusobola okutondawo embeera ey'obumu.
ach_prompt: I kare me apoka-poka ki lweny, pire tek tutwal pi wan me ribbe kacel ki nongo yoo me winye. Ka wacuku cwiny dano me niang ki kica, watwero kelo ribbe ikin dano.
teo_prompt: Kapakio nu atiakatiaka ka ingungeta, ejokuna oni aimorikikin kosodete aimorikikin. Kowai lo aitopolor acamanara keda aitim, ipedori oni aitolomun aimorikikina.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa esele coza ni azini ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma alea, eri orodriru ama ni emuzu tualu azini e'yo ama eselea 'diyi esuzu. E'yo vata azini asi ndriza ma omgbo otuza si, ama eco angu ti ecita ni 'diyi ede ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'okwebaganisamu n'obutabanguko, ni kikuru kwegaita hamwe tukakoragana. Twayoreka okwetegyerezana n'embabazi, nitubaasa kureetaho okukwatanisa.

eng_prompt: After a long time apart, I decided it was important to reconnect with my loved ones. So, I packed my bags and made my way to their home.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'ekiseera ekiwanvu nga tetuli wamu, nasalawo nti kikulu okuddamu okukwatagana n'abaagalwa bange. N'olw'ekyo, nasitula ensawo zange ne ngenda ewaabwe.
ach_prompt: Ingee kare malac ma pe waribbe, amoko tamma ni pire tek tutwal me kube ki dano na me amara. Dong, akano kicaana ci acito I ganggi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka apak naelwana, abu eong aomit ebe ejokuna aimorikikin keda luminak ka. Abu eong apukor iboroka kosodi alosit orekec.
lgg_prompt: Sawa ezu ma esele cozu 'bori ma vutia, a'du e'yo kini eri orodriru e'yo nzezu 'ba ma vile leletu 'diyi pie dika. Ka'dini, ma o'ba ma vile jurua 'diyi azini ma 'du geri muzu yi vile akua.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okumara obwire buringwa ntari hamwe, nkasharamu ngu n'eky'omugasho kugaruka kukwatanisa n'abakundwa bangye. N'ahabw'ekyo, nkakoresa enshaho zangye kuza omu maka gaabo.

eng_prompt: In response to growing public discontent with the current administration, a group of activists and former politicians have come together to form a new coalition. Their goal is to address the pressing issues facing the nation and offer an alternative to the established parties.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obutali bumativu bw'abantu obweyongera ku bukulembeze obuliwo, ekibinja ky'abalwanirizi b'eddembe n'abaali bannabyabufuzi bakwataganye ne bakola omukago omupya. Ekigendererwa kyabwe kwe kukola ku nsonga ez'amangu eggwanga ze lyolekaganye nazo n'okuwaayo ekirala mu kifo ky'ebibiina ebiriwo.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa cwer cwiny pa lwak I kom tela matye kombedi, gurup pa lulweny I kom gamente kacel ki lucung iwi bye macon guribbe kacel me cako dul manyen. Miti gi tye me cobo peko ma lobo man tye ka kato ki iye ki miyo yoo mukene mapat ki dul me cungu iwi bye macon.
teo_prompt: Kanuka amamut aiyalama naka itunga kanuka eyaitene loakwana, egurupu loka itunga keda ipolitisans lukolo imorikikinos kanu aiswamaun aimorikikina naitetet. Alosikinetekec erai aitemokin atiokisio nu etereikina keda akwap keda aijaikin iponesio ice luka ipatei luapolok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu ayikosi ku e'yo driceza curu'dorisi risi, ongulumu 'ba a'di 'dipi e'yo politiki ni 'diyi pie tualu 'ba politiki ni oku 'diyi pie tualu amuti o'diru ni e'dozu. Asisile yini ri e'yo okporu kari ni dri fuzu yi be 'diyi ma aza kozu azini geri fezu amuti okpo e'dopi 'diyi ma paria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obutashemererwa bw'abantu obweyongyeire ahabwebembezi oburiho hati, guruupu y'abarwanirizi b'obutegyeki hamwe n'abaabaireho ab'eby'obutegyeki, bateire hamwe kukora ekibiina kisya. Ekigyendererwa kyabo n'okukora aha nshonga z'amaani ezirikuteganisa eihanga n'okureetaho enkora endiijo kukira ebibiina ebiriho.

eng_prompt: I've been feeling stuck in my old ways and struggling to find a sense of purpose. I know that change is possible, but I need guidance on how to achieve it.
lug_prompt: Mbadde mpulira nga nsibidde mu makubo gange ag'edda era nga nfuba okufuna ekigendererwa mu bulamu. Nkimanyi nti enkyukakyuka esoboka naye nneetaaga okulambikibwa ku ngeri y'okugituukako.
ach_prompt: Abedo ka winyo calo adong I kwo na macon dok atye ka yele me nongo tyen lok me kwo. Angeyo ni aloka-loka twere, ento amito kony me ngeyo kit me cobo ne.
teo_prompt: Aomit eong ebe ebwounit eong toma iponesioka lumojong ido euta eong aimo alosikinet kotoma aijar. Ajeni eong ebe epedori aijulakineta, konye akoto eong aicoreta nuikamunitos epone loka aitodolikin ngun.
lgg_prompt: Ma ebi e'yo ma vile geri oku 'diyi ma alia ci dika ma ebi dri ci e'yo ma orodri esuzu. Anii ra kini ojata eco i ra, te le ma ma esu imbata geri 'bani ecozu eri esuzu ri ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Ntwire ninyehurira nyemereire omu mihanda yangye eya ira kandi ndwana kuronda ekigyendererwa omu magara gangye. Ninyetegyereza ngu empinduka neebaasika, kwonka ninyetenga obuhabuzi oku nshemereire kugikora.

eng_prompt: Entrepreneurship plays a crucial role in driving innovation and economic growth. Many people are curious about what defines an entrepreneur and the qualities that set them apart.
lug_prompt: Okutandikawo emirimu kulina kinene nnyo kye kukola mu kuleetawo obuyiiya n'okukulaakulana mu byenfuna. Abantu bangi baagala okumanya kiki ekitegeza omusuubuzi n'engeri ezimufuula ow'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Diro me biacara konyo tutwal I kelo diro manyen ki dongo lobo I tenge me lim. Dano mapol tye ki miti me ngeyo ngo ma nyutu ni ngat moni obedo latim biyacara ki kit ma kite pat kwede ki lutim biacara mukene.
teo_prompt: Aswam naka agwelanar erai naepol noi kanu aitolomunun acoasinei nuitetiak ka apol naka ikapun. Ekotosi itunga luipu ajenun ibore yenejenete itunga luitolosete ibiasaran keda iponesiokec luitegelikina.
lgg_prompt: E'yo tujari 'yezuri ni azi okporu nga e'yo o'diru 'diyi ejizu tualu zota e'yo robiani 'diyi pie. Ba karakara eyi le ni e'yo 'ba tujari 'yepi 'diyi ecepi azini wura eyini aa'zu ndu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okutandikaho eby'obushubuzi nikikora omurimo gw'amaani omu kureetaho okujumbura n'entunguuka omu by'entaasya. Abantu baingi nibenda kumanya ekirikworeka omuntu orikukora bizinesi n'emitwarize erikubataanisa.

eng_prompt: I'm interested in signing up for the upcoming event. Could you provide me with the details regarding the costs involved?
lug_prompt: Njagala okwewandiisa ku mukolo ogujja.
ach_prompt: Atye ki miti me cone pi yub matye kabino ni.
teo_prompt: Akoto eong aiwadikaun kanuka epucit lo ebunit.
lgg_prompt: Ale ma ru si e'yo emupi 'diyi ma alia indi.
nyn_prompt: Nyine ekihika ky'okwehandikisa aha mukoro ogurikwija.

eng_prompt: Focus on your own goals and priorities instead of seeking validation from those around you. Your energy is better spent on actions that truly matter to you.
lug_prompt: Teeka ebirowoozo byo ku biruubirirwa byo n'ebyo by'okulembeza mu kifo ky'okunoonya okukakasibwa okuva mu abo abakwetoolodde. Amaanyi go gasinga kukozesebwa ku bikolwa ebikulu gy'oli.
ach_prompt: Ket cwinyi I kom jami ma imito ki jami ma imito me kaka yenyo cwak ki bot jo ma itye kwedgi. Itwero tic ki keroni me timo jami ma pigi tego piri.
teo_prompt: Ekot ijo apodokinit alosikinetekon keda iboro lu isingarenit ijo itia aimo aitigogongio kama ejaasi ngul luejaasi jo. Ibusakinit jo aitwasam agogong kon toma aswamisinei nuepolok noi kanukon.
lgg_prompt: Le mi ma 'ba asi e'yo mini lele 'diyi ma dria azini e'yo mini le 'diyi ma dria aga 'ba mi agei 'diyi ma e'yo egazu. Le mi ma ayu okpo emivile ri muke ndeni e'yo orodriru mi dri 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ta omutima aha bigyendererwa byawe n'ebi orikukunda omu mwanya gw'okusherura obuhwezi kuruga omu bantu abakwetooroire. Amaani gaawe nigakoresibwa kurungi omu bikorwa ebikuru ahariiwe.

eng_prompt: When evaluating the effectiveness of any initiative, it's essential to consider the tangible outcomes it produces. Ultimately, the true value of a project lies in what it achieves.
lug_prompt: Mu kwekenneenya obulungi bw'enteekateeka yonna, kikulu okulowooza ku bivaamu ebirabika. Mu nkomerero, omugaso gwa pulojekiti guli mu by'etuukako.
ach_prompt: Ka itye ka neno ber pa yub mo keken, pire tek tutwal me neno adwogi ne ma nen. I agiki ne, ber pa yub moni tye I ngo ma en cobo.
teo_prompt: Kowai lo aanyanar eswamae lo ediokere, ibusakinit aomoom nuepedorete atakanun. Kawasia, ajokis na abeit naka epurojekt ejai toma aitodolikinio ke.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azi ma orodri ma ale andrita ma alia, eri orodriru asi 'bazu e'yo orodriru erini efu 'diyi ma dria. Asizu, orodri otita azi niri eri afa erini 'ye 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Waaba nooshwijuma oburungi bw'ekigyendererwa kyona, ni kikuru kuteekateeka aha birugyemu ebirikubaasa kureebeka. Omugasho gwa purogyekiti n'ebi erikukora.

eng_prompt: Effective management is crucial for the success of any initiative, especially in the public sector. Unfortunately, many government projects struggle to meet their objectives due to a lack of proper oversight and planning.
lug_prompt: Obukulembeze obulungi bukulu nnyo eri obuwanguzi bw'enteekateeka yonna naddala mu bitongole bya gavumenti. Eky'omukisa omubi, pulojekiti za gavumenti nnyingi zirwana okutuukiriza ebigendererwa byazo olw'obutaba na kulabirirwa n'enteekateeka ennungi.
ach_prompt: Doro tic maber obedo gin ma pire tek tutwalle I tenge pa gamente. Ki gum marac, yub pa gamente mapol nongo tek tutwal me cobo miti gi pi bedo peke pa lutela ki yub maber.
teo_prompt: Aingarenone najokan erai ibore yenepol noi kanu akerianut naka adio aswam, kacut kotoma atukot naka apugan. Nukaiturur, etionikinitos ipurojektin luipu luka apugan aitodolikin alosikinetekec kanu amamus na aanyanar ka aitemonokin ejok.
lgg_prompt: Driceza kililiru ri eri orodriru e'yo azi 'yezu drile suzaru tuni esele o'bi yini 'diyi ma alia. Drile onziru, otita gamete ni karakara 'diyi dri ci e'yo eyini lele 'diyi 'yezu e'yo 'bani eyi ma pamvu onezu kililiru azini otita eyi 'yezu kurisi.
nyn_prompt: Obwebembezi burungi n'obw'omugasho aha businguzi bw'ekigyendererwa kyona, namunonga omu bitongore bya gavumenti. Eky'omugisha mubi, purogyekiti za gavumenti nyingi nizirwana kuhikiiriza ebigyendererwa byazo ahabw'okuburwa okureberera n'okuteekateekyera kurungi.

eng_prompt: In an effort to standardize financial practices across the organization, the finance manager called a meeting with the accounting team. During this meeting, he emphasized the importance of clarity and consistency in their processes.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula enkola y'ebyensimbi mu kitongole kyonna, maneja w'ebyensimbi yayita olukiiko n'ababalirizi b'ebitabo. Mu lukungaana luno, yakkaatirizza obukulu bw'obutebenkevu n'obutakyukakyuka mu mitendera gyabwe.
ach_prompt: I tute me kelo rwom me tic ki lim I dul enoni, lador tic ki lim olwongo kacoke ki lutic me lim. Ikare me kacokke enoni, en owaco ni ber tutwal me bedo ki yoo me tic matye atir.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu naka aitirian iponesio luka ikapun luka erionget kere, abu eyaiton loka ikapun konyarau airiamunet keda etimu loka ikapun. Kotoma airiamunet kangin, abu ngesi kitogogong ajokis naka aica ka ainapakina kotoma ainapeta kec.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu geri robia esuzu 'diyi otuzu amuti 'da ma alea dria, 'ba e'yo robia esuzu 'diyi ma drilea ri omve mitingi 'ba e'yo robia otipi 'diyi pie. Mitingi 'di ma alea, eri 'ba okpo orodri e'yo 'bazu e'yo ada be azini e'yo yi 'yepi 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho enkora emwe omu by'empiiha omu kitongore, manegya w'eby'empiiha akeeta orukiiko na tiimu y'ababazi b'ebitabo. Omu rukiiko oru, akasisinkana omugasho gw'okworeka gye n'okukuratira engyenderwaho yaabo.

eng_prompt: In an effort to support the agricultural sector and promote sustainable farming practices, the government has announced new financial incentives. As part of this initiative, farmers' groups will be exempted from paying taxes.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okuwagira eby'obulimi n'obulunzi n'obulunzi obuwangaazi, gavumenti erangiridde ensimbi empya. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, ebibiina by'abalimi bijja kusonyiyibwa okusasula emisolo.
ach_prompt: I tute me tyelo kor tenge me pur ki dongo diro me pur matye anyim, gamente otyeko cwalo lok angeya manyen me miyo kony me lim. Macalo but yub man, kibigonyo dul pa lupur ki culu mucoro.
teo_prompt: Kanu aigang erionget loka akor ka aitopolor akoru na ejok, abu apugan kolimo ikapun luitetiak. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, eponio alemar igurupun lu akoriok kotoma aitac isolosinei.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu esele agrikica niri atizu dika geri ori ezoza ni ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, gamete azi e'yo robia feza ni o'diru 'diyi ma dria. Otita 'di ma azi ru, 'ba nga amuti 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyini 'diyi tru musoro ofezu ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okushagika eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa n'okutunguura emiringo y'obuhingi n'oburiisa erikugumaho, gavumenti erangirire esente nsya. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, guruupu z'abahingi n'abariisa niziija kusharwaho okushashura emishoro.

eng_prompt: After attending the financial literacy workshop, he gained valuable insights into budgeting and investing. With this newfound knowledge, he will be able to make smart decisions with his money.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwetaba mu musomo gw'okusoma ebyensimbi, yafuna amagezi ag'omugaso ku mbalirira n'okusiga ensimbi. Ng'alina amagezi gano amapya, ajja kusobola okusalawo mu ngeri ey'amagezi ku ssente ze.
ach_prompt: Ingee bedo tye I kacoke me pwonyo dano lok kom lim, en onongo ngec mapire tek tutwal I kom byek me lim ki keto lim I tic. Ki ngec manyen man, en twero moko tam mabeco I kom cente ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ajaikin toma airiamun naka aisisia nuka ikapun, abu ngesi kodum acoa naepol noi naikamunit ebajet keda aipikakin ikapun. Keda acoa na naitetet, ebuni ngesi apedori aitolomun aseununeta nuajokak keda ikapun ke.
lgg_prompt: Erini muzu otita imbatani e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma dria ri ma alia 'bori ma vutia, eri esu ondua orodriru otita ajeni 'diyi ma dria azini lonyi vuti alezani 'diyi ma dria. Ondua erini esu o'diru 'di be, eri nga e'yo onduaru 'diyi 'du i vile senderi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuza omu mushomo gw'okwegyesa eby'esente, akatunga obwengye bw'omugasho aha by'embaririra hamwe n'okutamu sente. Ahabw'obwengye obu yaatungire, naija kubaasa kucwamu gye aha sente ze.

eng_prompt: After months of suspicion and investigation, the charity board finally decided to take action against their treasurer. Whispers of financial mismanagement had circulated among the members, leading to a deeper inquiry into the group's finances.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okwekengera n'okunoonyereza, akakiiko akakola ku by'obwannakyewa kaasalawo okukola ku muwanika waazo. Okuwuubaala kw'okukozesa obubi ensimbi kwali kubunye mu bammemba, ekyaviiriddeko okunoonyereza okw'amaanyi ku nsimbi z'ekibiina.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me bedo ki byek ki kwed, dul ma doro dul ma miyo kony bot lucan dong gumoko tamgi me timo gin mo I kom lagwok limgi. Winye me tic ki lim I yoo marac obedo ka wot I kin lumemba, ma okelo kwed matut I kom lim pa dul enoni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aomisio keda aingic, apotu lukapolok luigangitos itunga kotuboto aswam nuikamunitos agwelanaran kec. Apotu akiro nuikamunitos aitolitol ikapun kokerata kanejaas imeban, ido abu koyangau aingic naepol noi naka ikapun luka egurupu.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani e'yo egazu azini vuti ondaza ma vutia, amuti 'ba azakoma fe'baa 'diyi ma drilea 'diyi asizu asi 'du e'yo 'du 'ba eyi ma robia ta mbapiri ma rua. O'duko e'yo robia ayuza onzi ma dria 'diyi aci 'ba amuti 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eselea, e'yo 'di fe 'bani e'yo vuti ondazu amuti 'da ma robia ma dria drile.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okuteekateeka n'okucondooza, akakiiko k'obuhwezi kakasharamu kutwarira eky'okureeberaho omubaziiki waabo. Orugambo rw'okukoresa kubi esente rukajanjaara omu ba memba, ekyarugiremu okucondooza aha nshohoza y'ekibiina.

eng_prompt: Successful project execution hinges on the ability to collaborate and communicate effectively among team members. Without a unified effort, tasks can become disorganized and inefficient.
lug_prompt: Okutuukiriza pulojekiti obulungi kwesigama ku busobozi bw'okukwatagana n'okuwuliziganya obulungi mu bammemba ba ttiimu. Awatali kaweefube wa bumu, emirimu giyinza okutaataaganyizibwa n'obutakola bulungi.
ach_prompt: Timo tic maber jenge I kom ribe ki lok maber ikin lumemba me dul tic. Labongo tic ma ribe, tic pe twero bedo maber.
teo_prompt: Aitodolikin epurojekt loajokan nes itodunit apedor naka aiswamanara ka einer ejok kanejaas imeban luka etimu. Arai emamei aimorikikina, epedorete aswamisinei aibiror ido mam iswamaete ejok.
lgg_prompt: Otita eyi ma e'yo 'yezu kililiru ri le 'ba eyi ma eci ti tualu e'yo nzezu eyi ma eselea kililiru. Okpo ti ecita kokoru, azi eyi eco eca e'yo kokoru dika eyi econi azi nga kililiru ku.
nyn_prompt: Okutwara purogyekiti omu nkora kurugirira aha kukwatanisa n'empurizagana nungi omu ba memba ba tiimu. Hatariho okukwatanisa, emirimo neebaasa kutabanguka kandi etakora gye.

eng_prompt: The state government has finalized its budget allocations for the upcoming fiscal year. As part of this process, each district will be notified how much money it will be receiving.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti y'essaza emalirizza embalirira yaayo ey'omwaka gw'ebyensimbi ogujja. Nga ekitundu ku nkola eno, buli disitulikiti ejja kutegeezebwa ssente mmeka z'egenda okufuna.
ach_prompt: Gamente me lobo dong otyeko poko byek me lim pi mwaka me lim mabino ni. Macalo but yub man, kibi niango distrik weng I wel cente ma gubi nongo.
teo_prompt: Adau apugan naka akwap aitodolikin ebajet ke kanuka ekaru loka ikapun lo ebunit. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, eponio aitijenikin ngol edisitrikt ikapun lu edumuni ngesi.
lgg_prompt: Gamete kari niri otu otita ajeni eli robiani emupi ri ni 'diyi 'bo. Otita 'di ma azi ru, 'ba nga distrikiti alu alu dri ece robia erini nga esu ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti y'eihanga eherize kuheereza abantu embaririra y'omwaka gw'eby'esente ogurikwija. Omu nkora egi, buri disiturikiti neija kumanyisibwa esente ezi erikwija kutunga.

eng_prompt: In response to the increasing threat of infectious diseases, many organizations have recognized the need for proactive measures. As a result, these institutions have implemented various health protocols and safety guidelines.
lug_prompt: Olw'obulabe bw'endwadde ezisiigibwa, ebitongole bingi bikirabye nti kyetaagisa okubaako kye bikola. N'ekivuddemu, amatendekero gano gatadde mu nkola enkola z'ebyobulamu n'obukuumi ez'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me two ma kobo oyot-oyot tutwal, dul mapat-pat guniang ni omyero gutim gin mo. Macalo adwogi ne, gangi tic magi guketo itic cik mapat-pat makwako yot-kom ki gwoko ber bedo.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuka adekasinei nu ikopas, ejenete iriongeta luipu eipud loka aitikitik. Kanuka ngun, etolomutu iriongeta lu ainapeta nuka angaleu keda nuka ayuwara.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru azo eyi erepi 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma e'yosi, amuti karakara eyi esu ra kini le 'ba ma 'du e'yo eyi mbeleru. E'yo 'disi, pari onita ni 'diyi 'ba azita ndu ndu e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi azini azita agei tema ni 'diyi 'yeta ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'endwara ezirikuturira obweyongyeire,ebitongore bingi byetegyereize ekyetengo ky'okukora ekirikwetengyesa. N'ekyarugiremu,ebitongore ebi bitaire omu nkora engyenderwaho z'eby'amagara n'eby'okwerinda.

eng_prompt: Numerous studies have shown a strong correlation between social inequalities and psychological distress. As individuals face systemic biases and prejudices, their overall quality of life can significantly diminish.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okungi kulaga akakwate ak'amaanyi wakati w'obutafaanagana mu mbeera z'abantu n'okunyigirizibwa mu birowoozo. Abantu ssekinnoomu bwe boolekaganye n'obusosoze mu nkola, omutindo gw'obulamu bwabwe okutwalira awamu gusobola okukendeera ennyo.
ach_prompt: Kwed mapol onyuto kubbe matek tutwal ikin dano matye ki peko me tam. Ka dano acel-acel nongo apoka-poka, rwom me kwo gi twero dok piny tutwal.
teo_prompt: Apotu aingic naepol itodutu eidicane loepol noi kiding atiakatiaka naka itunga keda aiyalongong. Kwape itunga itereikina keda atiakatiaka keda atiakatiaka, epedori adoketaitikec naka aijar aitidisiar noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza karakara eyi e'da e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma esele cozu trotro ri ma eselea e'yo ewaru eyi 'yepi 'diyi pie. ꞋBani ꞌba yi ma ngulupisi ꞌdiyi dri fuzu eꞌyo ꞌbani yi ma esele cozu azini eꞌyo ꞌbani yi ma esele cozu ꞌdiyi be ꞌdiyisi, yi ma idri ma wura ma omgbo ni eco esi ra.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza kwingi kworeka okukwatanisa kw'amaani ahagati y'obutingana omu bantu hamwe n'oburemeezi bw'omutwe. Abantu ku barikutunga okushoroorwa n'okushoroorwa, omutindo gw'amagara gaabo nigubaasa kukyendeera munonga.

eng_prompt: In response to growing concerns about the accessibility and quality of medical services, officials have been discussing potential reforms. Recent studies have highlighted significant gaps in health care delivery that need urgent attention.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira okweyongera ku kufuna n'omutindo gw'obujjanjabi, abakungu babadde bateesa ku nnongoosereza eziyinza okukolebwa. Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga ebituli mu byobulamu ebyetaaga okukolebwako mu bwangu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo ma tye kamede I kom yoo me nongo kony me yot kom ki rwom ne, lutic gubedo ka lok I kom aloka-loka matwero time. Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto peko madit tutwal I tenge me yot-kom ma omyero ki tii iye oyot-oyot tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongongo naikamunit adumun keda adoketait na amukian, eutasi eswamak aitemitem aijulanakineta. Aingic napac itodunit atiokisio nuepolok noi nuka amukian nuekotosi aitemokin katipet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza ma omgbo ni tuzu e'yo azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma esuta ma dria, azi'ba eyi e'bi agbatara gba ojata ecopi ra 'diyi ma dria. E'yo eti ondaza ebipi o'diru 'diyi e'da e'yo ewaru azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'okwerarikirira aha ku obuheereza bw'eby'amagara burikubaasa kuhikwaho n'omutindo gw'obuheereza bwabwo, abakungu batwire nibagaaniira aha mpindahinduka ezirikubaasa kubaho. Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka oburemeezi bw'amaani omu buheereza bw'eby'amagara oburikwetenga kukorwaho juba.

eng_prompt: After weeks of preparation and anticipation, the team gathered to discuss their strategies and goals. The atmosphere was charged with excitement as they delved into important topics over the course of the event.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera nga beetegekera n'okusuubira, ttiimu yakungaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nteekateeka n'ebiruubirirwa byabwe. Embeera yabadde ya ssanyu nga boogera ku nsonga enkulu mu kiseera ky'omukolo.
ach_prompt: Ingee cabit mapol me yubbe ki bedo ki byek, joo ne gugure me nywako lok I kom yub gi ki miti gi. Lwak gubedo ki yomcwiny madit tutwal I kare ma gubedo ka lok I kom lok mapigi tego I kare me yub eni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin lu aitemonokin keda aomisio, apotu etimu kimorikikinos kanu aitemitem iwaitin kec keda apeleikinata kec. Ajaasi itunga keda aiyalama naarai apotu kesi kitetemoto akiro nuepolok noi kotoma opucit kangol.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti otuza azini e'yo egaza ma vutia, amuti 'da tra eyi agbatara gbazu geri eyini azi ngazu 'diyi ma dria azini e'yo eyini le 'ye 'diyi ma dria. Angu nderi ma alea ayiko ga tre eyini e'yo nzezu e'yo okporu 'diyi ma dria omu 'da ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande z'okweteekateekyera n'okuteekateeka, tiimu ekateeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha nkora yaabo hamwe n'ebigyendererwa byabo. Abantu bakashemererwa munonga ahabw'okugamba aha nshonga nkuru aha mukoro.

eng_prompt: Efforts are being intensified to address the rising rates of HIV among vulnerable populations. One key focus is to close the gap of new infections to women and girls.
lug_prompt: Kaweefube agenda mu maaso okulwanyisa omuwendo gw'abantu abalina akawuka akaleeta mukenenya mu bantu abateesobola. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu eby'okussaako essira kwe kukendeeza ku muwendo gw'abakyala n'abawala abakwatibwa obulwadde obupya.
ach_prompt: Gitye ka tute matek me lweny i kom wel dano matye ki kwidi two jonyo I kin jo ma peko tye I komgi. Gin acel ma omyero waket iye cwiny madit tutwal en aye me gengo two manyen ma mako mon ki anyira.
teo_prompt: Eutai aswam kagogong kanu aitemokin aiyatakin naka adekasinei nuka ekurut lo eseny kanejaas itunga lu ican. Alosikinet naepol ngesi aitikitik adekasinei nuitetiak nejaas angor keda apesur.
lgg_prompt: Ba okpo 'ba e'yo azo izia niri ma omgbo tupi 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alea 'diyi ma eselea ri ma aza kozu. E'yo azi okporu 'bani asi 'bazu drinia ri eri e'yo 'bani azo o'diru 'diyi esuzu oku eyi ma eselea ezoanzi eyi pie ri ma omgbo esizu.
nyn_prompt: Hariho amaani agarikugyenda omu maisho okurwanisa omuhendo gw'abantu abaine akakooko ka siriimu ogweyongyeire omu bantu abatarikwebaasa. Ekintu kikuru ekishemereire kutaho amaani n'okuzibira abakazi n'abaishiki okukwatwa oburwaire obutsya.

eng_prompt: Advancements in medical research and treatment options have significantly improved the prognosis for those affected by this viral disease. As a result, many individuals are experiencing better health outcomes and increased longevity.
lug_prompt: Enkulaakulana mu kunoonyereza kw'ebyobujjanjabi n'engeri y'okujjanjaba erongoosezza nnyo obulwadde bw'abo abakoseddwa obulwadde buno obusiigibwa akawuka. N'ekivuddemu, abantu bangi bafuna ebyobulamu ebirungi n'okweyongera okuwangaala.
ach_prompt: Alokaloka ma otimme I kwed me yot kom ki yoo me nongo yat okelo alokaloka madit tutwal I kom kit me nongo two pa jo ma two eni omakogi. Macalo adwogi ne, dano mapol tye ka nongo yot kom maber ki medo kare me kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Apol naka aingic naka adekisia keda amukian etojokuna noi nuka adekasinei nuka itunga luejaasi keda adeka na. Kanuka ngun, eutasi itunga luipu ajaut keda angaleu najokan keda aijar naepol.
lgg_prompt: Eꞌyo ꞌbani esu eꞌyo eti ondazu azini aro esuzu ꞌdiyi otu eꞌyo ꞌbani ꞌba azo ꞌdi be ꞌdiyi ma rua ꞌdiyi ma eti ondazu ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara eyi e'yo rua ala ni muke 'diyi esu dika eyi ma idri sa'wa ezu.
nyn_prompt: Entunguuka omu kucondooza ahaby'amarwariro hamwe n'emibazi erikukoresibwa, eyongyeire aha burwaire bw'abantu abarwaire oburwaire obu. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu baingi nibatunga amagara marungi n'okwongyera aha magara gaabo.

eng_prompt: Connecting with others who share similar experiences can provide valuable support and understanding. Engaging in conversations with those facing similar challenges can help alleviate feelings of isolation.
lug_prompt: Okukwatagana n'abalala abalina byebayitamu ebifaanagana kisobola okuwa obuyambi obw'omuwendo n'okutegeeragana. Okwetaba mu mboozi n'abo aboolekaganye n'ebizibu ebifaanagana kiyinza okuyamba okukendeeza ku nneewulira y'okweyawula ku balala.
ach_prompt: Kube ki jo mukene matye ki ngec marom twero miyo kony ki niang maber tutwal. Nywako lok ki jo ma gitye ka kato ki peko ma rom ki megi twero konyo me gengo winyo ni itye keni.
teo_prompt: Airiamun keda luce luejaasi keda akiro nueputosi epedori aijaikin agangat keda amisiikin. Einer keda ngul lu ejaas keda atiokisio kwape kangun ingarakini aitidisiar aiyalongong.
lgg_prompt: Ti ecita 'ba azi e'yo yi 'yepi yi ma eselea 'diyi pie ri eco atita azini vata ma omgbo otu ra. E'yo nzeza 'ba e'yo ewaru aluri be 'diyi pie ri ni fe e'yo aa'zu a'dule ri ma omgbo esi.
nyn_prompt: Okukwatanisa n'abandi abarikuba baine oburemeezi oburikushushana noobaasa kutunga obuhwezi n'okwetegyereza. Okugaaniira n'abo abarikuhikwaho oburemeezi nk'obwo nikibaasa kuhwera omu kukyendeeza okwetorora.

eng_prompt: Many young people in the slums of Kampala face limited economic opportunities and lack access to education. As a result, some turn to alternative means of income, leading to a rise in sex work among this vulnerable population.
lug_prompt: Abavubuka bangi mu bitundu by'omugotteko mu Kampala bafuna emikisa emitono mu byenfuna era tebasobola kusoma. N'ekivuddemu, abamu baddukira mu ngeri endala ez'okufunamu ssente, ekiviiriddeko okweyongera mu kwegatta mu bantu bano abateesobola.
ach_prompt: Bulu mapol ma gibedo I kabedo ma opong ki lucan I Kampala pe gitye ki gum me nongo lim ki kwan. Macalo adwogi ne, jo mukene gicako tic ki yoo mukene me nongo cente, ma oweko tic me butu imit omede ikin jo ma goro.
teo_prompt: Atumunak luipu luko Kampala mam edumunenete arerengesio nu edumunun ikapun ido mam edumunenete asioman. Kanuka ngun, etojokaarete ice iponesio ice luka adumun ikapun, ido eyangauni aiyatakin naka aswam naka aelo kanejaas itunga lu ican.
lgg_prompt: Ba ode karakara angu ocuzaru kambala 'diyi ma alea 'diyi drileba robia esuzu 'diyi esu were dika eyi esuni onita ku. E'yo 'disi, 'ba azi 'diyi yi oja geri ndundu robia esuzu 'diyi vu, e'yo fepi e'yo ali o'bazaniri ma omgbo ni tuzu 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alia 'diyi ma eselea.
