N'ekyarugiremu, abamwe nibaronda emiringo endiijo y'okutungamu sente, ekirikureetaho okweyongyera kw'abakozi b'ebikorwa by'okuteerana omu bantu abo abatarikwebaasa.

eng_prompt: Recent studies have shown a troubling rise in the prevalence of the disease within the community. Many individuals affected by it are struggling to find adequate healthcare resources.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga okweyongera kw'obulwadde mu bantu. Abantu bangi abakoseddwa obulwadde buno balwana okufuna obujjanjabi obumala.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto ni wel dano matye ki two eni tye ka medde tutwal I kabedo mapatpat. Dano mapol ma two eni opoto i komgi gitye ka yele me nongo kony me yot kom ma oromo.
teo_prompt: Akiro nuitodunitos nuka aingic pac itodunit ebe iyata noi adekasinei kotunga. Itunga luipu luetirorit ngesi eutasi ainingosit adumun amukian naedolit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza o'diru 'diyi ece kini azo 'di ma omgbo tu ongulumu eyi ma alea saaru. Ba karakara erini candi fe 'diyi dri ci afa arojo ni 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka okweyongyera kw'oburwaire omu bantu. Abantu baingi abateganisiibwe, nibarwana kuronda obuheereza bw'eby'amagara oburikumara.

eng_prompt: In recent discussions about the healthcare system, many have raised concerns about the attitudes of certain professionals. Reports indicate that a troubling number of health workers prioritize efficiency over empathy.
lug_prompt: Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko ku nkola y'ebyobulamu, bangi baleese okweraliikirira ku ndowooza z'abakugu abamu. Lipoota ziraga nti omuwendo gw'abasawo ogweraliikiriza bakulembeza okukola obulungi okusinga okusaasira.
ach_prompt: I kare me nywako lok ma okato cokcok-ki I kom yub me yot kom, dano mapol gubedo ki lworo I kom tim pa ludiro mukene. Adwogi tic nyutu ni wel lutic yoto kom mapol giketo tic maber bedo gin ma pire tek loyo kica.
teo_prompt: Kotoma oineresinei lu atuboros nuikamunitos nuka angaleu, apotu itunga luipu itodutu aiyalongongokec kanuikamunitos iponesio luka ipirioitin ice. Itodunitos iripotan ebe eswamak lu adekis luipu isingarenitos aswam ejok adepar aitim.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza o'diru 'diyi ma alia geri alata ma dria 'diyi ma dria, 'ba karakara eyi ece asi otiza eyi e'yo azi'ba azi 'diyini 'diyi ma dria. O'duko ece kini azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ma kalafe asi otiza be 'diyi azi ngaza kililiru ri 'du okporu aga asi e'yeresi ri.
nyn_prompt: Omu kuhanuura okuhweireho ahaby'amagara, baingi boorekire okwerarikirira aha mitwarize y'abakugu abamwe. Ripoota nizooreka ngu omuhendo gw'abashaho ogurikwerarikiriza, niguza omu maisho okukora kurungi kukira okusaasira.

eng_prompt: In order to create a more inclusive healthcare system, it is essential to equip health workers with the necessary training and resources. This approach ensures that they can effectively address the diverse needs of the communities they serve.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutondawo enkola y'ebyobulamu erimu abantu bonna, kya mugaso okuwa abasawo okutendekebwa okwetaagisa n'ebikozesebwa. Enkola eno ekakasa nti basobola okukola ku byetaago eby'enjawulo eby'ebitundu bye baweereza.
ach_prompt: Me kelo yub me yot kom ma dano weng tye iye, pire tek tutwal me miyo pwony ki jami ma mite ki lutic yoto kom. Yoo man weko ginongo yoo me cobo miti pa lwak ma gitiyo botgi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitolomun ewai lo amukian lo imoriarit itunga kere, ejokuna noi aijaikin eswamak lu adekis aitutuoro ka iboro lu itwasamao. Ewai lo ijaikit kesi aitemokin atiokisio nuka itunga lu ijanakinete kesi.
lgg_prompt: Azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, eri orodriru 'ba azi ngapi arojoa 'diyi dri imbata fezu azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi fezu. Geri 'di ni fe eyini ani ecozu e'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu ongulumu eyini azi ngazu 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Okubaasa kureetaho enkora y'eby'amagara erimu abantu boona, n'eky'omugasho kuheereza abashaho emyoga n'eby'okukoresa ebirikwetengwa. Enkora egi neehamya ngu nibabaasa kukora ahabyetaago by'abantu b'omubyanga ebibarikuheereza.

eng_prompt: In response to the alarming rise in infection rates, communities have rallied together to address the urgent health crisis. As the situation escalates, numerous initiatives have emerged to combat the outbreak effectively.
lug_prompt: Olw'omuwendo gw'abantu abakwatibwa obulwadde okweyongera mu ngeri eyeeraliikiriza, ebitundu bikungaanidde wamu okukola ku buzibu bw'ebyobulamu obw'amangu. Ng'embeera yeeyongera, enteekateeka nnyingi zivuddeyo okulwanyisa okubalukawo kw'ekirwadde mu ngeri ennungi.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel dano matye ka nongo two, lwak guribbe kacel me lweny i kom peko me yot kom matye ni. I kare ma peko ne tye ka medde, yub mapol tye me lweny i kom poto pa two eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin enaaba loka adekasinei, apotu itunga kimorikikinos kanu aitemokin ationis naka angaleu. Kwape iyata ejautene, aponi kitolomunai iponesio luipu lu itikitikere adeka.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba azo esupi 'diyi ma ongmbo ni tuzu okporu ri ma e'yosi, ongulumu eyi tra eyi tualu e'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma aza kozu. E'yo ni tuzu drile, e'yo karakara eyi efu a'di 'dizu e'yo efupi 'da be geri kililiru 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'oburwaire, abantu bakwatanisa kukora ahaburemeezi bw'eby'amagara. Embeera ku erikweyongyera, enteekateeka nyingi zikozirwe okurwanisa okubarukaho kw'endwara omu muringo murungi.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing health crisis, the organization has mobilized resources to address the urgent needs of affected individuals. Their mission focuses on ensuring that everyone has access to necessary medical support, regardless of their financial situation.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ekizibu ky'ebyobulamu ekigenda kyeyongera, ekitongole kikungaanyizza ebintu okukola ku byetaago eby'amangu eby'abantu abakoseddwa. Ekigendererwa kyabwe kwe kukakasa nti buli omu afuna obujjanjabi obwetaagisa, awatali kufaayo ku mbeera ye ey'ebyensimbi.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko me yot kom matye kamede ameda, dul enoni ocoko lim me cobo miti pa dano ma onongo peko. Miti gi tye me neno ni dano weng gunongo kony me yot kom ma mite labongo paro pi lim ma gitye kwede.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ationis naka angaleu naepol noi, atukokinit erionget iboro kanu aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga luetirorit. Alosikinetekec nes awanyun ebe epedorete itunga kere adumunun amukian na ekotoi, araida ejaasi kesi keda ikapun idis.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi tupi 'diyi ma aza kozu, amuti 'da tra afa ayuzaru 'diyi e'yo mbeleru 'ba e'yo 'yepi 'diyi ma aza kozu. Asisile yiniri 'ba asi ndrezu kini 'ba dria ma esu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ra ka tro ovu e'yo robia ni yini ma alia 'diyi ma talasi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara obweyongyeire,ekitongore kirundaine ebintu by'okukora ahabyetaago by'abantu abaine oburemeezi. Ekigyendererwa kyabo n'okureeba ngu buri omwe yaatunga obuhwezi bw'eby'amagara, oihiremu n'embeera ye y'esente.

eng_prompt: In response to the rising health concerns, local leaders have initiated a comprehensive outreach program. Their goal is to ensure that everyone has access to essential health services.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira kw'ebyobulamu okweyongera, abakulembeze b'ebyalo batandiseewo enteekateeka y'okubunyisa amawulire. Ekigendererwa kyabwe kwe kukakasa nti buli omu afuna obujjanjabi obwetaagisa.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me yot kom matye kamede, lutela me tedero gucako yub me konyo dano weng. Miti gi tye me neno ni dano weng gunongo kony me yot kom ma mite pi kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongong naka angaleu, etegeasi engarenok luka atutubet ainapeta nuka aitodolikin itunga. Alosikinetekec erai awanyun ebe nginitunganan edumuni amukian na ejai.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi tupi tutu 'diyi ma aza kozu, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi e'do otita azi eyini ani ecozu eyi ma aza kozu dria. Asisile yiniri lezu nezu ra kini 'ba dria isu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara obweyongyeire, abeebembezi b'ebyaro batandikireho enteekateeka y'okuhitsya abantu boona. Ekigyendererwa kyabo n'okureeba ngu buri omwe yaatunga obuheereza bw'eby'amagara.

eng_prompt: Despite government regulations aimed at improving maternal health, many communities in Uganda still rely on traditional birth attendants for support during childbirth. This reliance persists even after official bans were implemented to regulate their practices.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga gavumenti erina ebiragiro ebigendereddwamu okutumbula ebyobulamu bwa bamaama abazaala, ebitundu bingi mu Uganda bikyesiga abazaalisa ab'ekinnansi okubawa obuyambi nga bazaala. Okwesigama kuno kukyagenda mu maaso newankubadde envumbo entongole zaateekebwawo okulungamya ebikolwa byabwe.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gamente oketo cik me ilo malo rwom me yot kom pa mon ma oyac, pol pa dano I Uganda pud gijenge I kom mon ma oyac me miyo kony ikare me nywal. Gen man pud tye kadi bed ni ki juku tic gi.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaas ikisila luka apugan kanu aitojokar angaleu naka angor nu epotiete, eringa itunga luipu ko Uganda emunokina keda angor nu esidook kanu aingarakinio kapak naka aidoun. Inyikokini amunokina ngin araida aponi kimikai aswamisioitikec.

Asi'baza 'diri mu drile ata 'bani e'yo azita palaa 'diyi atrizu e'yo yini 'ye 'diyi onezu 'bori ma vutia ra ti.

eng_prompt: Despite the event being highly anticipated, many were left wondering about the president's absence. Speculation grew as the ceremony approached, with officials remaining tight-lipped about the reasons for his decision.
lug_prompt: Wadde ng'omukolo gwali gusuubirwa nnyo, bangi baasigala beebuuza lwaki pulezidenti teyabaddewo. Okuteebereza kweyongera ng'omukolo gusemberera, nga abakungu basirifu ku nsonga z'okusalawo kwe.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni dano mapol gubedo ki byek me bedo tye I yub eni, dano mapol gubedo ki ngeng I kom bedo peke pa ladit lobo. Byek ma obedo tye omede ikare ma yub ne cok, ki lutic ma pe gunyuto tyen lok ma oweko en omoko tamme.

eng_prompt: In a recent community event aimed at improving local healthcare services, the minister announced several initiatives to enhance emergency response capabilities. As part of these efforts, the minister donated two ambulances to the district.

eng_prompt: Due to the prolonged drought and insufficient rainfall, many reservoirs are running dangerously low. As a result, the low levels of water have greatly affected the power generation.
lug_prompt: Olw'ekyeya ekiwanvu n'obutaba na nkuba emala, amazzi mangi gakendeera mu ngeri ey'akabi. N'ekivuddemu, amazzi amatono gakosezza nnyo amasannyalaze.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing demand for energy and economic growth, local leaders sought solutions to boost the region's infrastructure. After extensive planning and community discussions, they decided to invest in a new energy source.
lug_prompt: Olw'obwetaavu bw'amasannyalaze n'ebyenfuna obweyongera, abakulembeze b'ebyalo baanoonya engeri y'okutumbula ebintu ebikozesebwa mu kitundu. Oluvannyuma lw'okuteekateeka ennyo n'okukubaganya ebirowoozo mu kitundu, baasalawo okusiga ensimbi mu nsibuko y'amasannyalaze empya.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti me mac ki dongo lobo, lutela me tedero guyenyo yoo me ilo malo rwom me gedo i twok piny eni. Ingee yube maber ki nywako lok I kin lwak, gumoko tam gi me keto cente I yub manyen me mac.

Otuta angiri 'yezu azini agbatara gbazu ongulumu eyi ma eselea 'bori ma vutia, eyi 'du e'yo robia ayuzu geri aci esuzu o'diru 'diyi ma alea.

Bwanyima y'okukora enteekateeka n'okuhanuura n'abantu b'omukyanga kyabo, bakasharamu kutandikaho enkora ensya y'okukoresa amashanyarazi.

eng_prompt: Due to the ongoing power supply issues, the authorities have announced a new schedule for electricity distribution. As a result, the loading shedding will take a period of two weeks.
lug_prompt: Olw'ebizibu by'amasannyalaze ebigenda mu maaso, ab'obuyinza balangiridde enteekateeka empya ey'okugaba amasannyalaze. N'ekivuddemu, okukendeera kw'amasannyalaze kujja kutwala ebbanga lya wiiki bbiri.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me mac matye kawot anyim, lutela gukati ki yub manyen me poko mac. Adwogi ne obedo ni mac bi rweny pi cabit aryo.
teo_prompt: Kanuka ationis na akim na elosi akonye, alimor apedorosio ainapeta nuitetiak nuka aikor akim. Kanuka ngun, eyangaikini akim apak naka isabitin iarei.
lgg_prompt: E'yo aci awaza ni mupi drile 'diyi ma e'yosi, drice'ba eyi azi sa'wa o'diru aci awazu ri ni. E'yo 'disi, aci ma ako ni nga sabiti 'du iri.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'amashanyarazi oburikugyenda omu maisho, ab'obushoborozi balangirire enteekateeka nsya y'okugaba amashanyarazi. N'ekyarugiremu, amashanyarazi nigaija kumara esande ibiri.

eng_prompt: In response to the increasing demand for water resources, the government has proposed a comprehensive plan for water management. This initiative includes the construction of several infrastructure projects aimed at enhancing water storage capabilities.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu bw'amazzi obweyongera, gavumenti eteesezza enteekateeka enzijuvu ey'okuddukanya amazzi. Enteekateeka eno erimu okuzimba pulojekiti ez'enjawulo ezigendereddwamu okutumbula obusobozi bw'okutereka amazzi.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti pa jami me pii, gamente omiyo tam me yubu yub me tic i kom pii. Yub man tye iye gedo gedo mapat-pat ma ki keto pi medo rwom me gwoko pii.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipuda lo akipi, abu apugan kitutub ainapeta nuka aidar akipi. Imoriarit aswamisioit ngin adukio naka ipurojektin lu itwasamao kanu aitojokar aiboisit na aidar akipi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu yi ma dria 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, gamete fe egata otita azi dria yi ma tambazu 'diyi ma dria. Otita 'di ma alia otita afa ayuzaru 'diyi sizu 'bani lezu yi ma tambaza ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwenda kw'amaizi kweyongyera, gavumenti eteireho enteekateeka y'okureeberera amaizi. Enteekateeka egi erimu okwombeka purogyekiti nyingi ezirikugyenderera okwongyera amaizi.

eng_prompt: Many businesses in the area have struggled to maintain operations due to frequent power outages. As a result, they have suffered financial loss because of loading shedding.
lug_prompt: Bizineesi nnyingi mu kitundu zifunye obuzibu okukuuma emirimu gyazo olw'amasannyalaze okuvaako enfunda n'enfunda. N'ekivuddemu, bafiiriddwa ssente olw'amasannyalaze okukendeera.
ach_prompt: Biacara mapol I kabedo eni tye ka tute matek me medde ki ticgi pi mac ma bedo ka rweny kare ki kare. Macalo adwogi ne, gurwenyo lim pi mac ma obedo ka rweny.
teo_prompt: Ibiasaran luipu kotoma aiboisit ngin etionikinit aidar aswamukec kanuka amamus na akim. Kanuka ngun, apotu kesi kotwakiasi ikapunukec naarai apol akim.
lgg_prompt: Tujara angu 'da ma alea karakara eyi esu e'yo ewaru azi ngazu eyini aci ako eyi ma e'yosi. E'yo 'disi, eyi avi robia e'yo aci ako nirisi ra.
nyn_prompt: Bizinesi nyingi omu kyanga zitungire oburemeezi bw'okugumizamu n'emirimo yaazo ahabw'amashanyarazi kurugaho. N'ekyarugiremu, bakafeerwa esente ahabw'amashanyarazi kurugaho.

eng_prompt: As the power outages continue to disrupt daily life, community members have expressed growing frustration. In response to these challenges, the district leaders are looking for a solution to load shedding.
lug_prompt: Ng'amasannyalaze gakyagenda mu maaso n'okutaataaganya obulamu obwa bulijjo, abantu mu kitundu balaze obwennyamivu obweyongera. Mu kwanukula okusoomoozebwa kuno, abakulembeze ba disitulikiti banoonya engeri y'okugonjoolamu okukendeera kw'amasannyalaze.
ach_prompt: Kit mac ma tye ka rweny kwede tye ka balo kwo pa lwak, lutedero tye ka nyutu cwer cwiny gi. Pi peko magi, lutela me district tye ka yenyo yoo me tyeko peko me mac ma rweny.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyangaunit amamus na akim aitolitol aijar naka nginiparan, itunga luka atutubet itodunitos amamut aiyalama. Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu, eutasi engarenok luka edisitrikt aimo epone loka aitemokin aibiror naka akim.
lgg_prompt: Aci ako ni mu drile e'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu o'du driasi ri ezazu risi, 'ba ongulumu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'da candi eyini esu ri ma omgbo ni tu ra. E'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza kozu, drice'ba distrikiti ni 'diyi geri nda aci ako ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Okuburaho kw'amashanyarazi nikugumizamu kutabangura amagara gaabo aga buriizooba, abantu b'omukyanga boorekire okwerarikirira kwabo. Ahabw'oburemeezi obu, abeebembezi ba disiturikiti bariyo nibaronda oburyo bw'okumaraho amashanyarazi.

eng_prompt: Residents have been facing prolonged power outages due to severe weather conditions. In response, local officials have called for a gathering to discuss potential solutions.
lug_prompt: Abatuuze babadde boolekaganye n'ebbula ly'amasannyalaze okumala ebbanga eddene olw'embeera y'obudde embi. Mu kwanukula, abakungu b'ebyalo bayise olukungaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri z'okugonjoolamu ensonga.
ach_prompt: Lutedero gubedo ki peko me mac pi kare malac pi peko me piny marac tutwal. Ma lubbe ki lok eni, lutic me tedero gulwongo kacoke me nywako tam i kom yoo me cobo peko eni.
teo_prompt: Etereikina itunga keda amamus na akim adaun apak naepol kanuka ekuse ka etepe loaronon. Kanu abongokin, elimokinitos eswamak luka atutubet airiamun kanu aitemitem iwaitin lu itemokinet.
lgg_prompt: Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ebi aci ako esu sa'wa ezu e'yo angu mile ni onzi 'diyisi. Erini e'yo 'da omvizu, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi omve okuta eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo eyi ma aza kozu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Abatuuragye batwire nibatunga okubura kw'amashanyarazi ahabw'embeera y'obwire embi. Omu kugarukamu, abakuru b'ebyaro beetsire orukiiko, okuhanuura aha nshonga ezirikubaasa kukorwaho.

eng_prompt: In many organizations, the effectiveness of leadership is often measured by the ability to fulfill assigned responsibilities. However, there are instances where leaders fall short of these expectations.
lug_prompt: Mu bitongole bingi, obulungi bw'obukulembeze bupimibwa okusinziira ku busobozi bw'okutuukiriza obuvunaanyizibwa obuba buweereddwa. Kyokka, waliwo ebiseera abakulembeze we balemererwa okutuukiriza ebisuubirwa bino.
ach_prompt: I dul mapol, diro pa lutela ipol kare kipimo ki kero gi me cobo tic gi. Kadi bed kumeno, tye kare mogo ma lutela pe cobo miti magi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma oriongeta nuipu, epirioit lo engarenone itodunit ebe epedori ngesi aitodolikin aswamisioit na ijaikitai ngesi. Konye, icie apakio mam engarenok epedorete aitodolikin nu eomitai.
lgg_prompt: Amuti karakara eyi ma alea, 'ba e'yo driceza ni 'diyi ma omgbo o'bi geri eyini ecozu azi eyini fele 'diyi 'yezu ri si. Kani si, sa'wa azi 'diyi ci drice'ba eyini e'yo 'bani ega 'diyi 'yezu ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu bitongore ebingi, oburungi bw'obwebembezi buriijo nibugeragyeranisibwa n'obushoboorozi bw'okuhikiiriza obujunanizibwa obuheirwe. Kwonka, hariho obwire obu abeebembezi barikuremwa kuhikiiriza ebiteekateeko ebi.

eng_prompt: After numerous complaints from residents about frequent power outages, the district leaders decided it was time to take action. They convened a meeting to discuss the ongoing issues and formulate a response.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwemulugunya okungi okuva mu batuuze ku bbula ly'amasannyalaze, abakulembeze ba disitulikiti baasalawo nti kye kiseera okubaako kye bakolawo. Baayita olukiiko okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nsonga ezigenda mu maaso n'okukola eky'okuddamu.
ach_prompt: Inge koko mapol ma aa ki bot lwak pi peko me mac matye kabino teretere, lutela me district gumoko ni kare dong oromo me timo gin mo. Gulwongo kacoke me nywako lok I kom peko matye ka time ki yubu yoo me cobo ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na angurian nuipu kanejaas itunga kanu amamus na akim, apotu engarenok luka edisitrikt koseutu ebe erai kwana apak naka aswam. Apotu kesi onyarautu airiamunet kanu aitemitem akiro nu elosi akonye ka aitolomun epone lo ebeitor.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onuza karakara engazu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi vu e'yo aci ako ni 'diyi ma dria ri ma vutia, drice'ba distrikiti ni 'diyi 'du e'yo kini sa'wa ca 'bani e'yo 'yezu ra. Eyi omve mitingi agbatara gbazu e'yo mupi drile 'diyi ma dria azini geri eyini ecozu e'yo nde ma aza kozu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okwetomboitwa kwingi kuruga omu batuuragye ahabw'amashanyarazi kuguma nigarugaho, abeebembezi ba disiturikiti bakasharamu ngu nibwo bwire bw'okukora. Baketa orukiiko kuhanuura aha nshonga ezirikugyenda omu maisho n'okukora eky'okugarukamu.

eng_prompt: After weeks of enduring frequent power outages, the community's patience was wearing thin. Frustration grew as daily routines were disrupted and essential services became unreliable.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera ng'amasannyalaze gavaako, abantu baali tebakyalina bugumiikiriza. Obwennyamivu bweyongera ng'emirimu gya buli lunaku gikosebwa era n'obuweereza obwetaagisa ne bufuuka obuteesigika.
ach_prompt: I nge cabit mapol ma mac obedo ka rweny, diyo cwiny pa lwak obedo ka rweny. Cwer cwiny omede ikare ma tic me nino ducu oballe dok kony ma pire tek pe obedo tye.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka amamus na akim, apotu itunga kongetakisi atitingikinit. Apol noi aiyalongong naarai aponi itolitolunai aswamisinei nuka nginiparan ido mam eyuwara.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti 'bani aci ako ma ti ta mbazu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba ongulumua 'diyi ma asi teza e'de ra. E'yo 'bani 'ye o'du driasi ri ma omgbo ni tu ra azini azi orodriru 'diyi eca asi'baza kokoru.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande z'okugumira amashanyarazi kurugaho, abantu bakaba batakiine kugumisiriza. Okwerarikirira kweyongyeire ahabwokuba emirimo eya buriizooba ekaba etarikwetengwa kandi n'obuheereza obw'omugasho bukaba butarikwesigwa.

eng_prompt: Despite multiple attempts to reach out, our inquiries have gone unanswered. We are growing increasingly concerned about the lack of communication from the power suppliers.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga tugezezzaako emirundi mingi okutuukirira, ebibuuzo byaffe tebiddiddwamu. Tweyongedde okweraliikirira olw'obutaba na mpuliziganya okuva mu bagaba amasannyalaze.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni watemo tyen mapol me kube kwedwa, pe kigamo lapeny wa. Watye ka medde ki bedo ki lworo I kom lok ma aa ki bot joo ma miyo mac.
teo_prompt: Karaida etamit sio adolokin, mam aponi kobongokinai aingisetawok. Iyalongongoi sio noi kanu amamus na einer kanejaas lu ekoriete akim.
lgg_prompt: Erini tro o'bizu ama vu kalafe karakara 'diyi ma talasi ra ti, ama vile zita 'diyi awi omvi kokoru. Ama ovu drile asi otizaru e'yo nzeza ako engazu 'ba aci awa'baa 'diyi vu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okuteeraho kw'emirundi mingi kutuhikaho, ebibuuzo byaitu tibirikugarukwamu. Nitweyongyera okwerarikirira ahabw'obutahurizana kuruga omu bakama b'amashanyarazi.

eng_prompt: In a recent community event aimed at improving local healthcare services, the minister announced several initiatives to enhance emergency response capabilities. As part of these efforts, the minister donated three ambulances to the district.
lug_prompt: Mu mukolo ogwabaddewo gyebuvuddeko ogugendereddwamu okutumbula ebyobulamu mu kitundu, minisita yalangiridde enteekateeka ez'enjawulo ez'okutumbula obusobozi bw'okukwatamu embeera ez'amangu. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, minisita yawaddeyo emmotoka ezitambuza abalwadde ssatu eri disitulikiti.
ach_prompt: I yub ma otime cokcok-ki ma obedo ki miti me ilo malo rwom me kony me yot kom I tedero, minista owaco yoo mapat-pat mapat-pat me ilo malo rwom me miyo kony ikare me peko ma opoto atura. Macalo but tic man, minista omiyo ambulance adek bot district.
teo_prompt: Kotoma opucit loitemonokinitai pac kanu aitojokar amukian naka itunga, abu eminista kolimo iboro luipu luepedorete aitojokar ewai lo engeso. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, abu eminista ijaik edisitrikt amotokan nuadekis auni.
lgg_prompt: Yeta ongulumu eyini o'diru lezu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ri ma alea, minisita 'da azi e'yo ndundu eyini ecozu e'yo mbeleru 'diyi ma aza kozu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Okpo 'di ma azi ru, minisita 'da fe ambulansi eyi na distrikiti ni.
nyn_prompt: Omu mukoro ogwabaireho juba ogwabaire nigugyenderera okutunguura obuheereza bw'eby'amagara omu byaro, minisita akarangirira emiringo mingi y'okutunguura eby'okureeberaho eby'amaani. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka ezi, minisita akagabira disiturikiti za ambyurensi ishatu.

eng_prompt: After months of fundraising and community support, the new ambulance finally arrived at the district's emergency services station. The leaders gathered to celebrate this significant addition to their healthcare resources.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okusonda ssente n'obuyambi okuva mu bantu, ambyulensi empya yasembyeyo okutuuka ku sitenseni ya disitulikiti ey'obujjanjabi obw'amangu. Abakulembeze baakuŋŋaanye okujaguza okwongezebwa kuno okw'omugaso mu byobulamu byabwe.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me jogo cente ki miyo kony ki lwak, ambulance manyen ni dong oo I tecen me kony ma opoto atura I district. Lutela gucokke me kwero dongo lobo man I tenge me yot kom.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aituk ikapun keda agangat kama ejaasi itunga, abu amotoka na adekis naitetet kodisitrikt. Apotu engarenok kiriamunos ainumunum aiyatakinio na naepol noi naka iboro lu amukian.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani robia trazu azini atita ongulumu eyini fezu 'bori ma vutia, ambulansi o'diru 'da eca asizu distrikiti ma pari azakoma e'yo mbeleru 'diyiniri ma alea ra. Drice'ba eyi tra eyi ayiko zu e'yo 'di ma omgbo otuzu e'yo alata ni eyivile 'diyi ma alea ri si.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okurundaana esente n'obuhwezi kuruga omu bantu, ambyurensi ensya ekahika aha disiturikiti. Abeebembezi baketeeranira hamwe okujaguza okwongyera kw'amaani omu by'amagara gaabo.

eng_prompt: Many families in our community struggle to afford basic healthcare services. As a result, many individuals forgo necessary medical treatment due to financial constraints.
lug_prompt: Amaka mangi mu kitundu kyaffe galwana okufuna obujjanjabi obusookerwako. N'ekivuddemu, abantu bangi beewala obujjanjabi obwetaagisa olw'ebbula ly'ensimbi.
ach_prompt: Gangi mapol i kabedo wa gitye ki peko me nongo kony me yot kom. Macalo adwogi ne, dano mapol pe gi nongo kony me yot kom ma mite pi peko me lim.
teo_prompt: Ikalia luipu kotoma atutubetekosi etiono adumun amukian. Kanuka ngun, mam itunga luipu edumunenete amukian na ekotoi kanu ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Familia karakara amavile ongulumu ri ma alea 'diyi dri ci robia esuzu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi esuzu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara eyi eyi aro esu e'yo ewaru robia ni 'diyisi ku.
nyn_prompt: Amaka maingi omu kyanga kyaitu nigarwana kutunga obuheereza bw'eby'amagara. Ekyarugiremu, abantu baingi tibarikutunga bujanjabi oburikwetengwa ahabw'oburemeezi bw'esente.

eng_prompt: After hearing about her generous contribution, the townspeople gathered to discuss how they could express their gratitude. Many felt that her support would make a significant difference in their ongoing projects.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuwulira ku kuwaayo kwe okw'obugabi, abantu b'omu kibuga baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri gye bayinza okulaga okusiima kwabwe. Bangi baalowooza nti obuwagizi bwe bwandireetedde enjawulo mu pulojekiti zaabwe ezigenda mu maaso.
ach_prompt: Inge winyo lok I kom mic ma mege, lwak gugure me nywako tam I kom kit ma gitwero nyuto kwede pwocgi. Dano mapol gutamo ni kony mege bikelo alokaloka madit tutwal I yub meggi matye kawot anyim.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na apupun nuikamunitos agangat ke, apotu itunga luka eibuga kiriamunos kanu aitemitem epone loipedoria kesi aitodun aisiyalamakec. Apotu luipu opupoto ebe ebuni agangat ke aijulakin ipurojektin lu elosi akonye.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erizuri ma vutia, 'ba tawuni 'da ma alea 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu geri eyini ecozu eyi ma awa'difo e'dazu 'diyi ma dria. Ba karakara eyi ega kini atita erini ri nga ojata okporu eji otita eyini mupi drile 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okuhurira ebikwatireine n'obufura bwe, abantu b'omururembo baketeeranira hamwe kuhanuura oku bashemereire kworeka okusiima kwabo. Baingi bakahurira ngu obuhwezi bwe nibwija kureetaho empindahinduka omu purogyekiti zaabo ezirikugyenda omu maisho.

eng_prompt: When arranging for a specialist consultation, it is important to clarify the financial responsibilities involved. Patients should be informed that they will need to cover certain expenses associated with their referral.
lug_prompt: Bw'oba oteekateeka okwebuuza ku mukugu, kikulu okutangaaza ku buvunaanyizibwa bw'ensimbi obuzingirwamu. Abalwadde bateekeddwa okutegeezebwa nti bajja kwetaaga okusasula ensaasaanya ezimu ezikwatagana n'okusindikibwa kwabwe.
ach_prompt: Ka itye ka yubbe me nongo kony pa ludiro, pire tek tutwal me niang kit ma tic me lim tye kwede. Lutwo omyero ki niang gi ni omyero gucul pi cente ma mite pi kobo gi.
teo_prompt: Arai itemonokin jo aingic epirioit, ibusakinit aitetem nuikamunitos ikapun lu itwasamao. Ekot aitijenikino adekak ebe ibusakinit kesi aitac ikapun ice kanu aijukario kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo otuzu 'ba nita be angiri 'diyi vu, eri orodriru e'yo robia ni 'diyi ecezu. Le 'ba ma lu 'ba azoru 'diyi dri kini le eyi ma ofe aje azi eyi ma dria eyini eyi ma ti pezu arojoa risi.
nyn_prompt: Waaba nooteekateeka kwebuuza aha bakugu, n'eky'omugasho kumanya obujunanizibwa bw'esente oburimu. Abarwaire bashemereire kumanyisibwa ngu bashemereire kushashurira ebishare ebimwe ebirikukwata aha kubohereza omu irwariro erindi.

eng_prompt: Proper preparation can significantly impact both the mother's health and the baby's development. By considering various factors ahead of time, a mother can create a supportive environment for her pregnancy.
lug_prompt: Okwetegeka obulungi kusobola okukosa obulamu bwa maama n'enkula y'omwana. Maama bw'alowooza ku nsonga ez'enjawulo nga bukyali, asobola okuteekawo embeera ennungi mu lubuto lwe.
ach_prompt: Yubbe maber twero kelo adwoki maber I kom yotkom pa mego ki dongo pa latin. Ka mego otamo I kom jami mapol mapud kare ne pe oromo, en twero yubu kabedo maber pi yacu ne.
teo_prompt: Aitemonokin ejok epedori aitojokar angaleu naka toto keda apolo naka ikoku. Kowai lo aomoom iboro luipu eringa apak, epedori toto aitolomun ejautene loajokan kanu apotu ke.
lgg_prompt: Otuta kililiru ri eco e'yo 'ye okporovu ma rua ala ma dria azini odekua ma zota ma dria ra. Erini e'yo ndundu eyi 'duzu drioru risi, ayia eco angu atita fepi eri ma okporovu eyini ri ede ra.
nyn_prompt: Okweteekateekyera kurungi nikubaasa kukora kihango aha magara g'omukazi n'omwana. Omukazi ku arikuteekateeka aha nshonga nyingi bukiri kare, naabaasa kureetaho embeera nungi y'okutunga enda.

eng_prompt: After witnessing her tireless efforts to support the community, the district leader felt compelled to acknowledge her contributions. She had consistently gone above and beyond to help those in need, making a significant impact on the lives of many.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulaba okufuba kwe okw'obutaweera okuyamba ekitundu, omukulembeze wa disitulikiti yawulira nga alina okusiima emirimu gye. Yakola kyonna ekisoboka okuyamba abo abaali mu bwetaavu, era ekyo kyakyusa obulamu bw'abantu bangi.
ach_prompt: Inge neno tute matek ma en tye kwede me konyo lwak, latela me district owinyo ni myero opwoye pi jami ma en otimo. En obedo ka timo jami mapol me konyo jo ma peko tye i komgi, ma man okelo alokaloka madit i kwo pa dano mapol.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na awanyun aswamuke naka agangat nejaas itunga, abu engarenon lo edisitrikt kocam aisiyalamikin aswamuke. Abu ngesi kiswama nuipu noi kanu aingarakin ngul lu ican, ido abu ngesi koinak aijar naka itunga luipu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erini azi ngazu okpo kokoru ongulumu 'da ma aza kozu ri ndrezu 'bori ma vutia, drice'ba distrikiti ni 'da ega kini le i ma fe awa'difo e'yo erini 'ye 'diyi ma dria ra. Eri 'ye de sawa driasi e'yo agapi ra 'diyi azakoma fezu 'ba afa koko 'diyi dri, erini ojata okporu 'yezu 'ba karakara yi ma idri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okureeba oku arikukora n'amaani kuhwera abantu, omwebembezi wa disiturikiti akahurira aine kumusiima. Akaba agumire naakora ekirikukiraho okuhwera abo abatarikwebaasa, arikukora kihango aha magara g'abantu baingi.

eng_prompt: After winning the local election, she felt a deep sense of responsibility towards her constituents. Inspired by their support, she decided to take action that would benefit the community.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuwangula akalulu k'ebyalo, yawulira obuvunaanyizibwa obw'amaanyi eri abalonzi be. Olw'obuwagizi bwabwe, yasalawo okubaako ky'akolawo ekinaaganyula ekitundu.
ach_prompt: Inge loyo yer me tedero, en owinyo ni etye ki tic madit tutwal I kom lubol kwir mege. Pi kony ma gunongo, en omoko tamme me timo gin mo ma bikonyo lwak.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aitelekaar aseo naka atutubet, abu ngesi kopup nuikamunitos itunga luka atutubeteke. Aponi isinyikokinai ngesi agangat kec, abu ngesi koseu aswam ibore yenepedori aimedaun itunga.
lgg_prompt: Erini opeta angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ndezu 'bori ma vutia, eri ama e'yo azi okporu 'ba erini opi nyapi 'diyi ma dria. Atita yiniri si, eri asi 'du e'yo 'yezu e'yo ecopi ongulumu 'da ma orodri ejipi ra 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okusingura akaruuru k'ebyaro, akeehurira aine obujunanizibwa bw'amaani ahari abo abu arikujwekyera. Ahabw'obuhwezi bwabo, akasharamu kukora ekirikubaasa kuhwera abantu.

eng_prompt: In times of uncertainty and change, it's crucial for leaders to maintain a close connection with their teams. Understanding the realities of the workplace can help inform better decision-making and foster a supportive environment.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obutali bukakafu n'enkyukakyuka, kikulu nnyo abakulembeze okukuuma enkolagana ey'oku lusegere ne ttiimu zaabwe. Okutegeera embeera y'emirimu kiyamba mu kukola okusalawo okulungi n'okuleetawo embeera ey'obuwagizi.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko ki aloka-loka, pire tek tutwal ki lutela me bedo ki wat macok ki luticgi. Niang ngo matye katimme I gang tic twero konyo I moko tam maber dok weko tic bedo maber.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nuka amamus ajenanut keda aijulanakineta, ejokuna noi engarenok ajaut keda arucokina keda itimun kec. Amisiikin akiro nuka aiboisit na aswam ingarakini aitolomun aseununeta nuajokak ka aitopolor ejautene lo igangit.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru azini ojata ni 'diyi ma alia, eri orodriru 'ba drice'ba ru 'diyi ni yi ma eselea yi ma eselea aa'zu yi ma eselea. E'yo a'da pari azia 'diyi ma dria 'diyi vazu ri eco azakoma fe e'yo peta pezu kililiru azini angu atita fezu ri ma omgbo otuzu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'obutegyendesereza n'empinduka, nikikuru abebembezi kuguma nibakwatanisa na tiimu zaabo. Okwetegyereza amazima g'omumyanya y'emirimo nikibaasa kuhwera omu kucwamu kurungi n'okureetaho obusingye burungi.

eng_prompt: Despite advancements in healthcare, significant disparities remain in maternal health worldwide. Access to essential medical services and education is crucial to reducing the risks associated with pregnancy and childbirth.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga waliwo enkulaakulana mu byobulamu, waliwo enjawulo mu byobulamu bwa bamaama mu nsi yonna. Okufuna obujjanjabi obwetaagisa n'okusomesebwa bikulu nnyo mu kukendeeza ku bulabe obuva mu mbuto n'okuzaala.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni rwom me kony me yot kom tye malo, apoka-poka pud tye I lok me yot kom mege I wilobo lung. Nongo kony me yot kom ki pwony pire tek tutwal me dwoko piny peko ma bino ikare me yacu ki nywal.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejai apol naka angaleu, eringa ejaas atiokisio nuka angaleu naka nuatoto kotoma akwap kere. Adumunun amukian ka asioman erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitidisiar atiokisio nuka apotu ka aidoun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu ezoma ni ta tro arojo eyi ma alea ra ti, e'yo ndundu eyi nga po'di aa e'yo ayia eyini 'diyi ma tambazu ri ma alea kari 'di ma alea ndulu. Azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi azini onita ma esuta eri orodriru e'yo ewaru okporovu ni azini mva osiza ni 'diyi ma omgbo esizu.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho entunguuka omu by'amagara, hariho obutaikirizana omu by'amagara g'abakazi abarikuzaara omunsi yoona. Okutunga obuheereza bw'eby'amagara n'eby'obwegyese n'eky'omugasho omu kukyendeeza akabi akarikuruga omu kutwara enda n'okuzaara.

eng_prompt: Your resilience and determination inspire everyone around you. We want to take a moment to acknowledge your incredible strength.
lug_prompt: Obunyiikivu bwo n'obumalirivu bigezaamu amaanyi abo abakuliraanye. Twagala okutwala akaseera okusiima amaanyi go ag'ekitalo.
ach_prompt: Tek cwiny ki miti ni cuku cwiny dano weng ma I ngetgi. Wamito kwanyo kare mo me pwoyo teko ma itye kwede.
teo_prompt: Agogong kon keda apodokinit kon isinyikokitos itunga kere luejaasi jo. Ikoto sio ayangar apak kanu aisiyalamikin agogong kon naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Mi ma okpo tualu asi 'baza be ri ni ava fe 'ba dria mi agei 'diyi dri. Ale sa'wa 'du e'yo mi ma okpo okporu 'diyi ma e'yo egazu.
nyn_prompt: Okugumizamu kwawe n'okumariirira kwawe, nibihiga abantu boona abakwetooroire. Nitwenda kutwara akaire k'okusiima amaani gaawe ag'omutaano.

eng_prompt: Establishing a strong foundation in any relationship requires open communication and mutual respect. As partners navigate their journey together, they learn to rely on each other, fostering a sense of security.
lug_prompt: Okuteekawo omusingi omunywevu mu mukwano gwonna kyetaagisa empuliziganya ennungi n'okussa ekitiibwa mu buli omu. Nga abaagalana batambula olugendo lwabwe nga bali bombi, bayiga okwesigama ku buli omu, ekitumbula enneewulira y'obukuumi.
ach_prompt: Keto guti matek I winye mo keken mito lok ki woro ikin dano. Ka jo ma onyome woto I wot gi kacel, gipwonye me jenge I kom luwotgi, ma weko giwinyo agwoka.
teo_prompt: Aitolomun atukot naegogong kotoma eidicane ediokere ekoto einer loepukora ka ayongite yenice. Neautatar itunga alosit nepepe, isisiaete kesi amunokina, ido ijaikini kesi ayuara.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza kililiru azini inzita 'ba dria ma eselea ri eri orodriru aa'zu 'ba eyi ma eselea. Aku'ba eyi ka aci eyivile 'diyi ma alea tualu, eyi oni asi 'bazu eyi ma eselea, eyini ani aa'zu ageitema be.
nyn_prompt: Okutandikaho omusingye murungi omu mukago gwona, nikyetengyesa okuhurizana kurungi n'okuheerezana ekitiinisa. Abashaija n'abakazi ku barikugumizamu n'orugyendo rwabo, nibegyera kwesigana, ekirikubareetera kugira oburinzi.

eng_prompt: In the pursuit of power and influence, many leaders become consumed by their own agendas. As they navigate the complexities of governance, they often lose sight of the very constituents who entrusted them with their positions.
lug_prompt: Mu kunoonya obuyinza n'obuyinza, abakulembeze bangi beefaako bokka. Nga batambula mu buzibu bw'obukulembeze, batera okubuusa amaaso abo bennyini be bakiikirira ababakwasizza ebifo byabwe.
ach_prompt: I yenyo loc ki twero, lutela mapol gi keto cwinygi I kom jami ma megi keken. I kare ma gitye ka wot I peko me tela, pol kare wigi wil woko I kom lubol kwir ma ominigi twero me tela.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aimo apugan keda apedor, engarenok luipu epodokinitos akiro kec bon. Neautar kesi alosit toma aiboisio nuetioko nuka apugan, mam kesi ejenete itunga luka atutubenakec luapotu koinakisi kesi aiboisio kec.
lgg_prompt: Drice'ba karakara eyi e'yo eyi ma ngulupi ni 'diyi 'ye okpo esuzu. Yi ni acizu e'yo ewaru driceza ni 'diyi ma alea, yi ma mile avi 'ba angu yini opi nyazani 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kuronda obutegyeki n'obushoborozi, abebembezi baingi nibejumba omu bigyendererwa byabo. Kubarikutambura omu buremeezi bw'obwebembezi, nibabuza amaisho abantu abu barikujwekyera ababaheire obujunaanizibwa bwabo.

eng_prompt: After years of neglect and complaints from residents, the local government finally allocated funds for infrastructure improvements. Determined to make a difference, he took the initiative to address the pressing needs of his community.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka gy'okulagajjalirwa n'okwemulugunya okuva mu batuuze, gavumenti y'ebitundu yasembyeyo okuteekawo ensimbi ez'okutumbula ebizimbe. Ng'amaliridde okuleetawo enjawulo, ye yasooka okukola ku byetaago eby'amangu eby'ekitundu kye.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me cayo ki koko pa lwak, gamente me tedero dong okatti ki cente me yubu jami ma mite pi lwak. Macalo ngat ma omoko tamme me kelo aloka-loka, en okwanyo yoo me cobo miti pa lwak ma ikabedo ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka apalunit ka angurian kanejaas itunga, abu apugan naka atutubet koinak ikapun kanu aitojokar aiboisio. Apodokinit aitolomun aijulanakineta, abu ngesi kogeu aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga luka atutubeteke.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi adizu azini onuzu 'bori ma vutia, gamete angu 'da ma alea 'diyi fe asizu robia afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Asi 'baza be e'yo ojata ejizu, eri 'du e'yo 'yezu e'yo ewaru ongulumu erivileri ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okunagaijura n'okwetomboitwa kw'abatuuragye, gavumenti y'ekyaro ekahendera kutaho esente z'okutunguura ebyombeko. Ahabw'okumariirira kukora empindahinduka, akatwara enteekateeka y'okukora ahabyetaago by'abantu b'omukyanga kye.

eng_prompt: As the sun began to set over the village, she noticed the worried faces of her neighbors gathering near the clinic. Deep down, she knew that their struggles were far greater than her own.
lug_prompt: Enjuba bwe yatandika okugwa ku kyalo, yalaba amaaso ga baliraanwa be abaali bakungaanidde okumpi n'eddwaliro nga beeraliikirivu. Mu mutima gwe, yali akimanyi nti ebizibu byabwe byali binene nnyo okusinga ebibye.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma ceng ocako poto I caro ne, en oneno wang jirani ne ma obedo ki lworo ma gugure cok ki ot yat. I cwinye, en onongo ngeyo ni peko meggi dit loyo mege.
teo_prompt: Neageuna akolong aibiror ocalo, abu ngesi koany iponesio luka idunyetake luetioko lu atukokinos keda adekisia. Kotoma akekuan, ajeni ngesi ebe epol ationisikec adepar ke.
lgg_prompt: Etuka ni e'doria angu caluniri ma driarisi, eri ndre 'ba eri ma jo ejele ru okupi kiliniki ma ageia 'diyi ma andretia asi otiza be. Angu alia, eri nii ra kini e'yo yini 'diyi angiri ndeni aga i vile 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Eizooba ku ryatandikire kugwa omu kyaro, akareeba amaisho g'abaturanyi be abarikwerundaana haihi n'eirwariro. Omu mutima gwe, akaba naamanya ngu oburemeezi bwabo nibukira obwe.

eng_prompt: During the budget meeting, the finance minister discussed various tax exemptions aimed at supporting essential services. Among these, he highlighted the importance of ensuring that emergency vehicles remain accessible and affordable.
lug_prompt: Mu lukiiko lw'embalirira, minisita w'ebyensimbi yayogedde ku kusonyiyibwa emisolo egy'enjawulo egigendereddwamu okuwagira obuweereza obwetaagisa. Mu bino, yalambika obukulu bw'okukakasa nti emmotoka ez'amangu zisigala zituukirirwa era nga za bbeeyi.
ach_prompt: I kacoke me byek me lim, minista ma loyo lok kom lim oloko I kom gengo mucoro mapat-pat ma ki keto pi konyo tic ma mite pi kwo pa dano. I kin jami magi, en onyuto ber pa neno ni mutoka ma miyo kony ikare me peko ma opoto atura obedo yot dok welgi yot.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet naka ebajet, abu eminisita loka ikapun kitetem nuikamunitos ainanakineta nuka isolosinei kanu aigangia aijaanakinio na itunga. Kotoma akiro nu, abu ngesi kitogogong ajokis naka awanyun ebe epatana adolokin amotokan nu engeso.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi bajeti niri ma alea, minisita e'yo robia niri ni ri nze e'yo e'yo 'bani 'ba ofezu musoro si 'diyi ma dria geri ndundu eyini ecozu atita fezu azi orodriru 'diyi dri ri ma dria. E'yo 'diyi ma eselea, ece orodri 'bani mutukari e'yo azakoma lepi mbeleru 'diyi ma aa'zu ci azini aje kokoru ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko rw'embaririra y'eihanga, minisita w'eby'esente akagamba aha kusharirwa emishoro erikugyenderera okuhwera obuheereza. Omuri ebi, akashoborora omugasho gw'okureeba ngu ebiiruka ebirikuhwera abatarikwebaasa nibibaasa kuhikwaho kandi by'esente nkye.

eng_prompt: With mounting bills and no steady income, she realized her financial situation was becoming increasingly dire. Desperate for a solution, she weighed her options carefully.
lug_prompt: Olw'ebisale ebyeyongera n'obutaba na nnyingiza ya nkalakkalira, yakizuula nti embeera ye ey'ebyensimbi yali yeeyongera okuba embi. Olw'okuba yali ayagala nnyo okufuna eky'okugonjoola ekizibu ekyo, yalowooza nnyo ku ngeri gy'ayinza okukikolamu.
ach_prompt: Ki wel cente ma obedo kamede ki wel cente ma obedo kamede, en oniang ni cente ma en tye kwede tye ka doko rac tutwal. Ki miti matek tutwal me nongo yoo me cobo peko ne, en otamo matut tutwal I kom gin ma en twero timone.
teo_prompt: Keda aiyatakin na ikapun keda amamus na ikapun, abu ngesi koany ejauteneke loka ikapun erai lo erono noi. Kotoma aimo epone loka aitemokin ngun, abu ngesi kopodokin aomisio ke ejok.
lgg_prompt: Aje ma ongmbo tupi tupi tupi azini geri robia esuzuri ma ako si, eri esu e'yo erini robia esuzu 'diyi eca curu'do onzi. Erini lezu e'yo nde ma aza kozu saaru, eri ega e'yo erini eco 'ye 'diyi ma dria geri kililiru si.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebishare ebyabaire byeyongyeire hamwe n'obutabaasa kutunga esente, akeetegyereza ngu embeera ye y'esente ekaba neyeyongyera kuba mbi. Ahabw'okwenda kumanya eky'okukora, akateekateeka n'obwegyendesereza.

eng_prompt: Access to reliable electricity is crucial for economic development and improving living standards. By providing power to underserved communities, we can create opportunities for education, healthcare, and job creation.
lug_prompt: Okufuna amasannyalaze agesigika kya mugaso nnyo mu nkulaakulana y'ebyenfuna n'okutumbula omutindo gw'obulamu. Bwe tuwa amaanyi ebitundu ebitaweebwa bulungi, tusobola okutondawo emikisa mu by'enjigiriza, ebyobulamu, n'okutondawo emirimu.
ach_prompt: Bedo ki mac ma pe rweny ikare weng pire tek tutwal pi dongo lobo ki ilo malo rwom me kwo pa dano. Ka wamiyo kero bot lwak ma pe ki kony, watwero kelo gum me kwan, yot kom ki cako tic.
teo_prompt: Adumunun akim na iswamai ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu apol keda aitojokar adoketait na aijar. Kowai lo aijaikin itunga lu mam ijanakino akim, ipedori oni aitolomun arerengesio nuka asioman, amukian keda aitolomun aswamisinei.
lgg_prompt: Aci ma esuta kililiru ri eri orodriru zota e'yo robiani azini geri 'ba eyini aa'zu ri otuzu. Okpo feza ongulumu 'bani azi ngazu ku 'diyi dri ri si, ama eco drileba e'yo onita ni, alata ni azini azi eyi ma edeta ni 'diyi e'do ra.
nyn_prompt: Okuhikwaho amashanyarazi agatarikurugaho n'eky'omugasho aha ntunguuka y'eby'entaasya hamwe n'okutunguura omutindo gw'entuura y'abantu. Twaheereza amashanyarazi abantu abatarikuhikwaho, nitubaasa kureetaho emigisha y'eby'obwegyese, eby'amagara hamwe n'okutandikaho emirimo.

eng_prompt: Childbirth is a profound experience that shapes a woman's life in countless ways. Having witnessed the journey of motherhood, I have come to understand the immense challenges that come with bringing new life into the world.
lug_prompt: Okuzaala kintu kya maanyi nnyo ekikyusa obulamu bw'omukazi mu ngeri nnyingi. Olw'okuba ndabye olugendo lw'okubeera maama, ntegedde okusoomoozebwa okunene ennyo okujja n'okuleeta obulamu obupya mu nsi.
ach_prompt: Nywal obedo gin ma kelo alokaloka madit tutwal I kwo pa mon. I kare ma aneno wot pa mego, aniang peko madongo ma bino ki kelo kwo manyen I lobo.
teo_prompt: Aidoun erai ibore yenepol noi yenepedori aijulakin aijar naka aberu koponesio luegelegela. Kwape awanyunitor eong alosit naka nuatoto, amisiikinit eong atiokisio nuepolok nuelomunete kanu ayangaun aijar naitetet toma akwap.
lgg_prompt: Mva osiza eri e'yo azi okporu oku ma idri ojapi geri karakara eyi si ni i. Aa'zu aci ayia eyini ri ndrezu risi, ma emu e'yo ewaru emupi 'ba eyi ma edri ejizu wudrikuru'a 'diyi va.
nyn_prompt: Okuzaara n'ekintu ky'amaani ekirikukora aha magara g'abakazi omu miringo mingi. Ahabw'okureeba orugyendo rw'okuzaara,nyetegyereize oburemeezi bw'amaani oburikuruga omu kureeta amagara masya omu nsi.

eng_prompt: In rural areas, access to healthcare services can be severely limited due to a lack of nearby facilities. As a result, many pregnant mothers have to walk for long distances to access health facility.
lug_prompt: Mu byalo, okufuna obujjanjabi kuyinza okukendeera olw'ebbula ly'ebikozesebwa ebiriraanyeewo. N'ekivuddemu, bamaama b'embuto bangi batambula engendo mpanvu okufuna obujjanjabi.
ach_prompt: I caro, nongo kony me yot kom twero bedo tek tutwal pi nok pa jami tic ma cok. Macalo adwogi ne, mon ma oyac mapol woto pi bor piny me nongo kony me yot kom.
teo_prompt: Kocaaloi etiono adumunun amukian naarai emamete aiboisio nu idunyare. Kanuka ngun, elosete angor nu epotiete alosit aiboisio nu elwaka kanu adumun amukian.
lgg_prompt: Angu caluru 'diyi ma alea, geri 'bani azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi esuzu ri eco ovu ewaru e'yo afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma ako si. E'yo 'disi, ayia okporovu karakara 'diyi aci angu ezuru eyi ma alea arojo eyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myanya y'ebyaro, okutunga obuheereza bw'eby'amagara nikibaasa kukyendeera munonga ahabw'eibura ry'ebintu by'okukoresa haihi. N'ekyarugiremu, abakazi abaine enda baingi nibatambura engyendo ndaingwa kutunga obujanjabi.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent surge in medical emergencies, the local health department coordinated a plan to enhance emergency services. As part of this initiative, new ambulances were procured to improve response times across the region.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweyongerayongera mu bujjanjabi obw'amangu gyebuvuddeko, ekitongole ky'ebyobulamu mu kitundu kyakola enteekateeka okutumbula obujjanjabi obw'amangu. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, emmotoka ezitambuza abalwadde empya zaagulibwa okutumbula obudde bw'okwanukula okwetoloola ekitundu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa peko me two ma opoto atura, dul ma loyo lok kom yoto kom I tedero oyubu yub me medo rwom me miyo kony me yot kom ma opoto atura. Macalo but yub man, ki wilo ambulances manyen me yubu kare me tic I but piny eni weng.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyatakinio naka adekasinei nu engeso, abu erionget loka angaleu kitemok ainapeta nu aitogogong amukian naka adekasinei nu engeso. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, aponi ogwelai amotokan nuadekis nuitetiak kanu aitojokar apak naka abongokin kotoma aiboisit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo azakoma lepi mbeleru 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu o'diru ri ma e'yosi, arakala alata angu 'da ma alea ri otu otita azi ngazu azakoma fele mbeleru 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Otita 'di ma azi ru, 'ba je ambulansi o'diru 'diyi sa'wa 'bani e'yo 'yezu ri ma omgbo otuzu angu 'di ma alea ndulu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'oburwaire obw'ahonaaho, ekitongore ky'eby'amagara eky'omubyaro kikakora enteekateeka y'okwongyera aha buheereza bw'eby'ahonaaho. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, za ambyurensi nsya zikagurwa okwongyera obwire bw'okugarukamu abantu omu kicweka.

eng_prompt: The community has been eagerly preparing for the annual festival. After weeks of planning and organizing, the final details have been confirmed.
lug_prompt: Ekitundu kibadde kyetegekera n'obwagazi omukolo ogutegekebwa buli mwaka. Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera ez'okuteekateeka n'okutegeka, ebintu ebisembayo bikakasiddwa.
ach_prompt: Lwak gubedo ka yubbe ki miti madit tutwal pi kwer ma bedo mwaka ki mwaka. Ingee cabit mapol me yube ki yubbe, lok matut dong kimoko.
teo_prompt: Ekapakina itunga noi kanuka epucit lo ekaru. Akaulo naka isabitin lu aitemonokin ka aitemonokin, aponi itigogongorai akiro nuka awasia.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu 'da ebi otuta 'ye avasi omu eli vusi 'da ni. Sabiti 'bani otita eyi o'bazu azini eyi otuzu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba esu e'yo dria asizu 'diyi 'bo.
nyn_prompt: Abantu batwire nibeteekateekyera munonga omukoro ogurikubaho buri mwaka. Bwanyima y'esande z'okuteekateekyera hamwe n'okutebekanisa, ebirikukwata ahamuheru bihamiibwe.

eng_prompt: After years of hard work and dedication, the community finally achieved their goal. A special event was held to commemorate this milestone.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi nga bakola n'obunyiikivu, ekitundu kyatuuka ku kiruubirirwa kyabwe. Omukolo ogw'enjawulo gwaliwo okujjukira olunaku luno.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me tic matek ki keto cwiny gi, lwak i agiki ne gucobo miti gi. Yub mo ma pire tek obedo tye me kwero nino man.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aswam kagogong keda ainakina, apotu itunga itodolikisi alosikinetekec. Aponi kitolosai epucit lo itegelikina kanu aiitun apakio nu.
lgg_prompt: Azi ngaza okporu azini asi feza ma vutia, ongulumu 'da esu asizu e'yo eyini leleri ra. Ba 'ye omu azi ndu ni e'yo 'di ma e'yo egazu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okukora n'amaani n'okwehayo, abantu bakahikiiriza ekigyendererwa kyabo. Omukoro gw'omutaano gukabaho kwijuka omukoro ogu.

eng_prompt: As the world grappled with unprecedented health concerns, couples faced difficult decisions regarding their special day. The uncertainty surrounding large gatherings led to a wave of changes in wedding plans.
lug_prompt: Nga ensi elwanagana n'okweraliikirira kw'ebyobulamu okutabangawo, abaagalana baayolekaganye n'okusalawo okukalu ku bikwata ku lunaku lwabwe olw'enjawulo. Obutali bukakafu obwetoolodde enkungaana ennene bwaleetawo enkyukakyuka mu nteekateeka z'embaga.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lobo ne tye ka lweny ki peko me yot kom mapol tutwal, joo ma onyome gubedo ki tam matek tutwal I kom nino gi ma pire tek. Bedo ki akala-kala I kom gure madongo okelo aloka-loka mapol I yub me nyom.
teo_prompt: Kwape etereikina akwap keda aiyalongong naka angaleu, apotu itunga luedukokina kojaikinos keda aomisio nuetioko nuikamunitos apaaranikec na itegelikina. Atiokisio nuikamunitos atukonokin na itunga luipu abu koyangau aijulanakineta nuipu kotoma aitemonokineta nuka ipetai.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru ni dri ciria e'yo rua ala ni 'diyi ma dria, 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi esu e'yo ewaru eyi 'duzu eyi ma o'du inzile inzi 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi trazu ongmbo angiri si ri fe ojata eyi 'ye otita oku biza ni 'diyi ma alea karakara.
nyn_prompt: Obu ensi yaabaire neerarikirira ahaby'amagara, abashwereine bakashanga oburemeezi bw'okucwamu aha eizooba ryabo ery'omutaano. Obutaikirizana obwabaireho aha nteerane z'abantu nyamwingi, bukareetaho empindahinduka omu nteekateeka z'okugaitwa.

eng_prompt: The demand for skilled professionals in various industries has led to significant growth in the engineering sector. As a result, numerous job opportunities have emerged for individuals with engineering expertise.
lug_prompt: Obwetaavu bw'abakugu mu makolero ag'enjawulo buviiriddeko enkulaakulana mu by'obuyinginiya. N'ekivuddemu, emirimu mingi gizzeewo eri abantu abalina obukugu mu by'obuyinginiya.
ach_prompt: Miti pa ludiro ma ludiro I tenge mapat-pat okelo dongo I tenge me tic cing. Macalo adwogi ne, gum me tic mapol tye pi dano matye ki ngec me bedo engineer.
teo_prompt: Eipud loka ipirioitin lu emisiaritos kotoma okampuni luegelegela eyangau apol naepol noi kotoma okampuni loka eijiniaring. Kanuka ngun, epuakata aswamisinei nuipu noi mama ejaasi itunga luejaasi keda acoa naka eijiniaring.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba onita be okalamvu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyini lezu ri fe zota okporu esele inginiya eyini ri ma alea. E'yo 'disi, drileba azi ni karakara 'diyi efu 'ba nita inginiya eyini 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Ekyetengo ky'abakugu omu makorero gatari gamwe n'agamwe, kireesireho entunguuka y'amaani omu kitongore kya ba inginiya. N'ekyarugiremu, emirimo mingi etandikire aha bantu abaine obukugu omu by'obuyinginiya.

eng_prompt: The rapid expansion of urban areas and agriculture has led to significant loss of biodiversity. As ecosystems are disrupted, the delicate balance of nature is thrown into chaos.
lug_prompt: Okugaziwa okw'amangu okw'ebibuga n'ebyobulimi kuviiriddeko okubula kw'ebiramu eby'enjawulo. Eby'obutonde bwe bikosebwa, obutonde obutali bwenkanya busuulibwa mu kavuyo.
ach_prompt: Yub me dongo boma ki pur ma tye ka time oyot-oyot tutwal okelo rweny pa jami makwo mapol. Ka jami makwo ikin dano ki jami ma orumuwa oballe, rwom me kwo pa cwec ma orumuwa oballe tutwal.
teo_prompt: Apol naka itaunin keda akoru eyangaunit aibiror naka iboro luegelegela. Kwape itolitolorere isuban keda itiang, ejai aibiror naka isuban luka Edeke.
lgg_prompt: Angu tawuni eyini azini agirikica eyini tupi mbeleru ri fe afa nyakuni 'diyi ma omgbo esi ra. E'yo angu eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma ta mbaza ni mu drile, e'yo angu eyini aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu
nyn_prompt: Okweyongyera kw'endembo n'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa, kireesireho okufeerwa kw'ebintu bingi. Ebintu ebirikutuura omu itaka ku birikushiishwa, eby'obuhangwa nibiteganisibwa.

eng_prompt: As urban populations continue to grow, the demand for sustainable infrastructure increases. Engineers are tasked with addressing a multitude of challenges, including environmental concerns.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuwendo gw'abantu mu bibuga gweyongera okukula, obwetaavu bw'ebizimbe ebiyimiriddewo bweyongera. Bayinginiya baweebwa omulimu gw'okukola ku bizibu bingi omuli n'ebyo ebikwata ku butonde bw'ensi.
ach_prompt: I kare ma wel dano tye ka medde i boma, miti me gedo bene tye kamede. Kimiyo tic ki engineers me cobo peko mapol ma kwako cwec ma orumuwa.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata enaaba loka itunga kotoma oibuga, iyata eipud loka adukena nuejokuka. Ejaas engineers keda aswam na aitemokin atiokisio nuipu, aimoriarit nuikamunitos alupok.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba eyini aa'zu aku ambo eyi ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tutu risi, lezu afa ayuzaru aa'pi ewu drile ri ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo ni tu ra. Ba fe azi inginiya eyini e'yo ewaru karakara eyi ma aza kozu tualu e'yo angu amani aa'zu alenia 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Abantu ku barikugumizamu nibeyongyera omu ndembo, nikweyongyera ekyetengo ky'ebyombeko. Ba ingyiniya bahairwe omurimo gw'okukora ahaburemeezi bwingi, otwariiremu n'oburemeezi bw'obuhangwa bw'ensi.

eng_prompt: In recent months, the community has faced numerous challenges that require a united effort. Recognizing the importance of collaboration, various faith groups have come together to address the needs of our residents.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise, ekitundu kisanga okusoomoozebwa kungi okwetaagisa okukolera awamu. Olw'okumanya obukulu bw'okukolagana, ebibiina by'enzikiriza eby'enjawulo bikwataganye okukola ku byetaago by'abatuuze baffe.
ach_prompt: I dwe ma okato ni, lwak gunongo peko mapol ma mito ribe. Pi niang ber pa ribbe, dul dini mapat-pat guribe kacel me cobo miti pa lutedero wa.
teo_prompt: Kolapio luatuboros, etereikina itunga keda atiokisio nuipu nu ekotosi aimorikikina. Kanu ajenun ajokis naka aiswamanara, imorikikinos igurupun lu ediini luegelegela kanu aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga wok.
lgg_prompt: Mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, ongulumu 'da esu e'yo ewaru karakara eyi lepi 'ba eyi ma tualu. E'yo orodri ti icita niri ma e'yo egazu risi, amuti e'yo aitanisi ndundu 'diyi emu tualu e'yo 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyini le 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myezi ehingwireho, abantu batungire oburemeezi bwingi oburikwetenga okukwatanisa. Ahabw'okumanya omugasho gw'okukwatanisa, amadiini agatari gamwe, gakwatanisa kukora aha byetaago by'abatuuragye baitu.

eng_prompt: I've always been fascinated by how things work and the process behind creating innovative solutions. Lately, I've been considering a career in engineering and want to explore the requirements and skills involved.
lug_prompt: Bulijjo nkwatiddwako nnyo engeri ebintu gye bitambulamu n'enkola y'okutondawo ebintu ebipya. Gye buvuddeko, mbadde ndowooza ku kya kufuuka yinginiya era njagala okunoonyereza ku byetaago n'obukugu obulimu.
ach_prompt: I kare weng abedo ki miti madit tutwal I kom kit ma jami tiyo kwede ki yoo me cako tic manyen. Ite kare ni, abedo ka tamo I kom tic me bedo engineer dok amito niang I kom jami ma mite ki diro ma mite.
teo_prompt: Aminakinit eong noi epone loiswamata iboro keda epone loka aitolomun iboro luitetiak. Apakio nu, auta eong aomoom nuikamunitos aswam naka eijiniaring ido akoto eong aingic iboro lu ekotoi ka acoa.
lgg_prompt: Ma ovu sawa driasi ava be geri afa yi ni azi ngazuri ma dria azini geri e'yo o'diru 'diyi ma aza kozu 'diyi ma dria. O'du 'diyi ma alia, ma e'bi ovu egata be e'yo azi ngazu inginiya ru ri ma dria dika ale afa 'bani le azini ondua 'bani le 'diyi ma ale andri.
nyn_prompt: Ntwire ninkunda oku ebintu birikukoragye n'omuringo gw'okukoramu ebintu ebisya. Obwahati, ntwire ninteekateeka aha mirimo y'obuyinginiya kandi ninyenda kumanya ebirikwetengwa n'emyoga erimu.

eng_prompt: In response to the rising number of COVID-19 cases, health officials have implemented new guidelines. As a result, many activities that involve large groups of people are being limited.
lug_prompt: Olw'omuwendo gw'abalwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe ogweyongera, ab'ebyobulamu bataddewo ebiragiro ebipya. N'ekivuddemu, emirimu mingi egirimu abantu abangi gikugirwa.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel dano matye ki two korona, lutic me yot kom gukati ki cik manyen. Macalo adwogi ne, tic mapol matye ki dano mapol tye ka genge.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka naka ekorona, etolomutu eswamak luka angaleu aicoreta nuitetiak. Kanuka ngun, ikidioko aswamisinei nu imoriarit itunga luipu.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba azo COVID-19 niri be tupi 'diyi ma e'yosi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi 'ba azita o'diru 'diyi 'yeta ma alea. E'yo 'disi, 'yeta karakara ongulumu karakara eyi ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo esi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omuhendo gw'abarwaire ba COVID-19 ogweyongyeire, abakuru omu by'amagara bateire omu nkora ebiragiro ebisya. N'ekyarugiremu, emirimo mingi erimu abantu baingi eriyo neegarurwaho.

eng_prompt: When designing structures that impact the community, it is essential to adhere to strict regulations. This ensures that all professionals involved are held to a high standard of accountability.
lug_prompt: Bw'oba okola dizayini y'ebizimbe ebirina kye bikola ku bantu, kikulu nnyo okugoberera amateeka amakakali. Kino kikakasa nti abakugu bonna abakwatibwako bavunaanibwa ku mutindo ogwa waggulu ogw'embalirira.
ach_prompt: Ka itye ka yubu gedo ma kelo adwogi maber I kom lwak, pire tek tutwal me lubu cik matek tutwal. Man neno ni ludiro weng ma gitye I tic eni gimiyo kor tic gi I rwom mamalo tutwal.
teo_prompt: Arai itemonokin jo adukena nuepedorete aitojokara itunga, ibusakinit jo aitup ikisila luegogong. Einakini ngin awanyun ebe ipirioitin kere lu imoriaritos kes itodolikinitai adoketait naepol noi naka aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere ikapunukec.
lgg_prompt: Ba ka jo ecopi ongulumu eyi ma aza kopi ra 'diyi si ria, eri orodriru azita okporu 'diyi ma vuti obizu. Diri ne ra kini 'ba dria e'yo nipi e'yo nde ma alea 'diyi ma e'yo 'ye geri kililiru si.
nyn_prompt: Waaba noyombeka ebyombeko ebirikukwata aha bantu, ni kikuru okukuratira ebiragiro by'amaani. Eki nikihamya ngu abakugu boona abarikukwatwaho, nibajunanizibwa aha mutindo gw'ahaiguru.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent challenges faced by the engineering team, the leaders recognized the need for skill enhancement. To address this, they have planned a comprehensive training program for all the engineers in the community.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okusoomoozebwa kwa bayinginiya gyebuvuddeko, abakulembeze baalaba obwetaavu bw'okutumbula obukugu. Okusobola okukola ku nsonga eno, bategese enteekateeka y'okutendeka bayinginiya bonna mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko ma dul pa engineers gunongo cokcok-ki, lutela ne guneno ni omyero ki med rwom me diro gi. Me tyeko lok man, guyubu yub me pwonye pi engineers weng ma ikabedo eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuetereikina keda etimu loka engineers, apotu engarenok kojenutu eipud loka aikeuna acoa. Kanu aitemokin ngun, etemokisi kesi ainapeta nuka aitutuonor eijinia kere kotoma atutubet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru amuti inginiya eyini esu 'diyi ma aza kozu, drice'ba eyi esu ra kini le 'ba ma otu eyi ma onita ra. E'yo 'di ma aza kozu, eyi otu otita imbatani 'ba inginiya ru ongulumu 'da ma alea 'diyini dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi obu ba ingyiniya batungire, abebembezi bakareeba ekyetengo ky'okutunguura emyoga yaabo. Okukora aha nshonga egi, batebekaniise enteekateeka y'okutendeka ba ingyiniya boona omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: In our company, we prioritize accountability and quality in all projects. As such, we have established clear guidelines to ensure that every engineer understands their role in maintaining high standards.
lug_prompt: Mu kampuni yaffe, tukulembeza embalirira n'omutindo mu pulojekiti zonna. N'olw'ekyo, tutaddewo ebiragiro ebitangaavu okulaba nga buli yinginiya ategeera omulimu gwe mu kukuuma omutindo ogwa waggulu.
ach_prompt: I dul megwa, waketo kor tic ki kor tic kacel ki rwom me tic I yub weng. Macalo adwogi ne, waketo cik maleng me neno ni engineer weng oniang tic gi me gwoko rwom ma malo.
teo_prompt: Kokampunikosi, isingarenit sio aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun keda adoketait na ipurojektin. Kwape kwape kangin, itolomutu sio aicoreta nuecaete kanu awanyun ebe ejeni ngin engineer aswamukec naka aidar adoketait naikiara.
lgg_prompt: Amuti amavileri ma alea, ama e'yo otita amani 'diyi ma ale andrizu kililiru azini kililiru ri 'du e'yo okporu otita amani 'diyi ma alea dria. Ekile 'dile, ama o'ba azita kililiru 'diyi nezu ra kini inginiya dria yi ma azi yi ma dria kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Omu kitongore kyaitu, nitwebembeza embaririra n'omutindo omu purogyekiti zaitu zoona. N'ahabw'ekyo, tutaireho ebiragiro ebirikwetegyerezibwa kureeba ngu buri ingyiniya naayetegyereza omurimo gwe omukureeberera omutindo gw'ahaiguru.

eng_prompt: Investing in the education of young girls in STEM fields can lead to significant advancements in innovation and diversity. By encouraging their interest in engineering, we can help bridge the gender gap and foster a new generation of problem solvers.
lug_prompt: Okusiga ensimbi mu kusoma kw'abawala abato mu bitundu bya STEM kiyinza okuvaako enkulaakulana ey'amaanyi mu kuyiiya n'enjawulo. Nga tukubiriza okwagala kwabwe mu by'obuyinginiya, tusobola okuyamba okuggyawo ekituli mu kikula ky'abantu n'okutumbula omulembe omupya ogw'abagonjoola ebizibu.
ach_prompt: Keto lim I kwan pa anyira matino I tenge me STEM twero kelo dongo lobo madit tutwal I lok me diro ki diro mapatpat. Ka wacuku cwinygi me bedo ki miti i kom tic me bedo engineer, watwero konyo me juko apoka-poka matye ikin mon ki coo dok bene weko yalwak manyen ma gitye ki miti me tyeko peko bedo tye.
teo_prompt: Aipikakin ikapun toma asioman naka apesur nudidika kotoma aiboisio nuka STEM epedori ayangaun apol kotoma aitolomunun iboro luitetiak keda aiboisio nuegelegela. Kowai lo aisinyikokit kesi akoto aswam naka eijiniaring, ipedori oni aingarakin aitikitik atiakatiaka naka ikiliok keda angor kosodete aitopolor itunga luitetiak lu itemonokinete atiokisio.
lgg_prompt: Robia 'bazu ezoanzi nyiri eyini onita fezu STEM ma alea ri eco fe e'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu ri ma omgbo ni tuzu ra. E'yo eyini ava fezu e'yo inginiya ni 'diyi ma alea risi, ama eco fe esele coza oku eyi ma eselea agupi eyi pie ri ma omgbo esi dika ama eco 'ba o'diru e'yo eyi ma aza kopi 'diyi ezo ra.
nyn_prompt: Okuta esente omuby'obwegyese bw'abaishiki abakiri bato omu myoga ya STEM nikibaasa kureetaho entunguuka y'amaani omuby'obuhangwa hamwe n'oburingaaniza. Okureetaho ekyetengo kyabo omu by'obuyinginiya, nitubaasa kuhwera omu kumaraho omwanya oguri ahagati y'abashaija n'abakazi, n'okureetaho abantu abasya abarikubaasa kumaraho oburemeezi.

eng_prompt: In today's rapidly evolving technological landscape, it is essential for students to develop a strong foundation in engineering principles. By fostering a positive attitude towards engineering, educators can empower students to explore innovative solutions to real-world problems.
lug_prompt: Mu tekinologiya w'ennaku zino akyuka amangu, kyetaagisa abayizi okufuna omusingi omunywevu mu misingi gya yinginiya. Mu kukuza endowooza ennungi eri yinginiya, abasomesa basobola okuwa abayizi amaanyi okunoonyereza ku ngeri y'okugonjoolamu ebizibu by'ensi.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma tet manyen tye ka lokke oyot-oyot tutwal, pire tek tutwal pi lutino kwan me dongo guti matek tutwal I lok me bedo engineer. Ki pwonyo lutino me bedo ki cwiny maber i kom tic me bedo engineer, lupwonye twero miyo kero ki lutino me yenyo yoo me cobo peko matye.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nuka etatai loakwana, erai ibore yenepol noi esisiak adumun aisingarenit naepol noi kotoma ainapeta nuka eijiniaring. Kowai lo aitopolor aomisio nuejok nuikamunitos eijiniaring, epedorete isisianakinak aitigogong esisiak aimo iwaitin luitetiak luka aitemokin atiokisio nuka akwap.
lgg_prompt: E'yo tekenologia ni curu'do i ojapi mbeleru ri ma alea, eri orodriru sukulu anzi eyini e'yo inginiya ni 'diyi esuzu okporu. E'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu muke e'yo inginiya eyini 'diyi ma dria risi, imba'ba eyi eco sukulu anzi eyini okpo fe e'yo onduaru 'diyi ma aza kozu e'yo ewaru wudrikuru ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obuhangwa ebirikugyenda omu maisho, n'eky'omugasho aha beegi okutunga omusingi murungi omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa. Barikwegyesa abantu emiteekateekyere mirungi ahaby'obuyinginiya, abegyesa nibabaasa kuheereza abeegi amaani g'okusherura oburyo bw'okutereeza oburemeezi bw'ensi egi.

eng_prompt: As darkness falls, many individuals find themselves uneasy while walking through dimly lit areas. The presence of illumination can significantly influence their sense of security.
lug_prompt: Ekiro bwe kigwa, abantu bangi beesanga nga tebalina mirembe nga batambulira mu bifo ebirimu ekitangaala ekitono. Okubeerawo kw'ekitangaala kusobola okukyusa ennyo enneewulira yaabwe ey'obukuumi.
ach_prompt: Ka piny tye ka col, dano mapol nongo gipe ki kuc ka gitye ka wot I kabedo matye ki mac matidi. Bedo tye pa mac twero weko giwinyo agwoka.
teo_prompt: Arai kibiror akwap, mam itunga luipu epedorete alosit kotoma aiboisio nuejaasi keda aica naedit. Ajaut naka aica epedori aitojokar ayuwara kec.
lgg_prompt: Angu ini ni ecaria, 'ba karakara eyi eyi esu eyi ma ngulupi ni aa'zu e'yere eyini aciria angu aci kokoru 'diyi ma alea. Aci eyini aa'zu ci ri eco e'yo eyini aa'zu ageitema be ri ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omwirima ku gurikugwa, abantu baingi nibashanga bataine busingye baaba nibatambura omu myanya etarikwetegyerezibwa gye. Okubaho kw'ekyererezi nikibaasa kureetaho oburinzi.

eng_prompt: The dense foliage and remote location make it an ideal hideout for those looking to escape the law. Many have whispered about the dark activities that thrive in the shadows of the towering trees.
lug_prompt: Ebikoola ebinene n'ekifo eky'ewala kifuula ekifo kino ekifo ekirungi eky'okwekwekamu eri abo abanoonya okudduka amateeka. Bangi boogedde mu bufunze ku bikolwa eby'ekizikiza ebikolebwa mu bisiikirize by'emiti eminene.
ach_prompt: Oboke matye mapol tutwal ki kabedo matye kamaboco weko obedo kabedo maber tutwal pi jo ma tye ka yenyo me lwi ki I te cik. Dano mapol gubedo ka kwilo lok I kom jami maraco matye katime I tipo pa yadi maboco tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akwi nuipu noi keda aiboisit na elwaka einakini ngin aiboisit naejok noi naka aingop ngul lu ekotosi aisac ekisil. Apotu itunga luipu kinerata nuikamunitos aswamisinei nuarokok nu iswamaete kotoma aipanya nuka ikito luapolok.
lgg_prompt: Eri ma bi nzizaru tu azini angu alioru 'diyi fe erini ovuzu angu ozizaru onyiru 'ba lepi e'yo azita ni 'diyi apazu 'diyi dri. Ba karakara eyi olu e'yo 'yeta iniru 'diyi ma dria pati okporu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Amababi maingi hamwe n'omwanya gw'ebyaro, nigukihindura omwanya murungi gw'okwekwekamu abo abarikwenda kwetantara ebiragiro. Baingi bagambire omu kashushu ebikwatiraine n'emirimo y'omwirima erikukorera omu bicuucu by'emiti emihango.

eng_prompt: The recent installation of additional streetlights and improved surveillance cameras has significantly enhanced the neighborhood's safety measures. Community members have expressed their appreciation for these changes, noting the positive impact on their daily lives.
lug_prompt: Okuteekebwa kw'ebitaala by'oku nguudo n'ebyuma ebikuuma amaloboozi gye buvuddeko kyongedde nnyo obukuumi mu kitundu. Abantu b'omu kitundu balaze okusiima kwabwe olw'enkyukakyuka zino, nga bagamba nti zikosa obulamu bwabwe obwa bulijjo.
ach_prompt: Keto mac iteng gudi ki kamera me bedo ki wang mabit I kom dano okonyo tutwal I gwoko ber bedo I kabedo ma orumuwa. Lwak gunyutu pwocgi pi aloka-loka eni kun giwaco ni okelo adwogi maber i kom kwo gi me nino ducu.
teo_prompt: Aipikakin akimian nu orotin keda akameran nu engicete eyatakisi ayuwara kotoma aiboisit. Apotu itunga luka atutubet itodiasi aiyalamakec kanuka aijulanakineta nu, kotema ebe ejokuna noi aijarakec naka nginiparan.
lgg_prompt: Aci nzila dria 'diyi ma osuta o'diru tualu kamera angu onezu 'diyi pie ri otu e'yo ageyitema ni angu ama agei ri ma alea ri ra. Ba ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi e'da awa'difo eyini ojata 'diyi si eyini egazu orodri eyini esu eyi ma edri o'du driasi ri si.
nyn_prompt: Okutamu ebitaara by'ahanguuto ebindi n'okukoresa kamera nungi, kyongyeire amaani omu by'okwerinda omu byaro. Abantu b'omukyanga boorekire okusiima kwabo ahabw'empindahinduka ezi, barikureeba ebirungi ebikozire aha magara gaabo aga buriizooba.

eng_prompt: As dusk falls, the bustling marketplace begins to transition into a vibrant evening scene. Enhanced visibility from the newly installed street lights encourages more customers to visit local shops after sunset.
lug_prompt: Ekiro bwe kigwa, akatale akajjudde abantu katandika okukyuka ne kafuuka akawungeezi akajjudde abantu. Okwolesebwa okulungi okuva mu bitaala by'oku nguudo ebipya ebiteekeddwawo kikubiriza bakasitoma bangi okukyalira amaduuka g'omu kitundu ng'enjuba emaze okugwa.
ach_prompt: Ka piny odoko col, cuk ma dano dwong iye cako lokke doko kabedo ma dano dwong iye I otyeno. Neno maber ki mac ma ki keto I teng gudu weko luwil mapol limo dukan I ngee poto ceng.
teo_prompt: Kapak kana aibiror akwap, egeuni esokoni aijulakin aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aibo Asesen naejok kanejaas akimian nuitetiak nu orotin isinyikokini agwelak luipu aipejokin idukai luka atutubet akaulo naka akolong.
lgg_prompt: Angu ri ni ecaria, angu cu ni 'ba eyini aa'zu tu ri ni e'do oja i ecazu angu 'ba eyini aa'zu tu 'diyi ru ondresi. Angu ndreza kililiru engazu aci nzila dria 'bani o'diru 'diyi ma alia ri ni fe aje'ba yi dri ava muzu dukani angu ma alia 'diyi ma alia etuka ma vutia.
nyn_prompt: Omwirima ku gurikugwa, akatare akarimu abantu baingi, nikatandika kuhinduka omumwanya gw'omwebazyo ogurimu abantu baingi. Okureebeka kurungi okurugiirira aha bitaara by'ahanguuto ebitsya, nikihiga abaguzi baingi kutaayaayira amaduuka gaabo ahanyima y'eizooba kurenga.

eng_prompt: Residents have expressed growing concerns about the air quality in the area. Studies indicate that pollutants from various sources contribute to respiratory issues among the population.
lug_prompt: Abatuuze balaze obweraliikirivu obweyongera ku mutindo gw'empewo mu kitundu. Okunoonyereza kulaga nti obucaafu okuva mu nsibuko ez'enjawulo buviirako obuzibu mu kussa mu bantu.
ach_prompt: Lutedero gunyutu lworo I kom rwom me yamo I kabedo eni. Kwed nyutu ni jami ma balo yamo ma aa ki kama pat pat kelo peko me yweyo ikin dano.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga itodutu aiyalongongokec kanuikamunitos ekwam loaronon kaiboisit. Itodunit aingic ebe iboro lu emunarete akwap eyangaunete adekasinei nuka eiyengane kanejaas itunga.
lgg_prompt: Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ece asi otiza eyini ri ma omgbo tupi angu 'da ma alea ri ma dria. E'yo eti ondaza ece kini afa ondi engapi angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi e'yo oli seza ni 'diyi eji o'bi eyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Abatuuragye boorekire okwerarikirira aha mutindo gw'omwika omu kyanga. Okucondooza nikworeka ngu ebintu ebirikutokooza eby'obuhangwa kuruga omu myanya etari emwe, nibyo birikureetaho oburemeezi bw'okwitsya omu bantu.

eng_prompt: When planning a heist, criminals often assess their surroundings for vulnerabilities. A location that appears unprotected can be an enticing target for those with malicious intent.
lug_prompt: Nga bateekateeka obubbi, abamenyi b'amateeka batera okwekenneenya ebibeetoolodde okuzuula obunafu. Ekifo ekirabika nga tekikuumibwa kisobola okusikiriza abo abalina ebigendererwa ebikyamu.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma gitye ka yubbe me kwalo kwo, lutim aranyi ipol kare gi ngiyo kama gitye iye pi nongo peko. Kabedo ma nen calo pe ki gwoke twero bedo gin ma dano ma miti gi rac mito.
teo_prompt: Kapak kana aitemonokin akoko, etapit abilak ikisila airereonor aiboisio nuejaasi kesi. Aiboisit na esubit bala mam eyuaritai epedori aimusung ngul luejaasi keda apeleikinata nuarokok.
lgg_prompt: Bani ogu otuzuria, 'ba e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi tutuni angu eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma ale andri e'yo ewaru 'diyi esuzu. Pari azi e'dapi ageitema kokoru ni eco ovu 'ba egata onzi be 'diyi ma e'yosi.
nyn_prompt: Abakozi b'ebihagaro baaba nibateekateeka okwiba, nibakira kushwijuma ebyetorwaire. Omwanya ogurikworekwa nk'ogutaine by'okwerinda nigubaasa kuba ogw'okushendashenda abo abaine ebigyendererwa bibi.

eng_prompt: Despite their elaborate plans to evade capture, the criminals knew that their connections could help them escape justice. As the police closed in, they prepared to use their resources to secure their freedom.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde baakola enteekateeka z'okwewala okukwatibwa, abamenyi b'amateeka baali bakimanyi nti enkolagana yaabwe eyinza okubayamba okwewala okuvunaanibwa. Nga poliisi eggalawo, beetegekera okukozesa eby'obugagga byabwe okukuuma eddembe lyabwe.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gubedo ki yub matek tutwal me weyo makogi, lubal ne guniang ni kubbe meggi twero konyogi me weyo ngolo kop. Ikare ma abili odonyo I gang, guyube me tic ki jami gi me gwoko bedo agonya gi.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaas kesi keda aitemonokineta nuepolok nuka aisac aikamanario, ejenete abilak ikisila ebe epedorete arucokina kec aingarakin kes aisac atubokinio. Neagolokinor ipolisin, apotu kesi itemonokinos aitwasam iborokec kanu ayuwar ailajaara kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo yini otuta onyiru 'yezu yi bizu kurisi ra ti, 'ba e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi nii ra kini yi ma eselea 'diyi eco yi ma aza ko e'yo liza kililiru ri ma aliarisi ra. Polisi yini yi ma ti opizurisi, yi otu yi ma afa yini 'diyi ayuzu yi ma driwala ma ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho enteekateeka zaabo z'okwetantara okukwatwa, abakozi b'ebihagaro bakaba nibamanya ngu okukwatanisa kwabo nikubaasa kubahwera okwetantara okucwerwa orubanja. Obu poriisi yaabaire ekingire, bakeeteekateekyera kukoresa eby'obugaiga bwabo kurinda obugabe bwabo.

eng_prompt: Due to budget cuts and rising expenses, the local government has been forced to prioritize essential services. As a result, many non-essential projects have been put on hold.
lug_prompt: Olw'okukendeeza ku mbalirira n'okulinnyisa ensaasaanya, gavumenti z'ebitundu ziwaliriziddwa okukulembeza obuweereza obwetaagisa. N'ekivuddemu, pulojekiti nnyingi eziteetaagisa ziyimiriziddwa.
ach_prompt: Pi ngolo byek me lim ki mede pa wel lim, gamente me tedero omyero oket yub me miyo kony ma mite pi kwo obed gin ma pire tek loyo. Macalo adwogi ne, yub mapol ma pe pigi tego ki juku gi.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aitidisiar ebajet keda aiyatakin naka ikapun, abu apugan na okwap kisingaren aijaanakinio na itunga. Kanuka ngun, ipurojektin luipu lumam epol ajokis aponi ibwaikinai.
lgg_prompt: Otita aje robia niri ma omgbo esizu azini aje ma omgbo tuzu risi, gamete angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi e'bi asi 'ba e'yo azi orodriru 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba atri otita azi orodriru ku 'diyi ci.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okukyendeeza embaririra hamwe n'okweyongyera kw'enshohoza,gavumenti z'ebyaro zihigirwe kwebembeza obuheereza oburikwetengwa. N'ekyarugiremu, purogyekiti nyingi ezitarikwetengwa zikemerezibwa.
