eng_prompt: When choosing lighting options for your home, it's important to consider the longevity of the bulbs. Some types of bulbs are designed to last longer than others, impacting maintenance and costs.
lug_prompt: Bw'oba olonda engeri y'okukolamu amataala mu maka go, kikulu okulowooza ku bbanga bbaatule z'ettaala lye ziyinza okuwangaala. Ebika by'ebitaala ebimu bikoleddwa okuwangaala okusinga ebirala, ekikosa okulabirira n'ebbeeyi.
ach_prompt: Ka itye ka yero mac me gangi, pire tek tutwal me tamo I kom kit ma bulb tye ka tic kwede pi kare malac. Kiyubu kwai bulb mukene me rii pi kare malac loyo mukene, man weko tic me yubu gi ki welgi doko tek.
teo_prompt: Kapak kana aseun aica naka orekon, ibusakinit aomoom apak naepol noi naka agolokinio naka abawoi. Icie iponesio luka abalun eraas lu itwasamaete apak naepol adepar icie, ido itidisiari etiai loka aitemonokin keda aitac.
lgg_prompt: E'yo aci fezu mi vile akua 'diyi opezu ri ma dria, eri orodriru e'yo 'duzu e'yo aci bulopu 'da eyini aa'zu sa'wa ezu ri ma dria. Ba ede bulb esele azi 'diyi aa'zu ewu ezu aga azi 'diyi ra, e'yo 'bani eyi ma tambazu azini aje ma omgbo esizu.
nyn_prompt: Waaba nootoorana eby'okukoresa omuka yaawe, n'eky'omugasho okureeba ngu baarubu nizibaasa kugumaho kumara obwire buraingwa. Emiringo emwe ya barabu ekozirwe kumara obwire buraingwa kukira endiijo, ekirikureetera okurinda n'okushashura esente nyingi.

eng_prompt: Local authorities launched an investigation into a series of street light disappearances in the area. After gathering evidence, they were able to identify and apprehend the suspects involved.
lug_prompt: Ab'obuyinza mu kitundu baatandika okunoonyereza ku butaala bw'oku nguudo obubula mu kitundu. Oluvannyuma lw'okukung'aanya obujulizi, baasobola okuzuula n'okukwata abateeberezebwa okuba nga beenyigiddemu.
ach_prompt: Lutela me tedero gucako kwed I kom mac ma orweny I teng gudu mapol I kabedo eni. Ingee coko caden, gunongo dok gumako jo mabyek me bal tye I komgi.
teo_prompt: Apotu apedorosio nuka atutubet kogeutu aingic nuikamunitos aibiror naka akimian nu orotin katutubet. Akaulo naka aituk ajenanut, apotu kesi kopedosi ajenun ka aikamanar itunga luitepesenitai.
lgg_prompt: Okpo e'ipi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'do vuti ondaza aci nzila dria 'diyi ma aviza angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma dria. E'yo ecetaru 'diyi trazu 'bori ma vutia, eyi esu 'ba 'bani ega eyi eza e'yo 'da ma alea 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Ab'obushoborozi omu byaro batandikireho okucondooza aha by'okubura kw'ebitaara by'ahanguuto omu kyanga. Bwanyima y'okurundaana obujurizi, bakabaasa kumanya n'okukwata abarikuteekateekwaho kukora ebihagaro.

eng_prompt: During the city council meeting, the sustainability expert presented various options for reducing energy expenses. After analyzing the budget, he advised that it's less costly to use solar street lights.
lug_prompt: Mu lukiiko lw'akakiiko k'ekibuga, abakugu mu by'obutonde baayanjudde engeri ez'enjawulo ez'okukendeeza ku nsaasaanya ku masannyalaze. Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya embalirira, yawa amagezi nti si kya buseere okukozesa ebitaala by'oku nguudo eby'amaanyi g'enjuba.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kacokke pa lutela me boma madit, ludiro ma neno lok kom gwoko kwo pa dano gunyuto yoo mapat-pat me dwoko piny wel cente ma mite pi mac. Ingee ngiyo byek me lim, en owaco ni tic ki mac ma aa ki iceng I teng gudu pe tero cente madit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet naka ekansulo loka eibuga, apotu ipirioitin luka akwap kitodiasi iponesio luegelegela luka aitidisiar ikapun luka akim. Akaulo naka airereor ebajet, abu ngesi kicorak ebe edit etiai loka aitwasam akimian nu orotin nu esola.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi kanisulu aku ambu city niri niri niri ma alea, 'ba nita be e'yo angu ezoma ni 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ece geri ndundu eyini ecozu aci ayuzu ri ma omgbo esizu ra 'diyi. Bajeti ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, eri fe imbata kini eri aje werearu aci solar ru nzila dria 'diyi ayuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko rw'akakiiko k'orurembo, abakugu omu by'obuhangwa bakareeta oburyo bw'okukyendeeza aha nshohoza y'amashanyarazi. Bwanyima y'okushwijuma embaririra, akahabura ngu n'eky'esente nkye okukoresa ebitaara by'ahanguuto ebya soora.

eng_prompt: Despite the community's strong support for the project, the school board faced unexpected budget constraints. As a result, plans for upgrading the sports facilities were put on hold.
lug_prompt: Ng'oggyeko obuwagizi bw'ekitundu obw'amaanyi eri pulojekiti, akakiiko k'essomero kaayolekaganye n'obuzibu mu mbalirira obutasubirwa. N'ekyavaamu, enteekateeka z'okutumbula ebyemizannyo zaayimirizibwa.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni lwak onongo tye ki cwak matek tutwal I kom yub eni, dul madoro gang kwan onongo peko me lim ma pe byek tye I komgi. Macalo adwogi ne, yub me ilo malo rwom me kabedo me tuku kijuko woko.
teo_prompt: Karaida egangitos itunga luipu epurojekt, abu eyaitene lo esomero kodum atiokisio nuka ebajet. Kanuka ngun, aponi kibwounai aitemonokineta nuka aisiteteun aiboisio nuka aboliasio.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu eyini atita fezu otita 'da ni ra ti, amuti sukulu ni 'diyi esu e'yo robia ayuza ni 'bani ega kokoru 'diyi ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba atri otuta pari avita ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu 'diyi ci.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho obushagiki bw'amaani bw'abantu aha purogyekiti,akakiiko k'eishomero kakashanga oburemeezi omu mbaririra. N'ekyarugiremu, enteekateeka y'okutunguura emyanya y'emizaano ekemerezibwa.

eng_prompt: After a long wait, the technicians have finally completed the necessary repairs. The moment we've all been anticipating is just around the corner.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulinda ebbanga ddene, bayinginiya bamalirizza okuddaabiriza ebyetaagibwa. Akaseera ffenna ke tubadde tusuubira katuuse.
ach_prompt: Ingee kuro pi kare malac, ludiro otyeko yubu jami weng mamitte. Kare ma wan weng wabedo kakuru dong cok tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aidar aojau naepol, adautu ipirioitin angetakin aitemonokin. Apak na iwomit oni kere ebe ebunit.
lgg_prompt: Sawa ezu tezu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba tekenia ru 'diyi de asizu afa 'bani lele 'diyi edezu 'bo. Sa'wa amani ebi asi 'bazu drinia ri eca curu'do ogogo.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okurinda obwire bureingwa, ba ingyiniya baherize kukora emirimo erikwetengwa. Obwire obu twena tutwire nitutegyereza buri haihi kuhika.

eng_prompt: In an effort to enhance the safety and visibility of the park, the community decided to install solar lights along the walking paths. Unfortunately, the installation was short-lived as the batteries were stolen at night.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula obukuumi n'okulabika mu ppaaka, abantu baasalawo okuteeka ebitaala by'amaanyi g'enjuba ku makubo g'abatembeeyi. Eky'omukisa omubi, okuteekamu kwali kwa kaseera katono kubanga bbaatule zabbibwa ekiro.
ach_prompt: I tute me medo rwom me gwoko ber bedo ki neno piny I park, lwak gumoko tamgi me keto mac mac ma aa ki iceng I kabedo ma dano woto iye. Ki gum marac, keto mac obedo pi kare manok pien ki kwalo battery I dyewor.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitogogong ayuara keda aanyunet naka aiboisit naidarere itiang, apotu itunga ibwaikisi akimian nuka esola korotin lu alotok. Nukaiturur, abu aibwanakinio ngin kodaun apak naedit naarai aponi okokwarai abaturen kware.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu angu anyapa asea 'diyi ma ta mbazu ri ma omgbo otuzu, ongulumu 'da 'du e'yo aci solar ru 'diyi osuzu geri 'ba acipi 'diyini acizu 'diyi ma dria. Drile onziru, e'yo 'bani eyi osuzu ri ndra sa'wa weresi a'dusikuni 'ba ogu betru eyi inisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho obusingye n'okureebeka kurungi omu paaka, abantu bakasharamu kuta ebitaara bya soora aha mihanda y'okutamburiraho. Eky'omugisha mubi, okutaho ebyoma kukamara akaire kakye, ahabw'okuba bbaatule zikaibwa nyekiro.

eng_prompt: After years of careful planning and investment, the local government finally completed the extensive road improvement project. Residents are thrilled with the smooth, well-maintained streets that make commuting a breeze.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuteekateeka n'okusiga ensimbi okumala emyaka, gavumenti y'ebitundu emalirizza pulojekiti ennene ey'okutereeza enguudo. Abatuuze basanyufu olw'enguudo ennungi ezirabika obulungi ezireetera okutambula okuba okwangu.
ach_prompt: Ingee yub ki keto lim I tic pi mwaki mapol, gamente me tedero dong otyeko yub me yubu gudi. Lutedero cwiny gi yom ki yoo ma beco dok ma kiyubu maber ma weko wot bedo yot.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aitemonokin ka aipikakin ikapun, abu apugan naka atutubet kongetak epurojekt loajokan loka aitojokar irotin. Iyalamasi itunga noi kanu irotin lu ejokuka, lu itemonokinitai ejok lu ijaikitos alosit aiboisio nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Eli karakara eyi ma vutia otuta kililiru 'yezu azini lonyi vuti aleza 'yezu 'bori ma vutia, gamete angu ndundu eyini 'diyi de otita nzila eyi edezu 'da asizu ra. Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ayikosi nzila onyiru 'diyi si eyini ani acizu angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri 'bazu ewakokoru.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okukora enteekateeka n'obwegyendesereza, gavumenti y'ekyaro ekahendera yaamara kukora purogyekiti y'okutunguura enguuto. Abatuuragye nibashemererwa ahabw'enguuto nungi kandi ezirikwetengwa kurungi, ekirikureetera okugyenda n'okuruga omu kicweka kimwe kuza omu kindi.

eng_prompt: In recent years, significant strides have been made towards gender equality in various sectors. As a result, legislative changes have empowered women to engage actively in the political landscape.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, wabaddewo enkulaakulana ey'amaanyi eri omwenkanonkano mu bitundu eby'enjawulo. N'ekivuddemu, enkyukakyuka mu mateeka ziyambye abakyala okwenyigira ennyo mu byobufuzi.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, alokaloka mapol otime I tenge me neno ni mon ki coo gitye marom I tenge mapat-pat. Macalo adwogi ne, aloka-loka I cik omiyo kero ki mon me donyo I lok me cungu iwi-bye.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, aponi kitolomunai apol naepol noi mama ejaasi ikiliok keda angor kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela. Kanuka ngun, aijulanakineta nuka ikisila einakinitos angor apedor ajaut toma akiro nuka epolitikis.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, 'ba e'bi drile su e'yo oku eyini aa'zu agupi eyi be trotro ri ma dria esele ndundu eyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, ojata azita ma alia 'diyi fe okpo oku yi dri fizu e'yo politikini 'diyi ma alia indi.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, entunguuka y'amaani ekozirwe omu by'oburinganiza omu bitongore bitari bimwe na bimwe. N'ekyarugiremu, empindahinduka omu biragiro, ziheire abakazi amaani okwejumba omu by'obutegyeki.

eng_prompt: As the deadline for the annual fundraising event approaches, the committee is reviewing the current status of contributions. To ensure a successful outcome, timely participation from all members is crucial.
lug_prompt: Nga nsalesale w'omukolo gw'okusonda ssente buli mwaka asembera, akakiiko keetegereza embeera y'obuyambi eriwo kati. Okukakasa obuwanguzi, okwetaba mu budde okuva mu bammemba bonna kikulu nnyo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma nino me agiki me yub me jogo cente ma bedo tye mwaka ki mwaka tye cok, dul enoni tye ka ngiyo kit ma lim tye kwede. Pi neno ni tic owoto maber, omyero lumemba weng gubed tye ikare ki kome.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyapie apak naka awasia naka aituk ikapun kangol ekaru, euta ekomiti airereor ejautene loka agangat. Kanu aitodolikin akiro ejok, epolok noi aimorikikina naka imeban kere kotoma apak.
lgg_prompt: O'du asizu e'yo robia trazu eli vusi ri ni ecazu ogogo risi, komiti ni e'yo robia trazu 'diyi ma ale andri. E'yo drile suzaru 'diyi esuzu, 'ba dria memba ru 'diyi ma azi ngaza sa'wa dria ri eri orodriru.
nyn_prompt: Obwiire bw'ahamuheru bw'okushorooza esente buri mwaka, akakiiko kariyo nikashwijuma omutindo gw'obuhwezi oburiho hati. Okureeba ngu ebyarugyemu biba birungi,okwejumba kwa ba memba boona nikikuru munonga.

eng_prompt: After months of hard work and dedication, the women leaders in the district gathered to review their commitments. They celebrated their achievements and the positive impact they had made in the community.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okukola ennyo n'okwewaayo, abakulembeze abakyala mu disitulikiti baakuŋŋaana okuddamu okwetegereza obweyamo bwabwe. Baajaguza ebituukiddwaako n'enkyukakyuka ennungi gye baali bakoze mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me tic matek ki keto cwiny gi, lutela pa mon gucokke me ngiyo jami ma gucikke me timone. Gukwero jami ma gutimo ki adwogi maber ma gutimo I kabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aswam kagogong keda ainakina, apotu engarenok nungor kodisitrikt kiriamunos airereor aisumunetakec. Apotu kesi inumunumata aitodolikineta kec keda ajokis naka aswam kec kotoma atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Mba azi ngaza okporu azini asi feza ma vutia, drice'ba oku distrikitia 'diyi tra yi yi otuta yini 'diyi ma ale andrizu. Eyi fe ayiko e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma dria tualu orodri eyini esu ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi g'okukora n'amaani n'okwehayo, abeebembezi b'abakazi omu disiturikiti, baketeeranira hamwe kushwijuma ebyaraganisiibwe. Bakashemererwa ahabw'ebintu ebibahikireho hamwe n'omugasho ogu batungire omu bantu.

eng_prompt: In preparation for the upcoming community event, local businesses have come together to support the initiative. One of the key contributions has been from the district traders' association, which has generously offered to supply seating for attendees.
lug_prompt: Mu kwetegekera omukolo gw'ekitundu ogujja, abasuubuzi b'omu kitundu bakwataganye okuwagira enteekateeka. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ebivuddemu kwe kuba nti ekibiina ky'abasuubuzi mu disitulikiti kiwaddeyo ebifo eby'okutuula eri abantu.
ach_prompt: I yubbe pi yub me kabedo matye kabino ni, lutim biacara me tedero guribe kacel me cwako yub eni. Mic acel ma pire tek tutwal obedo pa dul pa lucat wil me district, ma gumiyo kabedo ki dano ma gubedo tye.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemonokin kanuka epucit lo ebunit, apotu ibiasaran luka atutubet imorikikinos kanu aigang aswamisioit ngin. Adiopet kotoma agangat naepol noi erai kama ejaasi atukot naka agwelanarak luko disitrikt, loajokan noi kanu aijaikin itunga aiboisio.
lgg_prompt: Otuta 'yezu omu ongulumu eyini emupi ri ni, tujari angu 'da ma alea 'diyi emu tualu atita fezu otita 'da ni. Afa feza okporu 'diyi ma azi enga engazu amuti 'ba tujari 'yepi distrikiti'a 'diyi vu, yini owizu 'ba emupi 'diyi dri rizu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kweteekateekyera omukoro gw'ekyanga ogurikwija, abashuubuzi b'omubyaro bakwatanisize kushagika enteekateeka. Kimwe aha bintu by'omugasho ebirikuheebwayo, n'ekibiina ky'abashuubuzi ekya disiturikiti, ekyehaireyo kutaho entebe z'okushutama.

eng_prompt: The event organizers implemented several new marketing strategies this year. As a result, they anticipated a larger turnout for today's function.
lug_prompt: Abategesi b'omukolo baateeka mu nkola obukodyo obupya obw'okutunda omwaka guno. N'ekyavaamu, baali basuubira abantu bangi okujja ku mukolo gwa leero.
ach_prompt: Luyub yub ne gukati ki yoo mapat-pat me cato wil I mwaka ni. Macalo adwogi ne, gubedo ki byek ni dano mapol bibino I yub matin.
teo_prompt: Apotu lu itemonokinak airiamunet itodolikisi iponesio luitetiak luka agwelanar okaru lo. Kanuka ngun, aomitos kesi ebe epote itunga luipu alomun toma opucit lolo.
lgg_prompt: Ba e'yo otupi 'diyi 'ba geri cuu ndazu o'diru 'diyi eli 'disi. E'yo 'disi, eyi ega ndra 'ba emu'ba 'diyi ma kalafe andru ri angiri.
nyn_prompt: Abatebekanisa omukoro bakata omu nkora oburyo busya bw'okuguza omwaka ogu. N'ekyarugiremu, bakaba nibateekateeka ngu abantu baingi nibaija aha mukoro gw'erizooba.

eng_prompt: In an effort to empower local communities, various workshops and programs have been implemented. These initiatives focus on equipping women with essential skills to enhance their economic independence.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula ebitundu, emisomo n'enteekateeka ez'enjawulo zitegekeddwa. Enteekateeka zino ziteeka essira ku kuwa abakyala obukugu obwetaagisa okutumbula okweyimirizaawo kwabwe mu byenfuna.
ach_prompt: I tute me tyelo kor lwak me tedero, kacoke me pwonye ki yub mapat-pat ki keto itic. Yub magi keto cwinygi tutwalle I kom miyo diro ma mite ki mon wek okony gi nongo cente.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitigogong itunga luka atutubet, itolomunitai airiamunun keda ainapeta nuegelegela. Alosikinet naka aswam ngun erai aijanakin angor acoa na itwasamao kanu aitogogong ikapunukec.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu ongulumu eyini okpo fezu, 'ba e'do otita eyi otita ndundu eyi pie. Otita 'diyi asi 'ba okpo fezu oku eyini ondua orodriru eyini ecozu eyi ma ngulupi esuzu e'yo robia nirisi ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura abantu b'omubyaro, emishomo n'enteekateeka nyingi zitandikirweho. Enteekateeka ezi nizigyenderera okuheereza abakazi emyoga y'omugasho, kugira ngu babaase kwebaisaho omu by'entaasya.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a noticeable shift in the business landscape of the city. More and more female entrepreneurs are stepping into leadership roles and making their mark in the retail industry.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise wabaddewo enkyukakyuka mu by'obusuubuzi mu kibuga. Abakyala bangi abasuubuzi bayingira mu bifo by'obukulembeze ne bakola akabonero kaabwe mu by'obusuubuzi.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, alokaloka madit otime I kom biacara me boma madit ne. Dako matye ki biacara mapol tye ka donyo I tic me tela dok bene tye ka keto lanyut I komgi I tenge me cat.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ejai aijulanakineta nuipu noi kotoma ebiasara loka eibuga. Angor nuipu noi nuejaasi keda ebiasara eutasi alomar toma aiboisio nuapolok kosodete aitolomun iponesiokec kotoma agwelanar.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, ojata e'dapi tujari aku ambu city niri ma alea ri ebi ovu ci. Oku tujari 'yepi karakara eyi fi pari driceza ni 'diyi ma alea eyini ani eyi ma wura 'bazu tujari 'yezu 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, habaireho empindahinduka y'amaani omu by'obushubuzi omu rurembo. Abakazi baingi abarikukora eby'obushubuzi nibaza omu myanya y'obwebembezi bakakora akamanyiso omu by'obushubuzi.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a significant shift in societal attitudes towards gender equality. This change has led to a more positive representation of women in various fields, including media and politics.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise wabaddewo enkyukakyuka ey'amaanyi mu ndowooza z'abantu ku mwenkanonkano. Enkyukakyuka eno ereetedde abakazi okukiikirirwa obulungi mu bintu eby'enjawulo omuli emikutu gy'amawulire n'ebyobufuzi.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, alokaloka madit otime I kit ma lwak tamo kwede I kom mon ki coo. Aloka-loka man okelo cung pa mon maber I kabedo mapat-pat, ma I kingi obedo odi poko ngec ki cungu iwi-bye.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ejai aijulanakineta nuepolok noi kotoma aomisio nuka angor keda ikiliok. Eyangau aijulanakineta ngun abwoikinio najokan naka angor kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela, aimoriarit nuka iyemuto keda nuka epolitikis.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, ojata amboru e'bi ovu 'yeta ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma alea e'yo oku eyini aa'zu agupi eyi be trotro ri ma dria ci. Ojata 'diri fe 'ba pa tupi oku yi ma paria e'yo ndundu ndu ndu yi ma alia, e'yo oyuyuani azini e'yo politiki ni 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, habaireho empindahinduka y'amaani omu miteekateekyere y'abantu ahabw'oburinganiza. Empindahinduka egi ereesire okujwekyerwa kurungi kw'abakazi omu myanya etari emwe, otwariiremu eby'amahurire hamwe n'eby'obutegyeki.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, many women have taken on various roles to contribute to their households. Their efforts often extended beyond traditional expectations, allowing their partners to pursue opportunities for growth.
lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo byonna, abakyala bangi bakoze emirimu egy'enjawulo okuyamba amaka gaabwe. Kaweefube waabwe yateranga okusukkuluma ku biteeberezebwa mu buwangwa, ekyasobozesanga bannaabwe okunoonya emikisa gy'okukulaakulana.
ach_prompt: I kare macon, mon mapol gutiyo tic mapat-pat me konyo gangi gi. Tute gi ipol kare okato miti gi macon, weko luwot gi nongo gum me dongo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nukolo kere, eyangasi angor aswamisinei nuegelegela kanu aigang ikalia kec. Apotu kesi kiswamata kagogong adepar lu eomitai sek, ido abu koinak ipaupakec apedor apolo.
lgg_prompt: E'yo agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, oku karakara eyi 'ye azi ndundu eyini ani afa fezu aku eyivile 'diyini. Okpo eyini 'ba ri tu aga e'yo eyini egale 'diyi ra, erini fezu eyi ma agyipi eyini drileba zozu 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu byafaayo byona, abakazi baingi batwire emirimo etari emwe n'emwe okuhwera amaka gaabo. Amaani gaabo gakaba gatari ga buriijo, ekyabaire nikibaasisa bagyenzi baabo kuronda emigisha y'okutunguuka.

eng_prompt: Each year, communities come together to honor the achievements and contributions of women in various fields. This celebration serves as a reminder of the ongoing fight for gender equality and women's rights.
lug_prompt: Buli mwaka, ebitundu bikungaana wamu okussa ekitiibwa mu bituukiddwaako n'ebikolebwa abakyala mu bintu eby'enjawulo. Okujaguza kuno kujjukiza olulwana olugenda mu maaso olw'okwenkanankana kw'ekikula ky'abantu n'eddembe ly'abakyala.
ach_prompt: Mwaka ki mwaka, lwak gure kacel me woro jami ma mon otimo I tenge mapat-pat. Kwero nino man poyo wi dano i kom lweny matye kawot anyim pi twero pa mon ki coo.
teo_prompt: Kangol ekaru, imorikikinos itunga ainumunum aitodolinikineta keda aswamisinei nuka angor kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela. Iswamai ainumunum na kwape aiitunitor nuka ejie lo elosi akonye kanu apedorosio nuka angor keda ikiliok.
lgg_prompt: Eli vusi, ongulumu eyi emu tualu inzita fezu e'yo oku eyini 'ye 'diyi ma dria. Omu 'diri azi nga a'di 'diza mupi drile e'yo oku eyini aa'zu agupi eyi be trotro ri ma dria azini drilemgbo oku eyini ri ma e'yo egazu.
nyn_prompt: Buri mwaka, abantu nibeteerana hamwe okuheereza ekitinisa abakazi abakozire n'ebi bakozire omu mirimo etari emwe. Omukoro gw'okujaguza nigwijutsya okurwanirira obugabe bw'abashaija n'abakazi.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing need for inclusivity, the committee has been working diligently to address the unique challenges faced by marginalized groups. Their latest initiative focuses specifically on empowering women with disabilities.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'okuyingiza abantu bonna, akakiiko kabadde kakola n'obunyiikivu okugonjoola okusoomoozebwa okw'enjawulo ebibinja ebyasuulibwa ku mabbali kwe bisanga. Enteekateeka yaabwe eyasembyeyo essira eritadde ku kutumbula abakyala abaliko obulemu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me dongo miti me bedo ki dano weng, dul enoni obedo katic ki mit kom me tyeko peko mapat-pat ma dul ma pe ki gum me tic kwedgi gitye ka kato ki iye. Yub meggi manyen tye tutwalle me tyelo kor mon matye ki goro.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loepol noi loka aimorikikin itunga, iswamat ekomiti kagogong aitemokin atiokisio nuegelegela nuetereikina keda igurupun luetiakaritai. Alosikinetekec naitetet erai aitigogong angor nu engwalitos.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu 'ba dria ma aa'zu alenia ri ma omgbo ni tuzu risi, komiti 'da ebi azi nga okporu e'yo ewaru ongulumu 'bani lezu eyi ma ta mbazu 'diyini esu 'diyi ma aza kozu. Otita eyini o'diru 'diyi asi 'ba okpo fezu oku aco be 'diyini.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwenda kweyongyera kw'abantu boona, akakiiko kateire amaani omu kukora ahaburemeezi oburikushangwa abantu abatarikwebaasa. Ekigyendererwa kyabo ekisya nikigyenderera munonga okutunguura abakazi abaine oburema.

eng_prompt: In a remarkable display of community spirit, local women gathered to honor the environment during last year's festivities. Their efforts not only brought joy but also contributed to a greener future.
lug_prompt: Mu kwolesebwa okw'ekitalo okw'omwoyo gw'ekitundu, abakyala b'omu kitundu baakuŋŋaana okussa ekitiibwa mu butonde bw'ensi mu bikujjuko by'omwaka oguwedde. Kaweefube waabwe teyakoma ku kuleeta ssanyu naye era yaleetawo ebiseera by'omu maaso ebirungi.
ach_prompt: I nyutu cwiny maber tutwal pa lwak, mon me tedero gugure me woro cwec ma orumuwa I kare me kwer me mwaka ma okato. Tute gi pe okelo yomcwiny keken ento bene okelo anyim maber.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aitodiar etau loajokan noi, apotu angor nuka atutubet kimorikikinos ayongite ejautene lo akwap kokaru loatubor. Mam aswam kec abu koyangau aiyalama bon konye abu koyangau ingaren na ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'da o'bi yi ma asi, oku angu 'da ma alea 'diyi tra eyi inzita fezu angu amani aa'zu alenia ri dri omu eli ajerisi 'diyi ma alea. Okpo eyini 'ba 'diyi awini lu ayiko eji ku te eyi fe vini ewu drialeri ni aa'zu muke ndeni.
nyn_prompt: Omubwire bw'okujaguza omwaka oguhwaire, abakazi b'omukyanga baketeeranira hamwe okuheereza obuhangwa bw'ensi ekitinisa. Amaani gaabo tigarareesire okushemererwa kwonka, kureka gakareetaho n'ebiro bya nyensya birungi.

eng_prompt: With its diverse flora and favorable climate, Uganda offers an ideal environment for honey production. Many entrepreneurs are turning to beekeeping as a sustainable source of income.
lug_prompt: Olw'ebimera byayo eby'enjawulo n'embeera y'obudde ennungi, Uganda ewa embeera ennungi ey'okulima omubisi gw'enjuki. Abasuubuzi bangi badda mu kulunda enjuki ng'ensibuko y'ensimbi ey'olubeerera.
ach_prompt: Lobo Uganda tye ki jami apita mapat-pat matye iye kacel ki piny ma ber tutwal ma weko bedo ber tutwal me puru moo kic. Lutim biacara mapol tye ka cako gwoko kic macalo yoo me nongo cente.
teo_prompt: Keda iraan luegelegela keda ejautene loajokan loka ikwamin, einakini Uganda aiboisit najokan noi naka aitolom esike. Eutasi agwelanarak luipu alosit aipit awo kwape ewai lo idumunet ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Eri vile ori ndundu 'diyi pie tualu angu mile be onyiru 'diyisi, Uganda ni angu onyiru anyu ezozu ri fe. Ba tujari 'ye'ba karakara eyi curu'do anyu tamba ekile geri azi eyini ecozu robia esuzu ra ni ru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebimera bitari bimwe na bimwe hamwe n'embeera y'obwire nungi, Uganda neehereza obuhangwa burungi bw'obwoki. Abashuubuzi baingi nibatandika okuriisa enjoki nk'oburugo bw'entaasya.

eng_prompt: Many students struggle to grasp complex concepts on their own. By attending educational seminars, they can gain valuable insights and support from experienced instructors.
lug_prompt: Abayizi bangi bazibuwalirwa okutegeera ebintu ebizibu ku lwabwe. Mu kwetaba mu misomo gy'ebyenjigiriza, basobola okufuna amagezi ag'omugaso n'obuyambi okuva mu basomesa abalina obumanyirivu.
ach_prompt: Lutino kwan mapol nongo tek tutwal me niang pwony ma tek tutwal pigi kengi. Ka gubedo tye I kacoke me pwonye, gitwero nongo ngec ki kony ki bot lupwonye matye ki ngec matut.
teo_prompt: Etionikinit esisiak luipu amisiikin akiro nuetioko kes ikulepek bon. Kowai lo ajaikin toma aisisiaeta, epedorete kesi adumun acoa ka agangat kama ejaasi isisianakinak luemisiaritos.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu anzi karakara eyi dri ci e'yo kongoloko 'diyi vazu eyi ma ngulupi si. Muzu otita imbatani onitani 'diyi ma alia risi, eyi eco ondua orodriru azini atita esu engazu imba'ba nita be 'diyi vu ra.
nyn_prompt: Abeegi baingi nibatunga oburemeezi bw'okwetegyereza ebintu bigumire ahabwaabo. Kubarikuza omu semina z'eby'obwegyese, nibabaasa kutunga obuhwezi n'obwengye kuruga omu beegyesa abakugu.

eng_prompt: After analyzing the academic results from various institutions, it became clear that some schools stood out in terms of student achievement. In particular, the performance metrics for government schools showed significant improvement compared to previous years.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya ebyava mu masomero okuva mu matendekero ag'enjawulo, kyazuuka nti amasomero agamu gaawukana mu nsoma y'abayizi. Okusingira ddala, ebipimo by'enkola y'amasomero ga gavumenti byalaga enkulaakulana ey'amaanyi bw'ogeraageranya n'emyaka egiyise.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo adwoki me kwan ma aa ki I gangi kwan mapat-pat, onen atyer kamaleng ni gangi kwan mukene gubedo pat ki gangi kwan mukene. Ki lok ada, rwom me timo peny pa gangi kwan pa gamente onyuto alokaloka madit tutwal ka iporo ki mwaka ma okato.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereonor eswamae loka esisiak luka isomeroi luegelegela, aponi kojenunai ebe icie isomeroi iswamaete ejok. Kacut, eswamae loka isomeroi luka apugan itodunit ebe ejokuna noi itiriani keda ikaru lu atuboros.
lgg_prompt: Bani agata onita ni engazu pari onita ni ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, eri eca kililiru kini sukulu azi 'diyi fu drile sukulu anzi eyi ma agata ma alea. Tutunisi, otita agata sukulu gameteni 'diyiniri e'da otuta angiri aga eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma ebyarugire omu bigyezo kuruga omu matendekyero agatari gamwe, kikarebeka butunu ngu amashomero agamwe gakaba nigakora gye omu bigyezo by'abeegi. Okukira munonga, enkora y'amashomero ga Gavumenti ekoreka okutunguuka kw'amaani wagyeragyeranisa n'emyaka ehwaire.

eng_prompt: Despite the efforts of dedicated teachers, the students consistently struggled with math concepts. As a result, standardized test scores reflected a troubling trend across the entire district.
lug_prompt: Ng'oggyeko kaweefube w'abasomesa abeewaddeyo, abayizi baalemagana n'endowooza z'okubala. N'ekyavaamu, obubonero bw'ebigezo eby'omutindo gwennyini bwalaga enkola etali nnungi mu disitulikiti yonna.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni lupwonye gutiyo matek tutwal, lutino kwan gubedo ka lweny ki lok me cura. Macalo adwogi ne, adwoki me pim ma ki keto I rwom marom onyuto tim marac tutwal I dicitrwik ne weng.
teo_prompt: Karaida apotu isisianakinak iswamata kagogong, apotu esisiak itereikina keda aomisio nuka aimar. Kanuka ngun, apotu ainwakio naka ainwakio kitodunit ationis naepol noi ko disitrikt kere.
lgg_prompt: Imba'ba ava be 'diyi ma okpo ni tro ovuzu ra ti, sukulu anzi eyi ri dri ci e'yo namba ni 'diyi be. E'yo 'disi, agata obeta ma alea 'diyi ece e'yo azi onzi distrikiti 'da ma alea ndulu ni i.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho amaani g'abegyesa, abeegi bakaguma nibarwana n'ebiteekateeko by'okubara. N'ekyarugiremu, obubonero bw'okukyebera oburikwetengwa, bukoreka enkora y'oburemeezi omu disiturikiti yoona.

eng_prompt: During the annual school assembly, the educational officer addressed the staff and highlighted the challenges faced over the past year. He expressed his appreciation for the dedication and commitment shown by the teachers in fostering a positive learning environment.
lug_prompt: Mu lukiiko lw'essomero olutegekebwa buli mwaka, akulira ebyenjigiriza yayogeddeko eri abakozi n'alaga okusoomoozebwa okwabaddewo omwaka oguwedde. Yalaze okusiima kwe olw'obumalirivu n'obumalirivu bw'abasomesa mu kutumbula embeera ennungi ey'okusoma.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kacoke ma bedo mwaka ki mwaka me gang kwan, ladit ma loyo lok kom kwan oloko ki lutic dok otito peko ma gunongo I mwaka ma okato. En onyuto pwocce pi tic matek ma lupwonye tye katimo me kelo kabedo maber me kwan.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet naka ekaru loka esomero, abu lo epolokit nuka asioman kiner keda eswamak kosodi aitodun atiokisio nuetereikina keda esomero kokaru lo atubor. Abu ngesi itodu aiyalamake kanu ainakina keda ainakina naka isisianakinak kanu aitopolor aiboisit najokan naka aisisia.
lgg_prompt: Sawa drifuza sukulu ni eli vusi ri si, azi'ba onita ni 'da nze e'yo azi'ba eyini dika ece e'yo ewaru eyini esu eli agapi 'disi 'diyi ma dria. Eri ece awa'difo erini e'yo asi feza ni azini asi feza imba'ba eyini e'da angu onita ni muke ri ma omgbo otuzu ri si.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko rw'eishomero orw'omwaka, orikukurira eby'obwegyese akagambira abakozi oburemeezi obubatungire omwaka oguhwaire. Akashoborora okusiima kwe ahabw'okwehayo n'obweziriki bw'abegyesa okureetaho embeera nungi y'okwega.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the latest standardized test scores, many educators expressed their concerns about the overall performance of their students. As a result, some schools were so disappointed with bad results.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya obubonero bw'ebigezo, abasomesa bangi baalaga obweraliikirivu bwabwe ku nkola y'abayizi baabwe okutwalira awamu. N'ekyavaamu, amasomero agamu gaggwaamu amaanyi olw'ebyava mu bigezo ebibi.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo kit ma lutino tye katimo peny kwede, lupwonye mapol gunyutu lworo gi i kom kit ma lutino tye katimo kwede peny. Macalo adwogi ne, gangi kwan mukene cwinygi pe obedo yom ki adwoki me peny ma pe obedo ber.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereonor eswamae loka aingito, apotu isisianakinak luipu itodutu aiyalongongokec kanu eswamae loajokan loka esisiak kec. Kanuka ngun, apotu isomeroi icie itakadikisi kanu aswamisio nuarokok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo sukulu anzi eyivile 'diyi ma agata ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, imba'ba karakara eyi ece asi otiza eyini sukulu anzi eyivile 'diyi ma agata ma dria. E'yo 'disi, sukulu azi 'diyi ovu candisi agata onzi 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma obubonero bw'ebigyezo, abegyesa baingi bakoreka okwerarikirira kwabo aha kukora kw'abeegi baabo. N'ekyarugiremu, amashomero agamwe gakahwa amaani ahabw'ebyarugire omu bigyezo ebitahikire.

eng_prompt: As the election results came in, the excitement in the village was palpable, with everyone eager to see who would emerge victorious. However, it quickly became clear that this year's competition was particularly fierce.
lug_prompt: Ebyava mu kulonda bwe byafuluma, essanyu mu kyalo lyali lirabika, nga buli omu yeegomba okulaba ani agenda okuvaayo ng'awanguzi. Kyokka, kyalabika mangu nti okuvuganya kw'omwaka guno kwali kwa maanyi nnyo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma adwogi yer obino, yomcwiny obedo tye I caro, dano weng obedo ki miti me neno anga ma obiloyo. Kadi bed kumeno, onen atyer kamaleng ni pyem me mwaka ni obedo tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Neadolunia akiro nuka aseo, apotu itunga luka ocalo iyalamasi noi, ido itunga kere ekotosi aanyun ingai bo ebuni aitelekaar. Konye, apotu kojenutu atipet ebe etiono noi abolobol naka ekaru kalo.
lgg_prompt: E'yo opetaa ni efuzu 'boria, ayiko calu ma alia ri e'da ra, 'ba dria le ndra ndre a'di ni nga efu agata ndepiri'i. Kani si, eca e'da mbeleru kini a'bala eli 'disi ri ndra okporu tu.
nyn_prompt: Ebyarugire omu buruuru ku byaizire, okushemererwa omu kyaro kukarebeka, buri omwe akaba aine ekihika ky'okureeba orikusingura. Kwonka, kikarebeka butunu ngu empaka z'omwaka ogu zikaba zigumire munonga.

eng_prompt: In the latest academic assessments, the results have shown a noticeable trend in student performance. This year, the data reveals a significant difference in achievement levels between genders.
lug_prompt: Mu kwekenneenya kw'ebyenjigiriza okwasembyeyo, ebyavuddemu biraga enkulaakulana mu nkola y'abayizi. Omwaka guno, ebiwandiiko biraga enjawulo ey'amaanyi mu mitendera gy'okutuuka ku buwanguzi wakati w'ekikula ky'abantu.
ach_prompt: I kwed me kwan ma okato cokcok-ki, adwogi ne onyuto dongo pa rwom me kwan pa lutino. I mwaka ni, ngec manyuto apoka-poka madit tutwal I rwom me cobo miti pa mon ki coo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aingic naka asioman naitetet, itodunit akiro nuelomunitos ebe ejokuna eswamae loka esisiak. Kokaru kalo, itodunitos akiro ngun atiaketait naepol noi kotoma aitodolikinio naka ikiliok keda angor.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza sukulu lazu o'diru 'diyi ma alea, e'yo efupi 'diyi e'da geri sukulu anzi eyini agazu muke ri ra. Eli 'disi, e'yo 'bani esu 'diyi ece esele coza angiri agupi eyi ma eselea oku eyi pie 'diyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Omu kukyebera eby'obwegyese okwabaireho, ebyarugire omu bigyezo nibyoreka entunguuka omu kukora kw'abeegi. Omwaka ogu, ebihandiiko nibyoreka entaaniso y'amaani omu by'obusinguzi ahagati y'abashaija n'abakazi.

eng_prompt: After a rigorous evaluation of academic performance and extracurricular achievements, the results of the annual school rankings were finally announced. To everyone's surprise, the best school in the district got forty-four aggregates.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya enkola y'okusoma n'ebituukiddwaako, ebyava mu nsengeka y'amasomero ey'omwaka byalangirirwa. Ekyewuunyisa buli omu, essomero eryasinga mu disitulikiti lyafuna obubonero ana mu buna.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo kit ma lutino tye katimo kwede i gang kwan kacel ki ngo ma lutino otimo i gang kwan mukene, adwoki me kwed me mwaka ki mwaka me gangi kwan kicwalo ne I agiki ne. Ki ngeng pa dano weng, gang kwan ma otimo maber loyo weng I district onongo aggregates pyer angwen wiye angwen.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereonor ejok eswamae loka esomero keda aitodolikineta nuka esomero, aponi kolimorai akiro nuka esomero kangol ekaru. Kanu aumokin itunga kere, abu esomero loajokan kakere kodum amakesin akaisaongon iwongon.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani agata sukulu eyini 'diyi ma ale andrizu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, 'ba azi e'yo agata sukulu eyi ma esele coza eli vusi 'diyiniri ra. Ba dria ma osuta si, sukulu districtia onyiru ndeni ri isu otita eyi kali su drini su.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma kurungi emikorere y'amashomero hamwe n'obuhanguzi oburi aheeru y'eishomero, ebyarugire omu kuronda kw'amashomero okwa buri mwaka bikarangirirwa. Okutangaaza buri omwe,eishomero eririkusinga oburungi omu disiturikiti, rikatunga obubonero makumi ana na buna.

eng_prompt: In an effort to improve student performance, the school administration has been reviewing various teaching strategies. After analyzing recent assessment data, the educational officer has recommended a more structured approach to evaluating student progress.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula ensoma y'abayizi, abakulembeze b'essomero babadde beetegereza enkola z'okusomesa ez'enjawulo. Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya ebyava mu kwekenneenya ebibaddewo gye buvuddeko, omukungu w'ebyenjigiriza awadde amagezi ku nkola entegeke obulungi ey'okukebera enkulaakulana y'abayizi.
ach_prompt: I tute me ilo malo rwom me kwan pa lutino, ludito me gang kwan gubedo ka neno yoo me pwonyo ma padi padi. Ingee ngiyo kor tic ma otimme cokcok-ki, ladit ma loyo lok kom kwan omiyo tam ni omyero ki tii ki yoo matir me ngiyo kit ma lutino tye ka kato kwede.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitojokar eswamae lo esisiak, euta eyaitene lo esomero airereor iwaitin lu aisisianakin lu egelegela. Akaulo naka airereonor akiro nuka aingic, abu eswaman loka asioman kicorak ebe ibusakinit aitwasam iponesio luitegelikina kanu airereonor eswamae loka esisiak.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu sukulu anzi eyi ma agata otuzu, driceza sukulu niri e'bi geri onita ni ndundu 'diyi ma ale andri. E'yo eti ondaza o'diru 'diyi ma vutia, azi'ba onita ma drilea ri fe egata geri 'bani sukulu anzi eyi ma zota onezu kililiru 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura emikorere y'abeegi, abebembezi b'eishomero batwire nibarondoora oburyo bw'okwegyesa obutari bumwe na bumwe. Bwanyima y'okushwijuma ebihandiiko by'okushwijuma abeegi, orikukurira eby'obwegyese, akahabura ngu habeho enkora nungi y'okushwijuma entunguuka y'abeegi.

eng_prompt: In recent evaluations of school leadership, several headteachers have faced scrutiny over their management and academic results. As a result, the education board has taken decisive action to address these issues.
lug_prompt: Mu kwekenneenya abakulembeze b'amasomero gyebuvuddeko, abakulu b'amasomero abawerako boolekaganye n'okukeberebwa olw'enzirukanya y'emirimu gyabwe n'ebyava mu kusoma kwabwe. N'ekivuddemu, ekitongole ky'ebyenjigiriza kikoze eky'amaanyi okugonjoola ensonga zino.
ach_prompt: I kwed ma okato cokcok-ki I kom tela me gangi kwan, ludito gangkwan mapol gunongo peko me ticgi ki adwoki me kwangi. Macalo adwogi ne, dul madoro lok kom kwan otimo gin mo me cobo peko magi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airereonor engarenone lo isomeroi pac, apotu lukapolok isomeroi luipu odumutu aingic kanu eyaitene kec keda eswamae kec. Kanuka ngun, etolomu erionget loka asioman nuepedorete aswam kanu aitemokin akiro nu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza o'diru driceza sukulu niri ma dria 'diyi ma alea, dricere karakara eyi esu e'yo eyi ma driceza ni azini agata onita ni 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, amuti onita niri 'du e'yo okporu e'yo 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kushwijuma obwebembezi bw'eishomero, abakuru b'amashomero baingi batungire okushwijumwa ahabw'obwebembezi bwabo hamwe n'ebirugire omu mishomo yaabo. N'ekyarugiremu, ekitongore ky'eby'obwegyese kikozire eky'amaani kukora aha nshonga ezi.

eng_prompt: The students worked diligently throughout the semester, motivated by the support and guidance of their headteacher. As a result, their hard work began to pay off in the form of impressive academic achievements.
lug_prompt: Abayizi baakola n'obunyiikivu mu lusoma lwonna olw'obuyambi n'obulagirizi bw'omukulu w'essomero lyabwe. N'ekyavaamu, okufuba kwabwe kwatandika okusasulwa mu ngeri y'obuwanguzi obw'ekitalo mu by'ensoma.
ach_prompt: Lutino kwan gutiyo matek tutwal I tem ne weng, kun ginongo cwak ki tira ki bot ladit gangkwan gi. Macalo adwogi ne, tic matek ma gutimo ocako kelo adwogi maber tutwal I kwan gi.
teo_prompt: Apotu esisiak iswamata keda agogongu kotoma atamu ngin kere, kanu agangat keda aicoreta nuka apolon esomero. Kanuka ngun, abu aswam kec kogeu aitac kotoma aitodolikinikec kotoma asioman.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu anzi 'da eyi nga azi okporu semester 'da ma alea dria, eyi esu ava atita azini imbata eyivile dricere ni 'diyisi. E'yo 'disi, azi okporu eyini nga ri e'do eyi ma orodri esu geri eyini agazu onita ma alea onyiru 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Abeegi bakakora n'amaani omu semisita yoona, ahabw'obuhwezi n'obwegyendesereza bwa mukuru w'eishomero ryabo. N'ekyarugiremu, okukoresa amaani kwabo kukatandika kushashurwa omu muringo gw'obusinguzi bw'omutaano omu by'obwegyese.

eng_prompt: Numerous studies have explored the impact of language on cognitive development in early childhood. One key finding highlights the advantages of using a child's native language in educational settings.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza kungi kunoonyezza engeri olulimi gye lukosaamu enkula y'okutegeera mu buto. Ekimu ku bizuuliddwa ebikulu kiraga emigaso gy'okukozesa olulimi oluzaaliranwa olw'omwana mu by'enjigiriza.
ach_prompt: Kwed mapol okato I kom adwoki pa leb I kom dongo pa dano I kare me tino. Gin acel ma pire tek ma kinongo nyutu ber pa tic ki leb pa lutino i gangi kwan.
teo_prompt: Ipu aisisiaeta nuengicete epone loepedoriata angajep aitopolor aomisio nuka idwe ludidik. Adiopet ajenunet itodunit ajokis naka aitwasam angajep naka idwe kotoma asioman.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza karakara eyi onda e'yo ti ni 'diyi ma okpo e'yo onita ni anzi nyiri eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma ezota ma dria ri ma dria. E'yo azi okporu 'bani esu ri ece orodri e'yo ti anzi nyiri eyini 'diyi ayuzu angu onita ni 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza kwingi kukecondooza aha nkora y'orurimi aha ntunguuka y'ebiteekateeko by'abaana bato. Ekijumbwirwe kimwe ekikuru nikyoreka emigasho y'okukoresa orurimi rw'enzaarwa y'omwana omuby'obwegyese.

eng_prompt: In recent discussions about the challenges facing rural education, it has become evident that many educators in village schools struggle with motivation. This lack of commitment often leads to a pattern of avoidance when it comes to their responsibilities.
lug_prompt: Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko ku kusoomoozebwa kw'ebyenjigiriza by'omu byalo, kyeyoleka bulungi nti abasomesa bangi mu masomero g'omu byalo balwana okufuna amaanyi. Obutabeera na kwewaayo kuno kutera okuviirako okwewala bwe kituuka ku buvunaanyizibwa bwabwe.
ach_prompt: I kare me nywako lok ma okato cokcok-ki I kom peko ma gangi kwan me caro tye ka kato ki iye, nen atyer kamaleng ni lupwonye mapol I gangi kwan me caro gitye ki peko me nongo cuku cwiny. Bedo peke pa miti eni ipol kare weko gi weyo tic gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma oineresinei lu atuboros nuikamunitos atiokisio nu etereikina keda asioman naka ocaloi, esubit bala etiono noi aisinyikokin isisianakinak lu ocaaloi. Amamus na ainakina duc eyangauni epone loka aisac aitodolikin aswamisinei kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza o'diru e'yo ewaru onita angu caluru 'diyi ma alea ri ma dria ri ma alea, eri e'da kini imba'ba karakara sukulu caluru 'diyi ma alea 'diyi dri ci ava esuzu. Asi feza ma ako 'di ni tutuni fe 'ba eyini e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi 'yezu ku ka eca e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma dria ria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kuhanuura okuhweireho ahaburemeezi bw'eby'obwegyese omu byaro, nikyoreka butunu ngu abegyesa baingi omu mashomero g'ebyaro nibarwana n'okugarurwamu amaani. Okubura okwehayo nikubareetera okwetantara obujunanizibwa bwabo.

eng_prompt: Many schools rely heavily on timely fee payments to maintain their programs and resources. When parents struggle to meet these financial obligations, it creates a ripple effect that ultimately impacts students' academic performance.
lug_prompt: Amasomero mangi geesigamye nnyo ku kusasula ebisale mu budde okusobola okukuuma pulogulaamu n'ebikozesebwa byaago. Abazadde bwe balwana okutuukiriza ebisaanyizo by'ensimbi bino, kireetawo enkola embi ekosa ensoma y'abayizi.
ach_prompt: Pol pa gangi kwan jenge tutwalle I kom cul me culu kwan ikare ki kome me gwoko yub gi ki jami gi. Ka lunyodo tye ka tute matek me cobo miti gi me lim, man kelo adwogi marac tutwal I kom kwan pa lutino.
teo_prompt: Isomeroi luipu emunokina noi aitac ikapun luka esomero kotoma apak kanu aidar ainapeta kec keda iboro. Arai etiono auriak aitodolikin iboro lu ikapun, itolomunenei ationis naepedori aitolitol eswamae lo esisiak.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu karakara eyi atita fe sukulu fizi ofezu sa'wa dria eyini ani otita eyivile 'diyi ma ta mbazu. Tipika ka dri ci e'yo robia ni 'diyi 'yezu, eri e'yo onzi eji sukulu anzi eyi ma agata onzi.
nyn_prompt: Amashomero maingi nigeemerera munonga aha kushashura ebishare by'eishomero omu bwire, okubaasa kuguma nigakora aha nteekateeka zaago hamwe n'ebintu byago. Abazaire kubarwana kuhikiiriza obujunanizibwa bwabo omu by'esente, nikireetaho oburemeezi oburikuteganisa emikorere y'abeegi omu mashomero.

eng_prompt: Despite high expectations and a strong track record, many were surprised by the recent changes in the school's performance metrics. Factors such as increased competition and shifts in student engagement may have contributed to this unexpected decline.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga waliwo ebisuubirwa bingi n'ebyafaayo ebirungi, bangi beewuunyizza enkyukakyuka ezaakolebwa mu nkola y'essomero gye buvuddeko. Ensonga nga okuvuganya okweyongera n'enkyukakyuka mu kwegatta kw'abayizi ziyinza okuba nga ze zaaviirako okukendeera kuno okwabadde tekusuubirwa.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gangi kwan ne gubedo ki gen madit tutwal I komgi dok bene gutimo jami mabeco tutwal, dano mapol gubedo ki ngeng I kom aloka loka ma otime cokcok-ki I kom kit ma gang kwan ne otimo kwede ticgi. Jami macalo pyem matek tutwal ki aloka-loka ikit ma lutino kwan tiyo kwede twero bedo ni okelo poto pa wel lutino kwan ma pe byek tye I komgi.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaas itunga keda aomisio nuepolok noi, apotu itunga luipu koumokinos keda aijulanakineta nuapotu iswamata esomero kangol. Iboro kwape abolobol naepol noi keda aijulanakineta nuka esisiak kes aticepak eyangautu aibiror na.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani asi 'bazu drinia angiri azini e'yo erini 'ye okporu 'diyi ma talasi, 'ba karakara eyi esu osutasi ojata sukulu 'da ma agata ma alea o'diru 'diyisi. E'yo ekile baka seza ma omgbo ni tuzu tualu e'yo sukulu anzi eyini lezu e'yo eyi 'yezu ri pie 'diyi fe e'yo 'di ma omgbo esizu ra.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho amatsiko maingi hamwe n'ebyafaayo by'amaani, abaingi bakatangazibwa empindahinduka ezabaireho omu nkora y'eishomero. Enshonga nk'okuhayahayana kweyongyeire hamwe n'empindahinduka omu kwejumba kw'abeegi, nikibaasa kuba nikyo kyareesireho okukyendeera oku.

eng_prompt: Despite facing numerous challenges and changes in leadership, the school has consistently demonstrated its commitment to academic excellence. As a result, it has garnered a strong reputation among parents and students alike.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga waliwo okusoomoozebwa kungi n'enkyukakyuka mu bukulembeze, essomero lyeyongera okulaga obumalirivu bwalyo mu kusoma obulungi. N'ekivuddemu, kifunye erinnya ery'amaanyi mu bazadde n'abayizi.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gukato ki peko mapol ki aloka-loka I tela, gang kwan eni onyuto kare ki kare ni guketo cwinygi I kom rwom me kwan maber. Macalo adwogi ne, gunongo nying maber ikin lunyodo ki lutino kwan.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaas keda atiokisio nuipu keda aijulanakineta nuka engarenone, itodunit duc esomero ngol ebe ekapakina aitodolikin eswamae loajokan. Kanuka ngun, adumu ngesi ekiror loajokan kanejaas auriak keda esisiak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru karakara eyi esuzu tualu ojata driceza ni 'diyi pie ra ti sukulu 'da e'da sa'wa driasi ava erini 'ba onita ma alea ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, isu ru okporu tipika eyi ma eselea sukulu anzi eyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho oburemeezi bwingi n'empindahinduka omu bwebembezi, eishomero rigumire niryoreka okwehayo kwaryo omu by'obwegyese. N'ekyarugiremu, kitungire eiziina ry'amaani omu bazaire n'abeegi.

eng_prompt: Many families have expressed their dissatisfaction with the current educational standards. As a result, they are exploring alternative options for their children's schooling.
lug_prompt: Amaka mangi galaze obutali bumativu bwago ku mutindo gw'ebyenjigiriza oguliwo. N'ekivuddemu, banoonya engeri endala ez'okusomesezaamu abaana baabwe.
ach_prompt: Gangi mapol gunyutu cwer cwiny gi i kom rwom me kwan matye kombedi. Macalo adwogi ne, gitye ka yenyo yoo mukene me pwonyo lutino gi.
teo_prompt: Apotu ikalia luipu itodutu amamut aiyalama kec kanuka adoketait na asioman. Kanuka ngun, eutasi kesi aimo iponesio ice luka asioman naka idwekec.
lgg_prompt: Familia karakara eyi ece e'yo eyini aa'zu ayikosi ku geri onita ni curu'do ri si. E'yo 'disi, eyi geri ndundu eyini ecozu anzi eyivile 'diyini onita fezu 'diyi onda.
nyn_prompt: Amaka maingi gareesire okwetomboitwa ahabw'omutindo gw'eby'obwegyese oguriho hati. N'ekyarugiremu, bariyo nibasherura oburyo obundi bw'okwegyesa abaana baabo.

eng_prompt: The educational system in the district has been facing significant challenges in recent years. One of the most pressing issues is the shortage of qualified teachers available to meet the needs of students.
lug_prompt: Enkola y'ebyenjigiriza mu disitulikiti ebadde esanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu myaka egiyise. Ekimu ku bizibu ebiriwo kwe kubulwa kw'abasomesa abalina ebisaanyizo okukola ku byetaago by'abayizi.
ach_prompt: Yub me kwan I district obedo kanongo peko mapol I mwaki ma okato ni. Lok acel ma pire tek tutwal en aye peko me nok pa lupwonye matye ki ngec me cobo miti pa lutino.
teo_prompt: Ewai lo aisisia ko disitrikt etereikina keda atiokisio nuepolok noi kokaru lu atuboros. Adiopet kotoma atiokisio nuepolok noi ngesi ekadakada loka isisianakinak luepedorete aitodolikin ipudesia luka esisiak.
lgg_prompt: Geri onita ni distrikiti 'da ma alea ri ebi e'yo ewaru eyi esu eli agapi 'diyi ma alea. E'yo azi okporu tu 'diyi ma azi eri imba'ba onita be 'diyi ma ako sukulu anzi eyi ma afa lele 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Eby'obwegyese omu disiturikiti bitwire nibishanga oburemeezi bw'amaani omu myaka egi. Kimwe aha nshonga ez'amaani, n'eibura ry'abegyesa abatendekirwe, abarikubaasa kuhikiiriza ebyetengo by'abeegi.

eng_prompt: Many communities rely on local organizations to support the well-being of their youth. One such initiative is the establishment of schools by churches, which often include essential services for students.
lug_prompt: Ebitundu bingi byesigamye ku bitongole by'omu kitundu okuyamba ku mbeera y'abavubuka baabwe. Ekimu ku bintu ng'ebyo kwe kutandikawo amasomero agazimbibwa amakanisa, nga gatera okubaamu ebyetaago by'abayizi.
ach_prompt: Kabedo mapol gijenge I kom dule ma ikabedo gi me konyo bulu gi. Yub acel ma kit meno obedo cako gangi kwan pa kanica, ma ipol kare tye iye jami ma mite pi lutino.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu emunokina iriongeta kanu aigang atumunak kec. Adiopet koboro kwape kangun ngesi aitegeario naka ikanisan luka isomeroi, imoriaritos duc aijaanakinio naka idwe.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara eyi asi 'ba amuti eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma dria atita fezu 'ba ode eyini aa'zu muke ri ni. E'yo azi alu 'dile 'diyi kanisa eyini sukulu eyi e'dozu, azakoma fele sukulu anzi eyini 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Ebyanga bingi nibyesiga ebitongore by'omubyaro okuhwera eminyeeto yaabo. Kimwe ahabikorwa nk'ebyo n'okutandikaho amashomero kuruga omu makanisa, agarikukira kuba garimu obuheereza bw'omugasho aha beegi.

eng_prompt: Our community has always been politically active, and it seems our efforts are finally paying off. In fact, three of the cabinet ministers come from our district.
lug_prompt: Ekitundu kyaffe bulijjo kibadde kya byabufuzi, era kirabika kaweefube waffe asembyeyo okusasula. Mu butuufu, baminisita basatu ku kabineeti bava mu disitulikiti yaffe.
ach_prompt: Kabedo wa I kare weng obedo ki miti I lok me cungu iwi bye, dok nen calo tutewa dong tye ka nyako nyige. Ki lok ada, luminicta adek aa ki i dicitrwik megwa.
teo_prompt: Arai duc atutubetekosi lu iswamaete akiro nuka epolitikis, ido esubit bala eutasi aswamisiowok aitac. Kabeit, iminisitan iuni luka ekabinet elomunitos kodisitriktakosi.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu amavileri ebi ovu e'yo politiki ni 'diyi ma alea sa'wa driasi, dika eri ena kile okpo amani 'diyi asizu asizu ofele ra. A'danisi, 'ba minisita ru na 'diyi enga ama vile distrikitia.
nyn_prompt: Ekyanga kyaitu kitwire nikikora munonga omu by'obutegyeki, kandi nikireebeka ngu amaani gaitu gariyo nigashashurwa. Omu mazima, ba minisita bashatu nibaruga omu disiturikiti yaitu.

eng_prompt: Our village has a rich history of producing influential figures who have shaped the nation. Among them, one stands out as a prominent former leader who left a lasting impact on our country.
lug_prompt: Ekyalo kyaffe kirina ebyafaayo bingi eby'okufulumya abantu ab'amaanyi abakyusizza eggwanga. Mu bo, omu yeeyoleka ng'eyali omukulembeze omututumufu eyalekawo ekifaananyi eky'olubeerera ku ggwanga lyaffe.
ach_prompt: Caro wa tye ki tekwaro madit tutwal me nyayo dano ma oywek ma guyubo lobo wa. I kingi, ngat acel obedo latela macon ma oywek ma oweko adwogi maber tutwal I kom lobo wa.
teo_prompt: Ejaasi ecalokosi keda akiro nukolo nuka aitolomun itunga luejokuka luetolomunitos akwap wok. Kotoma kakesi, ejai ediopebon kwape engarenon losek loajokan noi loabu kojalak akwap wok.
lgg_prompt: Calo amavileri ma adi lonyi be 'bani 'ba okporu kari 'di ma edri oja'ba 'diyi ofuzu. Eyi ma eselea, 'ba alu ni e'da ekile drice'ba azi okporu kari amavileri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ekyaro kyaitu kiine ebyafaayo by'okuzaara abantu b'amaani abahindwire eihanga. Omwe aharibo, n'omwebembezi w'amaani owaasigireho eihanga ryeitu eky'omutaano.

eng_prompt: In Uganda, social gatherings often revolve around communal activities that foster camaraderie and relaxation. Among these, consuming alcoholic beverages has become a popular pastime for many men.
lug_prompt: Mu Uganda, enkungaana ez'awamu zeetooloolera ku bikolwa eby'awamu ebitumbula omukwano n'okuwummulamu. Mu bino, okunywa omwenge kifuuse kya kwesanyusaamu eri abasajja bangi.
ach_prompt: I lobo Uganda, gure pa dano ipol kare jenge I kom jami ma kelo ribbe I kin dano ki nongo yweyo. I kin magi, mato kongo dong odoko gin ma pol pa coo maro timone me galo wang gi.
teo_prompt: Ko Uganda, atukonokin na itunga iswamaete aswamisinei nu eyangaunete aimorikikina keda aiyengun. Kotoma ngul, aimat ajon erai ibore yeneminasi ikiliok luipu.
lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri ma alea, okuta 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi tutuni aa e'yo eyi 'yepi eyi ma eselea tualu ava liza be 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'diyi ma eselea, ewa mvuza eca curu'do e'yo agupi karakara eyini ayiko fezu 'diyi ru.
nyn_prompt: Omuri Yuganda, enteerane z'okushemerererwa, nizikira kubaho ahabw'emirimo y'abantu boona erikureetaho okukwatanisa n'okushemererwa. Omuri ebi, okunywa amaarwa kihindukire eky'okushemererwa ky'abashaija baingi.

eng_prompt: The financial burden of education often falls heavily on families, leading to difficult decisions about prioritizing expenses. As a result, some students find themselves unable to participate in important assessments.
lug_prompt: Omugugu gw'ensimbi ogw'okusoma gutera kugwa nnyo ku maka, ekiviirako okusalawo okukaluba ku ngeri y'okukulembezaamu ensaasaanya. N'ekivuddemu, abayizi abamu beesanga nga tebasobola kwetaba mu bibuuzo ebikulu.
ach_prompt: Peko me cente me kwan ipol kare poto tutwal I kom gangi, ma weko moko tam tek tutwal I kom ngo ma omyero gukwong kwede. Macalo adwogi ne, lutino kwan mukene nongo ni pe gitwero timo peny ma pigi tego.
teo_prompt: Ationis na ikapun na asioman erai naepol noi mama ejaasi ikalia, ido eyangauni aomisio nuetioko nuikamunitos aitosom ikapun. Kanuka ngun, mam esisiak ice epedorete ajaikin toma aingito.
lgg_prompt: E'yo robia ni onita ma dria ri ni e'de familia eyi ma dria sa'wa driasi, dika eri fe eyini e'yo 'duzu e'yo ewaru eyini ani robia ayuzu ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, sukulu anzi azi 'diyi eyi esu eyi econi fizu obeta orodriru 'diyi ma alea ku.
nyn_prompt: Omugugu gw'esente z'obwegyese nigukira kugwa aha maka, ekirikubareetera okucwamu kubi aha bikwatiraine n'okwebembeza enshohoza. N'ekyarugiremu, abeegi abamwe tibarikubaasa kwejumba omu bigyezo by'omugasho.

eng_prompt: Research has shown that social influences play a significant role in a child's educational success. Specifically, the company children keep can greatly impact their motivation and engagement in school.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza kulaga nti embeera y'abantu ekola kinene nnyo ku buwanguzi bw'omwana mu kusoma. Okusingira ddala, emikwano abaana gye baba nagyo giyamba nnyo mu kubakubiriza n'okubayingiza mu ssomero.
ach_prompt: Kwed onyuto ni kit ma lutino kwano kwede konyo tutwal I lok me kwan pa lutino. Ki lok ada, lurem ma lutino bedo kwedgi twero kelo alokaloka madit tutwal I kom miti ki miti gi I gang kwan.
teo_prompt: Itodunit aingic ebe ejaasi itunga keda epone loepedoriata kesi aitodolikin asioman naka idwe. Kacut, epone loepedoria idwe aiswamanar keda luce epedori aitojokar aisinyikokinit kec kosomero.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ece kini e'yo 'ba eyi ecipi eyi pie 'diyi azi okporu nga anzi eyi ma agata onita ma alea ri ma alea. Tutunisi, 'ba anzi nyiri eyini aa'zu eyi pie 'diyi eco ava fe eyini tualu ava eyini esu sukulu'a ri be ra.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza kworeka ngu emicwe y'abantu neekora kihango omu businguzi bw'abaana omu mishomo yaabo. Okukira munonga, abaana abu barikukorengana nabo nibabaasa kubareetera kwejumba omu mishomo yaabo.

eng_prompt: Establishing a consistent routine is crucial for a child's academic success. One important aspect of this routine is setting aside time for homework.
lug_prompt: Okuteekawo enteekateeka eya bulijjo kya mugaso nnyo eri obuwanguzi bw'omwana mu kusoma. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu mu nteekateeka eno kwe kuteekawo obudde okukola emirimu gy'awaka.
ach_prompt: Keto yub me kwan ma kare ki kare pire tek tutwal pi latin me cobo miti ne I gang kwan. Gin acel ma pire tek tutwal I yub man obedo keto kare me timo tic me gang.
teo_prompt: Aitolomun ainapeta nuka esomero erai ibore yenepol noi kanu akerianut naka idwe kosomero. Adiopebore naepol noi kotoma ainapeta nu ngesi aitolomun apak kanu aswam eswamae lo ore.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eyi 'yezu sa'wa driasi ri eri orodriru anzi eyi ma drile suza sukulu'a ri ni. E'yo azi orodriru 'yeta 'di ma alea ri sa'wa 'ba azi ngazu akua ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okutandikaho entebeekanisa n'eky'omugasho aha businguzi bw'omwana omu mashomero. Ekintu kimwe ekikuru omu nteekateeka egi n'okutaho obwire bw'okukora omurimo gw'eishomero.

eng_prompt: The foundation of a child's future is largely influenced by their early experiences and guidance. Investing time and effort in nurturing their development is essential for fostering positive outcomes.
lug_prompt: Omusingi gw'ebiseera by'omwana eby'omu maaso gusinga kwesigama ku bye yayitamu mu buto n'obulagirizi. Okusiga obudde n'amaanyi mu kukuza enkulaakulana yaabwe kya mugaso nnyo mu kutumbula ebirungi ebivaamu.
ach_prompt: Gedo me anyim pa latin pol kare jenge I kom jami ma en okato iye con ki tira ma en nongo. Keto cawa ki kero I dongo pa lutino obedo gin ma pire tek pi kelo adwogi maber.
teo_prompt: Aingarenikinio naka idwe koingaren erai na itopolooritai kotoma akiro nuapotu kesi kodumutu kapoloukec. Aipikakin apak keda agogongu kanu aitopolor apolokec erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitodolikin akiro nuajokak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo anzi nyiri eyi ma ewu drialeri ni e'dozu ri tutuni e'yo eyini esu drioru 'diyi ma dria azini imbata eyini fe 'diyi ma dria. Sawa 'bazu azini okpo 'bazu e'yo eyini zozu 'diyi ma tambazu ri eri orodriru e'yo muke 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omusingye gw'ebiro by'omwana eby'omumaisho niguteganisibwa ebyamuhikireho akiri muto hamwe n'obwebembezi bwe. Okutaho obwire n'amaani omu kutunguura entunguuka yaabo n'eky'omugasho ahabw'ebirungi ebirikurugamu.

eng_prompt: Despite the strict rules against leaving campus after hours, a group of students decided to sneak out for a night of fun. Their adventurous spirit, however, led them to a place they weren't supposed to be.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde waaliwo amateeka amakakali agakugira okufuluma ettendekero oluvannyuma lw'essaawa z'essomero, ekibinja ky'abayizi baasalawo okwekweka ne bagenda okusanyuka ekiro. Kyokka, omwoyo gwabwe ogw'okutambulako gwabatwala mu kifo we batalina kubeera.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni cik tye matek i kom weko gang kwan I ngee cawa me pwony, gurup pa lutino kwan mogo gumoko tamgi me kwo I dyewor me galo wang. Cwinygi me timo jami mapat-pat, ento, oterogi I kabedo ma pe omyero gubed ie.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaas ikisila luitikitikete anyoun kosomero akaulo naka isawan, apotu esisiak ice koseutu alosit aiyalama kware. Akangasia kec, konye, abu koyangau kesi aiboisit namam ebeit kesi ajaut.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azita okporu 'bani lezu sukulu kuzu sawa ma vutia 'diyi ma talasi, sukulu anzi karakara eyi asi e'yo 'du eyi ofuzu amve eyini ani ayiko esuzu inisi. Eyi ma ava e'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu ri fe eyini mu angu eyini aa'zu ku 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho ebiragiro by'amaani ebirikuzibira okuruga ahaishomero bwanyima y'eshaaha, guruupu y'abeegi ekasharamu kwesherekyerera okushemererwa nyekiro. Omwoyo gwabo gw'okwenda kureeba ebirikugyenda omu maisho gukabatwara omu myanya ei babaire batashemereire kuba.

eng_prompt: In recent months, authorities have increased scrutiny on venues that cater to minors. As a result, several entertainment centres have faced consequences for violating age restrictions.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise, ab'obuyinza beeyongedde okukebera ebifo ebirimu abaana abatanneetuuka. N'ekivuddemu, ebifo by'eby'amasanyu bingi bifunye ebivaamu olw'okutyoboola obukwakkulizo bw'emyaka.
ach_prompt: I dwe ma okato cokcok-ki, lutela omedo rwom me ngiyo kama lutino ma mwaka gi pe oromo twero bedo iye. Macalo adwogi ne, kabedo me galo wang mapol gunongo adwogi marac pi turu cik me mwaka.
teo_prompt: Kolapio luatuboros, apotu apedorosio iyatakisi aingic aiboisio nu ijaanakinete idwe. Kanuka ngun, ejaas aiboisio nuipu nu isiyalaere itunga keda atiokisio kanu amengerikin ikaru lu itunga.
lgg_prompt: Mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, drice'ba eyi otu e'yo angu anzi eli capiku 'diyi ma ta mbapi 'diyi ma ale andrizu ra. E'yo 'disi, pari avita ni karakara 'diyi esu e'yo eyi ma dria e'yo eli 'ba eyini 'diyi ma vuti obizu ku 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu myezi ehingwireho, ab'obushoborozi bongyeire okushwijuma emyanya y'okushemerererwamu abaana abatakahikize emyaka. N'ekyarugiremu, emyanya mingi y'okushemererwamu etungire ebirugiremu ahabw'okuhenda ebiragiro by'emyaka.

eng_prompt: In many rural communities, cultural norms and limited access to education can lead to early exposure to sexual relationships. As a result, young girls often find themselves navigating complex social dynamics before they are fully prepared.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu by'ebyalo bingi, enkola z'obuwangwa n'obutafuna buyigirize bisobola okuviirako okwenyigira mu kwegatta nga bukyali. N'ekivuddemu, abawala abato batera okwesanga nga bayita mu mbeera enzibu nga tebannaba kwetegeka mu bujjuvu.
ach_prompt: I caro mapol, tekwaro ki peko me nongo pwony twero weko ngat moni donyo I tim me butu imit con. Macalo adwogi ne, anyira matino ipol kare nongo gitye ka wot I kwo matek tutwal ma peya guyube maber.
teo_prompt: Kocaaloi luipu, inonosio luka inonosio keda amamus adumunun asioman epedorete ayangaun aelo sek. Kanuka ngun, etapit apesur nudidika adumun awate kec etereikina keda iponesio luka itunga lumam kes ekapakina.
lgg_prompt: Angu calua karakara 'diyi ma alea, e'yo suruni 'diyi azini geri onita esuzu were 'diyi eco fe 'ba eyini e'dozu ali o'bazu drioru ra. E'yo 'disi, ezoanzi nyiri eyi eyi esu eyi e'yo ewaru eyi 'yepi eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma alea de nga po'di eyi awini eyi otu kililiru ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu byaro bingi, emicwe y'obuhangwa hamwe n'okutunga obwegyese bukye, nibibaasa kureetaho okuteerana bukiri kare. N'ekyarugiremu, abaishiki bato nibakira kwejumba omu by'obuhangwa bateteekateekire.

eng_prompt: Many students find it challenging to balance their academic responsibilities with personal time. As a result, weekends often become an extension of the school week.
lug_prompt: Abayizi bangi bakisanga nga kizibu okutuukiriza obuvunaanyizibwa bwabwe obw'okusoma n'obudde bwabwe obw'obuntu. N'ekivuddemu, wiikendi zitera okwongezaayo wiiki y'essomero.
ach_prompt: Lutino kwan mapol ginongo tek tutwal me gwoko cawa gi me kwan kacel ki cawa gi me timo jami gi. Macalo adwogi ne, tum pa cabit ipol kare bedo kare me kwan.
teo_prompt: Etionikinit esisiak luipu aimorikikin aswamukec nuka asioman keda apakikec. Kanuka ngun, etapit angeset naka esabiti aiyatakin esabiti loka esomero.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu anzi karakara eyi eri esu ewaru eyini eyini sa'wa eyini aa'zu sukulu'a ri ma alea sa'wa eyini aa'zu eyi ma ngulupi si ri be aa'zu tro tro. E'yo 'disi, sabiti ni i deria 'diyi eca sabiti sukulu niri ma sa'wa edripi ra 'diyi ru.
nyn_prompt: Abeegi baingi nikibakorera oburemeezi okuhikiiriza obujunanizibwa bwabo bw'eby'obwegyese n'obwire bwabo. N'ekyarugiremu, wiikendi nizikira kwongyerwamu esande y'eishomero.

eng_prompt: Despite the strict rules and surveillance, a few students always find a way to bend the system. Their desire for freedom often leads them to hatch elaborate plans to leave campus early.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde waliwo amateeka amakakali n'okulondoola, abayizi abatonotono bulijjo bafuna engeri y'okukyusakyusa enkola. Okwagala kwabwe okw'eddembe kutera okubaleetera okukola enteekateeka okuva ku ssomero nga bukyali.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni cik tye matek dok ki bedo ki wang mabit I kom lutino kwan, lutino kwan manok keken aye nongo yoo me turo cik. Mitigi me bedo agonya ipol kare weko giyubu yub me weko gang kwan con.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaas ikisila luikidioko ka aingic, esisiak lu ikidioko edumunenete epone loka aibil ainapeta ngun. Ekotokec loka ailajara einakini kesi aitemonokin nuka anyoun kosomero sek.
lgg_prompt: Azita okporu azini vuti ondaza ma talasi, sukulu anzi were eyi sa'wa driasi geri esu e'yo 'di 'yezu. Eyi ma ava driwala esuzu ri ni fe eyini otita eyi 'ye eyini sukulu kuzu drioru.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho ebiragiro by'amaani n'okucondooza, abeegi bakye buriijo nibasherura oburyo bw'okwihaho enkora. Ekyetengo kyabo ky'obusingye nikibareetera kukora enteekateeka y'okuruga ahaishomero bukiri kare.

eng_prompt: Many educators are struggling to maintain discipline in the classroom. As a result, they often face challenges with students who exhibit disruptive behavior.
lug_prompt: Abasomesa bangi balwana okukuuma empisa mu kibiina. N'ekivuddemu, batera okusanga okusoomoozebwa n'abayizi aboolesa enneeyisa etataaganya.
ach_prompt: Lupwonye mapol tye ka tute matek me bedo ki woro i gang kwan. Macalo adwogi ne, ipol kare ginongo peko ki lutino kwan matye ki tim maraco.
teo_prompt: Isisianakinak luipu eutasi ainingosit aidar ainapara kotoma atukot. Kanuka ngun, etapit kesi adumunun atiokisio keda esisiak lu itodunitos iponesio luarokok.
lgg_prompt: Imba'ba karakara eyi dri ci inzita eyi ma tambazu kilasia. E'yo 'disi, eyi sa'wa driasi e'yo esu sukulu anzi adriza onzi 'yepi 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Abeegyesa baingi nibarwana kurinda emicwe mirungi omu kibiina. N'ekyarugiremu, nibakira kutunga oburemeezi kuruga omu beegi abarikukora ebitahikire.

eng_prompt: After considering the challenges of balancing work and family life, I realized that a more structured environment might be beneficial for my child's development. The idea of a boarding school started to appeal to me as a solution for providing stability and focused education.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulowooza ku kusoomoozebwa kw'okukwataganya emirimu n'obulamu bw'awaka, nakitegedde nti embeera entegeke obulungi eyinza okuba ey'omuganyulo eri enkula y'omwana wange. Ekirowoozo ky'essomero ly'ekisulo kyatandika okunsikiriza ng'eky'okugonjoola okutebenkera n'okussa essira ku by'enjigiriza.
ach_prompt: Ingee tamo I kom peko me gwoko tic ki kwo me gang, aniang ni kabedo ma kiyubu maber twero bedo ber tutwal pi dongo pa latinna. Tam me bedo ki gang kwan me boarding ocako yomo cwinya macalo yoo me kelo kuc ki pwony maber.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aomoom atiokisio nuka aitirian aswam keda aijar naka ekale, abu eong ajen ebe aiboisit na itemokinitai ejok kanu apolo naka ikoku ka. Abu aomisioit naka esomero loka apero kogeu aisiyalamikin eong kwape epone loka aitolomun ainapakina keda asioman naejok.
lgg_prompt: Ma vile e'yo ewaru azi ngazu tualu familia be 'diyi ma e'yo egazu 'bori ma vutia, ma esu ra kini angu 'bani si kililiru 'diyi eco ovu orodriru ma vile mva ma zota ni. Egata sukulu lazu lazu lazu 'diyi niri e'do ma dri ava 'ba ekile geri azi ecozu e'yo otuza ni fezu azini onita asi 'bazu drinia ri le.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuteekateeka aha buremeezi bw'okukoresa gye emirimo n'amaka gangye, nketegyereza ngu obusingye burungi nibubaasa kuba obw'omugasho aha ntunguuka y'omwana wangye. Ekiteekateeko ky'eishomero ry'okuraaramu kikatandika kunshemeza nk'omuringo gw'okureetaho obucureera n'obwegyese burungi.

eng_prompt: In today's world, where safety concerns are more prevalent than ever, it's crucial for guardians to monitor their kids closely. With various risks lurking around every corner, maintaining a watchful eye has become essential.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero, okweraliikirira kw'ebyokwerinda kweyongedde okusinga bwe kyali kibadde, kya mugaso nnyo eri abakuumi okulondoola abaana baabwe. Olw'obulabe obutali bumu obuli mu buli kanyomero, okubeera obulindaala kifuuse kikulu.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma ite kare ni, kama lworo me gwoko kuc tye mapol tutwal, pire tek tutwal ki lugwok lutino me bedo ki wang matek i kom lutino gi. Ki peko mapat-pat matye kabino ikabedo weng, bedo ma wangwa twolo obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap na ilolo, ne epolor aiyalongong naka ayuwara adepar kapakio nukokau, ejokuka noi mama ejaasi edarak aanyanar idwekec ejok. Keda atiokisio nuegelegela nuejaas aiboisio kere, ejokuna noi aidar akonye.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alia, e'yo ageitema ni 'diyi ma omgbo angiri ndeni aga oku driorisi, eri orodriru 'ba anzi ta mbapi 'diyi dri yi vile anzi 'diyi ma pamvu andrizu kililiru. E'yo onzi tre 'diyi ma e'yo si, mile 'bazu mile be ri eca orodriru.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba, ahu okwerarikirira ahaby'okwerinda kweyongyeire munonga, n'eky'omugasho munonga abarikureeberera abaana baabo. Ahabw'oburemeezi bwingi oburiho, okwetegyereza n'eky'omugasho munonga.

eng_prompt: Effective teaching strategies are crucial for student success. When educators rely on inadequate techniques, it can significantly hinder the learning process.
lug_prompt: Enkola z'okusomesa ennungi za mugaso nnyo eri obuwanguzi bw'abayizi. Abasomesa bwe beesigama ku bukugu obutamala, kisobola okulemesa ennyo enkola y'okusoma.
ach_prompt: Yoo me pwonyo maber obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi lutino kwan me cobo miti gi. Ka lupwonye gijenge I kom diro me kwan ma goro, man twero gengo kwan tutwal.
teo_prompt: Iwaitin lu aisisianakin lu iswamaete ejok ejok kanu esisiak akerianar. Arai itwasamaete isisianakinak acoasinei numam edolitos, epedori aitolitol noi aisisia.
lgg_prompt: Otita imbatani kililiru 'diyi orodriru sukulu anzi eyi ma drile suza ni. Imba'ba ka yi ati geri onita ni kililiru ku 'diyi ma dria, eri eco onita atri ra.
nyn_prompt: Enkora nungi y'okwegyesa n'ey'omugasho ahabw'obusinguzi bw'abeegi. Abeegyesa ku barikwesiga obukoryo butarikumara, nikibaasa kuremesa okwega.

eng_prompt: Many families struggle to provide basic necessities, and the impact on children's well-being is profound. Ensuring that every child has access to nutritious meals is essential for their growth and learning.
lug_prompt: Amaka mangi galwana okufuna ebyetaago by'obulamu obwa bulijjo, era ebikosa obulamu bw'abaana bya maanyi. Okukakasa nti buli mwana afuna emmere erimu ebiriisa kya mugaso mu kukula n'okusoma kwe.
ach_prompt: Gangi mapol tye ka tute matek me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo pa lutino, dok man kelo peko madit tutwal I kom kwo pa lutino. Neno ni lutino weng tye ka nongo cam mabeco obedo gin ma pire tek pi dongo gi ki kwan gi.
teo_prompt: Etionikinitos ikalia luipu adumun iboro lu itwasamao, ido etiono noi aitojokaar aijar naka idwe. Aanyun ebe edumunenete idwe inyamat lu enyamete ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu apolo keda aisisia kec.
lgg_prompt: Familia karakara eyi dri ci afa lele aa'zu edriru 'diyi fezu, dika e'yo anzi nyiri eyini aa'zu muke ri ma dria ri angiri. E'yo nezu ra kini mva alu alu ni nyaka rua fepi muke 'diyi esu ri eri orodriru eyi ma zota azini onita ni.
nyn_prompt: Amaka maingi nigatunga oburemeezi bw'okureeberera ebyetaago by'omutaano, kandi eki nikikora kihango aha magara g'abaana. Okureeba ngu buri mwana atunga eby'okurya ebirimu ebiriisa n'eky'omugasho omu kukura kwe n'okwega kwe.

eng_prompt: During a community meeting at the local school, the officer addressed the gathered parents about various factors affecting their children's academic performance. He emphasized the importance of proper nutrition as a foundation for effective learning.
lug_prompt: Mu lukiiko lw'ekitundu ku ssomero ly'ekitundu, omukungu yayogeddeko eri abazadde abaali bakuŋŋaanye ku nsonga ez'enjawulo ezikosa ensoma y'abaana baabwe. Yakikkaatirizza obukulu bw'endya ennungi ng'omusingi gw'okusoma okulungi.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kacokke pa lwak I gang kwan me tedero, latic ne oloko ki lunyodo ma gugure I kom jami mapat-pat matye ka balo kwan pa lutino gi. En oketo cwiny I kom ber pa cam maber macalo guti me kwan maber.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet naka itunga kosomero loka atutubet, abu eswaman kiner keda auriak lu atukonokin kanuikamunitos iboro luipu luetiroritos eswamae loka idwekec kosomero. Abu ngesi kitogogong ajokis naka ainyam ejok kwape atukot naka aisisia najokan.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi ongulumu eyini ni ma alea, azi'ba 'da nze e'yo tipika eyi ma dria e'yo ndundu eyini fe anzi eyivile 'diyini agazu sukulu'a ri ma dria. Eri 'ba asi orodri nyaka nyaza kililiru niri ma dria onita kililiru ri ni.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko rw'ekicweka ah'eishomero ry'ekyaro, ofiisa akagamba n'abazaire abarikuteeranira hamwe aha nshonga nyingi ezirikuteganisa enkora y'abaana baabo omu mashomero. Akashoboorora omugasho gw'endya nungi nk'omusingye gw'okwega kurungi.

eng_prompt: Despite her hard work and dedication to studying, my sister was disappointed with her academic performance. She felt that the grading system was unfair and did not accurately reflect her efforts.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga yali akola nnyo era nga yeemalira ku kusoma, mwannyinaze teyasobola kusoma bulungi. Yawulira nti enkola y'okugaba obubonero teyali ya bwenkanya era teyalaga bulungi kufuba kwe.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni en tiyo matek dok oketo cwinye I kwan, lamera cwinye pe obedo yom ki kit ma en okwano kwede. En owinyo ni kit ma kimiye kwede makci pe obedo ber dok pe onyuto ticce maber.
teo_prompt: Karaida iswamai ngesi kagogong kosodi aisisia, abu inacika itakadik aswamuke kotoma asioman. Abu ngesi kowom ebe mam ainapeta nuka adoketait ejokuna ido mam itodunit agogonguke.
lgg_prompt: Erini tro azi ngazu okposi azini asi fezu onita ma dria ra ti, ma amvi ovu candisi agata erini onita ma aliarisi. Eri ega kini geri 'bani ongmbo fezu 'diyi ovuni kililiru ku dika eyi awini e'yo erini 'ye 'diyi e'da kililiru ku.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okukora n'amaani n'okwehayo kwe omu kwega, munyanyazi akahwa amaani ahabw'okukora gye omu mashomero. Akahurira ngu enkora y'okumuheereza obubonero ekaba etari y'oburingaaniza kandi etarikworeka kurungi amaani ge.

eng_prompt: Effective education relies on engaging students in the material. When students are captivated by what they are learning, they are more likely to retain information and develop a love for knowledge.
lug_prompt: Okusoma okulungi kwesigama ku kuyingiza abayizi mu by'okuyiga. Abayizi bwe bakwatibwako ebyo bye bayiga, batera okukwata obubaka n'okukulaakulanya okwagala eri okumanya.
ach_prompt: Kwan maber jenge I kom weko lutino bedo ki miti me pwonyo jami ma gimito pwonyo. Ka lutino oketo cwinygi I kom ngo ma gitye ka pwonyo, ci gibedo ki gum me gwoko ngec ki dongo mar pi ngec.
teo_prompt: Asioman na ejok itodunit ebe ibusakinit aisisianakin esisiak akiro nu isisiaete. Arai ikamunitos esisiak nu isisiaete kesi, epedorete kesi aiitun akiro kosodete aitolomun amina naka acoa.
lgg_prompt: Onita kililiru ri le sukulu anzi eyi ma aa e'yo onita ni 'diyi ma alea indi. Sukulu anzi eyi ka e'yo eyini oni 'diyisi ava be, eyi eco e'yo eyi ma dria sa'wa driasi dika eyi le onita saaru.
nyn_prompt: Obwegyese burungi nibwegamira aha kwegyesa abeegi. Abeegi ku barikukwatwaho ebi barikwega, nibabaasa kuguma nibamanya kandi bakunda n'obwengye.

eng_prompt: In many urban areas, the demand for education often exceeds the available resources. As a result, educational institutions face challenges in accommodating all students effectively.
lug_prompt: Mu bibuga bingi, obwetaavu bw'ebyenjigiriza buyitiridde eby'obugagga ebiriwo. N'ekivuddemu, amatendekero g'ebyenjigiriza gafuna okusoomoozebwa mu kusuza abayizi bonna obulungi.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol me boma, miti me kwan ipol kare kato lim matye. Macalo adwogi ne, gangi kwan nongo peko me gwoko lutino kwan weng maber.
teo_prompt: Kaiboisio nuipu nu otaun, epol eipuda lo asioman adepar iboro lu ejaas. Kanuka ngun, ejaas isomeroi keda ainingosia nuka aidar idwe ejok.
lgg_prompt: Angu aku ambu tawuni ru 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ma alia, lezu onita ma dria ri ma ongmbo aga lonyi ci 'diyi ra. E'yo 'disi, angu onita ni 'diyi e'yo ewaru eyi esu sukulu anzi eyi ma ta mbazu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Omu myanya mingi y'endembo, ebyetengo by'obwegyese nibisinga eby'obugaiga ebiriho. N'ekyarugiremu, amatendekyero g'eby'obwegyese nigatunga oburemeezi bw'okureeberera abeegi kurungi.

eng_prompt: In an effort to improve staff retention and morale, the school administration has been exploring various initiatives. One of the key proposals was to provide housing solutions for educators.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula abakozi n'empisa, abakulembeze b'essomero babadde banoonyereza ku nteekateeka ez'enjawulo. Ekimu ku biteeso ebikulu kyali kya kuwa abasomesa amayumba.
ach_prompt: I tute me medo rwom me tic pa lutic, ludito me gang kwan gubedo ka yenyo yoo mapat-pat. Yub acel ma pire tek obedo miyo gangi ki lupwonye.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitam aitojokar eswamae lo esisiak keda eswamae loajokan, euta eyaitene lo esomero aingic iboro luegelegela. Adiopet kotoma aomisio nuapolok arai aitolomun itogoi lu isisianakinak.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bani lezu azi'ba eyi ma ta mbazu azini eyi ma adriza otuzu, driceza sukulu niri ebi e'yo ndundu eyi ma eti onda. E'yo azi okporu 'bani 'bale 'diyi ma azi ndra geri jo sizu 'diyi fezu imba'ba eyini.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okugaruraho abakozi n'emitwarize, abebembezi b'eishomero babaire nibateekateeka aha bintu bitari bimwe na bimwe. Kimwe aha bigyendererwa ebikuru n'okuheereza abegyesa oburaaro.
