eng_prompt: After implementing a series of innovative teaching methods and extracurricular programs, the faculty was eager to see the impact on student achievement. As the academic year progressed, it became clear that the hard work was paying off.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okussa mu nkola enkola z'okusomesa ez'obuyiiya ne pulogulaamu ez'ebweru w'essomero, abasomesa baali beesunga okulaba engeri gye kikwata ku buwanguzi bw'abayizi. Omwaka gw'ebyensoma bwe gwagenda gugenda mu maaso, kyalabika bulungi nti okukola ennyo kwavaamu ebibala.
ach_prompt: Inge keto yoo me pwonyo manyen mapat-pat I tic ki yub mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat Ikare ma mwaka me kwan tye ka mede, nen atyer kamaleng ni tic matek tye ka kelo adwogi maber.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aitegear iponesio luitetiak luka aisisianakin keda ainapeta nuitegelikina, akoto esisiak aanyun epone loepedoriata kesi aitodolikin eswamae loka esisiak. Neautar ekaru loka asioman alosit, apotu kojenutu ebe euta aswam na agogong aitac.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onita ni o'diru 'diyi 'duzu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba onita ni 'diyi ma ava ndra e'yo sukulu anzi eyi ma agata ma dria ri ndrezu. Eli onitaniri ni muzu drile, eri eca e'dazaru kini azi okporu 'bani nga ri ni orodri esu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuta omu nkora engyenderwaho z'okwegyesa ez'omutaano hamwe na puroguraamu ezitarikushangwa omu mashomero, abegyesa bakaba baine ekihika ky'okureeba omugasho oguri omu kukora kurungi kw'abeegi. Omwaka gw'eby'obwegyese ku gwagumire nigugyenda omu maisho, kikarebeka butunu ngu okukora n'amaani kukashashurwa.

eng_prompt: As the popularity of the sport continues to grow, many communities are eager to form their own clubs. To accommodate this influx, the football federation registers new teams every season.
lug_prompt: Ng'obumanyirivu bw'omuzannyo bweyongera okukula, ebitundu bingi byagala nnyo okutondawo ebibiina byabwe. Okukwatagana n'okuyingira kuno, ekibiina ky'omupiira kiwandiisa ttiimu empya buli sizoni.
ach_prompt: Kit ma yweka pa tuku eni tye ka mede, kabedo mapol tye ki miti me cako dul tuku gi. Me cobo miti eni, dul ma doro lok kom tuku odilo coyo team manyen mwaka ki mwaka.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyatakin ajenara naka abolia ngin, ekotosi itunga aitolomun ikilabun kec. Kanu aitodolikin aiboisio nu, iwadikaete atukot naka emopira itimun luitetiak kangolisawa.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani avita 'di ma dria ri ni mu drile tuzu, ongulumu karakara eyi ava be amuti eyivile 'diyi e'dozu. E'yo 'ba eyini emuzu omgbo angirisi ri ma aza kozu, amuti mupira tuza avipi kari 'di ma alea 'diyi amuti o'diru 'diyi si ayi ti dria vusi.
nyn_prompt: Okumanywa kw'omuzaano ogu nikuguma nikweyongyera, abantu baingi nibenda kukora za kiraabu zaabo. Kubaasa kukora aha bantu abaingi, ekibiina ky'omupiira nikihandiika tiimu nsya buri siizoni.

eng_prompt: Many businesses are looking for ways to increase their visibility and brand recognition. One popular strategy is to invest in local sports teams.
lug_prompt: Bizineesi nnyingi zinoonya engeri z'okwongera okumanyika n'okumanyika. Enkola emu emanyiddwa ennyo kwe kuteeka ssente mu ttiimu z'ebyemizannyo ez'omu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Biacara mapol tye ka yenyo yoo me medo yweka gi. Yoo acel ma oywek tutwal en aye me keto lim I dul tuku me tedero.
teo_prompt: Eutasi ibiasaran luipu aimo iponesio luka aiyatakin ajenara kec. Adiopet ewai lo ejenara noi ngesi aipikakin ikapun mama ejaasi itimun luka aboliasio.
lgg_prompt: Tujura karakara eyi geri nda eyini ani eyi ma ru ku dika eyini ani eyi ma ru ku. Otita azi 'bani lele tu 'diyi ma azi eri sende 'bazu amuti avita ni ogogo 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Bizinesi nyingi ziriyo nizironda oburyo bw'okwongyera okumanywa n'okumanywa. Omuringo gumwe ogurikumanywa munonga n'okuta esente omu tiimu z'emizaano ez'omwihanga.

eng_prompt: After a thorough selection process, the football federation finalized the roster for the new team. With excitement building, they prepared to share their vision and expectations for the upcoming season.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okusunsula obulungi, akakiiko akaddukanya omupiira gw'ebigere kaamaliriza olukalala lwa ttiimu empya. Olw'essanyu eringi, beetegese okugabana okwolesebwa kwabwe n'ebisuubirwa mu sizoni ejja.
ach_prompt: Ingee yer maber tutwal, dul madoro tuku odilo otyeko coyo nying team odilo manyen. Ki yomcwiny madit tutwal, guyube me nywako tam gi ki gen gi pi kare me pyem matye kabino ni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aseo, abu atukot naka emopira kitutub ikiroria luka etimu loitetet. Keda aiyalama naepol, apotu kesi itemonokinos aimor aomisio kec keda aomisio nuka abolia naebunit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi opezu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, amuti mupira tuza ni omvele federation ru ri de 'ba amuti mupira avipi o'diru 'diyi ma ru eyi. Ayiko ni tuzu 'bo, eyi otu eyi ma egata eyi awazu sa'wa emupi ri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuronda kurungi, ekibiina ky'omupiira gw'ebigyere kikahendera orukarara rwa tiimu ensya. Ahabw'okushemererwa kwingi, bakeeteekateekyera okubagana ebiteekateeko byabo n'ebibarikuteekateeka omu siizoni erikwija.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the popularity of football has surged across Uganda, inspiring countless young athletes to pursue their dreams. As a result, various programs and initiatives have emerged to nurture and develop local talent.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, obuganzi bw'omupiira gw'ebigere bweyongedde mu Uganda yonna, okuzzaamu abazannyi abato bangi amaanyi okugoberera ebirooto byabwe. N'ekivuddemu, pulogulaamu n'enteekateeka ez'enjawulo zivuddeyo okukuza n'okukulaakulanya ebitone by'omu kitundu.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, yweka pa tuku odilo omede tutwal I lobo Uganda, ma okonyo lutuku matino mapol me cobo miti gi. Macalo adwogi ne, yub mapat-pat ki yub mapat-pat okati me pwonyo ki dongo talanta me tedero.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ejenara noi abolia naka emopira ko Uganda, ido isinyikokit atumunak luipu aitodolikin airujasia kec. Kanuka ngun, etolomun ainapeta nuegelegela kanu aitopolor keda aitopolor atalantan.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, e'yo 'bani mupira tuzari ma dria ri tu kari Uganda niri ma alea ndulu, erini ava fezu 'ba ode ongmbo angiri si 'diyi dri orobi eyivile 'diyi ma vuti obizu. E'yo 'disi, otita azini e'yo ndundu 'diyi efu e'yo 'ba talanta akua 'diyi ma ta mbazu azini ezozu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, omuhendo gw'omupiira gw'ebigyere gweyongyeire omu Uganda yoona, ekireteire abazaani bato baingi kukuratira ebirooto byabo. N'ekyarugiremu, puroguraamu nyingi zitandikireho okureeberera n'okutunguura emyoga y'abantu b'omwihanga.

eng_prompt: Football has a unique ability to unite people from diverse backgrounds. As a result, fans of various teams can be found in every corner of the nation.
lug_prompt: Omupiira gw'ebigere gulina obusobozi obw'enjawulo obw'okugatta abantu okuva mu mbeera ez'enjawulo. N'ekyavaamu, abawagizi ba ttiimu ez'enjawulo basobola okusangibwa mu buli kanyomero k'eggwanga.
ach_prompt: Tuku odilo tye ki kero me ribo dano ma aa ki I kabedo mapatpat. Macalo adwogi ne, lucwak tim mapat-pat twero nonge I but lobo man weng.
teo_prompt: Ejaasi emopira keda apedor naka aimorikikin itunga luegelegela. Kanuka ngun, epedorio adumun egangitok luka itimun luegelegela kotoma aiboisio kere nuka akwap.
lgg_prompt: Mupira tuza ma okpo 'ba engapi suru ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi ti ecita ejizu ri ci. E'yo 'disi, 'ba atita fepi amuti avitani ndundu 'diyi ma alia 'diyi eco esu kari ma kona dria ma alia ra.
nyn_prompt: Omupiira gw'ebigyere gwine obushoboorozi bw'omutaano obw'okugarukanisa abantu b'emiringo etari emwe. N'ekyarugiremu, abahagizi ba tiimu ezitarikushushana nibashangwa omuri buri kashonda k'eihanga.

eng_prompt: In an effort to strengthen the national team, the football federation has implemented a rigorous scouting program. This initiative aims to identify and nurture emerging talent across various regions.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okunyweza ttiimu y'eggwanga, akakiiko akaddukanya omupiira gw'ebigere kataddewo enteekateeka ey'amaanyi ey'abasikawutu. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okuzuula n'okukuza ebitone ebivaayo mu bitundu eby'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me jingo team odilo me lobo, dul ma doro lok kom tuku odilo I lobo Uganda oketo yub matek tutwal me nongo lutuku. Yub man tye ki miti me niang ki pwonyo dano matye ki talanta I but lobo mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitogogong etimu loka akwap, etolomu erionget loka abolia naka emopira ainapeta nuka aingic aboliak. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun ngesi ajenun ka aitopolor itunga luejaasi keda atalanta kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu amuti kari niri ma okpo engazu, amuti mupira tuza ni kari 'di ma alea 'diyi e'do otita okporu 'ba scout ru 'diyi ni. Otita 'di ma asisile lezu feta Munguni fe 'diyini 'diyi esuzu angu ndundu eyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okwongyera amaani omu tiimu y'eihanga, ekibiina ky'omupiira gw'ebigyere kitandikireho enteekateeka y'okusherura abazaani b'omupiira gw'ebigyere. Enteekateeka egi negyenderera okureebeka n'okureebeka emyoga omu byanga bitari bimwe na bimwe.

eng_prompt: In many communities, progress is often uneven, with certain groups struggling to keep pace. This disparity can lead to significant gaps in access to resources and opportunities.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi, enkulaakulana etera obutaba ya kyenkanyi, nga ebibinja ebimu birwana okukwatagana. Enjawulo eno esobola okuvaako ebituli ebinene mu kufuna ebyetaago n'emikisa.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol, dongo lobo ipol kare pe tye marom, dul mogo tye ka tute matek me medde anyim. Apoka-poka man twero kelo peko madit tutwal I nongo jami ki gum me tic.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubena nuipu, mam apol epatana, icie igurupun eutasi ainingosit aitodolikin. Atiakatiaka na epedori ayangaun atiokisio nuepolok noi kotoma adumun iboro keda arerengesio.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara eyi ma alea, e'yo zota ni 'diyi sa'wa driasi aa'ni tro tro, ongulumu azi 'diyi dri ci e'yo 'yezu eyi ma eselea. Esele coza 'diri eco fe esele coza amboru e'yo afa ayuzaru 'diyi esuzu azini drileba eyi ma esuta ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu byanga bingi, entunguuka terikukira kuba erikushushana, n'ebibiina ebimwe nibirwana kugumizamu n'omutindo. Entaaniso egi neebaasa kureetaho eibura ry'amaani omukutunga ebintu n'emigisha.

eng_prompt: In a shocking turn of events, the small town was rocked by allegations that sent shockwaves through the local community. Rumors began to circulate, leading to a media frenzy surrounding the club's star goalkeeper.
lug_prompt: Mu kukyuka okw'entiisa mu bibaddewo, akabuga akatono kaakankana olw'ebigambibwa ebyasindika amayengo g'ekikangabwa mu bantu b'omu kitundu. Olugambo lwatandika okusaasaana, ekyaviiriddeko obunkenke mu mikutu gy'amawulire okwetooloola omukwasi wa ggoolo wa kiraabu.
ach_prompt: I aloka-loka ma obedo ki ngeng tutwal, boma matidi ne obedo ki lworo I kom adot ma okelo lworo I kin lwak me tedero. Lok angea ocako wot, ma oweko lucoo lok angea gubedo ki lworo I kom lamak odilo pa dul tuku eni.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aijulakineta nuapotu kotakanutu, apotu akiro nuapotu koinakisi itunga luka atutubet aiyalongong noi. Apotu akiro kogeutu aisiarakin, ido abu koyangau aiyalongong mama ejaasi itunga luka iyemuto kanuikamunitos ekaman egolo loka ekilab.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi ma alea, e'yo 'bani 'yole aku eselesi 'diyi 'ye tawuni werea 'da ma e'yo ra. E'yo onzi 'diyi e'do aci, e'yo 'ba e'yo oyu'ba 'diyi ma dria 'diyi e'do ovu asi driasi 'ba amuti mupira avipi 'da ma dria 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu muringo ogurikutangaaza, etauni nkye ekakankana ahabw'ebyabaire nibigambwa aha bantu b'omubyaro. Orugambo rukatandika kujanjaara, ekyareteire abanyamakuru okwerarikirira aha bikwatiraine n'omukwasi wa gooro wa kiraabu.

eng_prompt: Local sports teams have been struggling to find suitable venues for their training sessions and matches. To enhance their skills and foster community engagement, the region needs a stadium to host friendly matches as a way of practising.
lug_prompt: Ttiimu z'ebyemizannyo mu kitundu zibadde zirwana okufuna ebifo ebisaanira okutendekebwa n'okuzannya emipiira gyazo. Okutumbula obukugu bwabwe n'okutumbula okukwatagana kw'ekitundu, ekitundu kyetaaga ekisaawe okukyaza emipiira gy'omukwano ng'engeri y'okwegezaamu.
ach_prompt: Tim me tuku me tedero gubedo ka yele me nongo kabedo maber me pwonye ki tuko. Me ilo rwom me diro gi ki medo rwom me tic pa lwak, but piny eni omyero gubed ki bar tuku me larem macalo yoo me pwonye.
teo_prompt: Etionikinit itimun luka aboliasio adumun aiboisio nuajokak kanu aituutoonor keda abolia kec. Kanu aitogogong acoasineikec ka aisinyikokin itunga aswam, ekot aiboisit aiboikin esawe loka aboliasio nuka ipaper kwape epone loka aitetemonor.

ach_prompt: Dwon me woo obedo ka winyo I ot ne weng, ma obedo gin ma wangeyo I kwowa me nino ducu. I kare mapol onongo atye ki miti me bedo ki kuc, ento onongo pe atwero nongo ne.

lgg_prompt: O'duko 'bani o'duko gbazuri ma o'duko ga jo ma aliasi dria, e'yo amani nile ra te e'yo ama vile idri o'du driasi 'diyi ma dria onzi. Ma esu ma ma ngulupi sawa driasi asi anzuru le, te eri sawa driasi e'da kile ma econi ca ku.
nyn_prompt: Orwari rw'okuteera enduuru rukahurirwa omu nju yoona, ekyabaire nikitwetegyereza kandi kituremeeza omu magara gaitu aga buriizooba. Nkaba nkira kwesherurira obwire bw'obusingye, kwonka buriijo kikaba nikireebeka nk'ekitarikubaasika.

eng_prompt: As we sit here discussing our dreams and aspirations, I'm curious to know what truly drives you. Everyone has something that ignites their enthusiasm; for you, what is it?
lug_prompt: Nga bwe tutudde wano nga twogera ku birooto byaffe n'ebiruubirirwa byaffe, njagala okumanya ekikukubiriza.
ach_prompt: I kare ma watye kany ka nywako lok I kom lek ki miti wa, atye ki miti me ngeyo ngo ma weko wucito anyim.
teo_prompt: Kwape iboikin sio ne aitemitem airujasiawok keda apeleikinatawok, akoto eong ajenun ibore yeneyangauni jo.
lgg_prompt: Amani rizu 'dia e'yo onzezu orobi amavile 'diyi ma dria azini e'yo amani lele 'diyi ma dria, ma ava be nizu e'yo a'dani mi dri cepiri a'dini yari ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ku turikushutama aha nituhanuura ebirooto byaitu n'ebi turikwenda, nyine ekihika ky'okumanya ekirikubareetera.

eng_prompt: Uganda is known for its diverse cultural and religious landscape. Among the various communities, the presence of Muslim families adds to the country's rich tapestry of traditions and beliefs.
lug_prompt: Uganda emanyiddwa olw'ebyobuwangwa n'enzikiriza zaayo ez'enjawulo. Mu bitundu eby'enjawulo, okubeerawo kw'amaka g'abasiraamu kwongera ku bugagga bw'eggwanga mu nnono n'enzikiriza.
ach_prompt: Lobo Uganda tye ki tekwaro ki dini mapatpat. I kin kabedo mapat-pat, bedo tye pa gangi pa cilam medo tekwaro ki niyee pa lobo man.
teo_prompt: Ejenara Uganda kanu inonosio keda idiinin luegelegela. Kotoma atekerin nuegelegela, ajaut naka ikalia lu isiramun iyatakini nuka inonosio keda aiyuunikec.
lgg_prompt: Ba ni kari Uganda niri e'yo suruni azini e'yo aitanisi ndundu 'diyisi. Ongulumu ndundu eyi ma eselea, familia isilamu eyini 'diyi ma aa'ta ni kari 'di ma e'yo a'ita ni 'diyi ma omgbo otu.
nyn_prompt: Uganda nemanywa ahabw'eby'obuhangwa n'eby'ediini bitari bimwe na bimwe. Omu byanga ebitarikushushana, okubaho kw'amaka g'abasiraamu nikyongyera aha migyenzo n'enyikiriza y'eihanga.

eng_prompt: As the sun sets, communities gather to break their fast together. This time of year holds great significance for many believers.
lug_prompt: Ng'enjuba egwa, ebitundu bikungaana okukomya okusiiba kwabyo wamu. Ekiseera kino eky'omwaka kya mugaso nnyo eri abakkiriza bangi.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma ceng tye ka poto, lwak gure me kwero cam kacel. Kare man me mwaka pire tek tutwal bot luyee mapol.
teo_prompt: Neilibunor akolong, etukonokinos itunga ailip nepepe. Ejaasi apakio nu nuka ekaru keda ajokis naepol noi kanejaas iyuunak luipu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo etuka ni 'deria, ongulumu eyi eyi oku eyini eyi ma nyaka 'dazu tualu. Sa'wa eli ni 'diri ma orodri angiri 'ba e'yo a'ita ni 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Omushana ku gurikugwaho, abantu b'omubyaro nibeteeranira hamwe okusiiba. Obwire obu obw'omwaka n'obw'omugasho munonga aha baikiriza baingi.

eng_prompt: After years of neglect and wear, the community decided it was time to restore the historic building. Plans were drawn up to breathe new life into the mosque, ensuring it would serve future generations.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka gy'okulagajjalirwa n'okukozesebwa, ekitundu kyasalawo nti kye kiseera okuzzaawo ekizimbe kino eky'ebyafaayo. Enteekateeka zaakolebwa okussa obulamu obuggya mu muzikiti, okukakasa nti gujja kuweereza emirembe egijja.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol ma ki cayo dok ki nywaro tic kwede, lwak gumoko ni kare dong oromo me roco gedo man macon-ni. Kiyubu yub me kelo kwo manyen I ot lega pa cilam wek okony anyim.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu lu apalunitai, apotu itunga lu atutubet koseutu ebe erai apak naka ainyakun aduketait naka akiro nukolosek. Aponi kitolomunai aitemonokineta nu aijar emusikit, kanu awanyun ebe ebuni aijaanakin itunga lu oingaren.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani adizu azini adizu 'bori ma vutia, ongulumu 'da 'du e'yo kini sa'wa ca jo adi ni 'da ogozu o'diru. Ba o'ba otita eyi eyini eyini ani lezu maskiti 'da ma aa edri o'diru eyini ani aa'zu orodriru ewu drialeri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okunagaijura n'okusiisikara, abantu bakasharamu ngu n'obwire bw'okugaruraho ekyombeko ky'ebyafaayo. Enteekateeka zikakorwa okureeta amagara masya omu muzigiti, okureeba ngu niguheereza abantu b'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: Kibuli mosque is one of the largest and most significant places of worship in the region. Every week, the community gathers there to participate in communal prayers and spiritual activities.
lug_prompt: Omuzikiti gw'e Kibuli kye kimu ku bifo eby'okusinzizaamu ebisinga obunene era ebikulu mu kitundu. Buli wiiki, abantu bakungaana eyo okwetaba mu kusaba okw'awamu n'emirimu gy'eby'omwoyo.
ach_prompt: Ot lega pa cilam me Kibuli obedo acel me kin odi lega madongo dok ma pigi tego tutwal I but lobo man. Cabit ki cabit, lwak gure kunu me lega kacel ki timo jami me cwiny.
teo_prompt: Erai emusikit loko Kibuli ediopet kotoma aiboisio nuapolok noi nu ilipere kotoma aiboisit kana. Kangolisabiti, atukonokin itunga ngina kanu ailip nepepe keda aswamisinei nuka edini.
lgg_prompt: Maskiti Kibuli niri eri pari inzita inzizu ambo ndeni angu 'di ma alea 'diyi ma azi. Sabiti dria vusi, ongulumu yi oku yi 'daa muzu Mungu ziza tualu azini 'yeta e'yo aitanisi 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Omuzigiti gw'e Kibuli nigumwe aha myanya y'okuramizamu erikukirayo obuhango omu kyanga. Buri sande, abantu nibateeranayo okwejumba omu kushabira hamwe n'emirimo y'eby'omwoyo.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the evidence and cross-referencing the sources, we found numerous inconsistencies. As a result, we doubt everything in his report.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya obujulizi n'okukwataganya ensibuko, twazudde obutakkaanya bungi. N'ekivuddemu, tubuusabuusa buli kimu ekiri mu alipoota ye.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo caden ki ngiyo kama gu aa ki iye, wanongo jami mapol ma pe rwatte. Macalo adwogi ne, watye ki akala-kala I kom jami weng matye I adwoki me kwed mege.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor aitogogongoret keda aingic alibuneta, apotu sio adumutu iboro luipu lumam iswamaete ejok. Kanuka ngun, abuonokin iso akiro kere nuejaasi toma oripootake.
lgg_prompt: Afa ecetaru 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, ama esu e'yo yi ma eselea 'diyi karakara. E'yo 'disi, ama ega e'yo dria eri vile o'duko siza ma alia 'diyi ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma obujurizi n'okushwijuma oburugo, tukashanga ebintu bingi ebitarikukwatanisa. N'ekyarugiremu, nitubangaanisa buri kimwe omu ripota ye.

eng_prompt: Recent demographic studies have shown significant shifts in population trends across various regions. As a result, various religious communities are experiencing changes in their numbers.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko ku muwendo gw'abantu kulaga enkyukakyuka ey'amaanyi mu mbeera y'abantu mu bitundu eby'enjawulo. N'ekivuddemu, amadiini ag'enjawulo gafuna enkyukakyuka mu bungi bwago.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki I kom wel dano onyuto aloka-loka madit tutwal I kom wel dano I but lobo mapat-pat. Macalo adwogi ne, dini mapat-pat tye ka nongo aloka-loka I welgi.
teo_prompt: Aingic naka itunga kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela itodunit aijulanakineta nuipu noi kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela. Kanuka ngun, eutasi iriongeta lu ediini aijulakin enaaba kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza o'diru e'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma dria ri ece ojata okporu e'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma dria angu ndundu eyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, ongulumu e'yo aitanisi ndundu 'diyi ojata isu kalafe yini ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho ahaby'omuhendo gw'abantu kworeka empindahinduka y'amaani omu bantu omu byanga bitari bimwe na bimwe. N'ekyarugiremu, amadiini maingi gariyo nigakora empindahinduka omu muhendo gwago.

eng_prompt: After a series of violent protests erupted in the city, law enforcement was called in to restore order. As tensions escalated, officers began identifying and detaining the instigators.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekalakaasa okw'amaanyi okwabalukawo mu kibuga, abakuumaddembe baayitibwa okuzzaawo obutebenkevu. Obunkenke bwe bwagenda bweyongera, abasirikale baatandika okuzuula n'okukwata abakubiriza.
ach_prompt: Inge jemo mapol ma otimme I boma ne, kilwongo abili me dwoko kuc. I kare ma telle omedde, abili ocako niang ki mako joo ma ocako tim ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aidiya naepol noi kotoma oibuga, aponi onyaraunai ipolisin ainyakun ainapakina. Neyatakinor atiokisio, apotu ipolisin kogeutu ajenun ka aikamar ngul luetegearitos ngun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ni e'dozu aku ambu city niri ma alea 'bori ma vutia, 'ba omve 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi e'yo otuzu. Erita ako ni tuzu uru, azi'ba eyi e'do 'ba e'yo nde 'yepi 'diyi esu azini eyi obi arujoa.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okwesharinga kw'akaimukiriro omu rurembo, ab'eby'obutegyeki bakeetwa kugaruraho obusingye. Obunkenke ku bwayeyongyeire, abapooriisi bakatandika kumanya n'okukwata abarikubureeta.

eng_prompt: The local community has been discussing the need for a larger place of worship. After months of planning and fundraising, the project has finally been approved.
lug_prompt: Abantu b'omu kitundu babadde bateesa ku bwetaavu bw'ekifo ekinene eky'okusinzizaamu. Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okuteekateeka n'okusonda ssente, pulojekiti yasembyeyo okukkirizibwa.
ach_prompt: Lwak gubedo ka lok I kom miti me gedo ot lega madit. Ingee dwe mapol me yube ki jogo cente, dong kimoko yub eni.

lgg_prompt: Ongulumu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ebi agbatara gba e'yo lezu angu inzita inzizu angiri ni ma dria. Mba otuta 'yezu azini robia trazu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba asizu otita 'da ai ra.
nyn_prompt: Abantu b'omukyanga batwire nibagaaniira aha kyetengo ky'omwanya muhango gw'okuramizamu. Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okuteekateekyera n'okurundaana esente, purogyekiti ekahwaho yaikirizibwa.

eng_prompt: As the project progressed, tensions began to rise among the team members. Different opinions on the best approach to take led to a series of heated discussions.
lug_prompt: Pulojekiti bwe yagenda mu maaso, obunkenke bwatandika okulinnya mu bammemba ba ttiimu. Endowooza ez'enjawulo ku ngeri esingayo obulungi ey'okukwatamu zaaviirako okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: I kare ma yub ne tye ka wot anyim, telle ocako medde ikin lumemba me dul ne. Tam mapat-pat I kom yoo maber loyo weng ma omyero ki tii kwede okelo laro lok mapol tutwal.
teo_prompt: Neautar epurojekt alosit, apotu ingungeta kogeutu aiyatakin kanejaas imeban luka etimu. Aomisio nuegelegela nuikamunitos epone loibusakinit aswam abu koyangau ipegeta luipu.
lgg_prompt: Otita 'da ni muzu drile, asi otiza e'do tu 'ba amuti 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eselea. Egata ndundu geri kililiru 'bani ecozu eyi 'yezu ri ma dria ri fe agbatara okporu 'diyi.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing challenges faced by vulnerable communities, many individuals are coming together to address pressing social issues. These efforts are particularly evident among various religious groups, including Muslims, who are mobilizing resources and support.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ebisoomooza ebyeyongera ebisangibwa abantu abateesobola, abantu bangi bali wamu okukola ku nsonga z'embeera z'abantu ez'amangu. Kaweefube ono yeeyolekera nnyo mu bibiina by'eddiini eby'enjawulo omuli n'eby'obusiraamu ebikunga abantu okubawa obuyambi.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko matye kamede ma lwak ma goro nongo, dano mapol tye ka ribbe kacel me tyeko peko mapigi tego me kwo pa lwak. Tute man nen tutwalle I kin dule me dini mapat-pat, ma I kingi obedo cilam, ma tye ka rayo lim ki kony.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu itereikina keda itunga lu ican, eutasi itunga aimorikikin aitemokin atiokisio nuepolok. Esubit noi aswamisio nu kanejaas igurupun lu ediini, aimoriarit isiramun, lu imorikikinete agangat keda iboro.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ongulumu e'yo ewaru ma alia 'diyini esu 'diyi ma aza kozu, 'ba karakara eyi emu tualu e'yo ewaru o'bi eyini 'diyi ma aza kozu. Okpo 'diyi e'da tutuni amuti dini ni ndundu eyi ma eselea isilamu eyini 'diyi ma eselea, eyini afa ndundu eyi trazu azini atita fezu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi obweyongyeire oburikushangwa abantu abatarikwebaasa, abantu baingi bariyo nibekwatanisa kukora aha nshonga z'abantu. Amaani aga nigareebeka munonga omu bibiina by'ediini ebitarikushushana, otwariiremu n'abasiraamu, abarikurundaana obuhwezi n'ebintu.

eng_prompt: During my tenure as project manager, we prioritized sustainable water solutions for the community. As a result, we initiated several infrastructure projects to improve access to clean water.
lug_prompt: Mu kiseera kye nnamala nga maneja wa pulojekiti, twakulembeza okugonjoola amazzi mu kitundu. N'ekyavaamu, twatandika pulojekiti z'ebizimbe ez'enjawulo okutumbula okufuna amazzi amayonjo.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma abedo macalo lador yub, waketo cwiny wa I kom yoo me nongo pii maber pi lwak. Macalo adwogi ne, wacako yub mapat-pat me medo yoo me nongo pii maleng.
teo_prompt: Kapak kana ajaar eong kwape eyaiton epurojekt, apodokinit sio aitemokin nuka akipi kanu itunga. Kanuka ngun, apotu sio ageutu ipurojektin luipu kanu adumun akipi nu elaete.
lgg_prompt: Sawa mani ovuzu 'ba e'yo otita 'da ma drilea ri si, ama 'ba e'yo yi ma aza kozu ongulumu eyidri ri okporu. E'yo 'disi, ama e'do otita afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma ayuza ma omgbo otuzu yi ala ma esuta ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire obu naabaire ndi manegya wa purogyekiti, tukaba nitwebembeza eby'okureeberera abantu omu by'amaizi. N'ekyarugiremu, tukataho purogyekiti z'okwombeka, okwongyera amaizi marungi.

eng_prompt: In light of recent tensions and conflicts within the community, leaders gathered to discuss the importance of unity and understanding. They emphasized the need for collaboration and mutual respect among all members.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bunkenke n'obukuubagano obwaliwo mu kitundu gye buvuddeko, abakulembeze baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bukulu bw'obumu n'okutegeeragana. Baakkaatiriza obwetaavu bw'okukolagana n'okussa ekitiibwa mu bammemba bonna.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki telle ki lweny ma obedo tye ikin lwak cokcok-ki, lutela gugure me nywako lok I kom ber pa ribe ki winye. Guketo cwinygi tutwal I kom miti me winye ki woro ikin lumemba weng.
teo_prompt: Katupitos ingungeta keda ingungeta luka atutubet, apotu engarenok kimorikikinos kanu aitemitem ajokis naka aimorikikina keda apuponoro. Apotu kesi kitogogongoto eipud loka aiswamanara keda ayongite itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako azini ngiringiri ongulumu eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma e'yosi, drice'ba eyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo ti ecita ni azini vata ni 'diyi ma orodri ma dria. Eyi 'ba asi e'yo lezu ti ecita azini inzita 'ba dria memba ru 'diyi ma eselea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obutaikirizana n'obutaikirizana obwahwaire omu bantu, abebembezi bakateerana kuhanuura aha mugasho gw'okukwatanisa n'okwetegyerezana. Bakashoboorora ekyetengo ky'okukwatanisa n'okuheerezana ekitiinisa omu bantu boona.

eng_prompt: Frustrated by the lack of transparency in government spending, the citizens gathered at the town hall meeting. They expressed their concerns about how their hard-earned money was being utilized.
lug_prompt: Olw'obutaba na bwerufu mu nsaasaanya ya gavumenti, bannansi baakuŋŋaanidde mu lukiiko lwa town hall. Baalaga obweraliikirivu bwabwe ku ngeri ssente zaabwe ze baakola n'amaanyi gye zaali zikozesebwamu.
ach_prompt: Pi cwer cwiny pi peko me cente ma gamente tiyo kwede, anywali gucokke I kacokke me town hall. Gunyutu lworo gi i kom kit ma kitye katic kwede ki cente ma gutiyo matek me nongo.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga kotukokinos toma airiamunet naka atukot naka apugan naarai amamete aica kotoma aitosom ikapun luka apugan. Apotu kesi itodutu aiyalongongo kec kanu eipone lo itwasamaere ikapun lu iswamata kesi kagogong.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani e'yo ada gavumete ma robia ayuza ma dria kuri ma e'yosi, kari anzi eyi tra eyi mitingi town hall niri ma alea. Eyi e'da asi otiza eyini geri 'bani robia eyini esu okposi 'diyi ayuzu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwerarikirira ahabw'eibura ry'oburingaaniza omu nkoresa ya gavumenti, abatuuragye baketeeranira omu rukiiko rwa town hall. Bakoreka okwerarikirira kwabo aha ku esente zaabo ezi bakozire n'amaani zaabaire nizikoresibwa.

eng_prompt: Uganda is known for its rich cultural diversity and religious tolerance. Among the various places of worship, the presence of Islamic centers is quite significant.

eng_prompt: The community has come together to raise funds for the much-needed improvements. After years of wear and tear, it was decided that the mosque required significant repairs and updates.
lug_prompt: Ekitundu kyegasse wamu okusonda ensimbi z'okukola ennongoosereza ezeetaagibwa ennyo. Oluvanyuma lw'emyaka gy'okukozesebwa n'okusaanuuka, kyasalibwawo nti omuzikiti gwetaaga okuddaabirizibwa okw'amaanyi n'okutereezebwa.

eng_prompt: After a long and challenging year, the church had finally come together to support one another through various trials. In his closing remarks, the Bishop expressed his heartfelt appreciation for the dedication and unity shown by all church leaders.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'omwaka omuwanvu era ogusoomooza, ekkanisa yasembyeyo okwegatta okuyambagana mu kugezesebwa okw'enjawulo. Mu bigambo bye eby'okuggalawo, Omulabirizi yalaga okusiima kwe okw'omutima olw'okwewaayo n'obumu obweyolesebwa abakulembeze b'ekkanisa bonna.

eng_prompt: During our weekly gathering, the pastor emphasized the importance of sharing our faith with others. He reminded us that each of us has a role in fulfilling the Great Commission.

lug_prompt: Mu kunoonya okuwangaala, ebisolo bingi bimanyiira embeera zaabyo enkambwe. Eby'obugagga bwe bikendeera, obuzaale bwabwe bubakubiriza okunoonya ebyetaago by'obulamu obwa bulijjo.

teo_prompt: Kanu aimo aijar, ejenete itiang luipu aiboisio nuetioko. Kwape ikidioko iboro, isinyikokitos kesi aimo iboro luipudasi kesi.

lug_prompt: Amaka mangi agazimbibwa mu bifo ebya wansi galwanagana n'okusoomoozebwa kw'ebizimbe. N'ekivuddemu, abatuuze batera okusanga obuzibu n'ebyobuyonjo.

eng_prompt: We've been struggling to find a reliable supply of water for our daily needs. The nearest well is miles away, making it difficult to access.
lug_prompt: Tubadde tulwana okufuna amazzi ageesigika ag'okukozesa mu byetaago byaffe ebya buli lunaku. Oluzzi oluli okumpi luli mayiro eziwera, ekikaluubiriza okutuuka.

eng_prompt: Given the increasing water scarcity in our area, we need to find a reliable source for our household needs. After researching various options, it seems that a borehole would be the most effective solution.
lug_prompt: Olw'ebbula ly'amazzi eryeyongera mu kitundu kyaffe, twetaaga okufuna ensibuko eyeesigika ey'ebyetaago by'awaka. Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza ku ngeri ez'enjawulo, kirabika nti nnayikondo y'esinga okukola.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a noticeable increase in the number of people engaging in home gardening. This trend is particularly evident among women, who are taking up the practice to promote sustainability and healthy eating.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise wabaddewo okweyongera mu muwendo gw'abantu abeenyigira mu kulima ennimiro awaka. Enkola eno yeeyolekera nnyo mu bakazi, abatwala enkola eno okutumbula obulamu n'endya ennungi.

lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, 'ba amvu 'yapi akua 'diyi ma kalafe tu ra. E'yo 'di ni i e'da tuni oku eyi ma eselea, eyini e'yo 'di 'yezu eyini ani ecozu aa'zu ewu drialeri ma alea dika nyaka nyaza muke ri ma omgbo otuzu.

eng_prompt: After assessing the community's water needs, the local leaders held a meeting to discuss potential solutions. They agreed that access to clean water was a priority and decided to take action.

lug_prompt: Omuyaga ogw'amaanyi gwakuba ekitundu, ne guleeta enkuba ey'amaanyi n'empewo ey'amaanyi. Akavuyo bwe kaali kagenda mu maaso, enduulu z'ebisolo by'omu nsiko zaawulikika mu kizikiza.

lgg_prompt: Ozoo okporu ni aci angu 'da ma alea dria, ozo okporu azini oli okporu 'diyi eji. E'yo ngiringiri ni 'yeria, o'duko anyapa asea 'diyiniri e'da angu ini ma alia.

lug_prompt: Enjuba bwe yatandika okugwa, abasajja abaali bambadde masiki baasemberera abantu be baali baagala okutta nga tebamanyi. Mu bwangu, bawanika ebyokulwanyisa byabwe, nga baagala ebintu bye eby'omuwendo.

eng_prompt: As tensions escalated in the crowded marketplace, gunfire erupted unexpectedly. In the chaos, he became an innocent victim of the violence.

eng_prompt: With the growing global population and increasing demand for food, researchers are focusing on innovative solutions. As a result, advancements in technology and sustainable practices are becoming a priority in the agricultural sector.

ach_prompt: Ki wel dano matye kamede I wilobo kacel ki miti me cam matye kamede, lukwed tye ka yenyo yoo me cobo peko man. Macalo adwogi ne, dongo lobo me tet ki diro me pur tye ka doko gin ma pire tek tutwal I tenge me pur.

N'ekyarugiremu, entunguuka omu tekinorogye hamwe n'emitwarize y'obuhangwa n'obuhingi n'oburiisa n'oburiisa, biriyo nibitwarwa nka bikuru omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa.

eng_prompt: In response to changing climate conditions and the need for sustainable food production, many farmers are exploring diverse agricultural methods. As a result, people are practising mixed farming.

lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi, abantu abagagga beeyongera okusiga ensimbi mu nnima eziyimirizaawo. Omuze guno gulaga obwagazi obweyongera mu bulimi nga omulimu oguleeta amagoba n'engeri y'okutumbula enkwata y'obutonde bw'ensi.
ach_prompt: I but lobo mapol, lulonyo gitye ka keto cente I pur matye kamede anyim. Man nyutu miti madit matye I kom pur macalo biacara ma kelo magoba ki bene macalo yoo me gwoko cwec ma orumuwa.
teo_prompt: Kaiboisio nuipu, eutasi itunga luebaritos aipikakin ikapun kec toma akoru na ejok. Itodunit aswamisioit ngin eipud loepol noi loka akoru kwape ibore yenimedaunete ikapun luipu ka epone loka aitopoloria ejautene lo akwap.
lgg_prompt: Angu karakara eyi ma alea, 'ba lonyi be 'diyi curu'do e'yo ori ezoza ni ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi 'ye. E'yo 'di ece ava tupi agirikica ma dria ri ekile tujari orodriru azini geri ecozu angu ama agei ri ma tambazu ri le.
nyn_prompt: Omu byanga bingi, abantu abagaiga beyongyeire kuta esente omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa. Enkora egi neeyoreka obwegyendesereza omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa nk'omuringo gw'okutunguura eby'obuhangwa.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent drought and its impact on agriculture, local officials held a meeting to discuss support for struggling farmers. As part of their relief efforts, the government has provided seeds to the farmers.
lug_prompt: Olw'ekyeya ekyaliwo gye buvuddeko n'engeri gye kyakosaamu ebyobulimi n'obulunzi, abakungu b'ebyalo baatuuza olukiiko okuteesa ku buyambi eri abalimi n'abalunzi abali mu buzibu. Ng'omu ku mirimu gyabwe egy'obuyambi, gavumenti egabidde abalimi ensigo.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me ceng ma obedo tye cokcok-ki ki adwoki ne I kom pur, lutic me tedero gubedo ki kacoke me nywako lok me konyo lupur matye I peko. Macalo yoo acel me miyo kony, gamente omiyo kodi bot lupur.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin akamu napac keda epone loetiroritor ngesi akoru, apotu eswamak luka atutubet iriamunos kanu aitemitem agangat mama ejaasi akoriok luejaasi keda ationis. Kwape ediope kotoma agangat kec, abu apugan ijaik akoriok ikinyom.
lgg_prompt: E'yo etuka eturisi azini e'yo erini 'ye agirikica ma dria ri ma e'yosi, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi 'ye mitingi agbatara gbazu atita fezu 'ba amvu 'ya'ba e'yo ewaru 'diyi dri. Okpo eyini 'ba 'diyi ma aza kozu ri ma azi ru, gamete awa ori 'ba amvu 'yapi 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ekyanda ekiriho obwahati hamwe n'oburemeezi bw'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa, abakuru b'ebyaro bakakora orukiiko rw'okuhanuura aha buhwezi bw'abahingi abarikurwana. Nk'emwe aha nkora yaabo y'obuhwezi,gavumenti egabiire abahingi embibo.

eng_prompt: To support the livelihoods of farmers and boost the economy, it is crucial to implement effective agricultural policies. This includes creating strategies that facilitate the sale and distribution of crops.
lug_prompt: Okuyambako abalimi n'abalunzi n'okutumbula ebyenfuna, kikulu nnyo okussaawo enkola ennungi mu byobulimi n'obulunzi. Kino kizingiramu okuteekawo enkola ezanguya okutunda n'okugaba ebirime.
ach_prompt: Me tyelo kor kwo pa lupur ki medo rwom me timo biacara, pire tek tutwal me keto cik me pur ma tiyo maber itic. Man kwako yubu yoo me cato ki poko cam.
teo_prompt: Kanu aigang aijar naka akoriok ka aitopolor edumune loka ikapun, ejokuna noi aitegear ainapeta nu akoru nu iswamaete ejok. Imoriaritos nu aitolomun iwaitin lu igangakinete agwelanar keda aikor iraan.
lgg_prompt: Ba amvu 'yapi 'diyi ma idri ta mbazu tualu e'yo robiani 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, eri orodriru azita agirikica ni 'diyi 'bazu azi ngazu kililiru. Di ma alia geri 'bani ecozu afa nyakuni 'diyi ozizu azini awazu ra 'diyi ma e'dota indi.
nyn_prompt: Okuhwera abahingi n'abariisa n'okutunguura eby'entaasya, n'eky'omugasho okuta ebiragiro by'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa omu nkora. Eki nikitwariramu okutandikaho oburyo bw'okuguza n'okugaba ebihingirwe.

eng_prompt: In today's competitive agricultural market, it's essential for farmers to optimize their resources and expertise. By focusing on specific areas of production, they can enhance efficiency and profitability.
lug_prompt: Mu katale k'ebyobulimi ak'ennaku zino akavuganya, kyetaagisa abalimi okukozesa obulungi ebintu byabwe n'obukugu bwabwe. Nga essira balitadde ku bifo ebimu eby'okufulumya ebintu, basobola okwongera ku buwanguzi n'amagoba.
ach_prompt: I cuk me pur ma ite kare ni ma pyem tye matek tutwal, pire tek tutwal ki lupur me tic ki jami gi ki diro gi. Kace giketo cwinygi I kom kabedo mapat-pat me yubu jami, ci gi twero medo rwom me tic ki nongo magoba.
teo_prompt: Kotoma osokoni loka akoru loka lolo loepol abolobol, ejokuka noi akoriok aitojokar iboro kec keda acoa kec. Kowai lo apodokinit aiboisio ace nuka aitolomio, epedorete kesi aitojokar eswamae loejok ka ameda.
lgg_prompt: Cuu agirikica ni andruri ma alia baka seza be, eri orodriru 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi dri afa yini 'diyi ayuzu kililiru azini ondua yini 'diyi ayuzu. Geri 'bani asi 'bazu angu 'bani afa edezu 'diyi ma dria, eyi eco geri afa edezu 'diyi ma omgbo otu azini orodri esuzu ri ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu katare k'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa ak'erizooba akarimu okuhayahayana kw'amaani, n'eky'omugasho abahingi n'abariisa okukoresa kurungi ebintu byabo n'obukugu bwabo. Kubarikuta amaani omu myanya y'okukoreramu, nibabaasa kwongyera amaani n'amagoba.

eng_prompt: As the community continues to grow, it is essential to consider the impact of land use on local farming practices. Proper management and foresight will ensure that agricultural activities can thrive alongside urban development.
lug_prompt: Ekitundu bwe kigenda kyeyongera okukula, kyetaagisa okulowooza ku ngeri enkola y'ettaka gy'ekosaamu ennima y'omu kitundu. Enzirukanya ennungi n'okulaba mu maaso bijja kukakasa nti ebyobulimi n'obulunzi bisobola okukulaakulana wamu n'enkulaakulana y'ebibuga.
ach_prompt: Ka lwak tye kamede ki dongo, pire tek tutwal me neno adwoki pa tic ki ngom i kom tic me pur. Doro tic maber kacel ki neno anyim obi weko tic me pur dongo kacel ki dongo lobo.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokini atutubet apoloun, ejokuna aomoom nuikamunitos epone lo itwasamaere alupok kanu akoru. Aitemonokin iboro ejok ka aanyun ebe epedorete aswamisinei nuka akor apol nepepe keda apol naka itaunin.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu eyini zozu drile, eri orodriru e'yo angu ayuza niri ma 'yeta e'yo ori ezoza ni angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma dria ri ma dria. Driceza kililiru azini egata kililiru ri ni nga ne ra kini 'yeta agirikica ni 'diyi eco zo tualu angu tawuni ru 'diyi ma ezota be ra.
nyn_prompt: Ekyanga kukirikugumizamu nikikura, n'eky'omugasho okureeba oku okukoresa eitaka kurikukwata aha buhingi n'oburiisa bw'abantu b'omubyaro. Enkora nungi hamwe n'okureeba omu maisho, nibiija kureeba ngu eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa nibitunguuka hamwe n'entunguuka y'endembo.

eng_prompt: In order to boost local agriculture and improve food security, the district is exploring new crop options. One of the most promising choices is a versatile and resilient crop that can thrive in various conditions.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutumbula ebyobulimi n'obulunzi mu ggwanga n'okwongera ku bungi bw'emmere, disitulikiti enoonyereza ku ngeri endala ez'okulunda. Ekimu ku bintu ebisingayo okuba eby'omugaso kwe kulima ebirime ebisobola okukula obulungi mu mbeera ez'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Me ilo malo rwom me pur ki gwoko cam, district tye ka yenyo jami apita mukene. Yo acel maber loyo weng en aye cam ma tiyo i kom jami mapat-pat dok twero dongo I kabedo mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor akoru na akwap ka aitojokar inyamat, euta edisitrikt aingic iponesio lu akoru luitetiak. Adiopet kotoma aseununeta nuajokak noi ngesi iraan luepedorete apoloun kotoma ojautene loegelegela.
lgg_prompt: E'yo agirikica angu 'da ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu dika nyaka ma omgbo otuzu, distrikiti ni geri ori eyi ezozu o'diru 'diyi onda. Afa 'bani eco 'ye onyiru ndeni 'diyi ma azi eri ori azi onyiru azini okporu ecopi zopi e'yo ndundu eyi ma alea ra ni i.
nyn_prompt: Okutunguura eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa omwihanga hamwe n'okutunguura eby'okurya, disiturikiti eriyo necondooza aha bintu ebindi by'obuhingi. Kimwe aha bintu ebirikukirayo kurungi, n'ebihingirwe ebirikubaasa kukurira embeera zitarikushushana.

eng_prompt: In today's competitive agricultural landscape, collaboration among farmers has become essential. By sharing resources and knowledge, they can tackle challenges more effectively.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ey'okuvuganya mu byobulimi n'obulunzi, okukolera awamu mu balimi n'abalunzi kifuuse kikulu nnyo. Bwe bagabana ebintu n'amagezi, basobola okukola ku bizibu mu ngeri ennungi.
ach_prompt: I kare me pyem me pur ma ite kare ni, ribbe ikin lupur obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal. Ka gupoko jami ki ngec, gitwero lweny i kom peko mapat-pat I yoo maber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolobol naka akoru ilolo, epolok noi aimorikikina kanejaas akoriok. Kowai lo aimor iboro keda acoa, epedorete kesi aitemokin atiokisio ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo agirikica ni ewu andruri ma alea baka seza ma alea, ti ecita 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi ma eselea ri eca curu'do orodriru. Afa ayuzaru azini ondua awaza vusi, yi eco e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza ko kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa eby'erizooba, okukwatanisa ahagati y'abahingi n'abariisa kihindukire eky'omugasho. Kubarikugabana eby'obugaiga n'obwengye, nibabaasa kurwanisa oburemeezi omu muringo murungi.

eng_prompt: In order to enhance the efficiency of agricultural outreach programs, it is essential to address the logistical challenges faced by the staff. Many extension workers are struggling to reach remote areas where their services are most needed.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutumbula obulungi bwa pulogulaamu z'ebyobulimi n'obulunzi, kya mugaso okukola ku kusoomoozebwa kw'abakozi kwe basanga. Abakola ku nsonga z'abantu bangi bafuba okutuuka mu byalo awali obwetaavu bw'obuweereza bwabwe.
ach_prompt: Me medo rwom me yub me pur, pire tek tutwal me tyeko peko ma lutic tye ka kato ki iye. Lutic mapol gitye ka tute matek me oo I caro kama tic gi mite iye tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kanu aikeun eswamae loajokan loka ainapeta nuka akoru, ejokuna aitemokin atiokisio nu ejaas eswamak. Eswamak luipu luka aiboisio nu ocaalo etionikinit adolere aiboisio nu ekotoi noi aijaanakinikec.
lgg_prompt: Otita agirikica ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, eri orodriru e'yo ewaru azi'ba eyini esu 'diyi ma aza kozu. Azi'ba karakara eyi dri ci cazu angu caloru 'bani eyi ma azakoza le tu 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Okubaasa kwongyera amaani omu puroguraamu z'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa, n'eky'omugasho kukora aha buremeezi bw'abakozi. Abashaho baingi nibarwana kuhika omu myanya y'ebyaro ahu obuheereza bwabo burikwetengwa munonga.

eng_prompt: In an effort to streamline agricultural support, the ministry conducted a comprehensive survey of local farmers. Based on their primary crops, the ministry has categorized the farmers into maize, coffee, rice, and cassava growers.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula obuyambi bw'ebyobulimi, minisitule yakola okunoonyereza okujjuvu ku balimi b'omu kitundu. Okusinziira ku birime byabwe ebisookerwako, minisitule egabanyizza abalimi mu bika by'abalimi b'emmwaanyi, emmwanyi, omuceere ne muwogo.
ach_prompt: I tute me medo kony me pur, gangkal otimo kwed matut I kom lupur me tedero. Ma lubbe ki jami apita ma gipito, gangkal opoko lupur ne I dul mapat-pat macalo anyogi, kawa, mucele ki gwana.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitigogong agangat na akoru, abu erionget kiswama aingic naepol noi mama ejaasi akoriok luka atutubet. Kotupitete iraanakec lusodit, abu erionget kitutub akoriok ngun araun akoriok emudunga, emwanyi, emuceri keda emuogo.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu atita agirikica niri ma omgbo otuzu, okalamvu 'da 'ye e'yo eti ondaza angiri 'ba amvu 'yapi ogogo 'diyi ma dria. Okalamvu 'da awa 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi ma esele eyi kaka, kawa, mucele, azini gbanda 'diyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okwongyera obuhwezi omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa, minisiture ekakora okucondooza aha bahingi n'abariisa b'omubyaro. Kurugirira aha bihingwa byabo ebikuru, minisiture etaire abahingi omu bibiina by'abahingi b'ebicoori, omwani, omuceeri hamwe na muhogo.

eng_prompt: Concerns have been raised about the quality of engineering education in Uganda. Many industry experts argue that the curriculum and training provided by universities do not meet the necessary standards.
lug_prompt: Okweraliikirira kuleeteddwa ku mutindo gw'ebyenjigiriza bya yinginiya mu Uganda. Abakugu mu by'amakolero bangi bagamba nti ensoma n'okutendekebwa ebiweebwa mu yunivasite tebituukana na mutindo gwetaagisa.
ach_prompt: Lworo tye I kom rwom me kwan pa ludiro I lobo Uganda. Ludiro mapol giwaco ni yub me pwonye ki pwonye ma gangi kwan me rwom ma malo miyo pe tye I rwom ma mite.
teo_prompt: Aponi itodunai aiyalongongo kanuikamunitos adoketait na asioman naka eijiniaring ko Uganda. Ebakasi ipirioitin luipu ebe aisisiaeta keda aitutuoro na ijaikitai ounibasitin mam itodolikinete adoketait na ekotoi.
lgg_prompt: Ba e'bi asi otiza e'da onita inginiya eyini ri ma wura ma dria kari Uganda niri ma alea. Ba onita be angiri e'yo okalamvu ni 'diyi ma dria 'diyi 'yo kini e'yo onita ni azini imbata university ru 'diyi fe 'diyi cani wura kililiru 'diyi ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Hariho okwerarikirira aha mutindo gw'obwegyese bwa bayinginiya omu Uganda. Abakugu omu by'amakorero nibagira ngu eby'okwegyesa n'okutendeka ebirikuhebwa za yunivasite tibirikuhikaana n'omutindo ogurikwetengwa.
